engChrName: Temporary placement to check event progression. Once night activities, quests, and map movement have been officially added, please delete.
engSearchText:
Temporary placement to check event progression.
Once night activities, quests, and map movement
have been officially added, please delete.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※夜行動やクエスト・マップ移動等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※夜行動やクエスト・マップ移動等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: For general mob character checks. There is a possibility that events will not function correctly if used, so please be careful. *Please delete if not needed.
engSearchText:
For general mob character checks. There is a
possibility that events will not function correctly if
used, so please be careful. *Please delete if
not needed.
jpnChrName: 一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが 正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが
正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: I must say, I'm a little sad that the upper-class citizens scarcely board our trams these days.
engSearchText:
I must say, I'm a little sad that the upper-class citizens
scarcely board our trams these days.
jpnChrName: しかし……最近では上流階級の方々の 導力トラム利用が減ったのは寂しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……最近では上流階級の方々の
導力トラム利用が減ったのは寂しいものです。

engChrName: I understand they are very busy—and are likely dazzled by the glitz and glamor of ETWS cars...
engSearchText:
I understand they are very busy—and are likely
dazzled by the glitz and glamor of ETWS cars...
jpnChrName: もちろん、皆さまもお忙しいですし、 エトワス車の魅力も十分に理解していますが……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、皆さまもお忙しいですし、
エトワス車の魅力も十分に理解していますが……

engChrName: But even so, I feel that our orbal trams hold value as a tradition—and we have a duty to maintain them for our descendants.
engSearchText:
But even so, I feel that our orbal trams hold value as a
tradition—and we have a duty to maintain them for
our descendants.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、だからこそ伝統的な価値として私達が 後世に伝えていく意義もあるのでしょうがね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、だからこそ伝統的な価値として私達が
後世に伝えていく意義もあるのでしょうがね。

engChrName: The orbal tram's late-night rides exist because, at one point in time, nobles used them to return home from high-society gatherings.
engSearchText:
The orbal tram's late-night rides exist because, at one
point in time, nobles used them to return home from
high-society gatherings.
jpnChrName: 導力トラムが遅くまで運行しているのは、かつて 貴人達が社交界の帰りに利用していた名残りです。
jpnSearchText:
導力トラムが遅くまで運行しているのは、かつて
貴人達が社交界の帰りに利用していた名残りです。

engChrName: Most of them use limousines now, but the orbal tram was dearly appreciated in the early days of the Orbal Revolution.
engSearchText:
Most of them use limousines now, but the orbal tram
was dearly appreciated in the early days of the
Orbal Revolution.
jpnChrName: 今では多くの方々はリムジンを利用されますが、 導力革命直後はトラムが好まれていたようで。
jpnSearchText:
今では多くの方々はリムジンを利用されますが、
導力革命直後はトラムが好まれていたようで。

engChrName: During that time, our company replaced its carriages with its first line of trams. They were quite forward thinking in those days.
engSearchText:
During that time, our company replaced its carriages
with its first line of trams. They were quite forward
thinking in those days.
jpnChrName: それまでの馬車便の運営会社の方針が 功を奏したといえるのでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
それまでの馬車便の運営会社の方針が
功を奏したといえるのでしょうな……

engChrName: They realized that, with the normalization of automated vehicles, people desired a means of transit that was reflective of the times.
engSearchText:
They realized that, with the normalization of
automated vehicles, people desired a means of transit
that was reflective of the times.
jpnChrName: 車の普及率が低かったのもあるでしょうが、やはり 慣れ親しんだ様式での移動が求められたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
車の普及率が低かったのもあるでしょうが、やはり
慣れ親しんだ様式での移動が求められたのでしょう。

engChrName: The trams' relaxed pace affords passengers an opportunity to relish the sights of the city.
engSearchText:
The trams' relaxed pace affords passengers an
opportunity to relish the sights of the city.
jpnChrName: トラムは速度などでは他の交通機関に劣りますが、 首都の地下鉄と違い景観をじっくり味わえます。
jpnSearchText:
トラムは速度などでは他の交通機関に劣りますが、
首都の地下鉄と違い景観をじっくり味わえます。

engChrName: They've now become an integral part of the city's aesthetics.
engSearchText:
They've now become an integral part of the
city's aesthetics.
jpnChrName: 景観条例でバスも少ないですしね、トラムは最早 街の景観と一体になった交通機関なのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
景観条例でバスも少ないですしね、トラムは最早
街の景観と一体になった交通機関なのですよ。

engChrName: Welcome to Oración—the city where tradition always lingers. Our world-renowned trams happen to be one such tradition.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Oración—the city where tradition
always lingers. Our world-renowned trams happen to
be one such tradition.
jpnChrName: 古き良き伝統の残る街、オラシオンへようこそ。 このトラムもまた、名所の一つでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
古き良き伝統の残る街、オラシオンへようこそ。
このトラムもまた、名所の一つでしてね。

engChrName: Did you know our company once ran a carriage service? You can learn all about its storied history if you decide to board.
engSearchText:
Did you know our company once ran a
carriage service? You can learn all about its storied
history if you decide to board.
jpnChrName: 運営会社がかつての馬車便の伝統を引き継いでいる 事もあり、アナウンス等にも作法がありまして。
jpnSearchText:
運営会社がかつての馬車便の伝統を引き継いでいる
事もあり、アナウンス等にも作法がありまして。

engChrName: Our trams are the pinnacle of elegance. They are a powerful means by which many experience the culture and history of our city.
engSearchText:
Our trams are the pinnacle of elegance. They are a
powerful means by which many experience the culture
and history of our city.
jpnChrName: そうした趣深さもあって、利便性に関わらず多くの 方々が歴史と文化を味わうためご利用されます。
jpnSearchText:
そうした趣深さもあって、利便性に関わらず多くの
方々が歴史と文化を味わうためご利用されます。

engChrName: It's deeply unfortunate that the recent tragedy has cast a pall over the city, but I hope you can enjoy your time here nonetheless.
engSearchText:
It's deeply unfortunate that the recent tragedy has cast
a pall over the city, but I hope you can enjoy your
time here nonetheless.
jpnChrName: 大きな事件で暗い雰囲気が漂っていますが…… せめて、安堵のひと時を過ごしてもらえれば。
jpnSearchText:
大きな事件で暗い雰囲気が漂っていますが……
せめて、安堵のひと時を過ごしてもらえれば。

engChrName: The number of suspicious individuals has gone down this morning. Did they just up and leave?
engSearchText:
The number of suspicious individuals has gone down
this morning. Did they just up and leave?
jpnChrName: ……今朝は不審者の動きが少ない気もするが、 勝手に引き上げようとしているのか……？
jpnSearchText:
……今朝は不審者の動きが少ない気もするが、
勝手に引き上げようとしているのか……？

engChrName: If they did, then I can't help but wonder why they even came here in the first place.
engSearchText:
If they did, then I can't help but wonder why they
even came here in the first place.
jpnChrName: ……ますます、連中が何のためにこの地に 踏み込んできたのかがわからん……
jpnSearchText:
……ますます、連中が何のためにこの地に
踏み込んできたのかがわからん……

engChrName: We've received reports of activity from jaegers and bracers all around the city.
engSearchText:
We've received reports of activity from jaegers and
bracers all around the city.
jpnChrName: 他の街区の仲間からは猟兵風の者を目撃した事や 遊撃士の活動が妙に活発と聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
他の街区の仲間からは猟兵風の者を目撃した事や
遊撃士の活動が妙に活発と聞いたが……

engChrName: What's going on? And what on earth are the bracers up to?
engSearchText:
What's going on? And what on earth are the bracers
up to?
jpnChrName: ……どうにも、この異常事態……遊撃士の方は 何か掴んでいたりするんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
……どうにも、この異常事態……遊撃士の方は
何か掴んでいたりするんじゃないか？

engChrName: I can't disobey orders from above, but that won't stop me from wondering why the top brass is playing dumb. Something is afoot.
engSearchText:
I can't disobey orders from above, but that won't stop
me from wondering why the top brass is
playing dumb. Something is afoot.
jpnChrName: 上の方針だから逆らえないが……遊撃士が非常時に シラを切るなど、国家に対してどういうつもりだ？
jpnSearchText:
上の方針だから逆らえないが……遊撃士が非常時に
シラを切るなど、国家に対してどういうつもりだ？

engChrName: No signs of suspicious individuals on the rail, and the station's clear, too.
engSearchText:
No signs of suspicious individuals on the rail, and the
station's clear, too.
jpnChrName: 今の所は鉄路での不審者の侵入は無し、 駅でも不審物等の発見は無しか……
jpnSearchText:
今の所は鉄路での不審者の侵入は無し、
駅でも不審物等の発見は無しか……

engChrName: Still, I can't be too lax. This city has many major political and business players—not to mention tourists.
engSearchText:
Still, I can't be too lax. This city has many major
political and business players—not to
mention tourists.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、気を抜く訳にもいかんな……この街には 政財界の有力者もいれば観光客も多くいる。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、気を抜く訳にもいかんな……この街には
政財界の有力者もいれば観光客も多くいる。

engChrName: It's my job to ensure their safety.
engSearchText: It's my job to ensure their safety.
jpnChrName: 警察として彼らの安全を確保するためなら、 用心し過ぎるという事もないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
警察として彼らの安全を確保するためなら、
用心し過ぎるという事もないだろう。

engChrName: The state of emergency has technically been lifted for Oración, but the police have been ordered to remain on alert.
engSearchText:
The state of emergency has technically been lifted for
Oración, but the police have been ordered to remain
on alert.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでは非常事態宣言こそ解除されたが、 警戒は解かないようにと言われていてな……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでは非常事態宣言こそ解除されたが、
警戒は解かないようにと言われていてな……

engChrName: Should we identify any suspicious individuals, we're to keep them marked, but we aren't allowed to confront them.
engSearchText:
Should we identify any suspicious individuals, we're
to keep them marked, but we aren't allowed to
confront them.
jpnChrName: 不審者・不審物については確認され次第、 マークしつつも干渉は避ける方針のようだ。
jpnSearchText:
不審者・不審物については確認され次第、
マークしつつも干渉は避ける方針のようだ。

engChrName: I don't know why the top brass has ordered this... Though I guess it's not my place to question them.
engSearchText:
I don't know why the top brass has ordered this...
Though I guess it's not my place to question them.
jpnChrName: 上の思惑は知らないが……君達もこの辺りで 怪しいモノを見つけたら至急、我々に言うように。
jpnSearchText:
上の思惑は知らないが……君達もこの辺りで
怪しいモノを見つけたら至急、我々に言うように。

engChrName: It sounds as though Monique will be heading off again soon. Time really does fly.
engSearchText:
It sounds as though Monique will be heading off
again soon. Time really does fly.
jpnChrName: モニクもそろそろ発つつもりのようじゃな…… 時間を早く感じるようになったものじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
モニクもそろそろ発つつもりのようじゃな……
時間を早く感じるようになったものじゃ……

engChrName: The year's conclusion is upon us. I just wish it didn't have to end with such a horrible tragedy.
engSearchText:
The year's conclusion is upon us. I just wish it didn't
have to end with such a horrible tragedy.
jpnChrName: 今年ももうじき終わる……災厄を最後に拝む 年末になってしまったがのう……
jpnSearchText:
今年ももうじき終わる……災厄を最後に拝む
年末になってしまったがのう……

engChrName: I'm sure next year will bring more changes to our lives. It's sad to see the old way of life go, but I'd like to see what the future has in store.
engSearchText:
I'm sure next year will bring more changes to
our lives. It's sad to see the old way of life go, but I'd
like to see what the future has in store.
jpnChrName: 来年も……きっと何かが変わりゆくのじゃろうな…… 寂しいような、見応えがあるような……
jpnSearchText:
来年も……きっと何かが変わりゆくのじゃろうな……
寂しいような、見応えがあるような……

engChrName: Times sure are changing. My grandkid is living in a wholly different world from the one I grew up in.
engSearchText:
Times sure are changing. My grandkid is living in a
wholly different world from the one I grew up in.
jpnChrName: それにしても……最近は本当に変わったのう…… 孫たちは、本当に新しい時代に生きておるのじゃな……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……最近は本当に変わったのう……
孫たちは、本当に新しい時代に生きておるのじゃな……

engChrName: When I started out as a railway engineer, we had steam engines, but in the blink of an eye, the age of orbal trains came upon us.
engSearchText:
When I started out as a railway engineer, we had
steam engines, but in the blink of an eye, the age of
orbal trains came upon us.
jpnChrName: 儂が鉄道員になった直後はまだ蒸気機関車も 残っておったが……すぐに導力列車になってな。
jpnSearchText:
儂が鉄道員になった直後はまだ蒸気機関車も
残っておったが……すぐに導力列車になってな。

engChrName: The waves of the Orbal Revolution washed right over me back then...and now I'm feeling them all over again.
engSearchText:
The waves of the Orbal Revolution washed right over
me back then...and now I'm feeling them all
over again.
jpnChrName: あの時に感じた、変革の衝撃を…… また味わっているような気分じゃ……
jpnSearchText:
あの時に感じた、変革の衝撃を……
また味わっているような気分じゃ……

engChrName: Too many people take the boons of technological advancements for granted. I'm glad Monique knows better.
engSearchText:
Too many people take the boons of technological
advancements for granted. I'm glad Monique
knows better.
jpnChrName: 儂の孫は幸いにもちゃんと判っておるようじゃが…… 最近は技術の恩恵が当然と思われ過ぎな気がする。
jpnSearchText:
儂の孫は幸いにもちゃんと判っておるようじゃが……
最近は技術の恩恵が当然と思われ過ぎな気がする。

engChrName: They're tools that should be in human hands. They aren't something we place ourselves into the hands of—so to speak.
engSearchText:
They're tools that should be in human hands.
They aren't something we place ourselves into the
hands of—so to speak.
jpnChrName: じゃが、技術はあくまで人が使うもの……それに 寄りかかってしまっては違うと思っての……
jpnSearchText:
じゃが、技術はあくまで人が使うもの……それに
寄りかかってしまっては違うと思っての……

engChrName: I imagine that horrible incident was caused by a weapon. This is precisely why I don't want technology to dominate our future.
engSearchText:
I imagine that horrible incident was caused by
a weapon. This is precisely why I don't want
technology to dominate our future.
jpnChrName: かの事件でも得体の知れない兵器が使われたそうだが…… ああいう技術が独り歩きしないかも不安だしのう。
jpnSearchText:
かの事件でも得体の知れない兵器が使われたそうだが……
ああいう技術が独り歩きしないかも不安だしのう。

engChrName: I was very worried when I heard Edith was placed under an extended state of emergency.
engSearchText:
I was very worried when I heard Edith was placed
under an extended state of emergency.
jpnChrName: 大変な事件があって、首都では警戒態勢が 長引いていると聞いて心配しとったが……
jpnSearchText:
大変な事件があって、首都では警戒態勢が
長引いていると聞いて心配しとったが……

engChrName: However, talking with my grandkid has put me at ease. If something were to happen to her, I don't know what I'd do with myself.
engSearchText:
However, talking with my grandkid has put me
at ease. If something were to happen to her, I don't
know what I'd do with myself.
jpnChrName: モニクの元気な顔が見れて安心じゃ…… 孫にまで何かあったら儂もどうなるか……
jpnSearchText:
モニクの元気な顔が見れて安心じゃ……
孫にまで何かあったら儂もどうなるか……

engChrName: So, Grandpa, take a look at these photos I took. These are the trains that run on the Tharbad-bound line. Check out that heat sink!
engSearchText:
So, Grandpa, take a look at these photos I took.
These are the trains that run on the
Tharbad-bound line. Check out that heat sink!
jpnChrName: それでねお祖父ちゃん、これがサルバッド方面で運行 している列車でね、排熱器が変わってるでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
それでねお祖父ちゃん、これがサルバッド方面で運行
している列車でね、排熱器が変わってるでしょ？

engChrName: And here's the Edith subway trains. Apparently, they're using new models these days.
engSearchText:
And here's the Edith subway trains.
Apparently, they're using new models these days.
jpnChrName: あとはこっちが首都の地下鉄で、最近は新しい 車種がかなり使われているみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
あとはこっちが首都の地下鉄で、最近は新しい
車種がかなり使われているみたいで……

engChrName: Goodness me. These trains don't look anything like the ones I saw back when I worked on the railroad.
engSearchText:
Goodness me. These trains don't look anything like
the ones I saw back when I worked on the railroad.
jpnChrName: はは、本当に列車も多様化して…… 儂が勤めていた時とはまるで違うのう……
jpnSearchText:
はは、本当に列車も多様化して……
儂が勤めていた時とはまるで違うのう……

engChrName: I never knew you were so interested in this sort of thing. Taking after me, are you?
engSearchText:
I never knew you were so interested in this sort
of thing. Taking after me, are you?
jpnChrName: それにしても、まさかモニクが列車にハマるとは…… これも血筋故といったところなのか……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、まさかモニクが列車にハマるとは……
これも血筋故といったところなのか……

engChrName: Yep. I took some photos of them on a whim and got curious about how they worked—and then the rabbit hole sorta swallowed me whole.
engSearchText:
Yep. I took some photos of them on a whim and got
curious about how they worked—and then the rabbit
hole sorta swallowed me whole.
jpnChrName: うーん、最初はカメラがメインだったけどね、 何だか途中からあちこちの列車が面白くなって！
jpnSearchText:
うーん、最初はカメラがメインだったけどね、
何だか途中からあちこちの列車が面白くなって！

engChrName: Well, it's always good to explore new interests. Curiosity is the key to discovering the wonders of life.
engSearchText:
Well, it's always good to explore new interests.
Curiosity is the key to discovering the wonders of life.
jpnChrName: はは、新しく興味を持てるものを見つけられるのは 良い事じゃ、好奇心は大切じゃからな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、新しく興味を持てるものを見つけられるのは
良い事じゃ、好奇心は大切じゃからな。

engChrName: Now, since you're back home, why don't you pay your parents a visit?
engSearchText:
Now, since you're back home, why don't you pay your
parents a visit?
jpnChrName: どれ、せっかくの帰省なのだし、そろそろ 両親のところにもいてあげたらどうじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
どれ、せっかくの帰省なのだし、そろそろ
両親のところにもいてあげたらどうじゃ？

engChrName: With the times being what they are, I'm sure they'll feel better knowing you're safe.
engSearchText:
With the times being what they are, I'm sure they'll
feel better knowing you're safe.
jpnChrName: こんな時世だしのう……二人もお前と 一緒にいれた方が安心するじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時世だしのう……二人もお前と
一緒にいれた方が安心するじゃろう。

engChrName: Fine... With everything that happened during my trip back, I bet Mom and Dad are worried sick about me.
engSearchText:
Fine... With everything that happened during my trip
back, I bet Mom and Dad are worried sick about me.
jpnChrName: それもそうだね……帰省中にこんな事が起きたもの、 お父さんとお母さんも心配だよね。
jpnSearchText:
それもそうだね……帰省中にこんな事が起きたもの、
お父さんとお母さんも心配だよね。

engChrName: Let's meet up again soon. I wanna tell you everything I've learned about cameras!
engSearchText:
Let's meet up again soon. I wanna tell you everything
I've learned about cameras!
jpnChrName: それじゃあまた後でお話ししようね。 カメラの事とかもせっかくだから聞いて欲しいし！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあまた後でお話ししようね。
カメラの事とかもせっかくだから聞いて欲しいし！

engChrName: Amazing... So this is what modern cameras can do. You can see all the nitty gritty details of this train with picture-perfect clarity.
engSearchText:
Amazing... So this is what modern cameras can do.
You can see all the nitty gritty details of this train
with picture-perfect clarity.
jpnChrName: なるほどな、これが最新式のカメラか…… あれだけ鮮明に列車の細部も見える訳じゃ……
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな、これが最新式のカメラか……
あれだけ鮮明に列車の細部も見える訳じゃ……

engChrName: I picked this camera up used at the orbal café in Edith. I asked Philibert to give it a once-over and to get the lens aligned.
engSearchText:
I picked this camera up used at the orbal café
in Edith. I asked Philibert to give it a once-over and
to get the lens aligned.
jpnChrName: うん、首都のオーバルカフェで買ったんだけど、 フィルベールさんにも調整してもらっててね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、首都のオーバルカフェで買ったんだけど、
フィルベールさんにも調整してもらっててね。

engChrName: After he worked his magic, it was good as new. It's basically my travel partner at this point!
engSearchText:
After he worked his magic, it was good as new.
It's basically my travel partner at this point!
jpnChrName: 今じゃ本当に手に馴染むし、 最早私の相棒みたいなものだよ！
jpnSearchText:
今じゃ本当に手に馴染むし、
最早私の相棒みたいなものだよ！

engChrName: Ah. Now I understand why you felt so compelled to take a trip.
engSearchText:
Ah. Now I understand why you felt so compelled to
take a trip.
jpnChrName: なるほどな、これがあってこそモニクの 旅行も意味を持つと言ったところか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな、これがあってこそモニクの
旅行も意味を持つと言ったところか。

engChrName: Word of advice, though. While machines are fine tools for improving one's quality of life, it's best not to become dependent on them.
engSearchText:
Word of advice, though. While machines are fine
tools for improving one's quality of life, it's best not to
become dependent on them.
jpnChrName: じゃがなモニク……便利な機械を愛するのは良いが、 あまり依存し過ぎてはならんぞ？
jpnSearchText:
じゃがなモニク……便利な機械を愛するのは良いが、
あまり依存し過ぎてはならんぞ？

engChrName: If we ever lose access to them, it's good to know how to do things the old-fashioned way.
engSearchText:
If we ever lose access to them, it's good to know how
to do things the old-fashioned way.
jpnChrName: 便利な代物の存在を当然と思うと……それが 無くなった時に、自分の力を思い出せなくなる。
jpnSearchText:
便利な代物の存在を当然と思うと……それが
無くなった時に、自分の力を思い出せなくなる。

engChrName: Don't worry. I won't let it take over my life. Otherwise, I'll start taking new tech for granted, and I don't want that.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I won't let it take over my life.
Otherwise, I'll start taking new tech for granted, and I
don't want that.
jpnChrName: うん、わかってるよ。 この便利さにちゃんと感謝していかないとねー。
jpnSearchText:
うん、わかってるよ。
この便利さにちゃんと感謝していかないとねー。

engChrName: My camera's not ready for pickup just yet. I came here thirty minutes early.
engSearchText:
My camera's not ready for pickup just yet. I came
here thirty minutes early.
jpnChrName: まだかな……カメラ、受け取り予定より ３０分も早く来ちゃったよ……！
jpnSearchText:
まだかな……カメラ、受け取り予定より
３０分も早く来ちゃったよ……！

engChrName: I'm trusting that Philibert will get it back in peak condition. I wanna take tons of photos of the festival!
engSearchText:
I'm trusting that Philibert will get it back in
peak condition. I wanna take tons of photos of
the festival!
jpnChrName: 記念祭のためにも、やっぱりフィルベールさんに 改めて調整してもらって万全にしないと！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭のためにも、やっぱりフィルベールさんに
改めて調整してもらって万全にしないと！

engChrName: I don't know if it'll be as fun this year, but I'm still pumped for it!
engSearchText:
I don't know if it'll be as fun this year, but I'm still
pumped for it!
jpnChrName: 今年、普段通りに楽しい記念祭になるかは わからないけど……なって欲しい期待も込めて！
jpnSearchText:
今年、普段通りに楽しい記念祭になるかは
わからないけど……なって欲しい期待も込めて！

engChrName: Grandpa was a railway engineer, so it's no surprise he's passionate about machines. I love them, too, so we always have plenty to talk about.
engSearchText:
Grandpa was a railway engineer, so it's no surprise
he's passionate about machines. I love them, too, so
we always have plenty to talk about.
jpnChrName: お爺ちゃん、昔列車を運転してただけあって、 本当に機械とかへの思い入れ強いよね……
jpnSearchText:
お爺ちゃん、昔列車を運転してただけあって、
本当に機械とかへの思い入れ強いよね……

engChrName: I wonder if my obsession with tech was influenced by him.
engSearchText:
I wonder if my obsession with tech was influenced
by him.
jpnChrName: だからお話するの楽しいんだけど……うーん、 やっぱり私の趣味もお爺ちゃんの影響なのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
だからお話するの楽しいんだけど……うーん、
やっぱり私の趣味もお爺ちゃんの影響なのかなぁ？

engChrName: I'm really glad my grandpa is doing okay.
engSearchText: I'm really glad my grandpa is doing okay.
jpnChrName: お祖父ちゃんも元気で良かった……
jpnSearchText: お祖父ちゃんも元気で良かった……

engChrName: I need to check on the rest of my family, too. I bet they're worried sick about me.
engSearchText:
I need to check on the rest of my family, too. I bet
they're worried sick about me.
jpnChrName: 帰省中にこんな事になっちゃったけど、その分 家族と過ごして安心させてあげないとね。
jpnSearchText:
帰省中にこんな事になっちゃったけど、その分
家族と過ごして安心させてあげないとね。

engChrName: Wish I could talk to Grandpa about trains more, but we can save that for later.
engSearchText:
Wish I could talk to Grandpa about trains more, but
we can save that for later.
jpnChrName: せっかく列車の良さなんかも判ってきたし、 お祖父ちゃんと話したかったの。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく列車の良さなんかも判ってきたし、
お祖父ちゃんと話したかったの。

engChrName: While I was on my way to the North District to see the palace, I caught sight of the movie theater.
engSearchText:
While I was on my way to the North District to see
the palace, I caught sight of the movie theater.
jpnChrName: 昔ながらの市場からお城が見えるって聞いて 北街区に行ったけど、今時は映画館もあるのね。
jpnSearchText:
昔ながらの市場からお城が見えるって聞いて
北街区に行ったけど、今時は映画館もあるのね。

engChrName: It fits in surprisingly well with the rest of the city. It doesn't clash with its aesthetic one bit.
engSearchText:
It fits in surprisingly well with the rest of the city.
It doesn't clash with its aesthetic one bit.
jpnChrName: でも、映画館みたいな施設があっても雰囲気は 変わらなかったし、やはり景観条例は重要ね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、映画館みたいな施設があっても雰囲気は
変わらなかったし、やはり景観条例は重要ね。

engChrName: The contrast between the palace and the marketplace is striking by comparison.
engSearchText:
The contrast between the palace and the marketplace
is striking by comparison.
jpnChrName: あの城も予想以上によく見えるし…… 庶民的な市場との対比が絵になるというか……
jpnSearchText:
あの城も予想以上によく見えるし……
庶民的な市場との対比が絵になるというか……

engChrName: I paid a visit to the grand cathedral after the memorial mass. It was simply divine.
engSearchText:
I paid a visit to the grand cathedral after the
memorial mass. It was simply divine.
jpnChrName: 総大聖堂……追悼ミサの後に入ってみたけど、 本当に壮麗というか……もはや神秘的ね。
jpnSearchText:
総大聖堂……追悼ミサの後に入ってみたけど、
本当に壮麗というか……もはや神秘的ね。

engChrName: The guidebook certainly didn't do it justice, but I don't think you can convey its elegance with mere words or pictures.
engSearchText:
The guidebook certainly didn't do it justice, but I
don't think you can convey its elegance with mere
words or pictures.
jpnChrName: ガイドブック以上だけど、それも仕方ない…… あんなの文章と写真だけで伝えられないもの。
jpnSearchText:
ガイドブック以上だけど、それも仕方ない……
あんなの文章と写真だけで伝えられないもの。

engChrName: Sadly, while that experience sent me to cloud nine, the prices in the local department store brought me crashing down to reality.
engSearchText:
Sadly, while that experience sent me to cloud nine,
the prices in the local department store brought me
crashing down to reality.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、そんな感慨にふけってたのに百貨店の 価格帯に驚いて現実に戻されちゃったワケだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、そんな感慨にふけってたのに百貨店の
価格帯に驚いて現実に戻されちゃったワケだけど……

engChrName: If only I had more money... I could've gotten more out of this visit had I not been drowning in financial woes.
engSearchText:
If only I had more money... I could've gotten more
out of this visit had I not been drowning in
financial woes.
jpnChrName: うーん、庶民は辛いわ……財布に悩まず、 あの雰囲気に浸り続けたいものよね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、庶民は辛いわ……財布に悩まず、
あの雰囲気に浸り続けたいものよね……

engChrName: This was my first time seeing an opera performance, and I can only describe it as a breathtaking experience.
engSearchText:
This was my first time seeing an opera performance,
and I can only describe it as a
breathtaking experience.
jpnChrName: オペラ……この機会に初めて観たんだけど、 何というか圧巻以外の言葉が出ないわ……
jpnSearchText:
オペラ……この機会に初めて観たんだけど、
何というか圧巻以外の言葉が出ないわ……

engChrName: I likely could've better understood the finer details of the story had I received a higher education—and if I saw it a few more times.
engSearchText:
I likely could've better understood the finer details of
the story had I received a higher education—and if I
saw it a few more times.
jpnChrName: 小難しい意味なんかはもっと教養をつけて、 何回も観なきゃわからないかもだけど……
jpnSearchText:
小難しい意味なんかはもっと教養をつけて、
何回も観なきゃわからないかもだけど……

engChrName: Nonetheless, I was drawn in by the stellar performances. There's a level of depth there you don't see in stage dramas and movies.
engSearchText:
Nonetheless, I was drawn in by the
stellar performances. There's a level of depth there
you don't see in stage dramas and movies.
jpnChrName: 歌も演技も……普通の映画や演劇には無い深み みたいなものがあるような気がしてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
歌も演技も……普通の映画や演劇には無い深み
みたいなものがあるような気がしてねぇ……

engChrName: Now, then. I've got some more time on my hands, so I think I'll tour the other districts.
engSearchText:
Now, then. I've got some more time on my hands, so
I think I'll tour the other districts.
jpnChrName: さて……午後は時間もあるし、この調子で他の 街区も見てきてしまおうかしら……
jpnSearchText:
さて……午後は時間もあるし、この調子で他の
街区も見てきてしまおうかしら……

engChrName: The cityscape looks so much more grand in person than in the pictures.
engSearchText:
The cityscape looks so much more grand in person
than in the pictures.
jpnChrName: 凄い……写真で見た以上に 昔の雰囲気が漂う街並みだわ。
jpnSearchText:
凄い……写真で見た以上に
昔の雰囲気が漂う街並みだわ。

engChrName: I'm glad I was able to come here as planned.
engSearchText: I'm glad I was able to come here as planned.
jpnChrName: こんな時だけど……予定通りに来てよかった。
jpnSearchText: こんな時だけど……予定通りに来てよかった。

engChrName: The hard work of the brilliant artisans is on full display. We're fortunate our ancestors saw fit to preserve it.
engSearchText:
The hard work of the brilliant artisans is on
full display. We're fortunate our ancestors saw fit to
preserve it.
jpnChrName: これも景観条例の賜物かしら、今でも 古都の街並みは文化遺産だもんね……
jpnSearchText:
これも景観条例の賜物かしら、今でも
古都の街並みは文化遺産だもんね……

engChrName: It's like I've been transported back to the time when the old royalty still existed. It's an incredible feeling.
engSearchText:
It's like I've been transported back to the time when
the old royalty still existed. It's an incredible feeling.
jpnChrName: かつて王侯貴族が暮らしていた時代の情景も 見えるようで……本当に見事よね。
jpnSearchText:
かつて王侯貴族が暮らしていた時代の情景も
見えるようで……本当に見事よね。

engChrName: It's a good thing the Calvardian revolutionaries left this place intact. It's such a beautiful city.
engSearchText:
It's a good thing the Calvardian revolutionaries left
this place intact. It's such a beautiful city.
jpnChrName: 革命の時に、この美しい町を打ち壊さなかった カルバード人はやっぱり理性的よね……
jpnSearchText:
革命の時に、この美しい町を打ち壊さなかった
カルバード人はやっぱり理性的よね……

engChrName: The nobles back then were rotten to the core, but there was no need to punish the artisans for the sins of the upper class.
engSearchText:
The nobles back then were rotten to the core, but
there was no need to punish the artisans for the sins
of the upper class.
jpnChrName: いくら腐敗した貴族が暮らしたとはいえ…… 街そのものや、それを作った職人に罪は無いしね。
jpnSearchText:
いくら腐敗した貴族が暮らしたとはいえ……
街そのものや、それを作った職人に罪は無いしね。

engChrName: The revolutionaries must've saw the value of preserving that history for future generations.
engSearchText:
The revolutionaries must've saw the value of
preserving that history for future generations.
jpnChrName: 未来に歴史を伝えられる価値……１００年前に 理解できたカルバード人はやっぱり凄いわ。
jpnSearchText:
未来に歴史を伝えられる価値……１００年前に
理解できたカルバード人はやっぱり凄いわ。

engChrName: The festival is drawing near, isn't it? I'd almost forgotten it after the tragedy of Creil Village.
engSearchText:
The festival is drawing near, isn't it? I'd almost
forgotten it after the tragedy of Creil Village.
jpnChrName: そういや、クレイユ村の事件もあって忘れていたが、 そろそろ記念祭の事も考える時期だったな……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、クレイユ村の事件もあって忘れていたが、
そろそろ記念祭の事も考える時期だったな……

engChrName: I hope it isn't canceled... The festival does bring in a lot of foreign tourists.
engSearchText:
I hope it isn't canceled... The festival does bring in a
lot of foreign tourists.
jpnChrName: まあ、例年通りに開催できるならだが…… 記念祭の前後は外国の観光客も増えるからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、例年通りに開催できるならだが……
記念祭の前後は外国の観光客も増えるからな。

engChrName: They often stop by to see Oración. It's a peak moneymaking period for us.
engSearchText:
They often stop by to see Oración. It's a peak
moneymaking period for us.
jpnChrName: ついでにオラシオンを見に来てくれる人も 毎年のようにいるし、俺らにとっても稼ぎ時でね。
jpnSearchText:
ついでにオラシオンを見に来てくれる人も
毎年のようにいるし、俺らにとっても稼ぎ時でね。

engChrName: I better work on my sales pitches. This is a sensitive time, so I have to be careful about what I say.
engSearchText:
I better work on my sales pitches. This is a sensitive
time, so I have to be careful about what I say.
jpnChrName: 今年はどういうキャンペーンで行くかな……事件の 事もあるし、不謹慎にならないようにせねば。
jpnSearchText:
今年はどういうキャンペーンで行くかな……事件の
事もあるし、不謹慎にならないようにせねば。

engChrName: I made a killing today. Edith folks sure are well off, aren't they?
engSearchText:
I made a killing today. Edith folks sure are well off,
aren't they?
jpnChrName: 今日も土産物がよく売れた。 こんな時でも首都方面の人は景気が良いものだ。
jpnSearchText:
今日も土産物がよく売れた。
こんな時でも首都方面の人は景気が良いものだ。

engChrName: To be honest, I feel a little guilty making money off tourists during these dark times.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I feel a little guilty making money off
tourists during these dark times.
jpnChrName: 正直、暗い時世だってのに観光で儲けてると 少しばかり申し訳ない気もしてくるがな……
jpnSearchText:
正直、暗い時世だってのに観光で儲けてると
少しばかり申し訳ない気もしてくるがな……

engChrName: Be that as it may, old-fashioned Calvardian handicrafts are a hot commodity right now.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, old-fashioned Calvardian
handicrafts are a hot commodity right now.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、何やかんやでカルバード古来の 意匠の品が国内の観光客にも人気な辺り……
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、何やかんやでカルバード古来の
意匠の品が国内の観光客にも人気な辺り……

engChrName: People all around the country care for the cultural heritage of their homeland.
engSearchText:
People all around the country care for the cultural
heritage of their homeland.
jpnChrName: やはりどこの人も、革命とか関係無く祖国の 伝統に何かしら思い入れがあるんだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
やはりどこの人も、革命とか関係無く祖国の
伝統に何かしら思い入れがあるんだろうなぁ……

engChrName: You may notice that the department store carries the same branded goods as us.
engSearchText:
You may notice that the department store carries the
same branded goods as us.
jpnChrName: 百貨店の方は見て来たかい？ 向こうもうちと同じ銘柄の品も扱っているが……
jpnSearchText:
百貨店の方は見て来たかい？
向こうもうちと同じ銘柄の品も扱っているが……

engChrName: The difference is, our goods are cheaper, so you're better off buying from us.
engSearchText:
The difference is, our goods are cheaper, so you're
better off buying from us.
jpnChrName: うちは観光客向けに厳選セレクトしているからね、 同じ名匠の品でも、うちで買った方がお得だよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちは観光客向けに厳選セレクトしているからね、
同じ名匠の品でも、うちで買った方がお得だよ。

engChrName: Oración's got a multitude of well-known handicraft goods producers.
engSearchText:
Oración's got a multitude of well-known handicraft
goods producers.
jpnChrName: オラシオンは手工業やら調度品の分野でも、 腕の立つ職人や名門の老舗企業が沢山あるからな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンは手工業やら調度品の分野でも、
腕の立つ職人や名門の老舗企業が沢山あるからな。

engChrName: My job's to look through the vast selection of goods they sell and pick out the ones I think tourists would like.
engSearchText:
My job's to look through the vast selection of goods
they sell and pick out the ones I think tourists
would like.
jpnChrName: そういう品を、観光の人らが喜ぶように 見繕うのも土産屋としちゃ腕の見せ所さ。
jpnSearchText:
そういう品を、観光の人らが喜ぶように
見繕うのも土産屋としちゃ腕の見せ所さ。

engChrName: Hey there! Looking for some handicrafts to remember your trip by? Well, you've come to the right place!
engSearchText:
Hey there! Looking for some handicrafts to
remember your trip by? Well, you've come to the
right place!
jpnChrName: やあ、記念の飾り物やら上等な陶器類などは 是非ともうちの店でどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
やあ、記念の飾り物やら上等な陶器類などは
是非ともうちの店でどうだい？

engChrName: We've got everything from fine art made by notable artisans to popular souvenir goods—all at a low price.
engSearchText:
We've got everything from fine art made by notable
artisans to popular souvenir goods—all at a low price.
jpnChrName: うちは名匠の手掛けた本格的な工芸品から、 お手軽価格で定番の土産物まで広く揃えていてね。
jpnSearchText:
うちは名匠の手掛けた本格的な工芸品から、
お手軽価格で定番の土産物まで広く揃えていてね。

engChrName: I've got something for customers of all stripes, so have a look around.
engSearchText:
I've got something for customers of all stripes, so have
a look around.
jpnChrName: それなりにお客さんに合ったものを勧められるし、 こんな時だが、気分転換に良いんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
それなりにお客さんに合ったものを勧められるし、
こんな時だが、気分転換に良いんじゃないか？

engChrName: The department store sells souvenirs, too, of course, but their prices are through the roof.
engSearchText:
The department store sells souvenirs, too, of course,
but their prices are through the roof.
jpnChrName: 百貨店の方でも土産は売っているが、 流石にあっちだと上等な品がメインでな。
jpnSearchText:
百貨店の方でも土産は売っているが、
流石にあっちだと上等な品がメインでな。

engChrName: It's up to you whether you want to blow your wallet on one thing, or get a whole bunch of goodies from here with mira to spare.
engSearchText:
It's up to you whether you want to blow your wallet
on one thing, or get a whole bunch of goodies from
here with mira to spare.
jpnChrName: まあ、良いものを一つ買うか、 定番の土産を大量に買って行くか……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、良いものを一つ買うか、
定番の土産を大量に買って行くか……

engChrName: One of our biggest draws is that each tourist can pick and choose what they feel is right for them.
engSearchText:
One of our biggest draws is that each tourist can pick
and choose what they feel is right for them.
jpnChrName: 観光客の人らの好み次第で、 選び放題ってのもうちのウリの一つなのさ。
jpnSearchText:
観光客の人らの好み次第で、
選び放題ってのもうちのウリの一つなのさ。

engChrName: Usually I start baking celebratory cakes for the festival around this time.
engSearchText:
Usually I start baking celebratory cakes for the festival
around this time.
jpnChrName: うーん、例年ならそろそろ記念祭のために お祝いのケーキなんかも用意する時期だけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、例年ならそろそろ記念祭のために
お祝いのケーキなんかも用意する時期だけど……

engChrName: But with the tragedy still fresh on our minds, I decided that now may not be the time for it.
engSearchText:
But with the tragedy still fresh on our minds, I
decided that now may not be the time for it.
jpnChrName: 今年は不幸な事件もあったしねぇ…… やっぱりやめておいた方が良いのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
今年は不幸な事件もあったしねぇ……
やっぱりやめておいた方が良いのかしら。

engChrName: Though I suppose it's best to not let this dark mood linger forever. I'll just see what the customers request and go from there.
engSearchText:
Though I suppose it's best to not let this dark mood
linger forever. I'll just see what the customers request
and go from there.
jpnChrName: でも、ずっと暗い雰囲気なのも何だし…… お客のリクエスト次第かしらねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、ずっと暗い雰囲気なのも何だし……
お客のリクエスト次第かしらねぇ……

engChrName: Would you like a late-night dessert? I hear they go quite well with wine.
engSearchText:
Would you like a late-night dessert? I hear they go
quite well with wine.
jpnChrName: 夜のデザートにもうちのお菓子はいかが。 ワインにも合うと思うしね。
jpnSearchText:
夜のデザートにもうちのお菓子はいかが。
ワインにも合うと思うしね。

engChrName: Many of my customers stop by well into the evening to buy my sweets.
engSearchText:
Many of my customers stop by well into the evening
to buy my sweets.
jpnChrName: ほら、うちの生菓子って日持ちしないから、 宿で食べていってくれるお客さんも多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、うちの生菓子って日持ちしないから、
宿で食べていってくれるお客さんも多くてね。

engChrName: They say the taste compliments the city's atmosphere well. I'm not sure what that means, but you won't hear me complaining!
engSearchText:
They say the taste compliments the city's
atmosphere well. I'm not sure what that means, but
you won't hear me complaining!
jpnChrName: 街の雰囲気も感じながら味わえるらしくて、 それはそれで好評みたいで有難い限りよ。
jpnSearchText:
街の雰囲気も感じながら味わえるらしくて、
それはそれで好評みたいで有難い限りよ。

engChrName: The Quincy Company is the most recognizable brand in Oración, but you'll find that my little store is just as well loved here.
engSearchText:
The Quincy Company is the most recognizable brand
in Oración, but you'll find that my little store is just as
well loved here.
jpnChrName: オラシオン銘菓と言えばクインシー社が有名だけど、 うちみたいな小さいお店も昔から人気でね。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン銘菓と言えばクインシー社が有名だけど、
うちみたいな小さいお店も昔から人気でね。

engChrName: However, few people outside the city walls would recognize our shop's name. That's because our products don't have a long shelf life.
engSearchText:
However, few people outside the city walls would
recognize our shop's name. That's because our
products don't have a long shelf life.
jpnChrName: あ、でもうちのはなるべく早めに召し上がって。 生菓子だからあまり日持ちはしないのよ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもうちのはなるべく早めに召し上がって。
生菓子だからあまり日持ちはしないのよ。

engChrName: So be sure to send those sweets down the hatch as soon as you can!
engSearchText:
So be sure to send those sweets down the hatch as
soon as you can!
jpnChrName: まあ、お土産として持って帰れないから、 他の街であまり知られてないのかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お土産として持って帰れないから、
他の街であまり知られてないのかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Welcome. Would you like a delicious Oración confectionery?
engSearchText:
Welcome. Would you like a delicious
Oración confectionery?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、美味しいオラシオン銘菓、 お一ついかがかしら？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、美味しいオラシオン銘菓、
お一ついかがかしら？

engChrName: I know people are down after that horrible incident, but I don't want our city's visitors to be sad the whole time they're here.
engSearchText:
I know people are down after that horrible incident,
but I don't want our city's visitors to be sad the whole
time they're here.
jpnChrName: あんな事件があって気落ちしている人も多いけど、 旅行に来たならちゃんと気晴らししていかなきゃ。
jpnSearchText:
あんな事件があって気落ちしている人も多いけど、
旅行に来たならちゃんと気晴らししていかなきゃ。

engChrName: My store's sweets are very popular with tourists. If they can help brighten people's moods, I'd be overjoyed.
engSearchText:
My store's sweets are very popular with tourists.
If they can help brighten people's moods, I'd
be overjoyed.
jpnChrName: うちのお菓子、観光の人にも人気だし、 せめて気分転換の助けになれたら嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
うちのお菓子、観光の人にも人気だし、
せめて気分転換の助けになれたら嬉しいわ。

engChrName: Okay, I got my fill of movies for this trip. Time to go see the grand cathedral!
engSearchText:
Okay, I got my fill of movies for this trip. Time to go
see the grand cathedral!
jpnChrName: さて……映画も観てテンション上がってきたし、 本命の総大聖堂にいよいよ突撃だ！
jpnSearchText:
さて……映画も観てテンション上がってきたし、
本命の総大聖堂にいよいよ突撃だ！

engChrName: There's no way we'd come all the way to Oración and NOT check it out.
engSearchText:
There's no way we'd come all the way to Oración and
NOT check it out.
jpnChrName: やはり、来たからにはあそこに行って おかないと帰るに帰れないよな。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、来たからにはあそこに行って
おかないと帰るに帰れないよな。

engChrName: It might help calm my nerves, too. There was a guy glaring at me while we were watching the movie.
engSearchText:
It might help calm my nerves, too. There was a guy
glaring at me while we were watching the movie.
jpnChrName: ところで……昨晩、あっちにある劇場か 何かの人が睨んできた気がするんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ところで……昨晩、あっちにある劇場か
何かの人が睨んできた気がするんだが……

engChrName: No idea what that was about, but it gave me the chills.
engSearchText:
No idea what that was about, but it gave me
the chills.
jpnChrName: アレは何だったんだろう？
jpnSearchText: アレは何だったんだろう？

engChrName: Oración's known for being old. Beautiful, mind you, but old.
engSearchText:
Oración's known for being old. Beautiful, mind you,
but old.
jpnChrName: オラシオン、昔ながらの見所は多いけど 娯楽はあんまり無いようなイメージだったしな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン、昔ながらの見所は多いけど
娯楽はあんまり無いようなイメージだったしな。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting to see a movie theater here. This city's becoming a fun place.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting to see a movie theater here.
This city's becoming a fun place.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか映画館も出来ていて…… 一層楽しめる街になっていきそうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか映画館も出来ていて……
一層楽しめる街になっていきそうじゃないか。

engChrName: We'll check out the grand cathedral tomorrow. Right now, I wanna see the palace ruins.
engSearchText:
We'll check out the grand cathedral tomorrow.
Right now, I wanna see the palace ruins.
jpnChrName: 壮麗な大聖堂は明日見るとして、 今日はあのバカでかい城跡を眺めるか。
jpnSearchText:
壮麗な大聖堂は明日見るとして、
今日はあのバカでかい城跡を眺めるか。

engChrName: I'm not a huge history buff or anything, but going to see the remnants of the old kingdom sounds interesting to me.
engSearchText:
I'm not a huge history buff or anything, but going to
see the remnants of the old kingdom sounds
interesting to me.
jpnChrName: 歴史は詳しくはないけど、過去の栄光の 遺構ってのもそれはそれで圧巻なんだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
歴史は詳しくはないけど、過去の栄光の
遺構ってのもそれはそれで圧巻なんだろうし。

engChrName: I was able to update my company on our situation.
engSearchText: I was able to update my company on our situation.
jpnChrName: テロのせいで首都に帰れそうにないが…… まあ、会社にも改めて連絡したし大丈夫だろ。
jpnSearchText:
テロのせいで首都に帰れそうにないが……
まあ、会社にも改めて連絡したし大丈夫だろ。

engChrName: I'd like to get back to the capital, but since that isn't happening, I'll just enjoy my unexpected vacation.
engSearchText:
I'd like to get back to the capital, but since that isn't
happening, I'll just enjoy my unexpected vacation.
jpnChrName: 時間は無駄にしたくないしな、延泊するなら その分観光の方も満喫しないと。
jpnSearchText:
時間は無駄にしたくないしな、延泊するなら
その分観光の方も満喫しないと。

engChrName: Someone at the station was saying Edith's still under a state of emergency. Guess we're not going back there anytime soon.
engSearchText:
Someone at the station was saying Edith's still under
a state of emergency. Guess we're not going back
there anytime soon.
jpnChrName: 駅の方で聞いたけど、首都の方はまだ非常事態宣言が 続いて当分は交通規制もやるらしいな……
jpnSearchText:
駅の方で聞いたけど、首都の方はまだ非常事態宣言が
続いて当分は交通規制もやるらしいな……

engChrName: Might as well just relax and enjoy our extended stay here.
engSearchText:
Might as well just relax and enjoy our extended
stay here.
jpnChrName: この分じゃあと数日は帰れそうにないし、 前向きに、追加の滞在期間は楽しんじゃおうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
この分じゃあと数日は帰れそうにないし、
前向きに、追加の滞在期間は楽しんじゃおうぜ。

engChrName: Work oughta foot the bill for lodging, so we don't have to worry about that, thankfully.
engSearchText:
Work oughta foot the bill for lodging, so we don't
have to worry about that, thankfully.
jpnChrName: 流石に会社を休むのも仕方がない事だし、 宿泊費もいずれ補償とかあるだろうしさ。
jpnSearchText:
流石に会社を休むのも仕方がない事だし、
宿泊費もいずれ補償とかあるだろうしさ。

engChrName: I guess that's good, but are you sure we should be having the time of our lives when...you know, that horrible tragedy just happened?
engSearchText:
I guess that's good, but are you sure we should be
having the time of our lives when...you know, that
horrible tragedy just happened?
jpnChrName: うーん、確かに好都合ではあるけど…… あんな事件があったのに、楽しんじゃって良いのかな？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、確かに好都合ではあるけど……
あんな事件があったのに、楽しんじゃって良いのかな？

engChrName: C'mon, Morie. Acting all depressed isn't gonna solve anything.
engSearchText:
C'mon, Morie. Acting all depressed isn't gonna
solve anything.
jpnChrName: モーリエ、俺たちが落ち込み続けたって何も 解決する訳じゃあないだろ？
jpnSearchText:
モーリエ、俺たちが落ち込み続けたって何も
解決する訳じゃあないだろ？

engChrName: If everyone in the world sat around and did nothing, who'd keep the economy going?
engSearchText:
If everyone in the world sat around and did nothing,
who'd keep the economy going?
jpnChrName: 少しでも普段通りの勢いを取り戻すくらいじゃなきゃ、 経済だって止まっちまうってものだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
少しでも普段通りの勢いを取り戻すくらいじゃなきゃ、
経済だって止まっちまうってものだぜ。

engChrName: Fair point. I was kind of bummed that our time here was so short anyway.
engSearchText:
Fair point. I was kind of bummed that our time here
was so short anyway.
jpnChrName: まあ、言われてみれば確かにそうかもね。 それじゃあ、節度を守って楽しもっか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、言われてみれば確かにそうかもね。
それじゃあ、節度を守って楽しもっか。

engChrName: But let's not go too crazy. We should spend in moderation.
engSearchText:
But let's not go too crazy. We should spend
in moderation.
jpnChrName: もともと滞在できる日数も短すぎたし、 この機会に色々見ていかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
もともと滞在できる日数も短すぎたし、
この機会に色々見ていかないとね。

engChrName: I was hoping we'd get to see the inside of the grand cathedral.
engSearchText:
I was hoping we'd get to see the inside of the
grand cathedral.
jpnChrName: うーむ、総大聖堂も観ていきたかったが……
jpnSearchText: うーむ、総大聖堂も観ていきたかったが……

engChrName: Now's not the time, though. We shouldn't disturb the memorial mass.
engSearchText:
Now's not the time, though. We shouldn't disturb the
memorial mass.
jpnChrName: 追悼ムード一色で、流石に観光って 空気じゃなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
追悼ムード一色で、流石に観光って
空気じゃなかったな。

engChrName: Yeah. We can drop by when that's over.
engSearchText: Yeah. We can drop by when that's over.
jpnChrName: まあ、滞在日数に余裕は出来た事だし 追悼ミサが終わったら改めて観に行こうよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、滞在日数に余裕は出来た事だし
追悼ミサが終わったら改めて観に行こうよ。

engChrName: In the meantime, why don't we visit the North District? I wanna get a good look at the old palace ruins!
engSearchText:
In the meantime, why don't we visit the
North District? I wanna get a good look at the old
palace ruins!
jpnChrName: 代わりに今日の午後は北街区なんてどう？ ほら、王宮跡も一番よく見えるって言うし。
jpnSearchText:
代わりに今日の午後は北街区なんてどう？
ほら、王宮跡も一番よく見えるって言うし。

engChrName: Sounds good. Should be an interesting sight.
engSearchText: Sounds good. Should be an interesting sight.
jpnChrName: それも良さそうだな、名物の建物を見るって 意味じゃ同じだし。
jpnSearchText:
それも良さそうだな、名物の建物を見るって
意味じゃ同じだし。

engChrName: Well, then. Let's catch the next tram to the North District!
engSearchText:
Well, then. Let's catch the next tram to the
North District!
jpnChrName: よっしゃ、それじゃあトラムで 北街区に向かうとしますか！
jpnSearchText:
よっしゃ、それじゃあトラムで
北街区に向かうとしますか！

engChrName: Okay, the palace and the market were cool and all, but my mind was BLOWN when I saw the theater. I can't believe there's one in this old city!
engSearchText:
Okay, the palace and the market were cool and all,
but my mind was BLOWN when I saw the theater.
I can't believe there's one in this old city!
jpnChrName: 北街区、城跡の眺めやら市場の雰囲気やらも 楽しめたが……この街にも映画館があるんだな！
jpnSearchText:
北街区、城跡の眺めやら市場の雰囲気やらも
楽しめたが……この街にも映画館があるんだな！

engChrName: There's a few films there that were on my to-watch list. You up for catching a movie tomorrow?
engSearchText:
There's a few films there that were on my
to-watch list. You up for catching a movie tomorrow?
jpnChrName: 日数に余裕はあるし、明日にでも何か観ていこうぜ。 ほら、いくつか観る機会を逃してた映画もあるし……
jpnSearchText:
日数に余裕はあるし、明日にでも何か観ていこうぜ。
ほら、いくつか観る機会を逃してた映画もあるし……

engChrName: Sure. Sounds fun.
engSearchText: Sure. Sounds fun.
jpnChrName: 良いね、たまには旅先での映画も面白いかも。
jpnSearchText: 良いね、たまには旅先での映画も面白いかも。

engChrName: Then we can go to the grand cathedral after that.
engSearchText: Then we can go to the grand cathedral after that.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、明日は映画見たらもう一回、 総大聖堂の方に行ってみようか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、明日は映画見たらもう一回、
総大聖堂の方に行ってみようか。

engChrName: It's almost time to see the grand cathedral at long last. Now that the memorial mass is over, we should be able to go right in.
engSearchText:
It's almost time to see the grand cathedral at long last.
Now that the memorial mass is over, we should be
able to go right in.
jpnChrName: ようやく総大聖堂……今なら追悼ミサも 終わっているし、普通に礼拝できそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
ようやく総大聖堂……今なら追悼ミサも
終わっているし、普通に礼拝できそうだね。

engChrName: It'll be nice to see some actual culture after that Golden Blood film...
engSearchText:
It'll be nice to see some actual culture after that
Golden Blood film...
jpnChrName: ところで……オラシオンの映画館でも 『ゴールデンブラッド』とかやってるんだ……
jpnSearchText:
ところで……オラシオンの映画館でも
『ゴールデンブラッド』とかやってるんだ……

engChrName: I expected the Oración theater to show more refined movies...
engSearchText:
I expected the Oración theater to show more
refined movies...
jpnChrName: もっとお上品なアート系ばかりじゃないかと 思っていたよ……
jpnSearchText:
もっとお上品なアート系ばかりじゃないかと
思っていたよ……

engChrName: I mostly just want to see the grand cathedral since I love immersing myself in culture and history.
engSearchText:
I mostly just want to see the grand cathedral since I
love immersing myself in culture and history.
jpnChrName: 本命は総大聖堂の方だとは言え、 映画は映画で楽しみだね、明日。
jpnSearchText:
本命は総大聖堂の方だとは言え、
映画は映画で楽しみだね、明日。

engChrName: But I wouldn't mind watching a movie with Sutton.
engSearchText: But I wouldn't mind watching a movie with Sutton.
jpnChrName: しんみり歴史や文化に浸るのも良いけど、 やっぱり少しは娯楽も欲しくなるしねー。
jpnSearchText:
しんみり歴史や文化に浸るのも良いけど、
やっぱり少しは娯楽も欲しくなるしねー。

engChrName: There ought to be some hidden gems in the North District, right?
engSearchText:
There ought to be some hidden gems in the North
District, right?
jpnChrName: 北街区、けっこう庶民的な地区らしいし、 城跡以外にも何か穴場スポットとか無いかな。
jpnSearchText:
北街区、けっこう庶民的な地区らしいし、
城跡以外にも何か穴場スポットとか無いかな。

engChrName: I know it has the market, but I'm kind of hoping there's a place where we can let loose and have some fun.
engSearchText:
I know it has the market, but I'm kind of hoping
there's a place where we can let loose and have
some fun.
jpnChrName: 市場なんかも良いけど、何か一つくらい エンタメ系のスポットがあっても面白いかも。
jpnSearchText:
市場なんかも良いけど、何か一つくらい
エンタメ系のスポットがあっても面白いかも。

engChrName: Sutton's right. We can't do anything to resolve the situation, and us acting all depressed won't help anyone.
engSearchText:
Sutton's right. We can't do anything to resolve the
situation, and us acting all depressed won't
help anyone.
jpnChrName: 確かにサットンの言う通り、何かできる訳でもない 私達が沈んでるだけじゃもったいないよね……
jpnSearchText:
確かにサットンの言う通り、何かできる訳でもない
私達が沈んでるだけじゃもったいないよね……

engChrName: I don't get to come by Oración all that often, so we may as well make the most of this chance to see the rest of the city!
engSearchText:
I don't get to come by Oración all that often, so we
may as well make the most of this chance to see the
rest of the city!
jpnChrName: 時間も有効に使ってこそだしね、この機会になかなか 来れないオラシオン、満喫するとしますか！
jpnSearchText:
時間も有効に使ってこそだしね、この機会になかなか
来れないオラシオン、満喫するとしますか！

engChrName: Let's see... Today's classes are Calvardian History I, Intro to Chemistry, and Intro to Geology.
engSearchText:
Let's see... Today's classes are Calvardian History I,
Intro to Chemistry, and Intro to Geology.
jpnChrName: さて、今日の一般教養は中世カルバード史に 基礎化学、基礎地質学か……
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日の一般教養は中世カルバード史に
基礎化学、基礎地質学か……

engChrName: The classes are tough, but I learn a lot from them. They're not only intellectually stimulating— they're fun.
engSearchText:
The classes are tough, but I learn a lot from them.
They're not only intellectually stimulating—
they're fun.
jpnChrName: 毎日大変だけど授業は何やかんやで流石というか 質がよくて……結構楽しみでさ。
jpnSearchText:
毎日大変だけど授業は何やかんやで流石というか
質がよくて……結構楽しみでさ。

engChrName: If they were boring, I doubt I'd be able to endure taking them on top of my part-time job.
engSearchText:
If they were boring, I doubt I'd be able to endure
taking them on top of my part-time job.
jpnChrName: まあ……これで授業までつまらなかったら、慣れない 環境でバイト掛け持ちしてまで通わないよね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……これで授業までつまらなかったら、慣れない
環境でバイト掛け持ちしてまで通わないよね……

engChrName: It doesn't hurt to eat out on occasion. The prices here are...fairly reasonable, all things considered.
engSearchText:
It doesn't hurt to eat out on occasion. The prices here
are...fairly reasonable, all things considered.
jpnChrName: たまには外食しても良いよな……ここの 料理ならそんなに高くもないし。
jpnSearchText:
たまには外食しても良いよな……ここの
料理ならそんなに高くもないし。

engChrName: After a long day of school and work, it's hard for me to work up the motivation to cook for myself.
engSearchText:
After a long day of school and work, it's hard for me
to work up the motivation to cook for myself.
jpnChrName: 正直、勉強とバイトでこうも忙しいと 自炊する気力も湧かなくなってくるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
正直、勉強とバイトでこうも忙しいと
自炊する気力も湧かなくなってくるんだよね。

engChrName: The food here's decently healthy, too. I'll take it over junk food any day of the week.
engSearchText:
The food here's decently healthy, too. I'll take it over
junk food any day of the week.
jpnChrName: ここの食事は健康にも良さそうだし…… ジャンクフードで済ますくらいならね……
jpnSearchText:
ここの食事は健康にも良さそうだし……
ジャンクフードで済ますくらいならね……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I think the waitress here is also working part time to pay for her school tuition.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I think the waitress here is also working
part time to pay for her school tuition.
jpnChrName: そういえば、ここのウェイトレスの彼女も、 学費のために頑張っているって聞くね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ここのウェイトレスの彼女も、
学費のために頑張っているって聞くね。

engChrName: Must be hard for a Central Eastern girl to live in this city. She probably has it much worse than me.
engSearchText:
Must be hard for a Central Eastern girl to live in
this city. She probably has it much worse than me.
jpnChrName: 彼女の場合は中東系だからこその苦労も あるだろうに、本当に頭が上がらないよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の場合は中東系だからこその苦労も
あるだろうに、本当に頭が上がらないよ。

engChrName: I know what it's like to come all the way out here without a mira to your name. I wish her the best.
engSearchText:
I know what it's like to come all the way out here
without a mira to your name. I wish her the best.
jpnChrName: 同じ余所者の苦学生として 応援していきたいものだね。
jpnSearchText:
同じ余所者の苦学生として
応援していきたいものだね。

engChrName: Phew. I managed to get off early today. I'll get to my homework after a quick nap.
engSearchText:
Phew. I managed to get off early today. I'll get to my
homework after a quick nap.
jpnChrName: ふう、今日は早めにバイト上がれた…… 少し休んだら課題もやっておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今日は早めにバイト上がれた……
少し休んだら課題もやっておかないと。

engChrName: None of my classmates understand what I'm going through because they're all sitting in the lap of luxury.
engSearchText:
None of my classmates understand what I'm going
through because they're all sitting in the lap of luxury.
jpnChrName: ……何が辛いって、同級生もお金持ちの子が多くて、 こういう苦労を共有できないんだよね……
jpnSearchText:
……何が辛いって、同級生もお金持ちの子が多くて、
こういう苦労を共有できないんだよね……

engChrName: I just want one friend who can share my pain...
engSearchText: I just want one friend who can share my pain...
jpnChrName: せめて学費やバイトの事で愚痴り合ったり できる友達がいれば気も楽になりそうなのに……
jpnSearchText:
せめて学費やバイトの事で愚痴り合ったり
できる友達がいれば気も楽になりそうなのに……

engChrName: Although, maybe I shouldn't be complaining at a time like this.
engSearchText:
Although, maybe I shouldn't be complaining at a
time like this.
jpnChrName: ……国中が大変な時に、何でこうしょうもない事で こんなに悩んでんのかな、僕……
jpnSearchText:
……国中が大変な時に、何でこうしょうもない事で
こんなに悩んでんのかな、僕……

engChrName: I finally got a part-time job! ...But that means I have to work in the evenings now, which is when I usually do my homework.
engSearchText:
I finally got a part-time job! ...But that means I have
to work in the evenings now, which is when I usually
do my homework.
jpnChrName: ふう、ようやくバイトの合間にありつけた…… 夕方にはまたバイトか……課題できそうにないな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ようやくバイトの合間にありつけた……
夕方にはまたバイトか……課題できそうにないな。

engChrName: I joined Oración University because it's a prestigious college, but man, the tuition is killer!
engSearchText:
I joined Oración University because it's a prestigious
college, but man, the tuition is killer!
jpnChrName: オラシオン大学、名門だからって入ったのに まさか授業料でこんなに苦労する事になるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン大学、名門だからって入ったのに
まさか授業料でこんなに苦労する事になるなんて……

engChrName: And I've got rent and other cost of living expenses on top of that. *sigh* If only I'd been born into a rich family...
engSearchText:
And I've got rent and other cost of living expenses on
top of that. *sigh* If only I'd been born into a
rich family...
jpnChrName: 家賃や物価も高いから節約にも限界があるし…… 庶民に厳しい街だよ、とほほ……
jpnSearchText:
家賃や物価も高いから節約にも限界があるし……
庶民に厳しい街だよ、とほほ……

engChrName: I wasn't expecting a surprise like this one. Maybe Aidios hasn't abandoned me after all!
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting a surprise like this one.
Maybe Aidios hasn't abandoned me after all!
jpnChrName: まさかあんなサプライズがあるなんて…… 女神様は私を見捨てていなかったのね！
jpnSearchText:
まさかあんなサプライズがあるなんて……
女神様は私を見捨てていなかったのね！

engChrName: I may be missing out on the EGC, and I'm not gonna be able to meet any fancy actresses.
engSearchText:
I may be missing out on the EGC, and I'm not gonna
be able to meet any fancy actresses.
jpnChrName: 映画祭にもＥＧＣにも行けなかったけど、 今回のイベントも楽しそう……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭にもＥＧＣにも行けなかったけど、
今回のイベントも楽しそう……

engChrName: But this event should still be tons of fun!
engSearchText: But this event should still be tons of fun!
jpnChrName: 女優さんたちには会えないけど、 本当に粋な計らいって感じね……！
jpnSearchText:
女優さんたちには会えないけど、
本当に粋な計らいって感じね……！

engChrName: Noooooo... Entry to the EGC is on a lottery system, and they've already ended applications to it...
engSearchText:
Noooooo... Entry to the EGC is on a lottery system,
and they've already ended applications to it...
jpnChrName: が～ん……ＥＧＣの入場って抽選制だったの？ しかももう受付終わっちゃってたし……
jpnSearchText:
が～ん……ＥＧＣの入場って抽選制だったの？
しかももう受付終わっちゃってたし……

engChrName: I couldn't go to the film festival, and now I can't attend the EGC, either... I'm kicking myself for not looking up more info in advance.
engSearchText:
I couldn't go to the film festival, and now I can't
attend the EGC, either... I'm kicking myself for not
looking up more info in advance.
jpnChrName: 映画祭に続いてこっちも行けないなんて…… こんな事なら開催の事調べなきゃよかったわ……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭に続いてこっちも行けないなんて……
こんな事なら開催の事調べなきゃよかったわ……

engChrName: I heard that Elaine's back in town! She's the pride of Oración!
engSearchText:
I heard that Elaine's back in town! She's the pride
of Oración!
jpnChrName: そういえば、オラシオンが誇るあの一流遊撃士、 エレインさんも帰って来たとかって噂も聞いたわ！
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、オラシオンが誇るあの一流遊撃士、
エレインさんも帰って来たとかって噂も聞いたわ！

engChrName: She's just as beautiful as all the top models, and she's super strong and cool, to boot!
engSearchText:
She's just as beautiful as all the top models, and she's
super strong and cool, to boot!
jpnChrName: エレインさんもモデルさんたちに劣らず素敵で…… しかも強くて凛々しいし、本当に憧れるわ……！
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんもモデルさんたちに劣らず素敵で……
しかも強くて凛々しいし、本当に憧れるわ……！

engChrName: If she really is back in Oración, I'd love to catch a glimpse of her...
engSearchText:
If she really is back in Oración, I'd love to catch a
glimpse of her...
jpnChrName: 本当に帰って来ているなら、どこかで お目にかかれたらいいのに……
jpnSearchText:
本当に帰って来ているなら、どこかで
お目にかかれたらいいのに……

engChrName: It sucks that I missed the film festival, but maybe I'll be able to see the EGC this year.
engSearchText:
It sucks that I missed the film festival, but maybe I'll
be able to see the EGC this year.
jpnChrName: うーん、映画祭に行けなかったのは悔しいけど、 ＥＧＣは今年はちゃんとできるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、映画祭に行けなかったのは悔しいけど、
ＥＧＣは今年はちゃんとできるのかしら？

engChrName: So, Paulina. Have you ever heard about the EGC?
engSearchText: So, Paulina. Have you ever heard about the EGC?
jpnChrName: ポリーナ、ＥＧＣってのはね、一流の モデルさんとかが集まるすごーいお祭りなのよ！
jpnSearchText:
ポリーナ、ＥＧＣってのはね、一流の
モデルさんとかが集まるすごーいお祭りなのよ！

engChrName: Yep! The radio said it's a biiig festival with models! But...the radio also said it might not happen this year...
engSearchText:
Yep! The radio said it's a biiig festival with models!
But...the radio also said it might not happen
this year...
jpnChrName: うん、ポリーナもきのうラジオできいた…… でも、ことしはできないかもって……
jpnSearchText:
うん、ポリーナもきのうラジオできいた……
でも、ことしはできないかもって……

engChrName: Yeah, but we can't give up hope! Those models worked really hard, so surely they'll still run it!
engSearchText:
Yeah, but we can't give up hope! Those models
worked really hard, so surely they'll still run it!
jpnChrName: そうよ、でも是非やって欲しいわ！ モデルさんたちだってがんばってるもの！
jpnSearchText:
そうよ、でも是非やって欲しいわ！
モデルさんたちだってがんばってるもの！

engChrName: I'll go check to see if it's still on!
engSearchText: I'll go check to see if it's still on!
jpnChrName: 後でちゃんとやるのかどうかも調べておかなきゃ！
jpnSearchText: 後でちゃんとやるのかどうかも調べておかなきゃ！

engChrName: Okie dokie! I've never seen you this excited before. It must be super fun!
engSearchText:
Okie dokie! I've never seen you this excited before.
It must be super fun!
jpnChrName: うん……おねえちゃんがたのしみにしてるんだもん、 ゼッタイすてきだよね！
jpnSearchText:
うん……おねえちゃんがたのしみにしてるんだもん、
ゼッタイすてきだよね！

engChrName: Maybe I'll get to meet a famous actress...or a model...
engSearchText: Maybe I'll get to meet a famous actress...or a model...
jpnChrName: ポリーナも、ジョユウさんとかモデルさんとか いっかいあってみたいな……
jpnSearchText:
ポリーナも、ジョユウさんとかモデルさんとか
いっかいあってみたいな……

engChrName: Th-This thing sounds scary...but as long as Tietta's with me, I'll be okay!
engSearchText:
Th-This thing sounds scary...but as long as Tietta's
with me, I'll be okay!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとコワイかもだけど…… おねえちゃんとなら、ゼッタイたのしいもん……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっとコワイかもだけど……
おねえちゃんとなら、ゼッタイたのしいもん……！

engChrName: C'mon, Tietta. It's okay! There's always next year, right?
engSearchText:
C'mon, Tietta. It's okay! There's always next
year, right?
jpnChrName: お、おねえちゃんゲンキだして……？ ほら、またライネンもあるんでしょ……？
jpnSearchText:
お、おねえちゃんゲンキだして……？
ほら、またライネンもあるんでしょ……？

engChrName: I-I wanted to go, too, but I can wait!
engSearchText: I-I wanted to go, too, but I can wait!
jpnChrName: ぽ、ポリーナもいきたかったけど、 ガマンするから……！
jpnSearchText:
ぽ、ポリーナもいきたかったけど、
ガマンするから……！

engChrName: W-Will I meet a famous model or actress at the EGC?
engSearchText:
W-Will I meet a famous model or actress at
the EGC?
jpnChrName: ぽ、ポリーナも……ジョユウさんとか、 モデルさんとかにあえるときってあるのかな……
jpnSearchText:
ぽ、ポリーナも……ジョユウさんとか、
モデルさんとかにあえるときってあるのかな……

engChrName: I'm kinda scared to go there, but I can do it if Tietta's with me...I think.
engSearchText:
I'm kinda scared to go there, but I can do it if Tietta's
with me...I think.
jpnChrName: おねえちゃんとイッショなら…… おまつりとかもこわくない……かも……？
jpnSearchText:
おねえちゃんとイッショなら……
おまつりとかもこわくない……かも……？

engChrName: There's some sort of event going on. They rented the space only a few moments ago.
engSearchText:
There's some sort of event going on. They rented the
space only a few moments ago.
jpnChrName: どうやら急に入ったイベントがあるようで…… 場所の貸し出しの相談も直前だったが……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら急に入ったイベントがあるようで……
場所の貸し出しの相談も直前だったが……

engChrName: When I heard who the organizer was, though, I couldn't possibly say no.
engSearchText:
When I heard who the organizer was, though, I
couldn't possibly say no.
jpnChrName: 主催があちらの筋と言う話であれば…… 断る理由は無いな……
jpnSearchText:
主催があちらの筋と言う話であれば……
断る理由は無いな……

engChrName: These two traveled all the way to Oración, and they have no interest in the opera house...
engSearchText:
These two traveled all the way to Oración, and they
have no interest in the opera house...
jpnChrName: あちらの二人は……オラシオンまで一体 何をしに来たというのですか……
jpnSearchText:
あちらの二人は……オラシオンまで一体
何をしに来たというのですか……

engChrName: Why? You can only experience it here!
engSearchText: Why? You can only experience it here!
jpnChrName: ここに来たからには他では観られない、 由緒あるオペラを観てこそのはず……
jpnSearchText:
ここに来たからには他では観られない、
由緒あるオペラを観てこそのはず……

engChrName: Movies are all over the country. There's no need to waste precious vacation time seeing one.
engSearchText:
Movies are all over the country. There's no need to
waste precious vacation time seeing one.
jpnChrName: 映画など、どこで観ても同じだし、 そもそも旅先で観る必要も無いだろうに……
jpnSearchText:
映画など、どこで観ても同じだし、
そもそも旅先で観る必要も無いだろうに……

engChrName: Although, I'm more bothered by the fact that they're having that conversation here of all places. I'm on the verge of tears!
engSearchText:
Although, I'm more bothered by the fact that they're
having that conversation here of all places. I'm on the
verge of tears!
jpnChrName: というか……わざわざここでその話をされると 正直私も泣きたくなってきますよ……！？
jpnSearchText:
というか……わざわざここでその話をされると
正直私も泣きたくなってきますよ……！？

engChrName: I'd love for tourists and young folk alike to experience the rich art and history found in opera.
engSearchText:
I'd love for tourists and young folk alike to experience
the rich art and history found in opera.
jpnChrName: 観光客や若い人たちにこそ、オペラという芸術の 歴史と奥深さを知ってもらいたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
観光客や若い人たちにこそ、オペラという芸術の
歴史と奥深さを知ってもらいたいものです。

engChrName: Art can only become one with our culture if it is experienced and shared by many people.
engSearchText:
Art can only become one with our culture if it is
experienced and shared by many people.
jpnChrName: 高尚な芸術といえど、やはり多くの人に 認知されてこそ継承されていくものですからな。
jpnSearchText:
高尚な芸術といえど、やはり多くの人に
認知されてこそ継承されていくものですからな。

engChrName: The opera house's owner, Ms. Adeline, is particularly devoted to opening the eyes of our youth to the value of traditional art.
engSearchText:
The opera house's owner, Ms. Adeline, is particularly
devoted to opening the eyes of our youth to the value
of traditional art.
jpnChrName: 当館のオーナー、アドリーヌ様も若い方々への 伝統芸術の啓蒙に非常に熱心な方でして。
jpnSearchText:
当館のオーナー、アドリーヌ様も若い方々への
伝統芸術の啓蒙に非常に熱心な方でして。

engChrName: Her belief that opera can match all entertainment mediums is absolute. It's awe-inspiring, really.
engSearchText:
Her belief that opera can match all entertainment
mediums is absolute. It's awe-inspiring, really.
jpnChrName: 映画などの新興芸術に負けまいという信念は 私も圧倒されるほどですよ。
jpnSearchText:
映画などの新興芸術に負けまいという信念は
私も圧倒されるほどですよ。

engChrName: Welcome to Oración's opera house. I know the recent tragedy is still looming over us, but I encourage you to see one of our performances.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Oración's opera house. I know the recent
tragedy is still looming over us, but I encourage you to
see one of our performances.
jpnChrName: 伝統あるオラシオンのオペラハウスへようこそ。 暗いご時世ですが、この機会にいかがですか。
jpnSearchText:
伝統あるオラシオンのオペラハウスへようこそ。
暗いご時世ですが、この機会にいかがですか。

engChrName: Opera houses are on the decline due to the rise of movies. Not to mention, those pop tunes are all the rage with the youth of today...
engSearchText:
Opera houses are on the decline due to the rise
of movies. Not to mention, those pop tunes are all the
rage with the youth of today...
jpnChrName: 最近はオペラハウスも減り、映画も娯楽作品が増え、 若者の間では珍妙な音楽が流行していますが……
jpnSearchText:
最近はオペラハウスも減り、映画も娯楽作品が増え、
若者の間では珍妙な音楽が流行していますが……

engChrName: The world is moving on from opera, it seems. What a great loss that will be to the Republic.
engSearchText:
The world is moving on from opera, it seems. What a
great loss that will be to the Republic.
jpnChrName: こうした伝統芸能が忘れ去られてしまうのは 実に心が痛みますし、共和国にとっても大きな損失……
jpnSearchText:
こうした伝統芸能が忘れ去られてしまうのは
実に心が痛みますし、共和国にとっても大きな損失……

engChrName: We must prevent such a future from coming to be. Those of us in the old capital must enlighten the people of Calvard to the best of our ability.
engSearchText:
We must prevent such a future from coming to be.
Those of us in the old capital must enlighten the
people of Calvard to the best of our ability.
jpnChrName: この古都で伝統芸能を受け継いだ我々には、少しでも 市民にこれを啓蒙し、伝える使命があるのです。
jpnSearchText:
この古都で伝統芸能を受け継いだ我々には、少しでも
市民にこれを啓蒙し、伝える使命があるのです。

engChrName: It's odd to see someone hosting an event for children at the opera house.
engSearchText:
It's odd to see someone hosting an event for children
at the opera house.
jpnChrName: オペラハウスで子供たちを集めての 催し事なんて珍しいですわね……
jpnSearchText:
オペラハウスで子供たちを集めての
催し事なんて珍しいですわね……

engChrName: Come to think of it, I believe I heard someone saying something about this on the orbal net.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I believe I heard someone saying
something about this on the orbal net.
jpnChrName: そういえば、ネットでどうこうとか 言っている人を見かけた気もしますわ……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ネットでどうこうとか
言っている人を見かけた気もしますわ……

engChrName: I didn't look too deeply into it, though.
engSearchText: I didn't look too deeply into it, though.
jpnChrName: 導力ネット上の話題というのは判らないけど、 何か関係があるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
導力ネット上の話題というのは判らないけど、
何か関係があるのかしら？

engChrName: Everyone involved in the film industry is all the same. From producers to actors, they're all so vulgar. So base.
engSearchText:
Everyone involved in the film industry is all the same.
From producers to actors, they're all so vulgar.
So base.
jpnChrName: 映画と言うのは作る者も出演する者も、 どこまでも俗悪で卑しいもののようですわね……
jpnSearchText:
映画と言うのは作る者も出演する者も、
どこまでも俗悪で卑しいもののようですわね……

engChrName: No child of mine will ever walk into a theater for as long as I live. I will expose them only to the highest forms of art!
engSearchText:
No child of mine will ever walk into a theater for as
long as I live. I will expose them only to the highest
forms of art!
jpnChrName: 絶対にわたくしの子供たちには見せたくないですわ、 うちの子は高尚な芸術で感性を養うべきざます！
jpnSearchText:
絶対にわたくしの子供たちには見せたくないですわ、
うちの子は高尚な芸術で感性を養うべきざます！

engChrName: It's only a matter of time before children imitate the 'art' they see on the screen and commit horrible atrocities all over the world.
engSearchText:
It's only a matter of time before children imitate the
'art' they see on the screen and commit horrible
atrocities all over the world.
jpnChrName: 映画のような低俗な映像を観過ぎると、 真似をして犯罪に走る子も出るんじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
映画のような低俗な映像を観過ぎると、
真似をして犯罪に走る子も出るんじゃないかしら？

engChrName: That Gotti person ought to be locked up when that happens. His violent, lubricious films may spell the end of civilized society as we know it.
engSearchText:
That Gotti person ought to be locked up when
that happens. His violent, lubricious films may spell
the end of civilized society as we know it.
jpnChrName: 特にゴッチなる監督の作る映画は、暴力と 性的描写がとても過激だと聞きますわ！
jpnSearchText:
特にゴッチなる監督の作る映画は、暴力と
性的描写がとても過激だと聞きますわ！

engChrName: What a wonderful performance that was.
engSearchText: What a wonderful performance that was.
jpnChrName: 先ほどの公演も見事なものでしたわね……
jpnSearchText: 先ほどの公演も見事なものでしたわね……

engChrName: Indubitably. Opera truly stands at the height of all art. Films cannot ever hope to match it.
engSearchText:
Indubitably. Opera truly stands at the height of all art.
Films cannot ever hope to match it.
jpnChrName: あのような深みのある表現は、 映画などでは到底できないものですもの。
jpnSearchText:
あのような深みのある表現は、
映画などでは到底できないものですもの。

engChrName: Did you hear that Oración has its own theater now? Apparently, everything shown there is utter trash that's aimed at uncultured simpletons.
engSearchText:
Did you hear that Oración has its own theater now?
Apparently, everything shown there is utter trash
that's aimed at uncultured simpletons.
jpnChrName: 映画館もオラシオンに出来ましたけど、内容を 伝え聞くだけでも単純で低俗そうで……
jpnSearchText:
映画館もオラシオンに出来ましたけど、内容を
伝え聞くだけでも単純で低俗そうで……

engChrName: That's hardly a surprise. Film directors and script 'writers' are just hacks masquerading as artists.
engSearchText:
That's hardly a surprise. Film directors and script
'writers' are just hacks masquerading as artists.
jpnChrName: 仕方のない事ですわ、映画の監督や脚本家など、 芸術家ではなくただの映画会社のスタッフ……
jpnSearchText:
仕方のない事ですわ、映画の監督や脚本家など、
芸術家ではなくただの映画会社のスタッフ……

engChrName: But they are far less detestable than the actors. They are nothing more than talentless failures who lack the skills to be cast in opera.
engSearchText:
But they are far less detestable than the actors.
They are nothing more than talentless failures who
lack the skills to be cast in opera.
jpnChrName: 何より映画俳優というのも、どうせほとんどが 一流の劇団員になれなかった落ちこぼれですのよ。
jpnSearchText:
何より映画俳優というのも、どうせほとんどが
一流の劇団員になれなかった落ちこぼれですのよ。

engChrName: The fact that people can enjoy those degenerate works is unfathomable to me.
engSearchText:
The fact that people can enjoy those degenerate
works is unfathomable to me.
jpnChrName: そう思うと、つまらないばかりか 哀れなものですわ。
jpnSearchText:
そう思うと、つまらないばかりか
哀れなものですわ。

engChrName: But I suppose our government is to blame for that. They ought to provide better cultural education.
engSearchText:
But I suppose our government is to blame for that.
They ought to provide better cultural education.
jpnChrName: そんな退廃した作り物に喜ぶ人たちも多いけれど…… 芸術的素養を育めなかった人の末路ですわ。
jpnSearchText:
そんな退廃した作り物に喜ぶ人たちも多いけれど……
芸術的素養を育めなかった人の末路ですわ。

engChrName: Movies will cause the youths of today to become desensitized to reality. Many will turn to lives of crime or try to attempt the impossible.
engSearchText:
Movies will cause the youths of today to become
desensitized to reality. Many will turn to lives of
crime or try to attempt the impossible.
jpnChrName: そういう人達は、映画と現実の区別もつかなくなって 犯罪を犯したり、出来もしない事に奔走するとか。
jpnSearchText:
そういう人達は、映画と現実の区別もつかなくなって
犯罪を犯したり、出来もしない事に奔走するとか。

engChrName: What a terrifying prospect... Let us hope that true art will spread once more and put a swift end to that abominable medium.
engSearchText:
What a terrifying prospect... Let us hope that true art
will spread once more and put a swift end to that
abominable medium.
jpnChrName: 怖ろしい事ざます……高尚な芸術がもっと広まって、 退廃した娯楽が駆逐されれば良いのに……
jpnSearchText:
怖ろしい事ざます……高尚な芸術がもっと広まって、
退廃した娯楽が駆逐されれば良いのに……

engChrName: (I can't BELIEVE what I'm hearing right now! Where do these people get off insulting everyone left and right?!)
engSearchText:
(I can't BELIEVE what I'm hearing right now!
Where do these people get off insulting everyone left
and right?!)
jpnChrName: （こ、こいつら……いくら何でも   偏見が酷すぎでしょ！？）
jpnSearchText:
（こ、こいつら……いくら何でも
偏見が酷すぎでしょ！？）

engChrName: (This isn't 1175—we're in the thirteenth century here! What kind of ancient relic has THIS much beef against movies?!)
engSearchText:
(This isn't 1175—we're in the thirteenth century here!
What kind of ancient relic has THIS much beef
against movies?!)
jpnChrName: （今、七耀暦何年よ！？　今時映画にこんな   先入観の人たちがいたなんて……ッ！）
jpnSearchText:
（今、七耀暦何年よ！？　今時映画にこんな
先入観の人たちがいたなんて……ッ！）

engChrName: (Calm down, Judith. What they're sayin' ain't cool, but you don't wanna make a fuss and end up blowin' your cover.)
engSearchText:
(Calm down, Judith. What they're sayin' ain't cool,
but you don't wanna make a fuss and end up blowin'
your cover.)
jpnChrName: （落ち着け、下手にここで騒いでお前が   来ているってバレたら面倒な事になっちまう。）
jpnSearchText:
（落ち着け、下手にここで騒いでお前が
来ているってバレたら面倒な事になっちまう。）

engChrName: (I know, I know... I'll bite my tongue and use this experience as fuel for honing my craft. I'll change their minds with my acting!)
engSearchText:
(I know, I know... I'll bite my tongue and use this
experience as fuel for honing my craft. I'll change
their minds with my acting!)
jpnChrName: （わ、わかってるわよ……！   いつか、実力で見返してやりたいってだけ！）
jpnSearchText:
（わ、わかってるわよ……！
いつか、実力で見返してやりたいってだけ！）

engChrName: Did you hear about that scandal with the famous movie actress last week?
engSearchText:
Did you hear about that scandal with the famous
movie actress last week?
jpnChrName: そういえば先ほど聞いたのだけど、先週首都では 有名らしい映画女優の話でもちきりだったとか……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば先ほど聞いたのだけど、先週首都では
有名らしい映画女優の話でもちきりだったとか……

engChrName: I did, but only a secondhand account of it. They say she had a one-night stand with a famous racer.
engSearchText:
I did, but only a secondhand account of it. They say
she had a one-night stand with a famous racer.
jpnChrName: わたくしも人伝に聞いたざますよ、 何でも車関係で有名な男と関係を持ったとか……
jpnSearchText:
わたくしも人伝に聞いたざますよ、
何でも車関係で有名な男と関係を持ったとか……

engChrName: Apparently, that racer is known for seducing and discarding women one after the other!
engSearchText:
Apparently, that racer is known for seducing and
discarding women one after the other!
jpnChrName: しかも相手の男も、何人もの女性を誑かしては 捨てる事を繰り返すような人だったとか！
jpnSearchText:
しかも相手の男も、何人もの女性を誑かしては
捨てる事を繰り返すような人だったとか！

engChrName: *gasp* My word... Surely the movie actress must have known that. What a shameful woman!
engSearchText:
*gasp* My word... Surely the movie actress must have
known that. What a shameful woman!
jpnChrName: その映画女優はそれを知った上で関係を……？ まあ、何とはしたないこと！
jpnSearchText:
その映画女優はそれを知った上で関係を……？
まあ、何とはしたないこと！

engChrName: That actress must've been no different from him. She's likely no stranger to disposing of men like yesterday's garbage!
engSearchText:
That actress must've been no different from him.
She's likely no stranger to disposing of men like
yesterday's garbage!
jpnChrName: きっとその女優も、相手の男と同じような事を 日頃からして慣れているような女なのですわ！
jpnSearchText:
きっとその女優も、相手の男と同じような事を
日頃からして慣れているような女なのですわ！

engChrName: Worse yet, I hear she commonly appears in those carnal exhibitions that Gotti person makes!
engSearchText:
Worse yet, I hear she commonly appears in those
carnal exhibitions that Gotti person makes!
jpnChrName: しかもその女優、例のゴッチという男の作る 官能的な映画に頻繁に出演していると聞きますわ！
jpnSearchText:
しかもその女優、例のゴッチという男の作る
官能的な映画に頻繁に出演していると聞きますわ！

engChrName: This just goes to show that morally repugnant movies beget morally repugnant people, whether actor, director, or viewer.
engSearchText:
This just goes to show that morally repugnant movies
beget morally repugnant people, whether actor,
director, or viewer.
jpnChrName: やはり映画俳優というものは、そういう 卑しい生き方だという良い例ざましょ？
jpnSearchText:
やはり映画俳優というものは、そういう
卑しい生き方だという良い例ざましょ？

engChrName: Indeed. This serves as irrefutable proof that an actress who fails to reach the heights of theater will fall to the depths of depravity.
engSearchText:
Indeed. This serves as irrefutable proof that an actress
who fails to reach the heights of theater will fall to the
depths of depravity.
jpnChrName: ええ、同じ役者でも劇団員になれないと そこまで堕ちてしまうだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、同じ役者でも劇団員になれないと
そこまで堕ちてしまうだなんて……

engChrName: What an unspeakable tragedy. I just want to turn my eyes from the whole sordid affair.
engSearchText:
What an unspeakable tragedy. I just want to turn my
eyes from the whole sordid affair.
jpnChrName: あまりにも哀れで目を覆いたくなるざます……！
jpnSearchText: あまりにも哀れで目を覆いたくなるざます……！

engChrName: (I can't BELIEVE what I'm hearing right now! Where do these people get off insulting everyone left and right?!)
engSearchText:

Where do these people get off insulting everyone left
and right?!)
jpnChrName: （こ、こいつら……いくら何でも   偏見が酷すぎでしょ！？）
jpnSearchText:
（こ、こいつら……いくら何でも

engChrName: (This isn't 1175—we're in the thirteenth century here! What kind of ancient relic has THIS much beef against movies?!)

jpnChrName: （今、七耀暦何年よ！？　今時映画にこんな   先入観の人たちがいたなんて……ッ！）
jpnSearchText:
（今、七耀暦何年よ！？　今時映画にこんな

engChrName: (Calm down, Judith. What they're sayin' ain't cool, but you don't wanna make a fuss and end up blowin' your cover.)
engSearchText:
(Calm down, Judith. What they're sayin' ain't cool,

jpnChrName: （落ち着け、下手にここで騒いでお前が   来ているってバレたら面倒な事になっちまう。）
jpnSearchText:
（落ち着け、下手にここで騒いでお前が
来ているってバレたら面倒な事になっちまう。）

engChrName: (I know, I know... I'll bite my tongue and use this experience as fuel for honing my craft. I'll change their minds with my acting!)
engSearchText:
(I know, I know... I'll bite my tongue and use this
experience as fuel for honing my craft. I'll change
their minds with my acting!)
jpnChrName: （わ、わかってるわよ……！   いつか、実力で見返してやりたいってだけ！）
jpnSearchText:
（わ、わかってるわよ……！
いつか、実力で見返してやりたいってだけ！）

engChrName: Goodness. I've never seen so many children in front of the opera house before. Well, I suppose it's fine— so long as they don't cause a ruckus.
engSearchText:
Goodness. I've never seen so many children in front
of the opera house before. Well, I suppose it's fine—
so long as they don't cause a ruckus.
jpnChrName: 高尚なオペラハウス前に随分と子供が集まって…… 騒がしくしないでくれるといいのですけど。
jpnSearchText:
高尚なオペラハウス前に随分と子供が集まって……
騒がしくしないでくれるといいのですけど。

engChrName: Although, looking at them now, I see a number of children who are dressed in remarkably unrefined garments.
engSearchText:
Although, looking at them now, I see a number of
children who are dressed in remarkably
unrefined garments.
jpnChrName: 見てみれば、あまり気品の無いような身なりの子も ちらほら混じっているようですわね……
jpnSearchText:
見てみれば、あまり気品の無いような身なりの子も
ちらほら混じっているようですわね……

engChrName: Who on earth is holding an event like this?
engSearchText: Who on earth is holding an event like this?
jpnChrName: 一体何の催しだというのですの？
jpnSearchText: 一体何の催しだというのですの？

engChrName: The movies that Gotti person makes are supposedly both immoral and obscene.
engSearchText:
The movies that Gotti person makes are supposedly
both immoral and obscene.
jpnChrName: ゴッチなる男が作る映画は、倫理観も 道徳も欠如したものと聞きますわ。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチなる男が作る映画は、倫理観も
道徳も欠如したものと聞きますわ。

engChrName: It's inconceivable to me that people actually watch that filth, but I'm even more astonished that any woman would act in them.
engSearchText:
It's inconceivable to me that people actually watch
that filth, but I'm even more astonished that any
woman would act in them.
jpnChrName: そんなものが流行るのも理解できないけれど、 女性の身で出演するなど気が知れませんわ。
jpnSearchText:
そんなものが流行るのも理解できないけれど、
女性の身で出演するなど気が知れませんわ。

engChrName: They must be the furthest thing from a proper lady. I imagine they're little more than dogs in heat without a fragment of shame.
engSearchText:
They must be the furthest thing from a proper lady.
I imagine they're little more than dogs in heat
without a fragment of shame.
jpnChrName: きっと淑女と呼ぶには程遠い、貞操観念も 羞恥心も皆無に等しい女に違いないざます。
jpnSearchText:
きっと淑女と呼ぶには程遠い、貞操観念も
羞恥心も皆無に等しい女に違いないざます。

engChrName: The only skill a movie actress must possess is having a fair body. All they're good at is arousing stimulation in lustful men.
engSearchText:
The only skill a movie actress must possess is having a
fair body. All they're good at is arousing stimulation
in lustful men.
jpnChrName: 映画俳優と言うのは所詮、単純な刺激だけの演出に 合わせて身体を動かすだけの仕事らしいですわよ。
jpnSearchText:
映画俳優と言うのは所詮、単純な刺激だけの演出に
合わせて身体を動かすだけの仕事らしいですわよ。

engChrName: The same goes for the so-called 'idols' I hear so much about. I'm told their nigh-scandalous outfits expose a great deal of skin.
engSearchText:
The same goes for the so-called 'idols' I hear so
much about. I'm told their nigh-scandalous outfits
expose a great deal of skin.
jpnChrName: 最近では“アイドル”なんてものや、やたらと 身体を見せる女優も多いと聞きますけれど……
jpnSearchText:
最近では“アイドル”なんてものや、やたらと
身体を見せる女優も多いと聞きますけれど……

engChrName: When I was young, we had a name for such people: harlots.
engSearchText:
When I was young, we had a name for such
people: harlots.
jpnChrName: そんなの、卑しい遊女と一体何が 違うというのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
そんなの、卑しい遊女と一体何が
違うというのかしら？

engChrName: I heard there was going to be an event for kids here. Is that what's going on in front of the opera house?
engSearchText:
I heard there was going to be an event for kids here.
Is that what's going on in front of the opera house?
jpnChrName: 何か子供向けの催しがあるとか無いとかって噂、 オペラハウス前の集まりがそうなのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
何か子供向けの催しがあるとか無いとかって噂、
オペラハウス前の集まりがそうなのかしら？

engChrName: Well, isn't that nice? It's been so very dour as of late, so it's always good to do something to clear the air.
engSearchText:
Well, isn't that nice? It's been so very dour as of late,
so it's always good to do something to clear the air.
jpnChrName: まあ、良いんじゃないかしら？　不幸な事件で 沈みがちだもの、気晴らしくらいは必要よ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、良いんじゃないかしら？　不幸な事件で
沈みがちだもの、気晴らしくらいは必要よ。

engChrName: I stopped by the market this evening. Bernice is such a generous woman.
engSearchText:
I stopped by the market this evening. Bernice is such
a generous woman.
jpnChrName: 夕方に市場の方に行ってみたのだけど、 ベレニスさん相変わらず気前よくて助かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
夕方に市場の方に行ってみたのだけど、
