ベレニスさん相変わらず気前よくて助かったわ。

engChrName: She was in a good mood today because a merchant she has a good relationship with stopped by. I got some very good deals from her.
engSearchText:
She was in a good mood today because a merchant
she has a good relationship with stopped by. I got
some very good deals from her.
jpnChrName: 懇意にしている商人さんが今日来るって事も あって随分とサービスしてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
懇意にしている商人さんが今日来るって事も
あって随分とサービスしてくれて。

engChrName: If you've lived in this city for as long as I have, you'll come to appreciate the few folks who lend a hand to the lower class.
engSearchText:
If you've lived in this city for as long as I have, you'll
come to appreciate the few folks who lend a hand to
the lower class.
jpnChrName: 本当、この街に住んでいると ああいう庶民の味方は有難いわよ。
jpnSearchText:
本当、この街に住んでいると
ああいう庶民の味方は有難いわよ。

engChrName: The average citizen in this city struggles to make ends meet.
engSearchText:
The average citizen in this city struggles to make
ends meet.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ただでさえあたしら平民は 物価が高くて困っているのに……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ただでさえあたしら平民は
物価が高くて困っているのに……

engChrName: If the situation remains as tense as it is, economic activity may come to a halt, which could drive food prices up.
engSearchText:
If the situation remains as tense as it is, economic
activity may come to a halt, which could drive food
prices up.
jpnChrName: こんな不安な状況が続いたら、経済も滞って 食料なんかも高騰しないかどうか……
jpnSearchText:
こんな不安な状況が続いたら、経済も滞って
食料なんかも高騰しないかどうか……

engChrName: Maybe I ought to stop by Bernice's store in the North District...
engSearchText:
Maybe I ought to stop by Bernice's store in the
North District...
jpnChrName: 北街区のベレニスさんのお店に 買いに行った方が良いかしらねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
北街区のベレニスさんのお店に
買いに行った方が良いかしらねぇ……

engChrName: Is it true that that village was destroyed? Oh, what a frightful age we live in...
engSearchText:
Is it true that that village was destroyed? Oh, what a
frightful age we live in...
jpnChrName: 例の村が丸ごと爆破されたとかいう事件…… 本当に怖い時代になったものねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
例の村が丸ごと爆破されたとかいう事件……
本当に怖い時代になったものねぇ……

engChrName: We've always had the occasional terrorist incident or uprising, but nothing so extreme as this.
engSearchText:
We've always had the occasional terrorist incident or
uprising, but nothing so extreme as this.
jpnChrName: 昔もテロや暴動はあったけど、 あんなに無差別じゃなかったもの……
jpnSearchText:
昔もテロや暴動はあったけど、
あんなに無差別じゃなかったもの……

engChrName: People like us may very well become the next victims. How horrifying...
engSearchText:
People like us may very well become the next victims.
How horrifying...
jpnChrName: これじゃああたしら庶民も、 いつ巻き込まれるかわかったもんじゃないわ……
jpnSearchText:
これじゃああたしら庶民も、
いつ巻き込まれるかわかったもんじゃないわ……

engChrName: The kids seem to be excited for something or another. As for what specifically, I have no idea.
engSearchText:
The kids seem to be excited for something or another.
As for what specifically, I have no idea.
jpnChrName: 特に話は聞いていないが……街の子供たち、 何か楽しみな事でもあるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
特に話は聞いていないが……街の子供たち、
何か楽しみな事でもあるみたいだな。

engChrName: There are no restrictions on holding an event, and we certainly won't snuff out a joyful little event that'll bring smiles to the children's faces.
engSearchText:
There are no restrictions on holding an event, and we
certainly won't snuff out a joyful little event that'll
bring smiles to the children's faces.
jpnChrName: 特にイベントなどの規制は指令されていないし、 こんな時だからこそ楽しみを潰す訳にもいかんな。
jpnSearchText:
特にイベントなどの規制は指令されていないし、
こんな時だからこそ楽しみを潰す訳にもいかんな。

engChrName: We'll just need to put more effort into our patrols so they can enjoy themselves without worry.
engSearchText:
We'll just need to put more effort into our patrols so
they can enjoy themselves without worry.
jpnChrName: 子供らのためにも、改めて気合を入れて 警備をしよう、安心して楽しめるようにな。
jpnSearchText:
子供らのためにも、改めて気合を入れて
警備をしよう、安心して楽しめるようにな。

engChrName: Officer Katarina said she had personal business to attend to. Guess this'll be a solo patrol night.
engSearchText:
Officer Katarina said she had personal business to
attend to. Guess this'll be a solo patrol night.
jpnChrName: カタリナ巡査は私用があるとかでね。 今夜の巡回は一人でやる事になりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
カタリナ巡査は私用があるとかでね。
今夜の巡回は一人でやる事になりそうだ。

engChrName: I've gathered that she's concerned about one of her friends, Officer Crema.
engSearchText:
I've gathered that she's concerned about one of her
friends, Officer Crema.
jpnChrName: ふむ、彼女は友人のクレマ巡査の事を 大分案じていたようだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、彼女は友人のクレマ巡査の事を
大分案じていたようだが……

engChrName: I don't know the details since I won't go poking into a woman's private life. She applied for time off properly, so I'll leave her to her business.
engSearchText:
I don't know the details since I won't go poking into
a woman's private life. She applied for time off
properly, so I'll leave her to her business.
jpnChrName: しかしプライベートに踏み込むのはよくないな。 届けも出している訳だし、私も仕事に専念しよう。
jpnSearchText:
しかしプライベートに踏み込むのはよくないな。
届けも出している訳だし、私も仕事に専念しよう。

engChrName: At first glance, nothing seems to be amiss. The upper crust and the tourists are going about their days like usual.
engSearchText:
At first glance, nothing seems to be amiss. The upper
crust and the tourists are going about their days
like usual.
jpnChrName: それにしても……上流階級や観光客の様子は 普段と変わったところはないが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……上流階級や観光客の様子は
普段と変わったところはないが……

engChrName: However, I'm certain I've seen some suspicious individuals about. I also don't understand why the bracers have called in additional support.
engSearchText:
However, I'm certain I've seen some suspicious
individuals about. I also don't understand why the
bracers have called in additional support.
jpnChrName: やはり時々、怪しい者も見かけるな…… 遊撃士の増員も理由が明示されておらず不可解だ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり時々、怪しい者も見かけるな……
遊撃士の増員も理由が明示されておらず不可解だ。

engChrName: I would normally expect the citizens to be more alarmed, but they are shockingly calm. I find it a little disquieting.
engSearchText:
I would normally expect the citizens to be more
alarmed, but they are shockingly calm. I find it a
little disquieting.
jpnChrName: 一般市民が他の都市より落ち着いている分…… ギャップが不気味と言わざるを得ない。
jpnSearchText:
一般市民が他の都市より落ち着いている分……
ギャップが不気味と言わざるを得ない。

engChrName: I wish I had a clearer picture of what's going on, but it's obvious that something's up. I better keep a close eye on the streets.
engSearchText:
I wish I had a clearer picture of what's going on, but
it's obvious that something's up. I better keep a close
eye on the streets.
jpnChrName: ……事態の詳細は分からないが、上層部の雰囲気を 見るに注意した方が良いのは確かだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……事態の詳細は分からないが、上層部の雰囲気を
見るに注意した方が良いのは確かだろう。

engChrName: One way or another, there are some duties that only we can perform. We'll do everything we can to keep the peace.
engSearchText:
One way or another, there are some duties that only
we can perform. We'll do everything we can to keep
the peace.
jpnChrName: 我々は我々に出来る事をするしかないからな、 少しでも市民の安全を守らねば。
jpnSearchText:
我々は我々に出来る事をするしかないからな、
少しでも市民の安全を守らねば。

engChrName: Good morning. Are you from out of town? Would you mind if I asked who you are and what you're here for?
engSearchText:
Good morning. Are you from out of town?
Would you mind if I asked who you are and what
you're here for?
jpnChrName: 君達は旅行者かな？ 悪いが、身元と滞在目的を聞かせてもらいたい。
jpnSearchText:
君達は旅行者かな？
悪いが、身元と滞在目的を聞かせてもらいたい。

engChrName: Sure thing. I'm just an everyday day laborer from Edith.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. I'm just an everyday day laborer
from Edith.
jpnChrName: まあ、首都から仕事で来たしがない便利屋さ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、首都から仕事で来たしがない便利屋さ。

engChrName: I was employed by Anchorville to help with moving things over at the midway point, but then, well, yesterday happened.
engSearchText:
I was employed by Anchorville to help with moving
things over at the midway point, but then, well,
yesterday happened.
jpnChrName: 昨日までは中間地点のアンカーヴィルで引っ越しの 仕事してたんだが、こんな事になっちまって……
jpnSearchText:
昨日までは中間地点のアンカーヴィルで引っ越しの
仕事してたんだが、こんな事になっちまって……

engChrName: I knew I wasn't gonna be gettin' back to Edith anytime soon, so I dropped by here. Figured I'd take up some cleaning jobs while I'm in town.
engSearchText:
I knew I wasn't gonna be gettin' back to Edith
anytime soon, so I dropped by here. Figured I'd take
up some cleaning jobs while I'm in town.
jpnChrName: 首都にも帰れそうにないから予定を繰り上げて、 この街での“掃除”の依頼対応に来たんだ。
jpnSearchText:
首都にも帰れそうにないから予定を繰り上げて、
この街での“掃除”の依頼対応に来たんだ。

engChrName: Understood. Thank you for your cooperation. We're on the lookout for suspicious individuals, so we're on high alert.
engSearchText:
Understood. Thank you for your cooperation.
We're on the lookout for suspicious individuals, so
we're on high alert.
jpnChrName: ふむ、聞く限りでは怪しくはなさそうだな。 すまないな、こちらも厳重警戒中なもので。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、聞く限りでは怪しくはなさそうだな。
すまないな、こちらも厳重警戒中なもので。

engChrName: The state of emergency has the top brass in a state of panic, and we have no idea why.
engSearchText:
The state of emergency has the top brass in a state of
panic, and we have no idea why.
jpnChrName: 手間を取らせてすみません、非常事態宣言とは 別口で警戒する指令が下ってまして。
jpnSearchText:
手間を取らせてすみません、非常事態宣言とは
別口で警戒する指令が下ってまして。

engChrName: Anyway, sorry to take up your time. We're just doing what we can to keep people safe.
engSearchText:
Anyway, sorry to take up your time. We're just doing
what we can to keep people safe.
jpnChrName: 上層部も慌ただしく私も詳しくは判らないですが、 市民を守るためですし、ご理解ください。
jpnSearchText:
上層部も慌ただしく私も詳しくは判らないですが、
市民を守るためですし、ご理解ください。

engChrName: Yeah. Though I'm not sure I understand their orders, myself.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Though I'm not sure I understand their
orders, myself.
jpnChrName: まあ、それにしても奇妙な指令だとは思うけどな……
jpnSearchText: まあ、それにしても奇妙な指令だとは思うけどな……

engChrName: They told us to identify and mark any jaegers sighted in town, but we aren't allowed to take any action against them. It's very peculiar.
engSearchText:
They told us to identify and mark any jaegers sighted
in town, but we aren't allowed to take any action
against them. It's very peculiar.
jpnChrName: 街で猟兵などを見つけても干渉せず、 マークに留めろとは……
jpnSearchText:
街で猟兵などを見つけても干渉せず、
マークに留めろとは……

engChrName: Sure wish I knew what the people up top were thinking.
engSearchText:
Sure wish I knew what the people up top
were thinking.
jpnChrName: 上の人たちは一体何を考えているのやら……
jpnSearchText: 上の人たちは一体何を考えているのやら……

engChrName: (Just as I suspected. They've opted to keep the local forces out of the loop.)
engSearchText:
(Just as I suspected. They've opted to keep the local
forces out of the loop.)
jpnChrName: （やはり……状況の詳細を知らされていなくても、   警戒態勢自体は敷いているようですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（やはり……状況の詳細を知らされていなくても、
警戒態勢自体は敷いているようですね……）

engChrName: (René probably had a hand in that. Makes it easy for us to go about our business, so I'm not complaining.)
engSearchText:
(René probably had a hand in that. Makes it easy for
us to go about our business, so I'm not complaining.)
jpnChrName: （まあ………ルネのところの横槍ってところだろうな。   この程度なら俺らも動きやすそうではあるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ………ルネのところの横槍ってところだろうな。
この程度なら俺らも動きやすそうではあるが……）

engChrName: I know you're concerned about Officer Crema, but we can't get distracted from our own work.
engSearchText:
I know you're concerned about Officer Crema, but
we can't get distracted from our own work.
jpnChrName: カタリナ巡査……クレマ巡査の心配もわかる。 だが、我々まで仕事が疎かになったらどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
カタリナ巡査……クレマ巡査の心配もわかる。
だが、我々まで仕事が疎かになったらどうだ。

engChrName: The best way to help her is to do our jobs right so she can get plenty of rest.
engSearchText:
The best way to help her is to do our jobs right so she
can get plenty of rest.
jpnChrName: 彼女のためにも……我々がしっかり働いて、 彼女に少しでも負担をかけないようにするんだ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女のためにも……我々がしっかり働いて、
彼女に少しでも負担をかけないようにするんだ。

engChrName: I know, I know... We'll just have to put in a bit more effort so she can be at ease.
engSearchText:
I know, I know... We'll just have to put in a bit more
effort so she can be at ease.
jpnChrName: そうですね……私達がクレマ巡査の事も 安心させられるよう、頑張るべきですよね……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……私達がクレマ巡査の事も
安心させられるよう、頑張るべきですよね……

engChrName: Seeing the children be so full of cheer reminds me of why this job is so important.
engSearchText:
Seeing the children be so full of cheer reminds me of
why this job is so important.
jpnChrName: そうですね……子供たちの笑顔を見ていると、 この警備も無駄にはならない気がしてきます。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……子供たちの笑顔を見ていると、
この警備も無駄にはならない気がしてきます。

engChrName: We have a duty to protect their smiles!
engSearchText: We have a duty to protect their smiles!
jpnChrName: あの子たちが安心して遊べる日が 戻るためにも、任務を遂行しましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
あの子たちが安心して遊べる日が
戻るためにも、任務を遂行しましょう……！

engChrName: I know that maintaining order in our jurisdiction is our job.
engSearchText:
I know that maintaining order in our jurisdiction is
our job.
jpnChrName: 任された管轄の秩序を守る事……それが 私達の仕事だとはわかっています。
jpnSearchText:
任された管轄の秩序を守る事……それが
私達の仕事だとはわかっています。

engChrName: But this situation is unlike anything I've ever encountered. I don't even know what we can do.
engSearchText:
But this situation is unlike anything I've
ever encountered. I don't even know what we can do.
jpnChrName: でも、やはり状況が異常過ぎて…… 私達もどうしたものか……
jpnSearchText:
でも、やはり状況が異常過ぎて……
私達もどうしたものか……

engChrName: Some of the other officers are struggling with all this...in more ways than one, in some cases.
engSearchText:
Some of the other officers are struggling with all
this...in more ways than one, in some cases.
jpnChrName: 警察官の中にも……思う所のある 人もいますし……
jpnSearchText:
警察官の中にも……思う所のある
人もいますし……

engChrName: The entire country is in a state of emergency, and these orders have left us more than a little puzzled.
engSearchText:
The entire country is in a state of emergency, and
these orders have left us more than a little puzzled.
jpnChrName: ただでさえ国中が異常事態なのにこんな指令が 下って、困惑する警官もいくらかいて……
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ国中が異常事態なのにこんな指令が
下って、困惑する警官もいくらかいて……

engChrName: Also, one of my coworkers in the North District is... going through a hard time. It's just one weird or bad thing after another.
engSearchText:
Also, one of my coworkers in the North District is...
going through a hard time. It's just one weird or bad
thing after another.
jpnChrName: 特に北街区に配属されてる同期の子は…… 不幸な事の直後だし心配ですね……
jpnSearchText:
特に北街区に配属されてる同期の子は……
不幸な事の直後だし心配ですね……

engChrName: I imagine Officer Crema is having a hard time concentrating on her work. I hope she'll be okay.
engSearchText:
I imagine Officer Crema is having a hard time
concentrating on her work. I hope she'll be okay.
jpnChrName: クレマ巡査……ちゃんと落ち着いて 任務に当たれていると良いけど。
jpnSearchText:
クレマ巡査……ちゃんと落ち着いて
任務に当たれていると良いけど。

engChrName: Wow, this sounds, like, super fun!
engSearchText: Wow, this sounds, like, super fun!
jpnChrName: いつもとゼンゼンちがうこと…… すっごいおもしろそう！
jpnSearchText:
いつもとゼンゼンちがうこと……
すっごいおもしろそう！

engChrName: May I go invite my friends real quick?
engSearchText: May I go invite my friends real quick?
jpnChrName: あ、いまからでもほかのこたちを さそってきてもダイジョーブなのかな！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、いまからでもほかのこたちを
さそってきてもダイジョーブなのかな！？

engChrName: Oh, I need to get permission from Mommy, too!
engSearchText: Oh, I need to get permission from Mommy, too!
jpnChrName: ママにもちゃんとおててふらなきゃ……！
jpnSearchText: ママにもちゃんとおててふらなきゃ……！

engChrName: The people seem to be even more unsettled today than yesterday.
engSearchText:
The people seem to be even more unsettled today
than yesterday.
jpnChrName: いくらか街の雰囲気も昨日に比べて 変わった気もしますね……
jpnSearchText:
いくらか街の雰囲気も昨日に比べて
変わった気もしますね……

engChrName: I suppose it's only natural. The entire Republic is in a state of disarray right now.
engSearchText:
I suppose it's only natural. The entire Republic is in a
state of disarray right now.
jpnChrName: もっとも、共和国全体が混乱している状況です、 この街も影響は受けるのは当然の事。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、共和国全体が混乱している状況です、
この街も影響は受けるのは当然の事。

engChrName: All we can do is ensure that the people within these walls feel at ease.
engSearchText:
All we can do is ensure that the people within these
walls feel at ease.
jpnChrName: 僕達がすべき事は、宿の中だけでも 安らげる空間を守る事、それだけです。
jpnSearchText:
僕達がすべき事は、宿の中だけでも
安らげる空間を守る事、それだけです。

engChrName: There's something strange going on in this city. I'm getting goosebumps, but I can't quite place why.
engSearchText:
There's something strange going on in this city.
I'm getting goosebumps, but I can't quite place why.
jpnChrName: それにしても街の雰囲気は、やはり普段とは違う ようで……警戒中というのもあるでしょうが。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても街の雰囲気は、やはり普段とは違う
ようで……警戒中というのもあるでしょうが。

engChrName: Regardless, it doesn't change what I have to do. I must serve our guests to the best of my ability.
engSearchText:
Regardless, it doesn't change what I have to do.
I must serve our guests to the best of my ability.
jpnChrName: もっとも、何が起きていようと店を預かる者として 為すべき事は決まっています。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、何が起きていようと店を預かる者として
為すべき事は決まっています。

engChrName: I'll just put aside my fears and focus on doing my job.
engSearchText: I'll just put aside my fears and focus on doing my job.
jpnChrName: お客様に安心していただく空間を維持する、 それが第一である事は間違いないですからね。
jpnSearchText:
お客様に安心していただく空間を維持する、
それが第一である事は間違いないですからね。

engChrName: I'm not sure what happened exactly, but I can see Nelly's former cheer has returned. That makes me very happy.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what happened exactly, but I can see
Nelly's former cheer has returned. That makes me
very happy.
jpnChrName: 詳しい経緯は存じませんが、ネリーの不安の 種が取り払われたようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
詳しい経緯は存じませんが、ネリーの不安の
種が取り払われたようで何よりです。

engChrName: I wish her only the best. She has such a promising career ahead of her.
engSearchText:
I wish her only the best. She has such a promising
career ahead of her.
jpnChrName: 彼女の事は僕としても応援したいですしね、 今後も前向きに頑張ってもらえれば。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の事は僕としても応援したいですしね、
今後も前向きに頑張ってもらえれば。

engChrName: Nelly has lofty dreams, and I want her to pursue them without worry.
engSearchText:
Nelly has lofty dreams, and I want her to pursue them
without worry.
jpnChrName: ふむ……困りましたね。 ネリーには安心して夢を追って欲しいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……困りましたね。
ネリーには安心して夢を追って欲しいのですが……

engChrName: Though I'm sure she'll have to face a number of obstacles along her path, especially in a city like this—where people are not kind to foreigners.
engSearchText:
Though I'm sure she'll have to face a number of
obstacles along her path, especially in a city like
this—where people are not kind to foreigners.
jpnChrName: 彼女はやはり中東系という事もあり、 何かとオラシオンでは苦労も多いようで……
jpnSearchText:
彼女はやはり中東系という事もあり、
何かとオラシオンでは苦労も多いようで……

engChrName: I can tell something's bothering her, but she insists she's fine. I think she's trying to avoid troubling me, but it's having the opposite effect.
engSearchText:
I can tell something's bothering her, but she insists
she's fine. I think she's trying to avoid troubling me,
but it's having the opposite effect.
jpnChrName: 僕もなるべく力になるようにはしているのですが、 今回は彼女も僕に迷惑をかけたくないと……
jpnSearchText:
僕もなるべく力になるようにはしているのですが、
今回は彼女も僕に迷惑をかけたくないと……

engChrName: Thank you for staying with us. We're happy to serve you.
engSearchText:
Thank you for staying with us. We're happy to
serve you.
jpnChrName: 当宿をご利用いただきありがとうございます。 特殊な状況下ですが、精一杯もてなしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
当宿をご利用いただきありがとうございます。
特殊な状況下ですが、精一杯もてなしますよ。

engChrName: Evidently, there's been a few shady characters around the city as of late.
engSearchText:
Evidently, there's been a few shady characters around
the city as of late.
jpnChrName: オラシオンにも、状況が状況なだけに訳ありな 方も多く来ているように見受けられますが……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンにも、状況が状況なだけに訳ありな
方も多く来ているように見受けられますが……

engChrName: Nonetheless, it's our job to provide legendary service for our guests, no matter who they are. If I can help you in any way, you need only ask.
engSearchText:
Nonetheless, it's our job to provide legendary service
for our guests, no matter who they are. If I can help
you in any way, you need only ask.
jpnChrName: なるべくお客様には融通を利かせるのはオーナーの 方針でもあります、お力になれる事があれば是非。
jpnSearchText:
なるべくお客様には融通を利かせるのはオーナーの
方針でもあります、お力になれる事があれば是非。

engChrName: Due to this tavern's popularity, the owner has high expectations of us.
engSearchText:
Due to this tavern's popularity, the owner has high
expectations of us.
jpnChrName: 多様な方々に愛される宿酒場として、 オーナーにも期待されておりますのでね。
jpnSearchText:
多様な方々に愛される宿酒場として、
オーナーにも期待されておりますのでね。

engChrName: And we intend to rise above them.
engSearchText: And we intend to rise above them.
jpnChrName: 宿を任せていただいている身として、 できる限りの対応はさせていただきますよ。
jpnSearchText:
宿を任せていただいている身として、
できる限りの対応はさせていただきますよ。

engChrName: I've been keeping an eye on the opera house, what with the contests and all.
engSearchText:
I've been keeping an eye on the opera house, what
with the contests and all.
jpnChrName: オペラハウスの方はコンクールの件もあって 気にしていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
オペラハウスの方はコンクールの件もあって
気にしていたけど……

engChrName: I don't remember there being any events for kids scheduled. Did I miss something?
engSearchText:
I don't remember there being any events for
kids scheduled. Did I miss something?
jpnChrName: 今日、子供が集まる催し事ってありましたっけ？ 私が見逃していただけかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
今日、子供が集まる催し事ってありましたっけ？
私が見逃していただけかもしれないけど……

engChrName: Thank you all so much. I feel like my efforts—and those of everyone who helped me along the way—are finally being rewarded.
engSearchText:
Thank you all so much. I feel like my efforts—and
those of everyone who helped me along the way—are
finally being rewarded.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、ありがとうございます……お陰で 私も皆も努力が報われそうで……
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、ありがとうございます……お陰で
私も皆も努力が報われそうで……

engChrName: But the best thing to come out of this was learning that Amalie had a ton of respect for me all along.
engSearchText:
But the best thing to come out of this was learning
that Amalie had a ton of respect for me all along.
jpnChrName: それにしても……あのアマーリエが、まさか 私をそんな風に認めてくれていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……あのアマーリエが、まさか
私をそんな風に認めてくれていたなんて……

engChrName: And if I want to keep it, I need to push myself even harder! You're on, Amalie!
engSearchText:
And if I want to keep it, I need to push myself
even harder! You're on, Amalie!
jpnChrName: それなら、私もあの子には全力で向き合って 応えるほかないですよね……！
jpnSearchText:
それなら、私もあの子には全力で向き合って
応えるほかないですよね……！

engChrName: Today was...a bit frightening, to be honest. It's been a while since I ran into discrimination on this scale...
engSearchText:
Today was...a bit frightening, to be honest. It's been a
while since I ran into discrimination on this scale...
jpnChrName: 今日、少々怖い事があって…… 久しぶりに、差別的な事を……
jpnSearchText:
今日、少々怖い事があって……
久しぶりに、差別的な事を……

engChrName: Still, the bracers are already on it, so there isn't anything for guests like you to worry about.
engSearchText:
Still, the bracers are already on it, so there isn't
anything for guests like you to worry about.
jpnChrName: でも、遊撃士の方々も動いてくれるようですし、 お客さん達の心配する事ではないです。
jpnSearchText:
でも、遊撃士の方々も動いてくれるようですし、
お客さん達の心配する事ではないです。

engChrName: I just...wonder if I'll be able to stay in this city.
engSearchText: I just...wonder if I'll be able to stay in this city.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……このまま私は、この街に 居続けても良いのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……このまま私は、この街に
居続けても良いのでしょうか……？

engChrName: I'm sure I'm causing trouble for everyone at school.
engSearchText: I'm sure I'm causing trouble for everyone at school.
jpnChrName: きっとまた学校の皆にも迷惑を……
jpnSearchText: きっとまた学校の皆にも迷惑を……

engChrName: I really don't wanna suspect my classmates, but I get that we have to start somewhere...
engSearchText:
I really don't wanna suspect my classmates, but I get
that we have to start somewhere...
jpnChrName: 同じ音楽学校の同級生を 疑いたくはありませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
同じ音楽学校の同級生を
疑いたくはありませんけど……

engChrName: I'm pretty sure Amalie's gone to the boutique today.
engSearchText: I'm pretty sure Amalie's gone to the boutique today.
jpnChrName: 今日、アマーリエさんは ブティックに行っているはずです。
jpnSearchText:
今日、アマーリエさんは
ブティックに行っているはずです。

engChrName: Could you go talk with her?
engSearchText: Could you go talk with her?
jpnChrName: どうか調査のほど、よろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText: どうか調査のほど、よろしくお願いします……！

engChrName: *sigh* I guess... I guess this is where I have to face reality.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess... I guess this is where I have to
face reality.
jpnChrName: ふぅ…… やっぱり諦めるしかないのかな……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……
やっぱり諦めるしかないのかな……

engChrName: Oh! I'm so very sorry! I was lost in thought.
engSearchText: Oh! I'm so very sorry! I was lost in thought.
jpnChrName: あっ、ごめんなさい！ つい考え事をしてしまって……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、ごめんなさい！
つい考え事をしてしまって……！

engChrName: Have you all had breakfast yet?
engSearchText: Have you all had breakfast yet?
jpnChrName: みなさん、朝食はもうお済みですか？
jpnSearchText: みなさん、朝食はもうお済みですか？

engChrName: Norbert's cooking is wonderful, so I'm sure he'll whip up something amazing for you!
engSearchText:
Norbert's cooking is wonderful, so I'm sure he'll whip
up something amazing for you!
jpnChrName: ノルベルトさんの料理は美味しいですから、 夕食も楽しみにしていてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
ノルベルトさんの料理は美味しいですから、
夕食も楽しみにしていてくださいね！

engChrName: Welcome to our inn! If there's anything I can help you with, just give me a holler.
engSearchText:
Welcome to our inn! If there's anything I can help
you with, just give me a holler.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、何かお困りのことが あれば声をかけて下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、何かお困りのことが
あれば声をかけて下さいね。

engChrName: I might just be a part-timer, but I promise I'm just as dedicated to caring for our guests as Norbert.
engSearchText:
I might just be a part-timer, but I promise I'm just as
dedicated to caring for our guests as Norbert.
jpnChrName: 私もバイトの身ではありますが、 ノルベルトさん同様にお役に立ちたいですので。
jpnSearchText:
私もバイトの身ではありますが、
ノルベルトさん同様にお役に立ちたいですので。

engChrName: I know what it feels like to be an outsider in this city, so I'm committed to giving a helping hand to any travelers that come here.
engSearchText:
I know what it feels like to be an outsider in this city,
so I'm committed to giving a helping hand to any
travelers that come here.
jpnChrName: 私もこの街では何かと肩身の狭い身ですし…… 少しでも多くの来訪者の助けになれれば。
jpnSearchText:
私もこの街では何かと肩身の狭い身ですし……
少しでも多くの来訪者の助けになれれば。

engChrName: I moved to Oración to attend its music academy, but for a while, I struggled to find work due to my Central Eastern heritage.
engSearchText:
I moved to Oración to attend its music academy, but
for a while, I struggled to find work due to my
Central Eastern heritage.
jpnChrName: 音楽学校に通うべくオラシオンに移り住んだのですが、 中東系だと思った以上に就業が難しいものでして……
jpnSearchText:
音楽学校に通うべくオラシオンに移り住んだのですが、
中東系だと思った以上に就業が難しいものでして……

engChrName: Norbert didn't care about that in the slightest, though. He brought me on board and made me feel welcome here.
engSearchText:
Norbert didn't care about that in the
slightest, though. He brought me on board and made
me feel welcome here.
jpnChrName: それにも関わらず、何の偏見も遠慮も無く受け入れて くれたこの宿は本当に温かくて、有難くて……
jpnSearchText:
それにも関わらず、何の偏見も遠慮も無く受け入れて
くれたこの宿は本当に温かくて、有難くて……

engChrName: That's why I'm working extra hard to show my gratitude.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm working extra hard to show
my gratitude.
jpnChrName: 恩返しのためにも、精一杯できる事を させていただいています。
jpnSearchText:
恩返しのためにも、精一杯できる事を
させていただいています。

engChrName: I never knew you worked at a tavern. And your employer is providing you with a room?
engSearchText:
I never knew you worked at a tavern. And your
employer is providing you with a room?
jpnChrName: それにしても貴女、こんな所で 住み込みでバイトをしていたんですのね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても貴女、こんな所で
住み込みでバイトをしていたんですのね。

engChrName: That's right. It's one of the perks Norbert offered me when he gave me this job.
engSearchText:
That's right. It's one of the perks Norbert offered me
when he gave me this job.
jpnChrName: はい、色々な場所を探したんですけど 店主のノルベルトさんが優しい方でして。
jpnSearchText:
はい、色々な場所を探したんですけど
店主のノルベルトさんが優しい方でして。

engChrName: I looked for work all over the city, but few places were willing to hire an immigrant like me. So I'm very grateful to him!
engSearchText:
I looked for work all over the city, but few places were
willing to hire an immigrant like me. So I'm very
grateful to him!
jpnChrName: 移民の私でも受け入れてくれたんですよ！
jpnSearchText: 移民の私でも受け入れてくれたんですよ！

engChrName: He's stood up for me time and time again whenever the customers complain about me. His kindness is more than I deserve.
engSearchText:
He's stood up for me time and time again whenever
the customers complain about me. His kindness is
more than I deserve.
jpnChrName: お客さんに私の事を言われても、 いつも守ってくれて……申し訳ないくらいです。
jpnSearchText:
お客さんに私の事を言われても、
いつも守ってくれて……申し訳ないくらいです。

engChrName: Oh, for heaven's sake! That attitude is completely unacceptable!
engSearchText:
Oh, for heaven's sake! That attitude is
completely unacceptable!
jpnChrName: ～～もうっ、貴女ねえ！ そういう態度がいけませんのよ！？
jpnSearchText:
～～もうっ、貴女ねえ！
そういう態度がいけませんのよ！？

engChrName: You were chosen for the leading role, so have the confidence befitting of it! Don't sag your head—hold it up high!
engSearchText:
You were chosen for the leading role, so have the
confidence befitting of it! Don't sag your head—hold
it up high!
jpnChrName: 主演に選ばれた自覚を持って 日頃からもっと堂々としていなさい！
jpnSearchText:
主演に選ばれた自覚を持って
日頃からもっと堂々としていなさい！

engChrName: O-Oh! Yes, of course!
engSearchText: O-Oh! Yes, of course!
jpnChrName: は、はい、そうですね……！
jpnSearchText: は、はい、そうですね……！

engChrName: (They've definitely got a rocky road ahead of them, but somehow, I think it'll work out just fine.)
engSearchText:
(They've definitely got a rocky road ahead of them,
but somehow, I think it'll work out just fine.)
jpnChrName: （前途多難そうではあるが…… 　ま、心配はいらねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（前途多難そうではあるが……
　ま、心配はいらねえな。）

engChrName: So, umm... Are you free on the night of the next rehearsal?
engSearchText:
So, umm... Are you free on the night of the
next rehearsal?
jpnChrName: あの……ちなみに、次の練習日の 夜って空いていますか？
jpnSearchText:
あの……ちなみに、次の練習日の
夜って空いていますか？

engChrName: I'm gonna do some more practice, and I'd love it if you could come with.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna do some more practice, and I'd love it if
you could come with.
jpnChrName: 良ければ自主練習に付き合って ほしいな、なんて思ったりして……！
jpnSearchText:
良ければ自主練習に付き合って
ほしいな、なんて思ったりして……！

engChrName: Oh! Well, I...suppose I can make time. I'll be expecting you to practice until you drop, though!
engSearchText:
Oh! Well, I...suppose I can make time. I'll be
expecting you to practice until you drop, though!
jpnChrName: ……！　いいでしょう、 やるからには徹底的にいきますわよ！
jpnSearchText:
……！　いいでしょう、
やるからには徹底的にいきますわよ！

engChrName: Okay, my job here is done, so it's time to get going. I should make a point to visit the Republic more often.
engSearchText:
Okay, my job here is done, so it's time to get going.
I should make a point to visit the Republic
more often.
jpnChrName: 一通り用は済んだ、もうじき帰らなきゃだけど…… やっぱり共和国は定期的に来たくなるわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
一通り用は済んだ、もうじき帰らなきゃだけど……
やっぱり共和国は定期的に来たくなるわねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe I'll go to Edith for the festival, assuming they still plan to hold it. I can visit all my friends there.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll go to Edith for the festival, assuming they
still plan to hold it. I can visit all my friends there.
jpnChrName: 例年通りに記念祭も開催できるなら、是非とも 首都にお邪魔したいしね……友人もいる事だし。
jpnSearchText:
例年通りに記念祭も開催できるなら、是非とも
首都にお邪魔したいしね……友人もいる事だし。

engChrName: I'll bet Deborah's still working at that department store. I wonder how she's been doing lately?
engSearchText:
I'll bet Deborah's still working at that
department store. I wonder how she's been
doing lately?
jpnChrName: デボラさん……変わらず百貨店勤めって聞くけど、 元気にしているかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
デボラさん……変わらず百貨店勤めって聞くけど、
元気にしているかしらねぇ。

engChrName: Okay, time for another break.
engSearchText: Okay, time for another break.
jpnChrName: さて、夕方の取引の前に一休みしようかしら。 しかし、共和国も随分発展したようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
さて、夕方の取引の前に一休みしようかしら。
しかし、共和国も随分発展したようだけど……

engChrName: The Republic's changed a great deal in recent years, and the same can be said for Ored.
engSearchText:
The Republic's changed a great deal in recent years,
and the same can be said for Ored.
jpnChrName: オレドも最近は結構変わっちゃったものでねぇ…… 一応、穀倉地帯というのは変わらないけど……
jpnSearchText:
オレドも最近は結構変わっちゃったものでねぇ……
一応、穀倉地帯というのは変わらないけど……

engChrName: The new movie theater and circuit are nice, but I'm concerned about the investments received from an unknown Central Eastern company.
engSearchText:
The new movie theater and circuit are nice, but I'm
concerned about the investments received from an
unknown Central Eastern company.
jpnChrName: 映画館やサーキットが出来たのは良いけど、 得体の知れない中東資本の会社も進出してきて……
jpnSearchText:
映画館やサーキットが出来たのは良いけど、
得体の知れない中東資本の会社も進出してきて……

engChrName: Honestly, I'm getting dizzy just thinking about how much my home could change over the next few years.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'm getting dizzy just thinking about how
much my home could change over the next few years.
jpnChrName: 正直、どこまで故郷が変わってしまうのか…… 考え始めると目が回ってしまいそうなもので。
jpnSearchText:
正直、どこまで故郷が変わってしまうのか……
考え始めると目が回ってしまいそうなもので。

engChrName: It's been a while since I traveled up here from Ored. I can't believe the universe picked now of all times to send the Republic into a frenzy.
engSearchText:
It's been a while since I traveled up here from Ored.
I can't believe the universe picked now of all times to
send the Republic into a frenzy.
jpnChrName: 久々にオレドから出向いてきてみたら、 まさか共和国がこんな事になってるなんてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
久々にオレドから出向いてきてみたら、
まさか共和国がこんな事になってるなんてねぇ……

engChrName: I had some business to discuss, so instead of leaving everything to the vendor, I decided to come here myself. And then this happens.
engSearchText:
I had some business to discuss, so instead of leaving
everything to the vendor, I decided to come
here myself. And then this happens.
jpnChrName: 商談もあるし、業者に任せっきりにできないと 思って来たけど……どうなるのかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
商談もあるし、業者に任せっきりにできないと
思って来たけど……どうなるのかしらねぇ。

engChrName: The consignees appear to be okay. Before I do anything else, I should stop by their places and make the deliveries.
engSearchText:
The consignees appear to be okay. Before I do
anything else, I should stop by their places and make
the deliveries.
jpnChrName: まあ、納品先はどこも元気みたいだし…… とりあえず挨拶に伺う事にしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、納品先はどこも元気みたいだし……
とりあえず挨拶に伺う事にしましょうか。

engChrName: This inn was my first stop. Once I finish my break, I'll go see how our best customers are doing.
engSearchText:
This inn was my first stop. Once I finish my break,
I'll go see how our best customers are doing.
jpnChrName: この宿屋への食材の納入も終わったし、 一休みしたらとりあえずお得意様の様子を……
jpnSearchText:
この宿屋への食材の納入も終わったし、
一休みしたらとりあえずお得意様の様子を……

engChrName: Always nice to see Monique. Been ages since she stopped by.
engSearchText:
Always nice to see Monique. Been ages since she
stopped by.
jpnChrName: それにしてもモニクの嬢ちゃん、 うちに来るのはなかなか久しいな……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもモニクの嬢ちゃん、
うちに来るのはなかなか久しいな……

engChrName: She always brings a job that's worth my time.
engSearchText: She always brings a job that's worth my time.
jpnChrName: 大分前にカメラをカスタムしてやったっきりか…… 今回もまあ腕が鳴るというもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
大分前にカメラをカスタムしてやったっきりか……
今回もまあ腕が鳴るというもんだ。

engChrName: I'll finish it up soon and hand her camera back to her. I'm sure she'll be happy with my work.
engSearchText:
I'll finish it up soon and hand her camera back to her.
I'm sure she'll be happy with my work.
jpnChrName: もうじき終えて引き渡す…… きっと満足してくれるだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
もうじき終えて引き渡す……
きっと満足してくれるだろうさ。

engChrName: After the man finished his shopping, he left without a word.
engSearchText:
After the man finished his shopping, he left without
a word.
jpnChrName: 男性の方は買い物を終えた後、 特に何も仰らずに店を出られましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
男性の方は買い物を終えた後、
特に何も仰らずに店を出られましたよ。

engChrName: The officer looked surprised, as I recall.
engSearchText: The officer looked surprised, as I recall.
jpnChrName: そういえば、婦警の方も 意外そうな顔をしていたような……？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、婦警の方も
意外そうな顔をしていたような……？

engChrName: A familiar face dropped by a short while ago. It was a girl who used to live in the neighborhood.
engSearchText:
A familiar face dropped by a short while ago. It was a
girl who used to live in the neighborhood.
jpnChrName: さっき、懐かしくて可愛い客が来てな、 近所のお嬢さんで……
jpnSearchText:
さっき、懐かしくて可愛い客が来てな、
近所のお嬢さんで……

engChrName: She was travelin' around, apparently, but she just got back home. Wanted me to fix up her camera—like old times.
engSearchText:
She was travelin' around, apparently, but she just got
back home. Wanted me to fix up her camera—like
old times.
jpnChrName: 帰省で帰って来ているようで、 久しぶりにカメラを預けてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
帰省で帰って来ているようで、
久しぶりにカメラを預けてくれた。

engChrName: It's more rewarding to do business with a customer who's happy with my work as opposed to those blue-blooded types.
engSearchText:
It's more rewarding to do business with a customer
who's happy with my work as opposed to those
blue-blooded types.
jpnChrName: やはり上流階級の人らのと違って素直に 喜んでくれるお客もやり甲斐があるもんでな。
jpnSearchText:
やはり上流階級の人らのと違って素直に
喜んでくれるお客もやり甲斐があるもんでな。

engChrName: Makes my perfectionist tendencies kick in. I'm gonna make her camera look good as new.
engSearchText:
Makes my perfectionist tendencies kick in. I'm gonna
make her camera look good as new.
jpnChrName: 一層張り切って、最高のカメラに 仕立て上げてあげるとするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
一層張り切って、最高のカメラに
仕立て上げてあげるとするぜ。

engChrName: Our workshop's been around for a long time. We serve people of all types—from upper-class citizens to travelers.
engSearchText:
Our workshop's been around for a long time.
We serve people of all types—from upper-class
citizens to travelers.
jpnChrName: ここも昔からある工房だが、上流階級だけでなく 庶民や旅行者にも贔屓のお客は多くてな。
jpnSearchText:
ここも昔からある工房だが、上流階級だけでなく
庶民や旅行者にも贔屓のお客は多くてな。

engChrName: We handle fancy decorations as well as machines.
engSearchText: We handle fancy decorations as well as machines.
jpnChrName: 一応は上等な装飾も承ってるが、やはり繊細な 調整を求めるのは庶民だろうと同じ。
jpnSearchText:
一応は上等な装飾も承ってるが、やはり繊細な
調整を求めるのは庶民だろうと同じ。

engChrName: I like workin' on the latter in particular. Always get a little giddy when someone walks through the door with some mechanical doodad.
engSearchText:
I like workin' on the latter in particular. Always get a
little giddy when someone walks through the door
with some mechanical doodad.
jpnChrName: 機械を扱う職人としては、やはりそっちで 頼られたほうが嬉しいもんだしな。
jpnSearchText:
機械を扱う職人としては、やはりそっちで
頼られたほうが嬉しいもんだしな。

engChrName: Maintenance work is my bread and butter. I take pride in my skills as a machinist.
engSearchText:
Maintenance work is my bread and butter. I take
pride in my skills as a machinist.
jpnChrName: 相手が誰であろうと、整備は誠心誠意、 職人の名に懸けてやらせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
相手が誰であろうと、整備は誠心誠意、
職人の名に懸けてやらせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Welcome to my workshop. You guys travelers? Now there's something I don't see every day.
engSearchText:
Welcome to my workshop. You guys travelers?
Now there's something I don't see every day.
jpnChrName: 我が工房へようこそ、旅行者の方々かい？ 上流階級の顧客も多いが、旅行者も歓迎しますぜ。
jpnSearchText:
我が工房へようこそ、旅行者の方々かい？
上流階級の顧客も多いが、旅行者も歓迎しますぜ。

engChrName: Most of our customer base is upper-class citizens, and they always ask for repairs on decorations, as well as custom-made orders on occasion.
engSearchText:
Most of our customer base is upper-class citizens, and
they always ask for repairs on decorations, as well as
custom-made orders on occasion.
jpnChrName: ここの上流階級は、細やかな調整と装飾の両立、 時にはオーダーメイドもご所望されるのでね。
jpnSearchText:
ここの上流階級は、細やかな調整と装飾の両立、
時にはオーダーメイドもご所望されるのでね。

engChrName: If you want any custom work done on your weapons—or if you need simple fine-tuning and maintenance—then I'm your man.
engSearchText:
If you want any custom work done on your
weapons—or if you need simple fine-tuning and
maintenance—then I'm your man.
jpnChrName: そうした繊細なカスタムにも応じとるが、 簡単な調整や整備も喜んで請け負うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そうした繊細なカスタムにも応じとるが、
簡単な調整や整備も喜んで請け負うぜ。

engChrName: I've also got weapons of my own in stock. People mainly buy 'em for sport hunting, but they're as good as what you'd get from a real specialist.
engSearchText:
I've also got weapons of my own in stock.
People mainly buy 'em for sport hunting, but they're
as good as what you'd get from a real specialist.
jpnChrName: あとは一応、スポーツハンティングをする人向けに 専門店には劣るが武器も多少は揃えているな。
jpnSearchText:
あとは一応、スポーツハンティングをする人向けに
専門店には劣るが武器も多少は揃えているな。

engChrName: We've been doin' this kind of work for generations— well before the Orbal Revolution, in fact.
engSearchText:
We've been doin' this kind of work for generations—
well before the Orbal Revolution, in fact.
jpnChrName: 繊細な調整、カスタムでも導力革命前から 受け継がれてきた腕があるんで任せてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
繊細な調整、カスタムでも導力革命前から
受け継がれてきた腕があるんで任せてくれ。

engChrName: Let me know if there's anything that catches your fancy.
engSearchText:
Let me know if there's anything that catches
your fancy.
jpnChrName: スポーツハンティング向けの最低限で良ければ、 武具の類も取り計らってあげよう。
jpnSearchText:
スポーツハンティング向けの最低限で良ければ、
武具の類も取り計らってあげよう。

engChrName: I've known for a while that there was a plot encompassing the upper crust of Oración's society.
engSearchText:
I've known for a while that there was a plot
encompassing the upper crust of Oración's society.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの上流階級を取り巻く陰謀──
jpnSearchText: オラシオンの上流階級を取り巻く陰謀──

engChrName: Elaine has been investigating it for some time.
engSearchText: Elaine has been investigating it for some time.
jpnChrName: 実はエレインさんは以前から 独自に調査をされていたのです。
jpnSearchText:
実はエレインさんは以前から
独自に調査をされていたのです。

engChrName: She couldn't do so openly due to her ties to her family, however. That's why I was quietly assisting her behind the scenes.
engSearchText:
She couldn't do so openly due to her ties to her
family, however. That's why I was quietly assisting
her behind the scenes.
jpnChrName: ですがご実家との関係上、表立ってではなく 私も一部協力させて頂いていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ですがご実家との関係上、表立ってではなく
私も一部協力させて頂いていたのですが……

engChrName: One way or another, I'm glad we can finally put this whole affair behind us.
engSearchText:
One way or another, I'm glad we can finally put this
whole affair behind us.
jpnChrName: なんにせよ、一区切りついて良かった。 我々にとっても感慨深いものがあります。
jpnSearchText:
なんにせよ、一区切りついて良かった。
我々にとっても感慨深いものがあります。

engChrName: But there's still the matter of Almata—and only you can put an end to them. Good luck, spriggan.
engSearchText:
But there's still the matter of Almata—and only you
can put an end to them. Good luck, spriggan.
jpnChrName: ですが……安堵するにはまだ早い。 裏解決屋の皆さん、どうか後は頼みます！
jpnSearchText:
ですが……安堵するにはまだ早い。
裏解決屋の皆さん、どうか後は頼みます！

engChrName: So Elaine was partaking in the game as its twentieth team? I had considered that possibility at one point, believe it or not.
engSearchText:
So Elaine was partaking in the game as its
twentieth team? I had considered that possibility at
one point, believe it or not.
jpnChrName: エレインさんが２０番目の参加者として 動いていた、ですか……
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんが２０番目の参加者として
動いていた、ですか……

engChrName: In any case, I'm glad she made contact with you.
engSearchText: In any case, I'm glad she made contact with you.
jpnChrName: 可能性を考えなかった訳ではないですが…… 結果的にあなた達に繋がれたのは幸いでした。
jpnSearchText:
可能性を考えなかった訳ではないですが……
結果的にあなた達に繋がれたのは幸いでした。

engChrName: Though I'm sure something's still weighing on her mind. Otherwise, she would've returned by now.
engSearchText:
Though I'm sure something's still weighing on
her mind. Otherwise, she would've returned by now.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……どうも彼女はまだ何かを 抱えているように思えます。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……どうも彼女はまだ何かを
抱えているように思えます。

engChrName: I know you have an important battle ahead of you, but if you have some time to spare, please try to help her.
engSearchText:
I know you have an important battle ahead of you,
but if you have some time to spare, please try to
help her.
jpnChrName: 決戦前に申し訳ないですが、 貴方がたも気に留めておいて頂ければ。
jpnSearchText:
決戦前に申し訳ないですが、
貴方がたも気に留めておいて頂ければ。

engChrName: With everything that's been going on, I wasn't expecting Gray Arnold to go off on his own.
engSearchText:
With everything that's been going on, I wasn't
expecting Gray Arnold to go off on his own.
jpnChrName: それにしても、まさかこの状況にあって グレイ・アーノルドが独断専行とは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、まさかこの状況にあって
グレイ・アーノルドが独断専行とは……

engChrName: I hear he came up here without permission. The boys up top chewed him out pretty good, yeah?
engSearchText:
I hear he came up here without permission. The boys
up top chewed him out pretty good, yeah?
jpnChrName: ああ、どうやら無断で来たらしいな。 上でこってり絞られてやがったが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、どうやら無断で来たらしいな。
上でこってり絞られてやがったが……

engChrName: Ah, so you were aware of what happened.
engSearchText: Ah, so you were aware of what happened.
jpnChrName: ああ、既にご存じでしたか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、既にご存じでしたか。

engChrName: Gray? You mean that junior bracer? I didn't realize he was dispatched to Oración.
engSearchText:
Gray? You mean that junior bracer? I didn't realize he
was dispatched to Oración.
jpnChrName: グレイ？　あの準遊撃士はオラシオン派遣の メンバーには入っていなかったんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
グレイ？　あの準遊撃士はオラシオン派遣の
メンバーには入っていなかったんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Funny, Lahad said the same thing earlier.
engSearchText: Funny, Lahad said the same thing earlier.
jpnChrName: それがですね、さきほどラハドさんが 気づいたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
それがですね、さきほどラハドさんが
気づいたのですが……

engChrName: Turns out, he wasn't cleared to come here. He left Edith and came up to Oración without approval.
engSearchText:
Turns out, he wasn't cleared to come here. He left
Edith and came up to Oración without approval.
jpnChrName: どうやら無断で首都を離脱し、 オラシオンに来てしまったようで……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら無断で首都を離脱し、
オラシオンに来てしまったようで……

engChrName: Oooh. Someone's in trouble.
engSearchText: Oooh. Someone's in trouble.
jpnChrName: おいおい、そいつは……
jpnSearchText: おいおい、そいつは……

engChrName: Yes, he explicitly violated the guild's code and put us all in danger. If his actions were against the game's rules, we'd be dead now.
engSearchText:
Yes, he explicitly violated the guild's code and put us
all in danger. If his actions were against the game's
rules, we'd be dead now.
jpnChrName: 幸い“ルール”には抵触していないようですが…… ギルドの規約に照らし合わせても看過はできません。
jpnSearchText:
幸い“ルール”には抵触していないようですが……
ギルドの規約に照らし合わせても看過はできません。

engChrName: Ah. Yeah, that would've been problematic. (He must've had some reason for doin' it, though.)
engSearchText:
Ah. Yeah, that would've been problematic.
(He must've had some reason for doin' it, though.)
jpnChrName: そのようだな…… （何か事情がありそうな雰囲気だが……）
jpnSearchText:
そのようだな……
（何か事情がありそうな雰囲気だが……）

engChrName: Anyway, we can't exactly send him back to Edith, so we decided to put him to work.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we can't exactly send him back to Edith, so
we decided to put him to work.
jpnChrName: ……何にせよ、来てしまった以上は 彼も考慮に入れて動く他ありません。
jpnSearchText:
……何にせよ、来てしまった以上は
彼も考慮に入れて動く他ありません。

engChrName: He's only a junior bracer, though, so he'll be on standby in case we need reinforcements.
engSearchText:
He's only a junior bracer, though, so he'll be on
standby in case we need reinforcements.
jpnChrName: この際です、彼はまだ準遊撃士ではありますが 増援が来たものと捉えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
この際です、彼はまだ準遊撃士ではありますが
増援が来たものと捉えましょう。

engChrName: So you're just gonna use him however you want? Amazed you can say all that with a straight face.
engSearchText:
So you're just gonna use him however you want?
Amazed you can say all that with a straight face.
jpnChrName: ハッ、せいぜいこき使ってやるって事か。 涼しい顔して言うじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、せいぜいこき使ってやるって事か。
涼しい顔して言うじゃねえか？

engChrName: Of course. It's just an efficient allocation of resources. I assumed that sort of thing would be something you people could respect.
engSearchText:
Of course. It's just an efficient allocation of resources.
I assumed that sort of thing would be something you
people could respect.
jpnChrName: ええ、それくらい柔軟な方が 裏解決屋としてもやりやすいのでは？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それくらい柔軟な方が
裏解決屋としてもやりやすいのでは？

engChrName: You ain't wrong.
engSearchText: You ain't wrong.
jpnChrName: ……ま、違いねぇか。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、違いねぇか。

engChrName: First Elaine disappeared, and now Gray's gone off on his own...
engSearchText:
First Elaine disappeared, and now Gray's gone off on
his own...
jpnChrName: それにしても、エレインさんの失踪に続き グレイの独断専行とは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、エレインさんの失踪に続き
グレイの独断専行とは……

engChrName: This irresponsible behavior is out of character for both of them.
engSearchText:
This irresponsible behavior is out of character for
both of them.
jpnChrName: 二人とも普段は真面目で こういった行動は取らないタイプですが……
jpnSearchText:
二人とも普段は真面目で
こういった行動は取らないタイプですが……

engChrName: Regardless, our priority here is dealing with the crisis in front of us.
engSearchText:
Regardless, our priority here is dealing with the crisis
in front of us.
jpnChrName: ……いえ、今は目の前の事態に 対処しなくては。
jpnSearchText:
……いえ、今は目の前の事態に
対処しなくては。

engChrName: Best of luck out there, spriggan.
engSearchText: Best of luck out there, spriggan.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋には期待していますよ。 まだ“可能性”を持っている者として。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋には期待していますよ。
まだ“可能性”を持っている者として。

engChrName: The upper zone has been cleared, but many teams still remain in the game.
engSearchText:
The upper zone has been cleared, but many teams
still remain in the game.
jpnChrName: “上層”が攻略され、各勢力も それぞれの思惑で動いているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
“上層”が攻略され、各勢力も
それぞれの思惑で動いているようですね。

engChrName: I'm glad we formed an alliance with you, Arkride. You've gone above and beyond our expectations.
engSearchText:
I'm glad we formed an alliance with you, Arkride.
You've gone above and beyond our expectations.
jpnChrName: ……アークライドさん、あなた方が戦力として 協力に値する事を改めて確認しました。
jpnSearchText:
……アークライドさん、あなた方が戦力として
協力に値する事を改めて確認しました。

engChrName: My grandfather says you handle your subcontracted tasks with finesse. After hearing about your exploits in the game, I can believe it, I suppose.
engSearchText:
My grandfather says you handle your subcontracted
tasks with finesse. After hearing about your exploits
in the game, I can believe it, I suppose.
jpnChrName: 下請けをこなす手際は祖父より聞いていますが 今回の共闘、そして結果から納得しました。
jpnSearchText:
下請けをこなす手際は祖父より聞いていますが
今回の共闘、そして結果から納得しました。

engChrName: Sounds like your team is doing well in there.
engSearchText: Sounds like your team is doing well in there.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……この状況においても 随分と活躍されているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……この状況においても
随分と活躍されているようですね。

engChrName: My grandfather says you handle your subcontracted tasks with finesse. I can see why he and Zin hold you in high regard, I suppose.
engSearchText:
My grandfather says you handle your subcontracted
tasks with finesse. I can see why he and Zin hold you
in high regard, I suppose.
jpnChrName: 下請けをこなす手際は首都の祖父からも聞いて いますが、ジンさん達が一目置くのも納得です。
jpnSearchText:
下請けをこなす手際は首都の祖父からも聞いて
いますが、ジンさん達が一目置くのも納得です。

engChrName: Hey, you didn't have to throw in that 'I suppose' at the end there.
engSearchText:
Hey, you didn't have to throw in that 'I suppose' at
the end there.
jpnChrName: ハッ、半分皮肉なんだろうが…… ま、褒め言葉と思っておいてやるとするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、半分皮肉なんだろうが……
ま、褒め言葉と思っておいてやるとするぜ。

engChrName: Wait, hang on. Your grandfather subcontracts to me? Does that mean...
engSearchText:
Wait, hang on. Your grandfather subcontracts to me?
Does that mean...
jpnChrName: って、下請けっつーことは お前さんの祖父さんってのは……
jpnSearchText:
って、下請けっつーことは
お前さんの祖父さんってのは……

engChrName: Oh, did no one mention? You know Hazel, the general branch manager? He's my grandfather.
engSearchText:
Oh, did no one mention? You know Hazel, the
general branch manager? He's my grandfather.
jpnChrName: あら、言っていませんでしたか？ 総支部責任者のヘイゼルは私の祖父ですが。
jpnSearchText:
あら、言っていませんでしたか？
総支部責任者のヘイゼルは私の祖父ですが。

engChrName: Judging by the looks on your faces, I see he didn't tell you. Why is he like that...?
engSearchText:
Judging by the looks on your faces, I see he didn't
tell you. Why is he like that...?
jpnChrName: その様子だと祖父も知らせていないようですね。 相変わらず人が悪い事です。
jpnSearchText:
その様子だと祖父も知らせていないようですね。
相変わらず人が悪い事です。

engChrName: Yeah. We had no idea.
engSearchText: Yeah. We had no idea.
jpnChrName: ギルド総支部の…… そうだったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ギルド総支部の……
そうだったんですね。

engChrName: Guess I oughta be careful around you. Something tells me you're gonna be one hell of a scary lady someday.
engSearchText:
Guess I oughta be careful around you.
Something tells me you're gonna be one hell of a
scary lady someday.
jpnChrName: そいつは油断ならねぇと言うか 末怖ろしいというか……
jpnSearchText:
そいつは油断ならねぇと言うか
末怖ろしいというか……

engChrName: I'll choose to take that as a compliment. You're welcome.
engSearchText:
I'll choose to take that as a compliment.
You're welcome.
jpnChrName: 褒め言葉として受け取っておきましょう。 一応、私も祖父は尊敬していますので。
jpnSearchText:
褒め言葉として受け取っておきましょう。
一応、私も祖父は尊敬していますので。

engChrName: Anyway, I respect my grandfather a great deal. I'd feel a lot better if he was here in Oración.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I respect my grandfather a great deal. I'd feel
a lot better if he was here in Oración.
jpnChrName: 本当ならこのオラシオンにも 祖父がいてくれたら心強かったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
本当ならこのオラシオンにも
祖父がいてくれたら心強かったのですが……

engChrName: Right now, he and an S-rank bracer are taking command to ensure the safety of the capital and the Republic as a whole.
engSearchText:
Right now, he and an S-rank bracer are taking
command to ensure the safety of the capital and the
Republic as a whole.
jpnChrName: 今は“Ｓ級”と共に、首都と共和国全土の 治安維持に当たってくれています。
jpnSearchText:
今は“Ｓ級”と共に、首都と共和国全土の
治安維持に当たってくれています。

engChrName: And I have my own role to play in all this.
engSearchText: And I have my own role to play in all this.
jpnChrName: ……私は私の使命を果たします。 この命に代えても。
jpnSearchText:
……私は私の使命を果たします。
この命に代えても。

engChrName: Is that right? Well, here's hopin' you inherited your granddad's good traits.
engSearchText:
Is that right? Well, here's hopin' you inherited your
granddad's good traits.
jpnChrName: そうか……ま、今はせいぜい、あんたの 祖父さん譲りの部分に期待させてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……ま、今はせいぜい、あんたの
祖父さん譲りの部分に期待させてもらうか。

engChrName: I will take advantage of every resource at my disposal.
engSearchText: I will take advantage of every resource at my disposal.
jpnChrName: ……私も祖父を見習って 使えるものは何でも活用するつもりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
……私も祖父を見習って
使えるものは何でも活用するつもりですよ。

engChrName: That includes you. We're fortunate that you're present here, Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
That includes you. We're fortunate that you're
present here, Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 定番の下請け先、アークライド解決事務所の 面々がこの地にいる事は僥倖と言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
定番の下請け先、アークライド解決事務所の
面々がこの地にいる事は僥倖と言えるでしょう。

engChrName: Ah, hello. You must be Arkride Solutions. I've heard much about you.
engSearchText:
Ah, hello. You must be Arkride Solutions. I've heard
much about you.
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》の方々ですね。 噂はかねがね伺っています。
jpnSearchText:
《アークライド解決事務所》の方々ですね。
噂はかねがね伺っています。

engChrName: The Oración branch is currently on high alert, though that isn't being publicized.
engSearchText:
The Oración branch is currently on high alert, though
that isn't being publicized.
jpnChrName: 現在オラシオン支部は、非公式ながら 特別警戒態勢を敷いています。
jpnSearchText:
現在オラシオン支部は、非公式ながら
特別警戒態勢を敷いています。

engChrName: Nonetheless, a bracer already lost their life in the line of duty...
engSearchText:
Nonetheless, a bracer already lost their life in the line
of duty...
jpnChrName: ……我々も油断はしていませんでした。 だというのに殉職者まで出てしまい………
jpnSearchText:
……我々も油断はしていませんでした。
だというのに殉職者まで出てしまい………

engChrName: Umm... If you don't mind me asking, who passed away?
engSearchText:
Umm... If you don't mind me asking, who
passed away?
jpnChrName: あの……殉職されたのは どのような方だったんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
あの……殉職されたのは
どのような方だったんですか……？

engChrName: His name was Ewan. He was a young bracer who only just got promoted to B-rank. He had a bright future ahead of him.
engSearchText:
His name was Ewan. He was a young bracer who
only just got promoted to B-rank. He had a bright
future ahead of him.
jpnChrName: ええ、名前は遊撃士ユアン。 Ｂ級に昇格した若手のホープでした。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、名前は遊撃士ユアン。
Ｂ級に昇格した若手のホープでした。

engChrName: He was working alongside a veteran bracer, who was severely injured in the attack.
engSearchText:
He was working alongside a veteran bracer, who was
severely injured in the attack.
jpnChrName: もう一人のベテラン遊撃士と 行動していたのですが、彼も重傷を負い……
jpnSearchText:
もう一人のベテラン遊撃士と
行動していたのですが、彼も重傷を負い……

engChrName: So he was the same rank as Claussell. Guess whoever they were fighting was a real monster.
engSearchText:
So he was the same rank as Claussell. Guess whoever
they were fighting was a real monster.
jpnChrName: Ｂ級といえばクラウゼルと同格だ。 ……それが二人がかりでやられるとはな……
jpnSearchText:
Ｂ級といえばクラウゼルと同格だ。
……それが二人がかりでやられるとはな……

engChrName: Indeed. We'll have to put the information Kirchheim brought back to good use.
engSearchText:
Indeed. We'll have to put the information Kirchheim
brought back to good use.
jpnChrName: ええ……彼らが持ち帰った情報は 必ず役立たせてもらいます。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……彼らが持ち帰った情報は
必ず役立たせてもらいます。

engChrName: Oh, speaking of which, he made an odd comment earlier. He said they went up against an enemy that they couldn't defeat.
engSearchText:
Oh, speaking of which, he made an odd
comment earlier. He said they went up against an
enemy that they couldn't defeat.
jpnChrName: そういえば、キルヒハイムさん── 生還した遊撃士が言っていました。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、キルヒハイムさん──
生還した遊撃士が言っていました。

engChrName: They wailed on it for a long time, but to no avail. I figured I should warn you.
engSearchText:
They wailed on it for a long time, but to no avail.
I figured I should warn you.
jpnChrName: いくら戦っても“倒せない敵”がいる……と。 貴方たちも気を付けておく事です。
jpnSearchText:
いくら戦っても“倒せない敵”がいる……と。
貴方たちも気を付けておく事です。

engChrName: Oh, damn. Thanks for the heads up.
engSearchText: Oh, damn. Thanks for the heads up.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Should we run into such a thing, we'll be certain to make a hasty retreat.
engSearchText:
Should we run into such a thing, we'll be certain to
make a hasty retreat.
jpnChrName: お互い最善を尽くすとしよう。
jpnSearchText: お互い最善を尽くすとしよう。

engChrName: I thought we were prepared for whatever Almata could throw at us. Clearly, we were mistaken.
engSearchText:
I thought we were prepared for whatever Almata
could throw at us. Clearly, we were mistaken.
jpnChrName: アルマータの対応には十分警戒して 当たっていたのですが、こんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの対応には十分警戒して
当たっていたのですが、こんな事に……

engChrName: We must bring this crisis to a swift conclusion. That's the only way we can make it up to Ewan.
engSearchText:
We must bring this crisis to a swift conclusion.
That's the only way we can make it up to Ewan.
jpnChrName: ……必ずやこの事態を解決してみせます。 ユアンの死に報いるためにも──
jpnSearchText:
……必ずやこの事態を解決してみせます。
ユアンの死に報いるためにも──

engChrName: Remember to stay away from that enemy they couldn't defeat if you can.
engSearchText:
Remember to stay away from that enemy they
couldn't defeat if you can.
jpnChrName: それと情報の中に気になるものが。 いくら戦っても“倒せない敵”がいると。
jpnSearchText:
それと情報の中に気になるものが。
いくら戦っても“倒せない敵”がいると。

engChrName: We don't want anyone else to be killed out there.
engSearchText: We don't want anyone else to be killed out there.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちも、どう動くつもりかは 知りませんが心しておくことです。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちも、どう動くつもりかは
知りませんが心しておくことです。

engChrName: Elaine's not comin' back tonight, is she?
engSearchText: Elaine's not comin' back tonight, is she?
jpnChrName: ……やはりエレインは戻らないか。
jpnSearchText: ……やはりエレインは戻らないか。

engChrName: Figured that'd be a long shot. She wouldn't have left if she didn't have a good reason.
engSearchText:
Figured that'd be a long shot. She wouldn't have left
if she didn't have a good reason.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう簡単に戻れるような理由なら そもそも出ていきはしないだろうしな、あいつは。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そう簡単に戻れるような理由なら
そもそも出ていきはしないだろうしな、あいつは。

engChrName: Agreed. Though as for what compelled her to leave, she wouldn't say.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Though as for what compelled her to leave,
she wouldn't say.
jpnChrName: ええ、相応のご事情があるはず。 私たちには伏せているようですが──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、相応のご事情があるはず。
私たちには伏せているようですが──

engChrName: Well, shoot. If only we knew a friend from her childhood who she'd open up to. Wouldn't that be convenient?
engSearchText:
Well, shoot. If only we knew a friend from her
childhood who she'd open up to. Wouldn't that
be convenient?
jpnChrName: ここはいっそ、あいつと深い“縁”が ある奴に任せるべきかもなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ここはいっそ、あいつと深い“縁”が
ある奴に任せるべきかもなぁ。

engChrName: (...He's as subtle as a brick to the face.)
engSearchText: (...He's as subtle as a brick to the face.)
jpnChrName: （……エレインとの縁、か。）
jpnSearchText: （……エレインとの縁、か。）

engChrName: (Guess I'll go diggin' through my memories. I bet I can figure out where she's loitering around.)
engSearchText:
(Guess I'll go diggin' through my memories. I bet I
can figure out where she's loitering around.)
jpnChrName: （まあ記憶を手繰りゃ、アイツの行きそうな   場所も思いつかなくもねぇが……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ記憶を手繰りゃ、アイツの行きそうな
場所も思いつかなくもねぇが……）

engChrName: I was surprised to hear Mr. Auclair was with Almata. I'd actually been looking into Mr. Daltie for some time now.
engSearchText:
I was surprised to hear Mr. Auclair was with Almata.
I'd actually been looking into Mr. Daltie for some
time now.
jpnChrName: オークレール氏がアルマータと、か…… ダルティエ氏は私も前から探っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
オークレール氏がアルマータと、か……
ダルティエ氏は私も前から探っていたが……

engChrName: I can't believe I failed to catch on to his scheme. I feel pathetic.
engSearchText:
I can't believe I failed to catch on to his scheme. I
feel pathetic.
jpnChrName: オークレール氏がその裏にいたとは。 気づけなかった自分が情けない。
jpnSearchText:
オークレール氏がその裏にいたとは。
気づけなかった自分が情けない。

engChrName: Perhaps...I looked the other way because I knew it'd make Elaine suffer.
engSearchText:
Perhaps...I looked the other way because I knew it'd
make Elaine suffer.
jpnChrName: ──いや、気づきたくなかったのやもしれん。 エレイン君の苦しみを思えばこそ。
jpnSearchText:
──いや、気づきたくなかったのやもしれん。
エレイン君の苦しみを思えばこそ。

engChrName: It's hard to say, though. I may have just been blind to the corruption within Oración.
engSearchText:
It's hard to say, though. I may have just been blind to
the corruption within Oración.
jpnChrName: だが、今となってはそれも詭弁か……所詮私も この地のタブーに縛られていたのだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、今となってはそれも詭弁か……所詮私も
この地のタブーに縛られていたのだろうな。

engChrName: So Ewan's lover was able to move on? That's good to hear.
engSearchText:
So Ewan's lover was able to move on? That's good
to hear.
jpnChrName: そうか……ユアンの恋人も、 新たに歩み出してくれたか……
jpnSearchText:
そうか……ユアンの恋人も、
新たに歩み出してくれたか……

engChrName: I'm sure leaving her behind was Ewan's greatest regret.
engSearchText:
I'm sure leaving her behind was Ewan's
greatest regret.
jpnChrName: ユアンにとって、彼女は最大の 心残りだったであろう……
jpnSearchText:
ユアンにとって、彼女は最大の
心残りだったであろう……

engChrName: If she'd been trapped by her own anger and lost sight of her own future, I don't know how I would've faced him up in heaven...
engSearchText:
If she'd been trapped by her own anger and lost sight
of her own future, I don't know how I would've faced
him up in heaven...
jpnChrName: 彼女が怨嗟に囚われて、未来を見る事が できなくなるような事がなかったのなら……
jpnSearchText:
彼女が怨嗟に囚われて、未来を見る事が
できなくなるような事がなかったのなら……

engChrName: But I don't have to worry about that now. I'm sure Ewan can rest easy.
engSearchText:
But I don't have to worry about that now. I'm sure
Ewan can rest easy.
jpnChrName: 彼もきっと報われる……安心して 女神様の元に行けるはずだ……
jpnSearchText:
彼もきっと報われる……安心して
女神様の元に行けるはずだ……

engChrName: Ewan, the bracer who passed away, left behind a significant other.
engSearchText:
Ewan, the bracer who passed away, left behind a
significant other.
jpnChrName: 死んだユアンには恋人がいたのだ…… 他の者から聞いただろうか？
jpnSearchText:
死んだユアンには恋人がいたのだ……
他の者から聞いただろうか？

engChrName: I'm sure that's his greatest regret.
engSearchText: I'm sure that's his greatest regret.
jpnChrName: 間違いなく……彼にとっての 最大の心残りだろうな……
jpnSearchText:
間違いなく……彼にとっての
最大の心残りだろうな……

engChrName: They had to be secretive about their relationship since he was a bracer and she was a police officer, but they loved each other dearly.
engSearchText:
They had to be secretive about their relationship since
he was a bracer and she was a police officer, but they
loved each other dearly.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士と警官という立場上、あまり公（おおやけ）には していなかったが仲睦まじい二人だった。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士と警官という立場上、あまり公（おおやけ）には
していなかったが仲睦まじい二人だった。

engChrName: Ewan's last request was that I take care of her, but...I can't do much as I am now.
engSearchText:
Ewan's last request was that I take care of her, but...I
can't do much as I am now.
jpnChrName: ……ユアンは、残された彼女を私に頼むと 言い残したが……この身に何ができようか……
jpnSearchText:
……ユアンは、残された彼女を私に頼むと
言い残したが……この身に何ができようか……

engChrName: Hey, spriggan. I heard you won the right to challenge Almata's boss.
engSearchText:
Hey, spriggan. I heard you won the right to challenge
Almata's boss.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋だったか……諸君が アルマータへ挑む権利を勝ち取ったと聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋だったか……諸君が
アルマータへ挑む権利を勝ち取ったと聞いたが。

engChrName: Some members of the guild may not be able to verbalize it, so I'll say it in their stead: everyone's counting on you.
engSearchText:
Some members of the guild may not be able to
verbalize it, so I'll say it in their stead: everyone's
counting on you.
jpnChrName: ギルドとしての体裁もあるが、 今は君たちに期待させてもらうとしよう……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドとしての体裁もあるが、
今は君たちに期待させてもらうとしよう……

engChrName: That said, we won't just be sitting here twiddling our thumbs. We'll make sure they regret taking Ewan from us.
engSearchText:
That said, we won't just be sitting here twiddling
our thumbs. We'll make sure they regret taking Ewan
from us.
jpnChrName: 無論我々も手をこまねいているわけではない。 ユアンに報いるためにも、必ずや──
jpnSearchText:
無論我々も手をこまねいているわけではない。
ユアンに報いるためにも、必ずや──

engChrName: I owe Ewan my life. I'd like to pay him back by putting an end to this...
engSearchText:
I owe Ewan my life. I'd like to pay him back by
putting an end to this...
jpnChrName: ユアンに救われた命だ。 なんとしても食い止めねば……
jpnSearchText:
ユアンに救われた命だ。
なんとしても食い止めねば……

engChrName: I'm worried about Elaine, too... If only I could lend her an ear.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about Elaine, too... If only I could lend
her an ear.
jpnChrName: エレイン君の事も心配だが、 この状況で可能性があるとすれば……
jpnSearchText:
エレイン君の事も心配だが、
この状況で可能性があるとすれば……

engChrName: Kirchheim is in a deep sleep.
engSearchText: Kirchheim is in a deep sleep.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士キルヒハイムは深い眠りに ついているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士キルヒハイムは深い眠りに
ついているようだ。

engChrName: (Based on what people were saying, I'm pretty sure he went up against the Eradicator.)
engSearchText:
(Based on what people were saying, I'm pretty sure he
went up against the Eradicator.)
jpnChrName: （話を聞く限り、構成員だけじゃなく   あの鏖殺野郎ともやり合ったんだろうな。）
jpnSearchText:
（話を聞く限り、構成員だけじゃなく
あの鏖殺野郎ともやり合ったんだろうな。）

engChrName: (Doubt he's gonna be wakin' up anytime soon.)
engSearchText: (Doubt he's gonna be wakin' up anytime soon.)
jpnChrName: （相当な重症だ……しばらく   意識は戻らねえだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（相当な重症だ……しばらく
意識は戻らねえだろう。）

engChrName: Well, I've checked in on him, so it's time to head on out.
engSearchText:
Well, I've checked in on him, so it's time to head
on out.
jpnChrName: さーて、挨拶もできたし そろそろ出かけるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
さーて、挨拶もできたし
そろそろ出かけるとすっか。

engChrName: I'll be part of the ground forces for now. Depending on the situation, though, we might see some member changes.
engSearchText:
I'll be part of the ground forces for now.
Depending on the situation, though, we might see
some member changes.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは地上部隊として動くつもりだが 状況次第ではメンバーチェンジもありえる。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは地上部隊として動くつもりだが
状況次第ではメンバーチェンジもありえる。

engChrName: This'll be a tough one—even for the A-rank bracers here. Careful out there, you guys.
engSearchText:
This'll be a tough one—even for the A-rank
bracers here. Careful out there, you guys.
jpnChrName: Ａ級だろうと命の保証はねえ状況だ。 そっちも気ィ張っていけよ？
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級だろうと命の保証はねえ状況だ。
そっちも気ィ張っていけよ？

engChrName: Ewan, I'm...so sorry. I'm only here because...you protected me...
engSearchText:
Ewan, I'm...so sorry. I'm only here because...you
protected me...
jpnChrName: すまぬ、ユアン…… ……あの時……私を庇ったばかりに……
jpnSearchText:
すまぬ、ユアン……
……あの時……私を庇ったばかりに……

engChrName: He only did what he thought was right. There's no need to be sorry.
engSearchText:
He only did what he thought was right. There's no
need to be sorry.
jpnChrName: ……アイツはアイツの信念に 従ったまでの事でしょうよ。
jpnSearchText:
……アイツはアイツの信念に
従ったまでの事でしょうよ。

engChrName: We're just happy you made it back alive.
engSearchText: We're just happy you made it back alive.
jpnChrName: むしろよく生きて帰ってくれた──
jpnSearchText: むしろよく生きて帰ってくれた──

engChrName: We'll handle things from here, Kirchheim. You just focus on getting some rest.
engSearchText:
We'll handle things from here, Kirchheim. You just
focus on getting some rest.
jpnChrName: キルヒハイムさん、あとは任せて ゆっくり休んでください。
jpnSearchText:
キルヒハイムさん、あとは任せて
ゆっくり休んでください。

engChrName: Lahad... Take care of...Oración. And Almata...
engSearchText: Lahad... Take care of...Oración. And Almata...
jpnChrName: ……ラハド……君……… オラシオンを……アルマータを………
jpnSearchText:
……ラハド……君………
オラシオンを……アルマータを………

engChrName: He's asleep now.
engSearchText: He's asleep now.
jpnChrName: 眠ったようだな……
jpnSearchText: 眠ったようだな……

engChrName: Yeah, he had six broken ribs and several lacerations. It's a miracle he escaped on his own.
engSearchText:
Yeah, he had six broken ribs and several lacerations.
It's a miracle he escaped on his own.
jpnChrName: ああ、アバラ６本に裂傷多数── 自力で逃げ切れたのが不思議なくらいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アバラ６本に裂傷多数──
自力で逃げ切れたのが不思議なくらいだぜ。

engChrName: Before he and Ewan were ambushed, they were looking into something in the labyrinth.
engSearchText:
Before he and Ewan were ambushed, they were
looking into something in the labyrinth.
jpnChrName: アルマータの連中、どうも反応兵器とは 別の仕込みも用意してやがるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの連中、どうも反応兵器とは
別の仕込みも用意してやがるらしい。

engChrName: Apparently, the nuclear weapon isn't the only thing we have to worry about. Almata brought in something else, but we don't know what.
engSearchText:
Apparently, the nuclear weapon isn't the only thing
we have to worry about. Almata brought in
something else, but we don't know what.
jpnChrName: そいつを探っていたユアンと キルヒハイムさんがやられちまったワケだが──
jpnSearchText:
そいつを探っていたユアンと
キルヒハイムさんがやられちまったワケだが──

engChrName: That's our warning to you, so try to make it count.
engSearchText: That's our warning to you, so try to make it count.
jpnChrName: この話、聞いたからには きっちり役立てろよ、裏解決屋？
jpnSearchText:
この話、聞いたからには
きっちり役立てろよ、裏解決屋？

engChrName: Of course! We'll put a stop to Almata's plans!
engSearchText: Of course! We'll put a stop to Almata's plans!
jpnChrName: わかりました……！ アルマータも必ず止めてみせます！！
jpnSearchText:
わかりました……！
アルマータも必ず止めてみせます！！

engChrName: Nice of you to worry about us. Is that why you let us listen in on what he was saying?
engSearchText:
Nice of you to worry about us. Is that why you let us
listen in on what he was saying?
jpnChrName: つーか初めから見越して 聞かせやがったんだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
つーか初めから見越して
聞かせやがったんだろうが？

engChrName: Haha. Who can say?
engSearchText: Haha. Who can say?
jpnChrName: ハハ、最大限活用したかったんでな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、最大限活用したかったんでな。

engChrName: Let's all do our best out there. We'll make them pay for what they did to Ewan and save the 280,000 citizens in the process.
engSearchText:
Let's all do our best out there. We'll make them pay
for what they did to Ewan and save the 280,000
citizens in the process.
jpnChrName: お互い手を尽くすとしようぜ。 友（ユアン）の弔い、そして２８万人の市民を救うためにな。
jpnSearchText:
お互い手を尽くすとしようぜ。
友（ユアン）の弔い、そして２８万人の市民を救うためにな。

engChrName: So, Ewan fought to the bitter end. That sounds just like him.
engSearchText:
So, Ewan fought to the bitter end. That sounds just
like him.
jpnChrName: そうですか……ユアンは最後まで 諦めずに……あいつらしいな……
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……ユアンは最後まで
諦めずに……あいつらしいな……

engChrName: He was your senior by half a year, right? I know you two had a friendly rivalry going on.
engSearchText:
He was your senior by half a year, right? I know you
two had a friendly rivalry going on.
jpnChrName: 君の半年先輩だったか…… いつも互いに切磋琢磨していたようだが……
jpnSearchText:
君の半年先輩だったか……
いつも互いに切磋琢磨していたようだが……

engChrName: Yes. Honestly, I was pretty frustrated that he reached B-rank before I did.
engSearchText:
Yes. Honestly, I was pretty frustrated that he reached
B-rank before I did.
jpnChrName: ええ……先にＢ級に上がられて 本当に悔しかったものです……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……先にＢ級に上がられて
本当に悔しかったものです……

engChrName: We may not be able to participate in the game anymore, but we can't let his efforts go to waste!
engSearchText:
We may not be able to participate in the game
anymore, but we can't let his efforts go to waste!
jpnChrName: “ゲーム”の参加資格は失われましたが あいつが残した想いだけは、絶対に……！
jpnSearchText:
“ゲーム”の参加資格は失われましたが
あいつが残した想いだけは、絶対に……！

engChrName: I feel the same. Sadly, I don't think there's much I can do in my current state.
engSearchText:
I feel the same. Sadly, I don't think there's much I
can do in my current state.
jpnChrName: ああ、私とて同じ想いだ。 この身体ではままならないが──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、私とて同じ想いだ。
この身体ではままならないが──

engChrName: Oh, right, I almost forgot to ask. Is it true that Elaine's gone missing?
engSearchText:
Oh, right, I almost forgot to ask. Is it true that
Elaine's gone missing?
jpnChrName: そういえば、エレイン君の 行方が分からないと聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、エレイン君の
行方が分からないと聞いたが……

engChrName: Yes. No one's seen her since this morning.
engSearchText: Yes. No one's seen her since this morning.
jpnChrName: ええ、実は今朝から……
jpnSearchText: ええ、実は今朝から……

engChrName: I know that Elaine can take care of herself, but...I can't stop myself from worrying about her.
engSearchText:
I know that Elaine can take care of herself, but...I
can't stop myself from worrying about her.
jpnChrName: エレインさんに限って滅多な事は 無いと信じたいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんに限って滅多な事は
無いと信じたいんですが……

engChrName: I wish I could help her. Both she and I grew up here in Oración, so maybe she would've opened up to me had I not been stuck in bed...
engSearchText:
I wish I could help her. Both she and I grew up here
in Oración, so maybe she would've opened up to me
had I not been stuck in bed...
jpnChrName: ……オラシオンは私の故郷でもある。 この状況で可能性があるとすれば……
jpnSearchText:
……オラシオンは私の故郷でもある。
この状況で可能性があるとすれば……

engChrName: Once we're all set, let's head out and take the fight to the palace.
engSearchText:
Once we're all set, let's head out and take the fight to
the palace.
jpnChrName: さて、それじゃあ準備が整い次第、 俺達も決着をつけに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、それじゃあ準備が整い次第、
俺達も決着をつけに行くとするか。

engChrName: Don't worry about Elaine. She's gonna be fine.
engSearchText: Don't worry about Elaine. She's gonna be fine.
jpnChrName: エレインは──まあ、色々と吹っ切れた 部分もあると思うしな。
jpnSearchText:
エレインは──まあ、色々と吹っ切れた
部分もあると思うしな。

engChrName: The best thing we can do for her now is to put an end to this nightmare.
engSearchText:
The best thing we can do for her now is to put an end
to this nightmare.
jpnChrName: 俺達が、エレインの覚悟を継いで この悪夢を終わらせんのが一番の報いだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
俺達が、エレインの覚悟を継いで
この悪夢を終わらせんのが一番の報いだろうさ。

engChrName: You leave things here to us.
engSearchText: You leave things here to us.
jpnChrName: こっちの事は俺たちに任せておけ。
jpnSearchText: こっちの事は俺たちに任せておけ。

engChrName: Don't worry about Elaine. She's gonna be just fine.
engSearchText: Don't worry about Elaine. She's gonna be just fine.
jpnChrName: エレインもいくらかは吹っ切れた 部分もあるだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
エレインもいくらかは吹っ切れた
部分もあるだろうしな。

engChrName: Now you go on out there and give those Almata goons a good smacking for me.
engSearchText:
Now you go on out there and give those Almata
goons a good smacking for me.
jpnChrName: あとは、お前さん達が最後まで進んで こいつの想いに報いてやるだけだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
あとは、お前さん達が最後まで進んで
こいつの想いに報いてやるだけだろうさ。

engChrName: We're still on the lookout for Elaine.
engSearchText: We're still on the lookout for Elaine.
jpnChrName: 無論、俺達もエレインの事は 気にかけておくつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
無論、俺達もエレインの事は
気にかけておくつもりだ。

engChrName: But finding her can't be our top priority in this situation, much as I hate to admit it.
engSearchText:
But finding her can't be our top priority in this
situation, much as I hate to admit it.
jpnChrName: だがこの情勢だ、優先順位は 下げざるを得ないからな。
jpnSearchText:
だがこの情勢だ、優先順位は
下げざるを得ないからな。

engChrName: It's just hard for me to believe she'd run off by herself now of all times.
engSearchText:
It's just hard for me to believe she'd run off by herself
now of all times.
jpnChrName: ふむ、あいつもそれくらいは 分かっているはずだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、あいつもそれくらいは
分かっているはずだが……

engChrName: Not gonna lie, losing Elaine right now's a huge blow. She left behind a gap that's hard to fill.
engSearchText:
Not gonna lie, losing Elaine right now's a huge blow.
She left behind a gap that's hard to fill.
jpnChrName: ……エレインが欠けるのは少々手痛いが、 その分も俺達で埋めていくしかないだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
……エレインが欠けるのは少々手痛いが、
その分も俺達で埋めていくしかないだろうな。

engChrName: It'd be great if we found her, but given the circumstances, that doesn't seem likely.
engSearchText:
It'd be great if we found her, but given the
circumstances, that doesn't seem likely.
jpnChrName: 見つかればそれに越した事はないが、 あいつがいなくなる程の事情だ。
jpnSearchText:
見つかればそれに越した事はないが、
あいつがいなくなる程の事情だ。

engChrName: We'll keep lookin' for her on our downtime, but till then, Fie and I are gonna have to go full throttle in fights.
engSearchText:
We'll keep lookin' for her on our downtime, but till
then, Fie and I are gonna have to go full throttle
in fights.
jpnChrName: 俺たちも気に掛けつつ 戦力ダウンに備えておくべきだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちも気に掛けつつ
戦力ダウンに備えておくべきだろうな。

engChrName: Elaine may be missing, but we still have to focus on the task at hand.
engSearchText:
Elaine may be missing, but we still have to focus on
the task at hand.
jpnChrName: エレインがいなくとも、俺達遊撃士の やるべき事に変わりは無いが……
jpnSearchText:
エレインがいなくとも、俺達遊撃士の
やるべき事に変わりは無いが……

engChrName: Still, I'm gonna keep an eye open for her, and I'll ask that you do the same.
engSearchText:
Still, I'm gonna keep an eye open for her, and I'll ask
that you do the same.
jpnChrName: まあ、お前さんの方でも気にかけてくれ。 間違いなく相当な事情があるだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お前さんの方でも気にかけてくれ。
間違いなく相当な事情があるだろうしな。

engChrName: Once again, thank you, Van. You gave me the chance to break the chains that bound me for so long.
engSearchText:
Once again, thank you, Van. You gave me the chance
to break the chains that bound me for so long.
jpnChrName: ヴァン……改めてありがとう。 因縁にけじめをつける機会をくれて──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン……改めてありがとう。
因縁にけじめをつける機会をくれて──

engChrName: The first time we met, you gave me a hand, and you offered it time and time again when we were in school together, too.
engSearchText:
The first time we met, you gave me a hand, and you
offered it time and time again when we were in
school together, too.
jpnChrName: この街で出会った頃も、 同じ学び舎に通っていた頃も……
jpnSearchText:
この街で出会った頃も、
同じ学び舎に通っていた頃も……

engChrName: You've helped so many times, I'm afraid I've lost count.
engSearchText:
You've helped so many times, I'm afraid I've
lost count.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、貴方にはいつも 助けられていた気がする。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、貴方にはいつも
助けられていた気がする。

engChrName: Nah, I didn't do nothin'. You've always been the one at the wheel of your life, Elaine.
engSearchText:
Nah, I didn't do nothin'. You've always been the one
at the wheel of your life, Elaine.
jpnChrName: 何言ってんだ、いつだって 道を選んできたのはお前自身だろ？
jpnSearchText:
何言ってんだ、いつだって
道を選んできたのはお前自身だろ？

engChrName: I just like stickin' by your side and doin' whatever I can to support you—my own way.
engSearchText:
I just like stickin' by your side and doin' whatever I
can to support you—my own way.
jpnChrName: 俺は傍にいて、できる事をやっただけさ。 ──俺なりの流儀でな。
jpnSearchText:
俺は傍にいて、できる事をやっただけさ。
──俺なりの流儀でな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...

engChrName: Oh, brother. Get a room, you two.
engSearchText: Oh, brother. Get a room, you two.
jpnChrName: ひゅーひゅー。
jpnSearchText: ひゅーひゅー。

engChrName: C'mon, Fie. Let's give the lovebirds a little privacy.
engSearchText: C'mon, Fie. Let's give the lovebirds a little privacy.
jpnChrName: あとは若い連中に任せるとするか。
jpnSearchText: あとは若い連中に任せるとするか。

engChrName: Wait, what? No! I mean, the death game's still—
engSearchText: Wait, what? No! I mean, the death game's still—
jpnChrName: ってそうじゃないでしょう！？ まだデスゲームだって──
jpnSearchText:
ってそうじゃないでしょう！？
まだデスゲームだって──

engChrName: Yeah, you're right.
engSearchText: Yeah, you're right.
jpnChrName: ああ、その通りだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その通りだ。

engChrName: You've put an end to things on your end, and now it's our turn to do the same.
engSearchText:
You've put an end to things on your end, and now it's
our turn to do the same.
jpnChrName: お前がけじめをつけたように…… 俺たちもケリを付けてくる。
jpnSearchText:
お前がけじめをつけたように……
俺たちもケリを付けてくる。

engChrName: Just kick back and relax for once in your life. You're long overdue for a rest.
engSearchText:
Just kick back and relax for once in your life.
You're long overdue for a rest.
jpnChrName: お前はここで待ってやがれ。 まだ胸の内も落ち着いちゃいねぇだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
お前はここで待ってやがれ。
まだ胸の内も落ち着いちゃいねぇだろうしな。

engChrName: You're right. Thank you, Van. And please, be safe!
engSearchText: You're right. Thank you, Van. And please, be safe!
jpnChrName: ええ──ありがとう、ヴァン。 どうか気を付けて……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ──ありがとう、ヴァン。
どうか気を付けて……！

engChrName: You don't need to worry about me, Van.
engSearchText: You don't need to worry about me, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、私の事は心配しないで先に進んで。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、私の事は心配しないで先に進んで。

engChrName: I promise I'll get some rest now that I've finally put all that behind me.
engSearchText:
I promise I'll get some rest now that I've finally put all
that behind me.
jpnChrName: 私も……貴方のお陰で やっと自分の因縁にけじめをつけられた。
jpnSearchText:
私も……貴方のお陰で
やっと自分の因縁にけじめをつけられた。

engChrName: I have nothing to fear now.
engSearchText: I have nothing to fear now.
jpnChrName: もう恐れるものは何もないわ。
jpnSearchText: もう恐れるものは何もないわ。

engChrName: So I want you to focus on bringing this whole thing to an end. I'll be waiting here... For you.
engSearchText:
So I want you to focus on bringing this whole thing
to an end. I'll be waiting here... For you.
jpnChrName: だから貴方も前を向いて、決着をつけてきて。 ……ここで待ってるから。
jpnSearchText:
だから貴方も前を向いて、決着をつけてきて。
……ここで待ってるから。

engChrName: President Auclair's condition has stabilized for the time being.
engSearchText:
President Auclair's condition has stabilized for the
time being.
jpnChrName: オークレール社長の容体も ひとまず危険な状態は脱したみたい。
jpnSearchText:
オークレール社長の容体も
ひとまず危険な状態は脱したみたい。

engChrName: He's left a heck of a mess for us to clean up, but I'm sure we can take care of it.
engSearchText:
He's left a heck of a mess for us to clean up, but I'm
sure we can take care of it.
jpnChrName: しばらくはゴタつくだろうけど 大丈夫、わたしたちも支えるから。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくはゴタつくだろうけど
大丈夫、わたしたちも支えるから。

engChrName: Sounds like President Auclair is willing to answer our questions.
engSearchText:
Sounds like President Auclair is willing to answer
our questions.
jpnChrName: オークレール社長も聴取には 応じる姿勢みたい。
jpnSearchText:
オークレール社長も聴取には
応じる姿勢みたい。

engChrName: He's left a heck of a mess for us to clean up, but I'm sure we can take care of it.
engSearchText:
He's left a heck of a mess for us to clean up, but I'm
sure we can take care of it.
jpnChrName: しばらくはゴタつくだろうけど 大丈夫、わたしたちも支えるから。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくはゴタつくだろうけど
大丈夫、わたしたちも支えるから。

engChrName: Anyway, now that we're out of the woods there, we can charge headlong into the palace. Let's end this.
engSearchText:
Anyway, now that we're out of the woods there, we
can charge headlong into the palace. Let's end this.
jpnChrName: あとはこの危機を解決するだけ── 行こっか、本当の意味でケリを付けるために。
jpnSearchText:
あとはこの危機を解決するだけ──
行こっか、本当の意味でケリを付けるために。

engChrName: Anyway, now that we're out of the woods there, you can charge headlong into the palace. The rest is up to you, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Anyway, now that we're out of the woods there, you
can charge headlong into the palace. The rest is up to
you, spriggan.
jpnChrName: あとはこの危機を解決するだけ── どうかよろしくね、《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》。
jpnSearchText:
あとはこの危機を解決するだけ──
どうかよろしくね、《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》。

engChrName: It'd be nice if Elaine would come back to us...
engSearchText: It'd be nice if Elaine would come back to us...
jpnChrName: エレイン……戻ってきてくれるなら それが一番だけど……
jpnSearchText:
エレイン……戻ってきてくれるなら
それが一番だけど……

engChrName: But maybe it's best that she sat this one out. The task's definitely gonna be a demanding one.
engSearchText:
But maybe it's best that she sat this one out.
The task's definitely gonna be a demanding one.
jpnChrName: 必ずしもそうとは限らないし、 今後は相応の覚悟も必要そうかな……
jpnSearchText:
必ずしもそうとは限らないし、
今後は相応の覚悟も必要そうかな……

engChrName: Let us know if you find Elaine. Till then, we'll be on the lookout for her.
engSearchText:
Let us know if you find Elaine. Till then, we'll be on
the lookout for her.
