jpnChrName: こっちでもエレインの事は探してみる。 ヴァンも何か掴んだらお願い。
jpnSearchText:
こっちでもエレインの事は探してみる。
ヴァンも何か掴んだらお願い。

engChrName: Really hope she's okay...
engSearchText: Really hope she's okay...
jpnChrName: この状況だし、大事じゃなきゃ いいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
この状況だし、大事じゃなきゃ
いいんだけど……

engChrName: To think Elaine's father was behind all this...
engSearchText: To think Elaine's father was behind all this...
jpnChrName: ……エレインさんのお父上がまさか、 オラシオンの黒幕だったとは……
jpnSearchText:
……エレインさんのお父上がまさか、
オラシオンの黒幕だったとは……

engChrName: I can't imagine how she's taking this. Who could've guessed things would turn out this way?
engSearchText:
I can't imagine how she's taking this. Who could've
guessed things would turn out this way?
jpnChrName: 彼女の心中は察するに余りあるが…… くっ、こんな結末になってしまうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
彼女の心中は察するに余りあるが……
くっ、こんな結末になってしまうなんて……

engChrName: I'll admit, when you brought up President Auclair, I thought I misheard you.
engSearchText:
I'll admit, when you brought up President Auclair, I
thought I misheard you.
jpnChrName: ……お前がエドモン社長の名を 挙げた時は、耳を疑ったが……
jpnSearchText:
……お前がエドモン社長の名を
挙げた時は、耳を疑ったが……

engChrName: I was surprised when I put two and two together, too.
engSearchText: I was surprised when I put two and two together, too.
jpnChrName: まあ、心当たりもいくつかあったんでな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、心当たりもいくつかあったんでな。

engChrName: Thanks for helping us find those leads, by the way. Your investigation's what brought them to light.
engSearchText:
Thanks for helping us find those leads, by the way.
Your investigation's what brought them to light.
jpnChrName: だが、お前さんの調査あってこそだ。 礼を言わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、お前さんの調査あってこそだ。
礼を言わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: No, I don't deserve any thanks for this.
engSearchText: No, I don't deserve any thanks for this.
jpnChrName: いや……感謝される資格などないさ。
jpnSearchText: いや……感謝される資格などないさ。

engChrName: I'm sure I was turning a blind eye to it on some level. After all, he's Elaine's family...
engSearchText:
I'm sure I was turning a blind eye to it on some level.
After all, he's Elaine's family...
jpnChrName: 俺はきっと、目を逸らしていたんだろう。 エレインさんの身内だからと……
jpnSearchText:
俺はきっと、目を逸らしていたんだろう。
エレインさんの身内だからと……

engChrName: Huh. That's surprisingly humble of you. Still, don't blame yourself.
engSearchText:
Huh. That's surprisingly humble of you. Still, don't
blame yourself.
jpnChrName: お前にしちゃ随分と殊勝な……だが、 今回は流石に仕方ない事だと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前にしちゃ随分と殊勝な……だが、
今回は流石に仕方ない事だと思うぜ。

engChrName: I only figured it out because the facts were practically laid out right in front of me. Otherwise, I never would've guessed it was him.
engSearchText:
I only figured it out because the facts were practically
laid out right in front of me. Otherwise, I never
would've guessed it was him.
jpnChrName: 俺でも、都合よく条件が揃ってなきゃ あそこまで深読みしなかったろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
俺でも、都合よく条件が揃ってなきゃ
あそこまで深読みしなかったろうしな。

engChrName: Now who's the humble one?
engSearchText: Now who's the humble one?
jpnChrName: ……フッ、あんたに 慰められる日が来るなんてな。
jpnSearchText:
……フッ、あんたに
慰められる日が来るなんてな。

engChrName: I wish I'd investigated him more, but even if I had, I doubt I would've put two and two together.
engSearchText:
I wish I'd investigated him more, but even if I had, I
doubt I would've put two and two together.
jpnChrName: せめてもう少し調査をできていれば…… いや、それでも答えに至れたかどうか……
jpnSearchText:
せめてもう少し調査をできていれば……
いや、それでも答えに至れたかどうか……

engChrName: No... I already knew something was off with Elaine. Maybe I could've guessed it was due to a familial matter.
engSearchText:
No... I already knew something was off with Elaine.
Maybe I could've guessed it was due to a
familial matter.
jpnChrName: 思えば、エレインさんの思い詰めた様子で 察する事も出来たかもしれない……
jpnSearchText:
思えば、エレインさんの思い詰めた様子で
察する事も出来たかもしれない……

engChrName: I must've just been turning a blind eye to that possibility because it was the worst-case scenario.
engSearchText:
I must've just been turning a blind eye to that
possibility because it was the worst-case scenario.
jpnChrName: 無意識のうちに、最悪の可能性から 目を逸らしていたのかもしれないな……
jpnSearchText:
無意識のうちに、最悪の可能性から
目を逸らしていたのかもしれないな……

engChrName: Don't beat yourself up. Even I couldn't figure it out, and I've known her since we were kids.
engSearchText:
Don't beat yourself up. Even I couldn't figure it out,
and I've known her since we were kids.
jpnChrName: いや……こればかりは仮にもあいつの 幼馴染なのに気づけなかった俺にも非がある。
jpnSearchText:
いや……こればかりは仮にもあいつの
幼馴染なのに気づけなかった俺にも非がある。

engChrName: Thanks to my mistake, we were too late. She's putting on a brave face, but this whole thing must be eating away at her...
engSearchText:
Thanks to my mistake, we were too late.
She's putting on a brave face, but this whole thing
must be eating away at her...
jpnChrName: ……そのせいで、機を逃して…… エレインも気丈に振る舞ってはいるが……
jpnSearchText:
……そのせいで、機を逃して……
エレインも気丈に振る舞ってはいるが……

engChrName: Well, one way or another, we'll need to be there to support her.
engSearchText:
Well, one way or another, we'll need to be there to
support her.
jpnChrName: ……何にせよ、この後は俺達が 支えていかねばならないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……何にせよ、この後は俺達が
支えていかねばならないだろう。

engChrName: We can't let this put an end to her bright future.
engSearchText: We can't let this put an end to her bright future.
jpnChrName: 彼女は……こんな事で未来を絶たれては 決してならない人だ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は……こんな事で未来を絶たれては
決してならない人だ。

engChrName: Yeah. I'm with you there.
engSearchText: Yeah. I'm with you there.
jpnChrName: ……同感だ。
jpnSearchText: ……同感だ。

engChrName: Anyway, for Elaine's sake, we gotta bring this whole thing to an end.
engSearchText:
Anyway, for Elaine's sake, we gotta bring this whole
thing to an end.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよ、エレインのためにも この戦いのケリはつけてくる。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよ、エレインのためにも
この戦いのケリはつけてくる。

engChrName: You mind keepin' an eye on her while I go do that?
engSearchText: You mind keepin' an eye on her while I go do that?
jpnChrName: お前も、その間はあいつの事は 改めて頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前も、その間はあいつの事は
改めて頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Of course. No need to ask.
engSearchText: Of course. No need to ask.
jpnChrName: ああ……言われなくともな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……言われなくともな。

engChrName: Bring this game to a swift end, Arkride. For all our sakes.
engSearchText:
Bring this game to a swift end, Arkride. For all
our sakes.
jpnChrName: ……どうか、エレインさんのためにも…… 決着をつけてきてくれ、アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
……どうか、エレインさんのためにも……
決着をつけてきてくれ、アークライド。

engChrName: I can't believe I'm about to say this...
engSearchText: I can't believe I'm about to say this...
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋にこんな事を言う日が来るとは 思ってもいなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋にこんな事を言う日が来るとは
思ってもいなかったが……

engChrName: ...but the fact is, the trail Elaine blazed can only be walked by you. You're the only one who can make her efforts worth it.
engSearchText:
...but the fact is, the trail Elaine blazed can only be
walked by you. You're the only one who can make her
efforts worth it.
jpnChrName: エレインさんの拓いた道をお前が繋いだ事も、 彼女の想いに報いれる者がお前だけなのは事実だ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんの拓いた道をお前が繋いだ事も、
彼女の想いに報いれる者がお前だけなのは事実だ。

engChrName: Go defeat Almata—and make them pay for toying with Elaine's life!
engSearchText:
Go defeat Almata—and make them pay for toying
with Elaine's life!
jpnChrName: ……エレインさんの人生を翻弄した元凶を…… アルマータを倒してきてくれ……！
jpnSearchText:
……エレインさんの人生を翻弄した元凶を……
アルマータを倒してきてくれ……！

engChrName: Oh. It's you.
engSearchText: Oh. It's you.
jpnChrName: ……お前達か。
jpnSearchText: ……お前達か。

engChrName: I heard that Elaine went up against your group down in the labyrinth.
engSearchText:
I heard that Elaine went up against your group down
in the labyrinth.
jpnChrName: エレインさんがよもや２０番目のチームとして お前達と当たっていたとはな……
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんがよもや２０番目のチームとして
お前達と当たっていたとはな……

engChrName: Yeah, she helped us win that round. We won't let her efforts go to waste.
engSearchText:
Yeah, she helped us win that round. We won't let her
efforts go to waste.
jpnChrName: まあ、あいつに繋がれた分は 無駄にしないつもりさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あいつに繋がれた分は
無駄にしないつもりさ。

engChrName: Anyway, what'cha looking at?
engSearchText: Anyway, what'cha looking at?
jpnChrName: 気になる事もないわけじゃないが…… それよりお前さん、調べものか？
jpnSearchText:
気になる事もないわけじゃないが……
それよりお前さん、調べものか？

engChrName: Something that's for our eyes only.
engSearchText: Something that's for our eyes only.
jpnChrName: フン、お前達に関係は無いが……まあ、 いざという時の情報交換には使えるか。
jpnSearchText:
フン、お前達に関係は無いが……まあ、
いざという時の情報交換には使えるか。

engChrName: Well, I guess I can share if we have info to swap. It's related to our suspicions that Almata has had some dealings in Oración.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess I can share if we have info to swap.
It's related to our suspicions that Almata has had
some dealings in Oración.
jpnChrName: オラシオンに関しては以前から アルマータとの関係が疑われていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンに関しては以前から
アルマータとの関係が疑われていたんだ。

engChrName: I'm organizing all the information that was collected at this branch and combining it with what we've learned over the last few days.
engSearchText:
I'm organizing all the information that was collected
at this branch and combining it with what we've
learned over the last few days.
jpnChrName: この支部に集まっている情報、そしてここ数日で 判明した情報を整理しているという訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
この支部に集まっている情報、そしてここ数日で
判明した情報を整理しているという訳だ。

engChrName: I'm hoping it'll prove helpful somewhere down the line.
engSearchText:
I'm hoping it'll prove helpful somewhere down
the line.
jpnChrName: 少しでも、突破口になりそうな話を 探っておいた方が良いだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
少しでも、突破口になりそうな話を
探っておいた方が良いだろうからな。

engChrName: Huh, neat. Well, good luck with that.
engSearchText: Huh, neat. Well, good luck with that.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……そっちにも 期待させてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……そっちにも
期待させてもらうとするか。

engChrName: There's been a rumor floating around about a connection between Almata and a member of Oración's high society.
engSearchText:
There's been a rumor floating around about a
connection between Almata and a member of
Oración's high society.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの上流階級には以前から アルマータと関係を持つ存在が噂されていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの上流階級には以前から
アルマータと関係を持つ存在が噂されていたんだ。

engChrName: Almata's propaganda may very well strike a chord with them—given their own white supremacist views.
engSearchText:
Almata's propaganda may very well strike a chord
with them—given their own white supremacist views.
jpnChrName: 白人至上主義を掲げる彼らと アルマータのプロパガンダは共通点があるからな。
jpnSearchText:
白人至上主義を掲げる彼らと
アルマータのプロパガンダは共通点があるからな。

engChrName: That said, a rumor's only a rumor until it's proven true. That's why our investigation has to be thorough.
engSearchText:
That said, a rumor's only a rumor until it's
proven true. That's why our investigation has to
be thorough.
jpnChrName: だがフェイクの可能性も高い── やはり調査は慎重に進めないとな。
jpnSearchText:
だがフェイクの可能性も高い──
やはり調査は慎重に進めないとな。

engChrName: Ewan fought Almata to the last and managed to protect his friend all the while.
engSearchText:
Ewan fought Almata to the last and managed to
protect his friend all the while.
jpnChrName: ユアンは最後までアルマータに抗い、 仲間を守ったんだな……
jpnSearchText:
ユアンは最後までアルマータに抗い、
仲間を守ったんだな……

engChrName: We'll hold a proper funeral for him at some point, but for now, all I can do is pray he finds peace in what he accomplished.
engSearchText:
We'll hold a proper funeral for him at some point, but
for now, all I can do is pray he finds peace in what
he accomplished.
jpnChrName: あいつの事はいずれ正式に弔うが…… 今はこの報を以て彼の安息を祈る他無いか。
jpnSearchText:
あいつの事はいずれ正式に弔うが……
今はこの報を以て彼の安息を祈る他無いか。

engChrName: I'm worried about where Elaine's gone most of all. I've gotta keep it together.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about where Elaine's gone most of all.
I've gotta keep it together.
jpnChrName: 何よりエレインさんの行方も心配だ、 俺もしっかりしないとな。
jpnSearchText:
何よりエレインさんの行方も心配だ、
俺もしっかりしないとな。

engChrName: I won't shirk my assigned duties, of course...
engSearchText: I won't shirk my assigned duties, of course...
jpnChrName: ……俺も仕事を疎かにするつもりは無いが……
jpnSearchText: ……俺も仕事を疎かにするつもりは無いが……

engChrName: ...but I'd really like to be searching for Elaine right now.
engSearchText:
...but I'd really like to be searching for Elaine
right now.
jpnChrName: やはりエレインさんについては 可能な範囲で探してみるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
やはりエレインさんについては
可能な範囲で探してみるつもりだ。

engChrName: If any of you get a hint of Elaine's whereabouts, please tell me.
engSearchText:
If any of you get a hint of Elaine's whereabouts,
please tell me.
jpnChrName: お前達も……彼女の足取りで 何か判れば俺に知らせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
お前達も……彼女の足取りで
何か判れば俺に知らせてくれ。

engChrName: Sure thing, man. Just don't let it weigh you down too much, all right?
engSearchText:
Sure thing, man. Just don't let it weigh you down too
much, all right?
jpnChrName: ああ……お前さんも あまり思い詰めないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……お前さんも
あまり思い詰めないようにな。

engChrName: Naturally, I have my reservations about you being involved in this game.
engSearchText:
Naturally, I have my reservations about you being
involved in this game.
jpnChrName: フン、お前達もこの“ゲーム”に 首を突っ込むとはな……
jpnSearchText:
フン、お前達もこの“ゲーム”に
首を突っ込むとはな……

engChrName: But I'm willing to follow Elaine's lead. Let's put our differences behind us for the time being.
engSearchText:
But I'm willing to follow Elaine's lead. Let's put our
differences behind us for the time being.
jpnChrName: ……思うところはあるが、エレインさんの 言う通り、お互い上手くやるしか無さそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……思うところはあるが、エレインさんの
言う通り、お互い上手くやるしか無さそうだ。

engChrName: I'm on board with that.
engSearchText: I'm on board with that.
jpnChrName: ああ……状況がどう動くかはわからんが……
jpnSearchText: ああ……状況がどう動くかはわからんが……

engChrName: I'm glad you understand this ain't the time to be engaging in pointless antagonism.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you understand this ain't the time to be
engaging in pointless antagonism.
jpnChrName: 無用な反目をしてる場合じゃないってのは 流石のお前さんでも弁えてるよな？
jpnSearchText:
無用な反目をしてる場合じゃないってのは
流石のお前さんでも弁えてるよな？

engChrName: Urgh. Yes, I get it.
engSearchText: Urgh. Yes, I get it.
jpnChrName: ……っ！　当然だ！
jpnSearchText: ……っ！　当然だ！

engChrName: Ewan wouldn't want me to get wrapped up in a meaningless fight, nor would he want me to cause trouble for Elaine.
engSearchText:
Ewan wouldn't want me to get wrapped up in a
meaningless fight, nor would he want me to cause
trouble for Elaine.
jpnChrName: ユアンだって……無駄な諍いで エレインさんの手を煩わせる事など望まないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ユアンだって……無駄な諍いで
エレインさんの手を煩わせる事など望まないだろう。

engChrName: Oh, is that Ewan the one who...umm...passed away this morning?
engSearchText:
Oh, is that Ewan the one who...umm...passed away
this morning?
jpnChrName: そういえば、そのユアンさんという方は…… 今朝亡くなったという……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、そのユアンさんという方は……
今朝亡くなったという……

engChrName: Yeah. We joined the bracers around the same time, but he got promoted to B-rank a little before I did.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We joined the bracers around the same time,
but he got promoted to B-rank a little before I did.
jpnChrName: ああ……あいつは俺と同年代だったが、 俺より一足早くＢ級になってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……あいつは俺と同年代だったが、
俺より一足早くＢ級になってな。

engChrName: Renton and I were always stuck playing catch up with him. And just when I finally managed to narrow the gap...
engSearchText:
Renton and I were always stuck playing catch up
with him. And just when I finally managed to narrow
the gap...
jpnChrName: 俺やレントンもあいつに追い付こうと…… 俺もようやく並んだというのに……
jpnSearchText:
俺やレントンもあいつに追い付こうと……
俺もようやく並んだというのに……

engChrName: Sorry to hear that, man.
engSearchText: Sorry to hear that, man.
jpnChrName: そうか……そいつは無念だったろうな……
jpnSearchText: そうか……そいつは無念だったろうな……

engChrName: ...One way or another, I have faith that Elaine and Zin will find a way to resolve this situation.
engSearchText:
...One way or another, I have faith that Elaine and
Zin will find a way to resolve this situation.
jpnChrName: ……とにかく、俺はエレインさんやジンさんが この状況を打破する事を信じる。
jpnSearchText:
……とにかく、俺はエレインさんやジンさんが
この状況を打破する事を信じる。

engChrName: To ensure they can focus on the task at hand, I, along with everyone else here, will handle everything on the surface.
engSearchText:
To ensure they can focus on the task at hand, I, along
with everyone else here, will handle everything on
the surface.
jpnChrName: そのためにも地方から集まってくれた連中と 一緒にバックアップに徹するつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
そのためにも地方から集まってくれた連中と
一緒にバックアップに徹するつもりだ。

engChrName: We're giving it our all, and I expect you'll do no less! Are we clear?
engSearchText:
We're giving it our all, and I expect you'll do no less!
Are we clear?
jpnChrName: お前達もせいぜい気をつけておけ……！
jpnSearchText: お前達もせいぜい気をつけておけ……！

engChrName: Crystal. That was my plan all along.
engSearchText: Crystal. That was my plan all along.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、言わずもがなだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、言わずもがなだぜ。

engChrName: Oh, by the way, I wanted to ask. Does...Elaine seem off to you?
engSearchText:
Oh, by the way, I wanted to ask. Does...Elaine seem
off to you?
jpnChrName: ……ところでだが……お前から見て、 エレインさんに変わった様子は無いか？
jpnSearchText:
……ところでだが……お前から見て、
エレインさんに変わった様子は無いか？

engChrName: I heard you two went out drinking the other night.
engSearchText: I heard you two went out drinking the other night.
jpnChrName: 先日、二人で飲んだと聞いたが……
jpnSearchText: 先日、二人で飲んだと聞いたが……

engChrName: Hmm? Whaddaya mean?
engSearchText: Hmm? Whaddaya mean?
jpnChrName: ハン……一体どうした、藪から棒に？
jpnSearchText: ハン……一体どうした、藪から棒に？

engChrName: ...Never mind. If you didn't notice anything, it's probably nothing.
engSearchText:
...Never mind. If you didn't notice anything, it's
probably nothing.
jpnChrName: いや……何も無ければ別にいいんだ。
jpnSearchText: いや……何も無ければ別にいいんだ。

engChrName: Still, I can tell something's on her mind. If you notice anything strange, let me know.
engSearchText:
Still, I can tell something's on her mind. If you notice
anything strange, let me know.
jpnChrName: だが、あの人にとって負担もあるだろうし…… 何か気付いたら俺にも言うんだな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、あの人にとって負担もあるだろうし……
何か気付いたら俺にも言うんだな。

engChrName: Will do.
engSearchText: Will do.
jpnChrName: ああ、せいぜい気に留めておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、せいぜい気に留めておくぜ。

engChrName: Lahad and I will be doing requests and intel gathering with the group that's come from across the Republic.
engSearchText:
Lahad and I will be doing requests and intel
gathering with the group that's come from across
the Republic.
jpnChrName: 俺とラハドさんは、各地から来てくれた連中と 共に地上で依頼対応と情報収集をする。
jpnSearchText:
俺とラハドさんは、各地から来てくれた連中と
共に地上で依頼対応と情報収集をする。

engChrName: Honestly, I'd rather be helping Elaine and Zin on the battlefield.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'd rather be helping Elaine and Zin on
the battlefield.
jpnChrName: ……本当ならエレインさんやジンさんと共に 行きたいところではあるが……
jpnSearchText:
……本当ならエレインさんやジンさんと共に
行きたいところではあるが……

engChrName: But if they need me to hold down the fort here, I'll gladly do so!
engSearchText:
But if they need me to hold down the fort here, I'll
gladly do so!
jpnChrName: 彼女たちが後顧の憂い無く戦うためにも、 役目を果たさせてもらうさ……！
jpnSearchText:
彼女たちが後顧の憂い無く戦うためにも、
役目を果たさせてもらうさ……！

engChrName: Ah, hey. I heard about what happened this morning.
engSearchText: Ah, hey. I heard about what happened this morning.
jpnChrName: おう、お前達か……午前中の件は 聞かせてもらったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おう、お前達か……午前中の件は
聞かせてもらったぜ。

engChrName: You beat Elaine in a one-on-one fight and earned the right to challenge the big bad. Look at you go.
engSearchText:
You beat Elaine in a one-on-one fight and earned the
right to challenge the big bad. Look at you go.
jpnChrName: エレインにタイマンで勝った上に、 しっかり最終決戦まで進むとは大したモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインにタイマンで勝った上に、
しっかり最終決戦まで進むとは大したモンだ。

engChrName: Don't rest on your laurels, though. It's now up to you to stop Almata in their tracks.
engSearchText:
Don't rest on your laurels, though. It's now up to you
to stop Almata in their tracks.
jpnChrName: ま、だからこそあいつに劣らぬ働きを── 絶対にアルマータを止めてもらわねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、だからこそあいつに劣らぬ働きを──
絶対にアルマータを止めてもらわねぇとな。

engChrName: Right. She passed the baton to us, so now we gotta carry it to the end.
engSearchText:
Right. She passed the baton to us, so now we gotta
carry it to the end.
jpnChrName: ああ、あいつが繋いでくれたモンは 無駄にはしねぇさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あいつが繋いでくれたモンは
無駄にはしねぇさ。

engChrName: I'm surprised you accepted that conclusion so easily, though. Figured at least one of you'd be in denial.
engSearchText:
I'm surprised you accepted that conclusion so
easily, though. Figured at least one of you'd be
in denial.
jpnChrName: しかし、お前さんも随分とこの結果を すんなり受け入れてるみてぇだが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、お前さんも随分とこの結果を
すんなり受け入れてるみてぇだが……

engChrName: Well, I am a little frustrated since she's our friend.
engSearchText: Well, I am a little frustrated since she's our friend.
jpnChrName: ま、同じ仲間でありながらあいつを 支えてやれなかったってのはあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、同じ仲間でありながらあいつを
支えてやれなかったってのはあるしな。

engChrName: But I've no reason to doubt that you beat her. I just have to accept you're the better fit for the job.
engSearchText:
But I've no reason to doubt that you beat her. I just
have to accept you're the better fit for the job.
jpnChrName: それに……あいつに打ち勝った実力、 認めねえ訳にはいかねぇだろ？
jpnSearchText:
それに……あいつに打ち勝った実力、
認めねえ訳にはいかねぇだろ？

engChrName: Huh. Well, thanks, I guess. I'll try to live up to your hopes.
engSearchText:
Huh. Well, thanks, I guess. I'll try to live up to
your hopes.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そりゃどーも。 精々期待に応えさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……そりゃどーも。
精々期待に応えさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: You'll need to give it everything you've got out there.
engSearchText: You'll need to give it everything you've got out there.
jpnChrName: ……お前らが最終決戦に挑むってんなら、 一層そっちに集中してもらわなきゃ困る。
jpnSearchText:
……お前らが最終決戦に挑むってんなら、
一層そっちに集中してもらわなきゃ困る。

engChrName: We'll handle everything in the city, so you just get in there and do some damage.
engSearchText:
We'll handle everything in the city, so you just get in
there and do some damage.
jpnChrName: 地上でのゴタゴタは全部引き受けてやるから 気兼ねなく乗り込んでこいよ！
jpnSearchText:
地上でのゴタゴタは全部引き受けてやるから
気兼ねなく乗り込んでこいよ！

engChrName: One of your friends seems like they have something interesting planned. I'm curious to see what it is.
engSearchText:
One of your friends seems like they have something
interesting planned. I'm curious to see what it is.
jpnChrName: お仲間がちょいと面白い事もやってるようだが そっちも気を回しておいてやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お仲間がちょいと面白い事もやってるようだが
そっちも気を回しておいてやるぜ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah, I heard about what was going on with Elaine. Guess she wanted to deal with it all herself...
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, I heard about what was going on
with Elaine. Guess she wanted to deal with it
all herself...
jpnChrName: エレインの件も、連絡を受けてる。 あいつも一人で背負い込みやがって……
jpnSearchText:
エレインの件も、連絡を受けてる。
あいつも一人で背負い込みやがって……

engChrName: I'll go check on her later. Sounds like she's finally managed to put everything behind her.
engSearchText:
I'll go check on her later. Sounds like she's finally
managed to put everything behind her.
jpnChrName: まー後で様子を見に行ってやるか。 ようやく全部吐き出せたみてえだしな。
jpnSearchText:
まー後で様子を見に行ってやるか。
ようやく全部吐き出せたみてえだしな。

engChrName: Oh, sorry. As you can see, I'm a little busy at the moment.
engSearchText:
Oh, sorry. As you can see, I'm a little busy at
the moment.
jpnChrName: よお、すまねえな。 見ての通り取り込み中でよ。
jpnSearchText:
よお、すまねえな。
見ての通り取り込み中でよ。

engChrName: I thought I sensed someone lurking around earlier. Turns out, it was Gray all along.
engSearchText:
I thought I sensed someone lurking around earlier.
Turns out, it was Gray all along.
jpnChrName: 妙な気配を感じるから探ってみたら、 やっぱり付いて来てやがってな。
jpnSearchText:
妙な気配を感じるから探ってみたら、
やっぱり付いて来てやがってな。

engChrName: I didn't realize he was struggling this much...
engSearchText: I didn't realize he was struggling this much...
jpnChrName: ったく……まあコイツが何かを 抱えてるのは薄々気づいちゃいたが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……まあコイツが何かを
抱えてるのは薄々気づいちゃいたが。

engChrName: Well, he's here now, so he might as well make himself useful to us.
engSearchText:
Well, he's here now, so he might as well make
himself useful to us.
jpnChrName: こうなった以上、仕方ねえ。 地上班の一人として働いてもらうしかねえな。
jpnSearchText:
こうなった以上、仕方ねえ。
地上班の一人として働いてもらうしかねえな。

engChrName: I'm sensing something. Could that be...?
engSearchText: I'm sensing something. Could that be...?
jpnChrName: この感覚……まさかとは思うが……
jpnSearchText: この感覚……まさかとは思うが……

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe not.
engSearchText: Hmm... Maybe not.
jpnChrName: いや、大したことじゃないんだがな。
jpnSearchText: いや、大したことじゃないんだがな。

engChrName: I've been sensing someone lurking about while I've been handling requests with the surface team.
engSearchText:
I've been sensing someone lurking about while I've
been handling requests with the surface team.
jpnChrName: 地上任務を片付ける中で 気になる気配を感じるっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
地上任務を片付ける中で
気になる気配を感じるっつーか……

engChrName: Maybe I should look into this more...
engSearchText: Maybe I should look into this more...
jpnChrName: ふむ、ちょいと探りを入れてみるか……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、ちょいと探りを入れてみるか……

engChrName: (I have no clue what he's talking about... Well, whatever it is, it doesn't concern me.)
engSearchText:
(I have no clue what he's talking about...
Well, whatever it is, it doesn't concern me.)
jpnChrName: （よく分からんが……口ぶりからして   ルールに抵触する類ではなさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（よく分からんが……口ぶりからして
ルールに抵触する類ではなさそうだな。）

engChrName: I need to look into this. I feel like I'm going crazy.
engSearchText: I need to look into this. I feel like I'm going crazy.
jpnChrName: まさかとは思うが…… ま、オレの方で探ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
まさかとは思うが……
ま、オレの方で探ってみるか。

engChrName: If my hunch is right, then this could turn into a big mess.
engSearchText:
If my hunch is right, then this could turn into a
big mess.
jpnChrName: この状況だ、後々面倒な事に ならないとも限らねえしな……
jpnSearchText:
この状況だ、後々面倒な事に
ならないとも限らねえしな……

engChrName: I suppose it's possible that he snuck in yesterday...
engSearchText: I suppose it's possible that he snuck in yesterday...
jpnChrName: 勘が当たってりゃ、一応は昨日から 紛れ込んでたって事になるワケだが……
jpnSearchText:
勘が当たってりゃ、一応は昨日から
紛れ込んでたって事になるワケだが……

engChrName: Care to explain yourself, Gray Arnold?
engSearchText: Care to explain yourself, Gray Arnold?
jpnChrName: さーて、話を聞かせてもらおうかね。 グレイ・アーノルド？
jpnSearchText:
さーて、話を聞かせてもらおうかね。
グレイ・アーノルド？

engChrName: You abandoned your post in Edith and snuck into a mission that's way too dangerous for a junior bracer like you.
engSearchText:
You abandoned your post in Edith and snuck into a
mission that's way too dangerous for a junior bracer
like you.
jpnChrName: 首都で留守番してるはずの準遊撃士（見習い）が 何故こっそり付いてきやがったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
首都で留守番してるはずの準遊撃士（見習い）が
何故こっそり付いてきやがったんだ？

engChrName: Though I suppose you're more skilled than the average rookie. You were able to stay hidden for all of yesterday, after all.
engSearchText:
Though I suppose you're more skilled than the
average rookie. You were able to stay hidden for all of
yesterday, after all.
jpnChrName: 昨日一日、俺たちから隠れおおせた事は 褒めてやってもいいがな。
jpnSearchText:
昨日一日、俺たちから隠れおおせた事は
褒めてやってもいいがな。

engChrName: Look, I'm... I'm sorry. I know I shouldn't be here.
engSearchText: Look, I'm... I'm sorry. I know I shouldn't be here.
jpnChrName: ……ッ……すみません、 先輩方への迷惑は百も承知しています。
jpnSearchText:
……ッ……すみません、
先輩方への迷惑は百も承知しています。

engChrName: But I... I...!
engSearchText: But I... I...!
jpnChrName: ですが……僕は……！
jpnSearchText: ですが……僕は……！

engChrName: Oh, give me a break. Did you learn nothing from what happened last week?
engSearchText:
Oh, give me a break. Did you learn nothing from
what happened last week?
jpnChrName: ふう、勘弁してくれよ。 この前の一件で懲りなかったのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ふう、勘弁してくれよ。
この前の一件で懲りなかったのかよ？

engChrName: Huh? Ah, right. You're talking about the stunt he pulled back in Longlai, right?
engSearchText:
Huh? Ah, right. You're talking about the stunt he
pulled back in Longlai, right?
jpnChrName: ハッ、そういや龍來では迷惑を かけたって話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そういや龍來では迷惑を
かけたって話だったか。

engChrName: Yep. He dodged all our questions about what he was doing back then, and he's up to the same old tricks now.
engSearchText:
Yep. He dodged all our questions about what he was
doing back then, and he's up to the same old
tricks now.
jpnChrName: ああ、そん時も要領を得ない事で お茶を濁してたんだけどな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そん時も要領を得ない事で
お茶を濁してたんだけどな……

engChrName: Though getting him reined in was a simple task— thanks to my handyman friend there.
engSearchText:
Though getting him reined in was a simple task—
thanks to my handyman friend there.
jpnChrName: んま、そっちの便利屋さんのお陰で 俺もラクできたけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
んま、そっちの便利屋さんのお陰で
俺もラクできたけどさ。

engChrName: For the record, I didn't take that request just to make life easier for you.
engSearchText:
For the record, I didn't take that request just to make
life easier for you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、別にあんたに楽させるために 請け負ったんじゃねぇけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、別にあんたに楽させるために
請け負ったんじゃねぇけどな。

engChrName: Oh, right. Thanks again for your help back then. I will repay you for—
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Thanks again for your help back then.
I will repay you for—
jpnChrName: その節は……ありがとうございました。 この恩も決して──
jpnSearchText:
その節は……ありがとうございました。
この恩も決して──

engChrName: Hey, don't get us off subject. It's time to tell us what's going on.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't get us off subject. It's time to tell us what's
going on.
jpnChrName: あのなぁ、そうじゃなくてよ…… 良い加減理由くらい話しても良くねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
あのなぁ、そうじゃなくてよ……
良い加減理由くらい話しても良くねぇか？

engChrName: It's funny. When I got to Longlai, I pegged you as an oddball with a good heart.
engSearchText:
It's funny. When I got to Longlai, I pegged you as an
oddball with a good heart.
jpnChrName: まったく、龍來に来てた時から妙に 引っかかる奴だとは思ってたけどよ……
jpnSearchText:
まったく、龍來に来てた時から妙に
引っかかる奴だとは思ってたけどよ……

engChrName: I never thought you'd turn out to be such a rebel. Hate to see it.
engSearchText:
I never thought you'd turn out to be such a rebel.
Hate to see it.
jpnChrName: それがまさかこんな勝手をするとは、 センパイ悲しいったらありゃしないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それがまさかこんな勝手をするとは、
センパイ悲しいったらありゃしないぜ。

engChrName: I've actually gotten some reports about changes in your behavior.
engSearchText:
I've actually gotten some reports about changes in
your behavior.
jpnChrName: ……ま、その辺りの報告も受けててな。 お前が何か事情があるのは判ってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、その辺りの報告も受けててな。
お前が何か事情があるのは判ってんだ。

engChrName: Can you tell us what's going on—or do you not trust us?
engSearchText:
Can you tell us what's going on—or do you not
trust us?
jpnChrName: その末に今回の勝手な行動と来た。 ……そんなに俺達が信用できねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
その末に今回の勝手な行動と来た。
……そんなに俺達が信用できねぇか？

engChrName: N-No, it's not that.
engSearchText: N-No, it's not that.
jpnChrName: ……すみません、先輩方を 信頼していない訳では無いんです。
jpnSearchText:
……すみません、先輩方を
信頼していない訳では無いんです。

engChrName: It's just... When I heard the kind of trouble Almata was causing, I... I knew I had to do something.
engSearchText:
It's just... When I heard the kind of trouble Almata
was causing, I... I knew I had to do something.
jpnChrName: ですが……アルマータがこんな事件を起こしたと 聞いたら、居ても立っても居られないというか……
jpnSearchText:
ですが……アルマータがこんな事件を起こしたと
聞いたら、居ても立っても居られないというか……

engChrName: Oh, yeah? So whatever's eating away at you is related to Almata?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? So whatever's eating away at you is related
to Almata?
jpnChrName: んん？　となると、お前を駆り立てるのは アルマータ絡みの何かだってのか？
jpnSearchText:
んん？　となると、お前を駆り立てるのは
アルマータ絡みの何かだってのか？

engChrName: When the time comes—when it's all finally over—I'll tell you everything.
engSearchText:
When the time comes—when it's all finally over—I'll
tell you everything.
jpnChrName: ──時が来たら……全てが終わったら 話せる限りを話します。
jpnSearchText:
──時が来たら……全てが終わったら
話せる限りを話します。

engChrName: After that, I'll accept whatever punishment comes my way.
engSearchText:
After that, I'll accept whatever punishment comes
my way.
jpnChrName: その時は──必要とあらば如何なる 処罰も受け入れるつもりです……
jpnSearchText:
その時は──必要とあらば如何なる
処罰も受け入れるつもりです……

engChrName: Ugh. You are one stubborn kid, you know that?
engSearchText: Ugh. You are one stubborn kid, you know that?
jpnChrName: …………ったく………… お前も頑固だよな、大概によ。
jpnSearchText:
…………ったく…………
お前も頑固だよな、大概によ。

engChrName: Fine, if this is THAT important to you, we'll lay off.
engSearchText: Fine, if this is THAT important to you, we'll lay off.
jpnChrName: まあそこまで言うなら 付き合ってやろうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
まあそこまで言うなら
付き合ってやろうじゃねえか。

engChrName: I'll be perfectly clear with you, though. Right now, you're still just a greenhorn, and you're also restricted by the rules of the game.
engSearchText:
I'll be perfectly clear with you, though. Right now,
you're still just a greenhorn, and you're also restricted
by the rules of the game.
jpnChrName: だがその前に──この状況でお前は準遊撃士だ。 “ゲーム”のルールに縛られてる身でもある。
jpnSearchText:
だがその前に──この状況でお前は準遊撃士だ。
“ゲーム”のルールに縛られてる身でもある。

engChrName: You'll be with the surface team until we get out of this hellish situation. Are we clear?
engSearchText:
You'll be with the surface team until we get out of
this hellish situation. Are we clear?
jpnChrName: この死地を乗り切るまで 地上班の一人として働いてもらうぞ？
jpnSearchText:
この死地を乗り切るまで
地上班の一人として働いてもらうぞ？

engChrName: Yes, sir! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Yes, sir! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: ……はい、望むところです！！
jpnSearchText: ……はい、望むところです！！

engChrName: (This kid's obviously got some beef with Almata.)
engSearchText: (This kid's obviously got some beef with Almata.)
jpnChrName: （コイツの事情か……アルマータと   因縁があるのは確かのようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（コイツの事情か……アルマータと
因縁があるのは確かのようだが……）

engChrName: (Now that I think about it, Drusilla back in Longlai seemed to have realized something was up with him.)
engSearchText:
(Now that I think about it, Drusilla back in Longlai
seemed to have realized something was up with him.)
jpnChrName: （そういや……龍來じゃドルシラ婆さんが   何か勘付いていたようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや……龍來じゃドルシラ婆さんが
何か勘付いていたようだが……）

engChrName: (Well, I can't worry about this right now.)
engSearchText: (Well, I can't worry about this right now.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……今は目の前の事が先決だが、   一応気に留めておくとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ……今は目の前の事が先決だが、
一応気に留めておくとするか。）

engChrName: Phew. The surface team's managed to keep a tight grip on information so far.
engSearchText:
Phew. The surface team's managed to keep a tight
grip on information so far.
jpnChrName: ふう、地上でのトラブルや事件、 情報収集なんかは一段落してきたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、地上でのトラブルや事件、
情報収集なんかは一段落してきたよ。

engChrName: Though we've run into some trouble now that all of the other players have been eliminated.
engSearchText:
Though we've run into some trouble now that all of
the other players have been eliminated.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋以外の勢力は脱落して 問題を起してる連中もいたけど……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋以外の勢力は脱落して
問題を起してる連中もいたけど……

engChrName: But we'll deal with them all. You just leave it to us!
engSearchText: But we'll deal with them all. You just leave it to us!
jpnChrName: 大体はギルドとして対処できたね。 ふふん、こっちは任せておくがいいよ！
jpnSearchText:
大体はギルドとして対処できたね。
ふふん、こっちは任せておくがいいよ！

engChrName: Why in the world would that Gray kid sneak into this op?
engSearchText:
Why in the world would that Gray kid sneak into
this op?
jpnChrName: グレイって新米、まさかこの状況で こっそりついて来ただなんて……
jpnSearchText:
グレイって新米、まさかこの状況で
こっそりついて来ただなんて……

engChrName: He's even more defiant than Aaron, and that's a high bar!
engSearchText:
He's even more defiant than Aaron, and that's a
high bar!
jpnChrName: アーロン以上の跳ね返りね！
jpnSearchText: アーロン以上の跳ね返りね！

engChrName: True, but you set the bar even higher than me.
engSearchText: True, but you set the bar even higher than me.
jpnChrName: お前に言われたくねーけどな。
jpnSearchText: お前に言われたくねーけどな。

engChrName: I mean, you're an amazing martial artist, but you're stuck at C-rank because you can't stick to the mission.
engSearchText:
I mean, you're an amazing martial artist, but you're
stuck at C-rank because you can't stick to
the mission.
jpnChrName: 武術の腕は相当あんのに 突っ走りがちなＣ級はどこのどいつだよ？
jpnSearchText:
武術の腕は相当あんのに
突っ走りがちなＣ級はどこのどいつだよ？

engChrName: H-How do you...? Grr... You've become even more of a smug little brat since the dojo days.
engSearchText:
H-How do you...? Grr... You've become even more of
a smug little brat since the dojo days.
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……道場（ウチ）に通ってた頃から思ってたけど やっぱりお前、可愛くないね。
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬ……道場（ウチ）に通ってた頃から思ってたけど
やっぱりお前、可愛くないね。

engChrName: Whatever. The final round is up next, right? Best of luck to you and the other bracers!
engSearchText:
Whatever. The final round is up next, right? Best of
luck to you and the other bracers!
jpnChrName: まあいいよ、次はいよいよ“下層”攻略── ジンさんたちと協力しつつ精々頑張る事ね！
jpnSearchText:
まあいいよ、次はいよいよ“下層”攻略──
ジンさんたちと協力しつつ精々頑張る事ね！

engChrName: Whatever. The guild's out of the game, so we'll continue doing what we can from the surface!
engSearchText:
Whatever. The guild's out of the game, so we'll
continue doing what we can from the surface!
jpnChrName: まあいいよ、ギルドも脱落してしまったし…… 明日からは動き方を変えて対処に回るね！
jpnSearchText:
まあいいよ、ギルドも脱落してしまったし……
明日からは動き方を変えて対処に回るね！

engChrName: Ewan lost his life because of this whole thing, so we can't back down now.
engSearchText:
Ewan lost his life because of this whole thing, so we
can't back down now.
jpnChrName: ユアンが命を落としてる以上、 アタシたちも後には引けないよ。
jpnSearchText:
ユアンが命を落としてる以上、
アタシたちも後には引けないよ。

engChrName: Still, we'll all need a good night's rest, so we're gonna hit the sack before long.
engSearchText:
Still, we'll all need a good night's rest, so we're gonna
hit the sack before long.
jpnChrName: とはいえ休息は必要── 明日に備えてぐっすり休むね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ休息は必要──
明日に備えてぐっすり休むね。

engChrName: There's a lot we have to worry about—Elaine and Gray included—but we just gotta put those issues to the side and get some shuteye!
engSearchText:
There's a lot we have to worry about—Elaine and
Gray included—but we just gotta put those issues to
the side and get some shuteye!
jpnChrName: エレインさんや、あのグレイって新米は 気になるけど……やるべき事をやるだけよ！
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんや、あのグレイって新米は
気になるけど……やるべき事をやるだけよ！

engChrName: Hey there, spriggan. It's been a while, hasn't it? I've been hearing all about your exploits since Langport.
engSearchText:
Hey there, spriggan. It's been a while, hasn't it?
I've been hearing all about your exploits
since Langport.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……久しぶりね。 煌都の後の事も、聞かせてもらったね。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……久しぶりね。
煌都の後の事も、聞かせてもらったね。

engChrName: Wassup, girl.
engSearchText: Wassup, girl.
jpnChrName: ハッ、まさかお前とここで 出くわすとは思わなかったけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、まさかお前とここで
出くわすとは思わなかったけどな。

engChrName: Don't 'wassup, girl' me, Aaron!
engSearchText: Don't 'wassup, girl' me, Aaron!
jpnChrName: それはこっちの台詞ねアーロン！
jpnSearchText: それはこっちの台詞ねアーロン！

engChrName: Aaanyway, we were all called here to deal with Almata, so I figured I'd bump into you all at some point.
engSearchText:
Aaanyway, we were all called here to deal with
Almata, so I figured I'd bump into you all at
some point.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ……アルマータに備えるために 呼ばれたと思えば、こんな事になるとはね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ……アルマータに備えるために
呼ばれたと思えば、こんな事になるとはね。

engChrName: Everyone here's in this together. We've got your back.
engSearchText: Everyone here's in this together. We've got your back.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、今は他の皆と一蓮托生よ。 バックアップ、任せるが良いね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、今は他の皆と一蓮托生よ。
バックアップ、任せるが良いね。

engChrName: And we've got yours. Elaine and Zin may be the ones on the front lines, but you ain't out of the danger. Careful out there.
engSearchText:
And we've got yours. Elaine and Zin may be the ones
on the front lines, but you ain't out of the danger.
Careful out there.
jpnChrName: ああ……エレインやジンも危険だろうが、 お前達も気をつけてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……エレインやジンも危険だろうが、
お前達も気をつけてな。

engChrName: I heard Heiyue's going to be a part of the game, too.
engSearchText: I heard Heiyue's going to be a part of the game, too.
jpnChrName: しかし……黒月もこの“ゲーム”に 参加しているとはね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……黒月もこの“ゲーム”に
参加しているとはね。

engChrName: I wonder what they could be scheming...
engSearchText: I wonder what they could be scheming...
jpnChrName: 連中には思う所あるけど、敵は同じアルマータ…… 潰し合ってる場合じゃないのに……
jpnSearchText:
連中には思う所あるけど、敵は同じアルマータ……
潰し合ってる場合じゃないのに……

engChrName: Well, that doesn't matter now. Fact is, we've got a common enemy now, and that's Almata.
engSearchText:
Well, that doesn't matter now. Fact is, we've got a
common enemy now, and that's Almata.
jpnChrName: ……でも、あたしは遊撃士としてやる事をやるだけ。 黒月がどう動こうと今は関係無いね。
jpnSearchText:
……でも、あたしは遊撃士としてやる事をやるだけ。
黒月がどう動こうと今は関係無いね。

engChrName: Is Ikaruga really that strong?
engSearchText: Is Ikaruga really that strong?
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりその《斑鳩》って猟兵団、 そこまで手強いね？
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりその《斑鳩》って猟兵団、
そこまで手強いね？

engChrName: They are. I heard some nasty things about them back in the East.
engSearchText:
They are. I heard some nasty things about them back
in the East.
jpnChrName: ああ、東にいた時からヤバい話は いくつも聞いている……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、東にいた時からヤバい話は
いくつも聞いている……

engChrName: As it happens, a few people from my village ended up becoming jaegers like them.
engSearchText:
As it happens, a few people from my village ended up
becoming jaegers like them.
jpnChrName: 俺の里からも、猟兵になった奴は いくらかいたが……
jpnSearchText:
俺の里からも、猟兵になった奴は
いくらかいたが……

engChrName: If even half the stories they've told me are true, then I can believe they're the strongest corps.
engSearchText:
If even half the stories they've told me are true, then I
can believe they're the strongest corps.
jpnChrName: そいつら伝手で聞く限りでも、連中が 最強ってのは大袈裟でも何でもねぇよ……
jpnSearchText:
そいつら伝手で聞く限りでも、連中が
最強ってのは大袈裟でも何でもねぇよ……

engChrName: Wow. It's rare to see you give such a serious assessment.
engSearchText:
Wow. It's rare to see you give such a
serious assessment.
jpnChrName: ……お調子者のアンタに そこまで言わせるとはね……
jpnSearchText:
……お調子者のアンタに
そこまで言わせるとはね……

engChrName: Now you've got me worried. I hope they don't end up crossing paths with Zin's team!
engSearchText:
Now you've got me worried. I hope they don't end up
crossing paths with Zin's team!
jpnChrName: ジンさん達がかち合う事にならないか 本当に心配ね……！
jpnSearchText:
ジンさん達がかち合う事にならないか
本当に心配ね……！

engChrName: Fingers crossed. I'm still surprised they even bothered coming out here to the West.
engSearchText:
Fingers crossed. I'm still surprised they even bothered
coming out here to the West.
jpnChrName: ああ、全くだぜ。 まさか西方に来てまで連中と出くわすとは……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、全くだぜ。
まさか西方に来てまで連中と出くわすとは……

engChrName: Wait a minute. Is it possible that thing I sensed in Longlai was... No, I shouldn't be thinking about this.
engSearchText:
Wait a minute. Is it possible that thing I sensed in
Longlai was... No, I shouldn't be thinking about this.
jpnChrName: 思えば龍來で感じたあの気配も…… いや、一旦考えないでおいた方が良いか……
jpnSearchText:
思えば龍來で感じたあの気配も……
いや、一旦考えないでおいた方が良いか……

engChrName: This rookie acts like a polite little boy one second, then he goes absolutely feral the next. This is a literal nightmare.
engSearchText:
This rookie acts like a polite little boy one second,
then he goes absolutely feral the next. This is a
literal nightmare.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、このルーキー君は優等生に見えて とんだ破天荒っぷりだ、参っちまうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、このルーキー君は優等生に見えて
とんだ破天荒っぷりだ、参っちまうぜ。

engChrName: Well, we're stuck with him now. No way around that.
engSearchText: Well, we're stuck with him now. No way around that.
jpnChrName: ま、ともかく来ちまった以上、 せいぜいこき使ってやるとすっかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ともかく来ちまった以上、
せいぜいこき使ってやるとすっかねぇ。

engChrName: At least he's capable, which means he can handle a second round of work, work, work.
engSearchText:
At least he's capable, which means he can handle a
second round of work, work, work.
jpnChrName: 俺も一応、こいつの実力は把握済み。 ここはシゴキの第二ラウンドと行きますか。
jpnSearchText:
俺も一応、こいつの実力は把握済み。
ここはシゴキの第二ラウンドと行きますか。

engChrName: Hey, what's up? I wasn't expecting to run into you again so soon—and definitely not under these circumstances.
engSearchText:
Hey, what's up? I wasn't expecting to run into you
again so soon—and definitely not under
these circumstances.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、まさかこんな形で、こんなに早く あんたらと再会する事になるなんてな……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、まさかこんな形で、こんなに早く
あんたらと再会する事になるなんてな……

engChrName: Thanks again for your help back in Longlai.
engSearchText: Thanks again for your help back in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ま、あのルーキーの一件じゃ世話になったぜ。 今回はどうなるかわからねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、あのルーキーの一件じゃ世話になったぜ。
今回はどうなるかわからねぇが……

engChrName: No prob. Also, yeah, didn't think I'd bump into you here. This kinda high-stakes gig ain't normally your thing, is it?
engSearchText:
No prob. Also, yeah, didn't think I'd bump into
you here. This kinda high-stakes gig ain't normally
your thing, is it?
jpnChrName: ああ……それにしても、まさかお前まで 呼ばれてるとはな、だいぶ似つかわしくないが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……それにしても、まさかお前まで
呼ばれてるとはな、だいぶ似つかわしくないが。

engChrName: Nope, but duty calls. Drusilla heard they needed capable bracers and recommended me.
engSearchText:
Nope, but duty calls. Drusilla heard they needed
capable bracers and recommended me.
jpnChrName: デスゲームってのは予想外だったが、腕利きを 集めてるって事でドルシラさんが推薦してさ。
jpnSearchText:
デスゲームってのは予想外だったが、腕利きを
集めてるって事でドルシラさんが推薦してさ。

engChrName: Well, as long as I'm on the surface, we're cool. Though I haven't taken on requests in a big city like this before...
engSearchText:
Well, as long as I'm on the surface, we're cool.
Though I haven't taken on requests in a big city like
this before...
jpnChrName: ま、俺はせいぜい地上班として、 初の大都会ミッションに挑むとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺はせいぜい地上班として、
初の大都会ミッションに挑むとするよ。

engChrName: ...but I'm not gonna question the guys at HQ. Just gotta trust in them and do the best job I can.
engSearchText:
...but I'm not gonna question the guys at HQ.
Just gotta trust in them and do the best job I can.
jpnChrName: 総支部の人らならやってくれる、俺はそれを信じて バックアップに徹する他無いだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
総支部の人らならやってくれる、俺はそれを信じて
バックアップに徹する他無いだろうさ。

engChrName: Well said. And if you want my opinion, I'd say you're more than qualified to handle the biggest of big cities.
engSearchText:
Well said. And if you want my opinion, I'd say you're
more than qualified to handle the biggest of big cities.
jpnChrName: そうか……ま、お前の能力も都市部でも 活かす術はいくらでもあるだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……ま、お前の能力も都市部でも
活かす術はいくらでもあるだろうしな。

engChrName: With skills like yours, you've got nothin' to worry about.
engSearchText:
With skills like yours, you've got nothin' to
worry about.
jpnChrName: いざという時には頼りにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: いざという時には頼りにしてるぜ。

engChrName: (Hmm? Oh, this is the guy from Longlai. So he's Eastern...)
engSearchText:
(Hmm? Oh, this is the guy from Longlai. So
he's Eastern...)
jpnChrName: （……？　龍來にいた奴か……   東方系のようではあるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……？　龍來にいた奴か……
東方系のようではあるが……）

engChrName: (I think I've heard about this guy... He might be from one of the northeast tribes.)
engSearchText:
(I think I've heard about this guy... He might be from
one of the northeast tribes.)
jpnChrName: （もしかして……噂に聞く北東の……）
jpnSearchText: （もしかして……噂に聞く北東の……）

engChrName: Oh, you're...Kazan, right? From the Longlai branch?
engSearchText: Oh, you're...Kazan, right? From the Longlai branch?
jpnChrName: お前は確か……龍來支部のカザンだったか。 お前まで来ているとはな。
jpnSearchText:
お前は確か……龍來支部のカザンだったか。
お前まで来ているとはな。

engChrName: In the flesh. You're probably wondering why I'm here.
engSearchText:
In the flesh. You're probably wondering why
I'm here.
jpnChrName: ああ、こんな事になるなんて俺も驚きだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こんな事になるなんて俺も驚きだ。

engChrName: After what happened to Creil, HQ wanted to put together a team of skilled bracers.
engSearchText:
After what happened to Creil, HQ wanted to put
together a team of skilled bracers.
jpnChrName: クレイユってところでの事件を受けて、各支部の 腕の立つヤツを集めているって聞いてさ。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユってところでの事件を受けて、各支部の
腕の立つヤツを集めているって聞いてさ。

engChrName: Drusilla recommended me, and well, I figured it'd be a chance to make a name for myself, but I didn't know what I signed up for...
engSearchText:
Drusilla recommended me, and well, I figured it'd be
a chance to make a name for myself, but I didn't
know what I signed up for...
jpnChrName: ドルシラさんも推薦してくれたし、 名を上げるチャンスかと思ってみりゃ……
jpnSearchText:
ドルシラさんも推薦してくれたし、
名を上げるチャンスかと思ってみりゃ……

engChrName: I understand how you feel. It's certainly been a crazy turn of events.
engSearchText:
I understand how you feel. It's certainly been a crazy
turn of events.
jpnChrName: こんな事になるなんて…… 予想できませんものね……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になるなんて……
予想できませんものね……

engChrName: Well, nothing I can do about it now. Just gotta tough it out.
engSearchText:
Well, nothing I can do about it now. Just gotta tough
it out.
jpnChrName: ま、とはいえこうなっちまった以上は どうしようもねぇんだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、とはいえこうなっちまった以上は
どうしようもねぇんだろうしな。

engChrName: I need to stay positive, do my job, and trust that the guys at HQ made the right call sending me here.
engSearchText:
I need to stay positive, do my job, and trust that the
guys at HQ made the right call sending me here.
jpnChrName: 総支部の人らが解決してくれるのを信じて、 せいぜい前向きに働かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
総支部の人らが解決してくれるのを信じて、
せいぜい前向きに働かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I've always wanted to work in the city, anyway. I'll just try to do my best.
engSearchText:
I've always wanted to work in the city, anyway.
I'll just try to do my best.
jpnChrName: 一応、憧れてた都会での仕事でもある…… そうでも思わなきゃやってられねぇってな
jpnSearchText:
一応、憧れてた都会での仕事でもある……
そうでも思わなきゃやってられねぇってな

engChrName: I'm sure you'll do great. If Drusilla's singin' your praises, you're probably pretty damn good.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you'll do great. If Drusilla's singin' your
praises, you're probably pretty damn good.
jpnChrName: そうか……まあ、あのドルシラさんが 推薦したってんなら実力も確かだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……まあ、あのドルシラさんが
推薦したってんなら実力も確かだろうしな。

engChrName: Knock 'em dead out there.
engSearchText: Knock 'em dead out there.
jpnChrName: せいぜい頼りにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: せいぜい頼りにしてるぜ。

engChrName: I didn't have to deal with Almata back in Longlai, so I never knew they had so many screws loose.
engSearchText:
I didn't have to deal with Almata back in Longlai, so
I never knew they had so many screws loose.
jpnChrName: それにしても、アルマータ……龍來にいる限りだと 直接関わる事件も無かったが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、アルマータ……龍來にいる限りだと
直接関わる事件も無かったが……

engChrName: Who'd be crazy enough to bring jaegers and bracers together and say, 'Okay, now fight to the death!' It's pure insanity!
engSearchText:
Who'd be crazy enough to bring jaegers and bracers
together and say, 'Okay, now fight to the death!'
It's pure insanity!
jpnChrName: まさかこんな事をおっぱじめるために俺達や猟兵団を 集めるなんざ、とことん頭のネジが迷子みてぇだ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな事をおっぱじめるために俺達や猟兵団を
集めるなんざ、とことん頭のネジが迷子みてぇだ。

engChrName: If I knew things would turn out like this, I would've turned down the recommendation without a second thought.
engSearchText:
If I knew things would turn out like this, I would've
turned down the recommendation without a
second thought.
jpnChrName: こんな事になるなら推薦なんて突っぱねてりゃ…… と言いたいところだが……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になるなら推薦なんて突っぱねてりゃ……
と言いたいところだが……

engChrName: Well, now that I'm in this mess, I just have to trudge through it.
engSearchText:
Well, now that I'm in this mess, I just have to trudge
through it.
jpnChrName: 当事者になっちまった以上は遊撃士として やる事はやるさ、総支部の人らを信じてな。
jpnSearchText:
当事者になっちまった以上は遊撃士として
やる事はやるさ、総支部の人らを信じてな。

engChrName: I know I broke the code—and I understand that I'm just a junior bracer...
engSearchText:
I know I broke the code—and I understand that I'm
just a junior bracer...
jpnChrName: ……皆さんにご迷惑をおかけしている事は 重々承知しています……
jpnSearchText:
……皆さんにご迷惑をおかけしている事は
重々承知しています……

engChrName: But after everything Almata did...and with them sowing fear across the Republic...
engSearchText:
But after everything Almata did...and with them
sowing fear across the Republic...
jpnChrName: ですが……アルマータがあんな事件を起こして 共和国を恐怖に染め上げている中で……
jpnSearchText:
ですが……アルマータがあんな事件を起こして
共和国を恐怖に染め上げている中で……

engChrName: I... I HAD to do something! I couldn't just stay behind!
engSearchText:
I... I HAD to do something! I couldn't just
stay behind!
jpnChrName: 僕だけ……僕だけが居残りなど…… 居ても立っても居られません……！！
jpnSearchText:
僕だけ……僕だけが居残りなど……
居ても立っても居られません……！！

engChrName: Everyone! Over here! I'm the guide, so follow my lead!
engSearchText:
Everyone! Over here! I'm the guide, so follow
my lead!
jpnChrName: みなさーん！　こちら、こちらですよー！ お姉さんが皆さんを案内しますっ！
jpnSearchText:
みなさーん！　こちら、こちらですよー！
お姉さんが皆さんを案内しますっ！

engChrName: I know we've all been down in the dumps lately, but let's try to forget all that and have fun today!
engSearchText:
I know we've all been down in the dumps lately, but
let's try to forget all that and have fun today!
jpnChrName: さあ、暗いニュースで落ち込んでるかもしれない ですが、今日は精一杯楽しみましょう！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、暗いニュースで落ち込んでるかもしれない
ですが、今日は精一杯楽しみましょう！

engChrName: (Huh? Where's she draggin' those kids off to?)
engSearchText: (Huh? Where's she draggin' those kids off to?)
jpnChrName: （……？　子供たちをどこかに連れて行くのか？）
jpnSearchText: （……？　子供たちをどこかに連れて行くのか？）

engChrName: (Wait, I don't got time to poke my nose into this. I'll just trust that she knows what she's doing.)
engSearchText:
(Wait, I don't got time to poke my nose into this.
I'll just trust that she knows what she's doing.)
jpnChrName: （……いや、今は首を突っ込むのはナシだ、   あいつを信じて任せておこう。）
jpnSearchText:
（……いや、今は首を突っ込むのはナシだ、
あいつを信じて任せておこう。）

engChrName: (Only thing I gotta worry about is the fight that's ahead of us.)
engSearchText:
(Only thing I gotta worry about is the fight that's
ahead of us.)
jpnChrName: （これから控えてるのは連中との最後の戦いだ、   余計な事を気にする暇はねぇ……）
jpnSearchText:
（これから控えてるのは連中との最後の戦いだ、
余計な事を気にする暇はねぇ……）

engChrName: Okay, everyone, we're going to head out soon!
engSearchText: Okay, everyone, we're going to head out soon!
jpnChrName: 皆さーん、もう少ししたら出発ですっ！
jpnSearchText: 皆さーん、もう少ししたら出発ですっ！

engChrName: Follow my lead!
engSearchText: Follow my lead!
jpnChrName: でも、慌てないでください！ お姉さんについて来れば大丈夫！
jpnSearchText:
でも、慌てないでください！
お姉さんについて来れば大丈夫！

engChrName: I'm not allowed to report on anything going on...
engSearchText: I'm not allowed to report on anything going on...
jpnChrName: ……今この街で起こっている事…… 決して伝えることは出来ないけれど……
jpnSearchText:
……今この街で起こっている事……
決して伝えることは出来ないけれど……

engChrName: ...but I know that wouldn't stop Dingo from trying to help! There has to be something I can do!
engSearchText:
...but I know that wouldn't stop Dingo from trying
to help! There has to be something I can do!
jpnChrName: それでも、ディンゴさんの代わりに…… 記者としてできることはあるはずです！
jpnSearchText:
それでも、ディンゴさんの代わりに……
記者としてできることはあるはずです！

engChrName: Yeah, your investigative nose may actually come in handy here.
engSearchText:
Yeah, your investigative nose may actually come in
handy here.
jpnChrName: ああ……今回はお前さんの働きも それなりにアテにさせてもらうかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……今回はお前さんの働きも
それなりにアテにさせてもらうかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: This city might be hiding a thread that'd unravel this whole mess, and a competent journalist like you could sniff it out.
engSearchText:
This city might be hiding a thread that'd unravel this
whole mess, and a competent journalist like you could
sniff it out.
jpnChrName: 今の街の表の姿からも……何か事態を 打破する糸口も見つかるかもしれねぇしな……
jpnSearchText:
今の街の表の姿からも……何か事態を
打破する糸口も見つかるかもしれねぇしな……

engChrName: W-Wait, are you actually complimenting me? Who are you, and what have you done with Van Arkride?
engSearchText:
W-Wait, are you actually complimenting me?
Who are you, and what have you done with
Van Arkride?
jpnChrName: あ、あなたがまさかそんな素直に わたしにアテにするなんて言うとは……
jpnSearchText:
あ、あなたがまさかそんな素直に
わたしにアテにするなんて言うとは……

engChrName: Hey, c'mon. I can dish out some praise from time to time.
engSearchText:
Hey, c'mon. I can dish out some praise from time
to time.
jpnChrName: あのな……俺もディンゴとはそれなりに 長い付き合いだったが……
jpnSearchText:
あのな……俺もディンゴとはそれなりに
長い付き合いだったが……

engChrName: Really, though, despite how Dingo acted, he had a ton of respect for you.
engSearchText:
Really, though, despite how Dingo acted, he had a
ton of respect for you.
jpnChrName: あれでもあいつは、 お前の事を認めていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あれでもあいつは、
お前の事を認めていたんだ。

engChrName: And I put a lot of stock in his opinions.
engSearchText: And I put a lot of stock in his opinions.
jpnChrName: だったら今こそ、お前の事を アテにしても良いだろうよ……
jpnSearchText:
だったら今こそ、お前の事を
アテにしても良いだろうよ……

engChrName: You say that, but Dingo would always try to slip away whenever I was in the vicinity.
engSearchText:
You say that, but Dingo would always try to slip away
whenever I was in the vicinity.
jpnChrName: ……ディンゴさん、 認めてくれてたのにいつも逃げて……
jpnSearchText:
……ディンゴさん、
認めてくれてたのにいつも逃げて……

engChrName: I know you're right, though. He was rude sometimes, but...I respected him, too.
engSearchText:
I know you're right, though. He was rude sometimes,
but...I respected him, too.
jpnChrName: 今思っても、意地悪です……
jpnSearchText: 今思っても、意地悪です……

engChrName: To the bitter end, he fought to deliver the truth. He was a hero.
engSearchText:
To the bitter end, he fought to deliver the truth.
He was a hero.
jpnChrName: でも……そんなディンゴさんも、 記者として最後まで戦ったんですよね……！
jpnSearchText:
でも……そんなディンゴさんも、
記者として最後まで戦ったんですよね……！

engChrName: Yeah, he was. And now it's time for you to pick up the torch.
engSearchText:
Yeah, he was. And now it's time for you to pick up
the torch.
jpnChrName: ああ、だからお前もお前なりに 戦えばいい、それを頼りにしてやる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だからお前もお前なりに
戦えばいい、それを頼りにしてやる。

engChrName: But keep in mind, that doesn't mean you gotta do things exactly like him. He'd want you to make the most of your strengths.
engSearchText:
But keep in mind, that doesn't mean you gotta do
things exactly like him. He'd want you to make the
most of your strengths.
jpnChrName: 何もディンゴと全く同じじゃなくて良い、 得意なように、正しいと思ったようにやれ。
jpnSearchText:
何もディンゴと全く同じじゃなくて良い、
得意なように、正しいと思ったようにやれ。

engChrName: Not like you need me to tell you that, though.
engSearchText: Not like you need me to tell you that, though.
jpnChrName: お前が自分の強みを活かす事。 あいつだってそれを望むだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
お前が自分の強みを活かす事。
あいつだってそれを望むだろうさ。

engChrName: Right. I know he'd want me to follow my own path.
engSearchText: Right. I know he'd want me to follow my own path.
jpnChrName: はい……わたし、がんばります！
jpnSearchText: はい……わたし、がんばります！

engChrName: The truth can run, but it can't hide. If there's a lead that'll help us move forward, then I'll find it!
engSearchText:
The truth can run, but it can't hide. If there's a lead
that'll help us move forward, then I'll find it!
jpnChrName: どんな小さなことでも、記者としてできる事を、 情報の力でできる事を……！
jpnSearchText:
どんな小さなことでも、記者としてできる事を、
情報の力でできる事を……！

engChrName: I think I'll start by asking what the citizens think about the situation.
engSearchText:
I think I'll start by asking what the citizens think
about the situation.
jpnChrName: ……とりあえず、この街の人が今の情勢に どういう認識を持っているのかとか……
jpnSearchText:
……とりあえず、この街の人が今の情勢に
どういう認識を持っているのかとか……

engChrName: Then I'll look into what the police are up to.
engSearchText: Then I'll look into what the police are up to.
jpnChrName: 警察がどういう動き方をしているのかを 調べてみたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
警察がどういう動き方をしているのかを
調べてみたいと思います。

engChrName: A good reporter never underestimates the value of mundane conversations. Leads often crop up where you least expect them to.
engSearchText:
A good reporter never underestimates the value of
mundane conversations. Leads often crop up where
you least expect them to.
jpnChrName: もしかしたら、そういう何気ない情報の中に、 人々を救う糸口もあるかもしれないですし……！
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたら、そういう何気ない情報の中に、
人々を救う糸口もあるかもしれないですし……！

engChrName: Shouldn't you be preparing for the final battle? Don't tell me you're procrastinating.
engSearchText:
Shouldn't you be preparing for the final battle?
Don't tell me you're procrastinating.
jpnChrName: あら、お兄さん。 もうすぐ決戦なら忙しいんじゃなくて？
jpnSearchText:
あら、お兄さん。
もうすぐ決戦なら忙しいんじゃなくて？

engChrName: We're workin' on it. What're you up to? Still investigating?
engSearchText:
We're workin' on it. What're you up to?
Still investigating?
jpnChrName: ああ、準備を万全に整え次第、待機する つもりだが……お前さんは相変わらず調査を？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、準備を万全に整え次第、待機する
つもりだが……お前さんは相変わらず調査を？

engChrName: As it so happens, yes. Up until yesterday, I was getting a grasp on the situation in the city and looking into the forces present here.
engSearchText:
As it so happens, yes. Up until yesterday, I was
getting a grasp on the situation in the city and
looking into the forces present here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、昨日までは確かに諸々の調査というか 調べ事で忙しかったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、昨日までは確かに諸々の調査というか
調べ事で忙しかったわね。

engChrName: I've also been doing a number of favors on the down low.
engSearchText:
I've also been doing a number of favors on the
down low.
jpnChrName: オラシオンと各勢力の状況把握もそうだし、 あとは色々と“裏”取りを頼まれてたり……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンと各勢力の状況把握もそうだし、
あとは色々と“裏”取りを頼まれてたり……

engChrName: Today, though, I'm doing a little transmitting.
engSearchText: Today, though, I'm doing a little transmitting.
jpnChrName: でも今日のは少し違うわね、 どちらかと言えば、発信する方。
jpnSearchText:
でも今日のは少し違うわね、
どちらかと言えば、発信する方。

engChrName: The heck you mean by that? Oh, you must be doin' information manipulation. Or hacking, maybe.
engSearchText:
The heck you mean by that? Oh, you must be doin'
information manipulation. Or hacking, maybe.
jpnChrName: 発信する方……？　情報操作か ハッキングでもしてんのか？
jpnSearchText:
発信する方……？　情報操作か
ハッキングでもしてんのか？

engChrName: That's quite the accusation you've laid at my feet. I'm doing nothing of the sort—this time.
engSearchText:
That's quite the accusation you've laid at my feet.
I'm doing nothing of the sort—this time.
jpnChrName: 随分とイメージ悪いわね。 今回はそういう系統じゃないから。
jpnSearchText:
随分とイメージ悪いわね。
今回はそういう系統じゃないから。

engChrName: Well, it's no skin off my back either way.
engSearchText: Well, it's no skin off my back either way.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんに限って 滅多な事はしないと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんに限って
滅多な事はしないと思うが……

engChrName: Oh, and if you hear anything about Elaine, gimme a ring, all right?
engSearchText:
Oh, and if you hear anything about Elaine, gimme a
ring, all right?
jpnChrName: 一応、エレインの件もあるし……あいつに 絡みそうな情報もあればついでに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、エレインの件もあるし……あいつに
絡みそうな情報もあればついでに頼むぜ。

engChrName: Of course.
engSearchText: Of course.
jpnChrName: ええ、それはもちろん。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それはもちろん。

engChrName: Keep in mind, though, that the value of any information you receive will vary depending on how you choose to act on it.
engSearchText:
Keep in mind, though, that the value of any
information you receive will vary depending on how
you choose to act on it.
jpnChrName: ただ……私が情報を集めたとしても、それを受けて 動く人次第で情報の意味はどうにも変わるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ……私が情報を集めたとしても、それを受けて
動く人次第で情報の意味はどうにも変わるわ。

engChrName: Always remember that.
engSearchText: Always remember that.
jpnChrName: その事を……今は改めて意識した方が良い 頃合いかも知れないわね。
jpnSearchText:
その事を……今は改めて意識した方が良い
頃合いかも知れないわね。

engChrName: Damn. That was, like, philosophical and shit.
engSearchText: Damn. That was, like, philosophical and shit.
jpnChrName: ハッ、相も変わらず意味深に……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、相も変わらず意味深に……

engChrName: Shouldn't Agnès be ready soon?
engSearchText: Shouldn't Agnès be ready soon?
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、アニエス達もそろそろ 準備は良いのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、アニエス達もそろそろ
準備は良いのかしら？

engChrName: I need a pick-me-up. Scooping her up in my warm, loving embrace always recharges my batteries.
engSearchText:
I need a pick-me-up. Scooping her up in my warm,
loving embrace always recharges my batteries.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私になるほどと思わせてくれる 後輩なんていつぶりかしらね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私になるほどと思わせてくれる
後輩なんていつぶりかしらね……

engChrName: Oh, and that's a girl's private secret. Spill the tea, and I'll hack your computer.
engSearchText:
Oh, and that's a girl's private secret. Spill the tea, and
I'll hack your computer.
jpnChrName: あ、お兄さんには秘密よ。 これは乙女の秘密って事でね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、お兄さんには秘密よ。
これは乙女の秘密って事でね。

engChrName: I may be playing the part of guild supervisor...
engSearchText: I may be playing the part of guild supervisor...
jpnChrName: 私は一応、ギルドのスーパーバイザーって 扱いにはなっているけど……
jpnSearchText:
私は一応、ギルドのスーパーバイザーって
扱いにはなっているけど……

engChrName: ...but if you need any assistance from me, I'm more than happy to help.
engSearchText:
...but if you need any assistance from me, I'm more
than happy to help.
jpnChrName: お兄さんには借りも多いし、 可愛い後輩もいる事だしね。
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんには借りも多いし、
可愛い後輩もいる事だしね。

engChrName: Although, depending on the request, I may have to do it on the sly.
engSearchText:
Although, depending on the request, I may have to
do it on the sly.
jpnChrName: 力になってあげても良いわ、内容次第では ギルドの皆には内緒だけど。
jpnSearchText:
力になってあげても良いわ、内容次第では
ギルドの皆には内緒だけど。

engChrName: Thank you, Renne. I'm sure we'll take you up on that.
engSearchText: Thank you, Renne. I'm sure we'll take you up on that.
jpnChrName: レン先輩……頼もしい限りです！
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……頼もしい限りです！

engChrName: (Her info network's so vast, it's almost scary. If she's offering, we might as well make use of it.)
engSearchText:
(Her info network's so vast, it's almost scary. If she's
offering, we might as well make use of it.)
jpnChrName: （事実、こいつの情報力は確かなものだ……   必要な時は頼るのも手だろうな。）
jpnSearchText:
（事実、こいつの情報力は確かなものだ……
必要な時は頼るのも手だろうな。）

engChrName: I'm offering in part because I owe you, but I also simply like what you do.
engSearchText:
I'm offering in part because I owe you, but I also
simply like what you do.
jpnChrName: お兄さんには借りがあるってのもそうだけど、 裏解決屋の流儀、私も嫌いじゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんには借りがあるってのもそうだけど、
裏解決屋の流儀、私も嫌いじゃないわ。

engChrName: You're free to make use of me as you see fit. If you need help, you know where to find me.
engSearchText:
You're free to make use of me as you see fit. If you
need help, you know where to find me.
jpnChrName: ま、せいぜい私の存在は有効活用する事ね、 せっかくこんなに近くにいるんだもの。
jpnSearchText:
ま、せいぜい私の存在は有効活用する事ね、
せっかくこんなに近くにいるんだもの。

engChrName: It has been a blessing to see how much Ferida has grown over these last few months.
engSearchText:
It has been a blessing to see how much Ferida has
grown over these last few months.
jpnChrName: フェリーダがこの数ヶ月で、戦士として 見違えるほど成長したのは僥倖であった。
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダがこの数ヶ月で、戦士として
見違えるほど成長したのは僥倖であった。

engChrName: Unfortunately, we do not have time to celebrate. We must first vanquish our enemies.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, we do not have time to celebrate.
We must first vanquish our enemies.
jpnChrName: だが……それを祝うも、フェリーダと再び 研鑽をするのも全てを終わらせてからだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが……それを祝うも、フェリーダと再び
研鑽をするのも全てを終わらせてからだ。

engChrName: I will not let Almata steal my daughter's future!
engSearchText: I will not let Almata steal my daughter's future!
jpnChrName: アルマータ……彼奴等に未来は奪わせんぞ。
jpnSearchText: アルマータ……彼奴等に未来は奪わせんぞ。

engChrName: Ah, it's you.
engSearchText: Ah, it's you.
jpnChrName: 君達か……
jpnSearchText: 君達か……

engChrName: We owe you for yesterday. Seeing my daughter make strides on the battlefield filled me with pride.
engSearchText:
We owe you for yesterday. Seeing my daughter make
strides on the battlefield filled me with pride.
jpnChrName: フッ、昨日は世話になったな、色々な意味で。 娘が研鑽を積めている事が判ったのは収穫だ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、昨日は世話になったな、色々な意味で。
娘が研鑽を積めている事が判ったのは収穫だ。

engChrName: Abi...
engSearchText: Abi...
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）……
jpnSearchText: お父さん（アブ）……

engChrName: Two jaeger commanders out shopping together?
engSearchText: Two jaeger commanders out shopping together?
jpnChrName: まさか、高位猟兵団の幹部が二人で 揃ってショッピングとはな……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、高位猟兵団の幹部が二人で
揃ってショッピングとはな……

engChrName: Did Gehenna freeze over or somethin'?
engSearchText: Did Gehenna freeze over or somethin'?
jpnChrName: まあ、あんたらの事だ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、あんたらの事だ。

engChrName: Or are you guys just preppin' for the battles ahead?
engSearchText: Or are you guys just preppin' for the battles ahead?
jpnChrName: お互い用心深く今後の準備をしていたら 鉢合わせってところだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
お互い用心深く今後の準備をしていたら
鉢合わせってところだろうな。

engChrName: The latter.
engSearchText: The latter.
jpnChrName: 鋭いな……まさしくその通りだ。
jpnSearchText: 鋭いな……まさしくその通りだ。

engChrName: Thanks to you, our fight rages on, and that means we will go up against even more powerful foes.
engSearchText:
Thanks to you, our fight rages on, and that means we
will go up against even more powerful foes.
jpnChrName: 君達のお陰で我らも戦いは続くからな。 それも、同じく勝ち抜いてきた者が敵となる。
jpnSearchText:
君達のお陰で我らも戦いは続くからな。
それも、同じく勝ち抜いてきた者が敵となる。

engChrName: We will procure any tool within our vicinity that will raise our chances of victory.
engSearchText:
We will procure any tool within our vicinity that will
raise our chances of victory.
jpnChrName: この地で利用し得るものは全て使って 万全の体勢で挑むのみだ。
jpnSearchText:
この地で利用し得るものは全て使って
万全の体勢で挑むのみだ。

engChrName: Damn, you guys sure are takin' this shit seriously. That's a jaeger for you, though.
engSearchText:
Damn, you guys sure are takin' this shit seriously.
That's a jaeger for you, though.
jpnChrName: あんたらも巻き込まれた側だろうに、 気合の入れようは流石プロの猟兵っつーか。
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも巻き込まれた側だろうに、
気合の入れようは流石プロの猟兵っつーか。

engChrName: Hope we don't bump into your crew.
engSearchText: Hope we don't bump into your crew.
jpnChrName: ま、できればかち合わない事を祈るぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、できればかち合わない事を祈るぜ。

engChrName: We may have been eliminated, but that doesn't mean we won't have to take up arms.
engSearchText:
We may have been eliminated, but that doesn't mean
we won't have to take up arms.
jpnChrName: 我らは脱落したとはいえ、いつ何があるか わからん状況だからな。
jpnSearchText:
我らは脱落したとはいえ、いつ何があるか
わからん状況だからな。

engChrName: When it comes to Almata, it is best to expect the unexpected.
engSearchText:
When it comes to Almata, it is best to expect
the unexpected.
jpnChrName: それに、アルマータ側にも想定外の事も 相応にあると見受けられる。
jpnSearchText:
それに、アルマータ側にも想定外の事も
相応にあると見受けられる。

engChrName: Also, should we have an opportunity to get a shot at their leader, we can't afford to miss it.
engSearchText:
Also, should we have an opportunity to get a shot at
their leader, we can't afford to miss it.
jpnChrName: 何某かの巡り合わせで彼奴等の大将首を 狙う機会があれば、逃さぬつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
何某かの巡り合わせで彼奴等の大将首を
狙う機会があれば、逃さぬつもりだ。

engChrName: Well, with Ferida's help—and yours as well—we were able to attain victory...
engSearchText:
Well, with Ferida's help—and yours as well—we were
able to attain victory...
jpnChrName: フ、フェリーダとお前達の助力で勝ち抜く事も 叶ったわけだしな、為すべきを為すだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
フ、フェリーダとお前達の助力で勝ち抜く事も
叶ったわけだしな、為すべきを為すだけだ。

engChrName: ...but there are still fearsome foes ahead. Marduk being one of them.
engSearchText:
...but there are still fearsome foes ahead.
Marduk being one of them.
jpnChrName: フェリーダの力量は判ったが、同時にＭＫ社も 勝ち抜いておると聞く……
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダの力量は判ったが、同時にＭＫ社も
勝ち抜いておると聞く……

engChrName: Should we be unlucky, I may have to face my own son...
engSearchText:
Should we be unlucky, I may have to face my
own son...
jpnChrName: 上手く巡れば、次はカシムと刃を……
jpnSearchText: 上手く巡れば、次はカシムと刃を……

engChrName: I...really hope it doesn't come to that...
engSearchText: I...really hope it doesn't come to that...
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）……やはり、お兄ちゃんを……
jpnSearchText: お父さん（アブ）……やはり、お兄ちゃんを……

engChrName: Well, if it does, don't worry. My blade will not yield to my heart. I would relish the opportunity to witness his strength for myself.
engSearchText:
Well, if it does, don't worry. My blade will not yield
to my heart. I would relish the opportunity to witness
his strength for myself.
jpnChrName: 案ずるな、今回の戦で私情の刃は振るわん……だが、 奴の力を見極めるにはこの上ない機会なのでな。
jpnSearchText:
案ずるな、今回の戦で私情の刃は振るわん……だが、
奴の力を見極めるにはこの上ない機会なのでな。

engChrName: We may have been eliminated, but we still must remain vigilant.
engSearchText:
We may have been eliminated, but we still must
remain vigilant.
jpnChrName: 我々は脱落してしまったとは言え、 当面はこの地に留まる他無いからな。
jpnSearchText:
我々は脱落してしまったとは言え、
当面はこの地に留まる他無いからな。

engChrName: Based on what happened to Aida, we know Almata will attack when we least expect it.
engSearchText:
Based on what happened to Aida, we know Almata
will attack when we least expect it.
jpnChrName: 連中の闇討ちなどにも備え、アイーダの遺した 戦訓で確実に身を守るため、万全を期す。
jpnSearchText:
連中の闇討ちなどにも備え、アイーダの遺した
戦訓で確実に身を守るため、万全を期す。

engChrName: You and Ferida have done well so far.
engSearchText: You and Ferida have done well so far.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、勝ち抜いたのはお前達もだ。 フェリーダもな。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、勝ち抜いたのはお前達もだ。
フェリーダもな。

engChrName: The greatest of soldiers revel in overcoming insurmountable odds to achieve honor and glory.
engSearchText:
The greatest of soldiers revel in overcoming
insurmountable odds to achieve honor and glory.
jpnChrName: 最悪の宴の中と言えど、武勲を挙げて戦局を 動かしている事は戦士として本望なはずだろう。
jpnSearchText:
最悪の宴の中と言えど、武勲を挙げて戦局を
動かしている事は戦士として本望なはずだろう。

engChrName: If you aren't careful, however, someone else may steal the killing blow and claim victory for themselves.
engSearchText:
If you aren't careful, however, someone else may steal
the killing blow and claim victory for themselves.
jpnChrName: そして、同時に全ての元凶たる アルマータに刃が届く事も意味するからな。
jpnSearchText:
そして、同時に全ての元凶たる
アルマータに刃が届く事も意味するからな。

engChrName: If you do not wish for that to happen, then win!
engSearchText: If you do not wish for that to happen, then win!
jpnChrName: 君達にも……健闘を祈る！
jpnSearchText: 君達にも……健闘を祈る！

engChrName: We must ensure Almata pays dearly for their actions, no matter the cost.
engSearchText:
We must ensure Almata pays dearly for their actions,
no matter the cost.
jpnChrName: ……例えこの最悪のデスゲームがどう転ぼうと、 アルマータには相応の報いを受けさせる。
jpnSearchText:
……例えこの最悪のデスゲームがどう転ぼうと、
アルマータには相応の報いを受けさせる。

engChrName: We may have our differences with the Warriors of Kruga and Ikaruga, but that is one point we can all agree on.
engSearchText:
We may have our differences with the Warriors of
Kruga and Ikaruga, but that is one point we can all
agree on.
jpnChrName: 我らやクルガ、斑鳩などで各々流儀も違うだろうが、 猟兵団もこの点だけは皆同じ思いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
我らやクルガ、斑鳩などで各々流儀も違うだろうが、
猟兵団もこの点だけは皆同じ思いだろう。

engChrName: I wish you and your team good luck.
engSearchText: I wish you and your team good luck.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……君達も武運を。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋……君達も武運を。

engChrName: I never thought we'd bear witness to such an unprecedented act of terrorism...
engSearchText:
I never thought we'd bear witness to such an
unprecedented act of terrorism...
jpnChrName: まさかこんな前代未聞のテロに直面するとは……
jpnSearchText: まさかこんな前代未聞のテロに直面するとは……

engChrName: The Royal Guardian will not rest until we find and deliver the truth behind this story.
engSearchText:
The Royal Guardian will not rest until we find and
deliver the truth behind this story.
jpnChrName: まあ、我がＲＧ（ロイヤルガーディアン）も有力者とのパイプを フル活用して情報収集に当たるだろうね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、我がＲＧ（ロイヤルガーディアン）も有力者とのパイプを
フル活用して情報収集に当たるだろうね。

engChrName: We pride ourselves on our longstanding connections. You can trust our credibility.
engSearchText:
We pride ourselves on our longstanding connections.
You can trust our credibility.
jpnChrName: やはり、いざという時に古くからのコネクションを 活用できるのは我が社の強みだ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、いざという時に古くからのコネクションを
活用できるのは我が社の強みだ。

engChrName: We're certainly more reliable than some third-rate gossip rag like Meld.
engSearchText:
We're certainly more reliable than some third-rate
gossip rag like Meld.
jpnChrName: たまに刺さる記事を出すとは言え、メルドのような ゴシップ誌とは訳が違うのさ。
jpnSearchText:
たまに刺さる記事を出すとは言え、メルドのような
ゴシップ誌とは訳が違うのさ。

engChrName: (I've heard of the Royal Guardian. They're an old Oración news company.)
engSearchText:
(I've heard of the Royal Guardian. They're an old
Oración news company.)
jpnChrName: （ＲＧ（ロイヤルガーディアン）……オラシオンに拠点がある、   古い通信社ですよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（ＲＧ（ロイヤルガーディアン）……オラシオンに拠点がある、
古い通信社ですよね……）

engChrName: (From what I read, they took a heavily royalist stance prior to the revolution.)
engSearchText:
(From what I read, they took a heavily royalist stance
prior to the revolution.)
jpnChrName: （革命前に、王制側に近い立場を   取っていたという……）
jpnSearchText:
（革命前に、王制側に近い立場を
取っていたという……）

engChrName: (Yeah, and they still lean conservative. They don't explicitly promote racial discrimination, at least.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, and they still lean conservative. They don't
explicitly promote racial discrimination, at least.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、今でも保守的な論調が多いな。   流石にあからさまな人種差別は書かないが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、今でも保守的な論調が多いな。
流石にあからさまな人種差別は書かないが。）

engChrName: (He's right about one thing, though: they're well connected with like-minded, local big shots in the business and political worlds.)
engSearchText:
(He's right about one thing, though: they're well
connected with like-minded, local big shots in
the business and political worlds.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、土着の名士やら政財界の保守派との   パイプを使った情報力は侮れねぇが……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、土着の名士やら政財界の保守派との
パイプを使った情報力は侮れねぇが……）

engChrName: (Honestly, I think their articles are junk.)
engSearchText: (Honestly, I think their articles are junk.)
jpnChrName: （正直ここの記事、いけ好かないのよね。）
jpnSearchText: （正直ここの記事、いけ好かないのよね。）

engChrName: (They write on and on about how movies aren't art. What a load of bull!)
engSearchText:
(They write on and on about how movies aren't art.
What a load of bull!)
jpnChrName: （伝統芸能を持ち上げるために、映画を   一段下の文化として書くところあるし……）
jpnSearchText:
（伝統芸能を持ち上げるために、映画を
一段下の文化として書くところあるし……）

engChrName: (That aside, it seems like they at least have a sense of the danger they're in.)
engSearchText:
(That aside, it seems like they at least have a sense of
the danger they're in.)
jpnChrName: （とはいえ……そんなこいつらでも、流石に   今回は危機感を持っているようだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（とはいえ……そんなこいつらでも、流石に
今回は危機感を持っているようだな。）

engChrName: I thought I saw a serious-looking reporter woman come out of the guild.
engSearchText:
I thought I saw a serious-looking reporter woman
come out of the guild.
jpnChrName: そういえばさっき、ギルドから随分と 熱心な記者の女性が出てきたな……
jpnSearchText:
そういえばさっき、ギルドから随分と
熱心な記者の女性が出てきたな……

engChrName: I didn't recognize her, but she didn't seem like the gossip-rag type. Perhaps she's with Eaton? Or maybe Tyrell?
engSearchText:
I didn't recognize her, but she didn't seem like the
gossip-rag type. Perhaps she's with Eaton? Or
maybe Tyrell?
jpnChrName: ここでは見ない顔だがゴシップ系ではなさげだ、 イートンかタイレル辺りかな？
jpnSearchText:
ここでは見ない顔だがゴシップ系ではなさげだ、
イートンかタイレル辺りかな？

engChrName: Either way, I should find a chance to speak with her so we can exchange information.
engSearchText:
Either way, I should find a chance to speak with her
so we can exchange information.
jpnChrName: まあ良い、情報交換もできるかもしれないし、 折を見て話しをしてみようか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良い、情報交換もできるかもしれないし、
折を見て話しをしてみようか。

engChrName: My pure-blooded patriotic comrades, I implore you to think long and hard!
engSearchText:
My pure-blooded patriotic comrades, I implore you
to think long and hard!
jpnChrName: 祖国を愛する純血なるカルバードの 同志達よ、今一度深く考えて欲しい！
jpnSearchText:
祖国を愛する純血なるカルバードの
同志達よ、今一度深く考えて欲しい！

engChrName: These immigrants have been flooding in from Goddess-knows-where, and they are taking YOUR jobs and trampling on OUR pride!
engSearchText:
These immigrants have been flooding in from
Goddess-knows-where, and they are taking YOUR
jobs and trampling on OUR pride!
jpnChrName: 近年再び増加し始めた移民……彼らが奪うのは、 カルバード人労働者の仕事だけに留まらない！
jpnSearchText:
近年再び増加し始めた移民……彼らが奪うのは、
カルバード人労働者の仕事だけに留まらない！

engChrName: And now these vermin think they can etch themselves into our cultural history!
engSearchText:
And now these vermin think they can etch themselves
into our cultural history!
jpnChrName: 我らの誇り……例えば伝統文化だ！　最近では、 伝統的な芸術にも彼らの参入が始まっている。
jpnSearchText:
我らの誇り……例えば伝統文化だ！　最近では、
伝統的な芸術にも彼らの参入が始まっている。

engChrName: Are we going to stand here and let them take the center stage of our opera house?
engSearchText:
Are we going to stand here and let them take the
center stage of our opera house?
jpnChrName: このままでは、異民族の様式に合わせるため、 我らの伝統が歪められる危険もあるのだ！
jpnSearchText:
このままでは、異民族の様式に合わせるため、
我らの伝統が歪められる危険もあるのだ！

engChrName: Will we let them rewrite our culture so that it bends to their inferior traditions?
engSearchText:
Will we let them rewrite our culture so that it bends
to their inferior traditions?
jpnChrName: 真なる愛国者ならば、そうした移民への譲歩が いずれどのような未来を招くか想像できよう！
jpnSearchText:
真なる愛国者ならば、そうした移民への譲歩が
いずれどのような未来を招くか想像できよう！

engChrName: I say NO! Join me, my Calvardian brothers and sisters! We will eradicate this cultural infestation before it grows beyond our control!
engSearchText:
I say NO! Join me, my Calvardian brothers
and sisters! We will eradicate this cultural infestation
before it grows beyond our control!
jpnChrName: 今こそ手を取り合い、カルバード人として、 異民族の文化的侵略に立ち向かう時である！
jpnSearchText:
今こそ手を取り合い、カルバード人として、
異民族の文化的侵略に立ち向かう時である！

engChrName: Well, my deal went smoothly enough, but despite my tidy profit, I can't bring myself to celebrate.
engSearchText:
Well, my deal went smoothly enough, but despite my
tidy profit, I can't bring myself to celebrate.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、取引も一通り円満に終わったが…… どうやら大変な事になっているようだね？
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、取引も一通り円満に終わったが……
どうやら大変な事になっているようだね？

engChrName: What happened to Creil truly pains my heart.
engSearchText: What happened to Creil truly pains my heart.
jpnChrName: 勿論、共和国全土を震撼させている 例の事件も胸が痛い限りだが……
jpnSearchText:
勿論、共和国全土を震撼させている
例の事件も胸が痛い限りだが……

engChrName: I'm also worried about Oración. I can tell something is going on behind the scenes.
engSearchText:
I'm also worried about Oración. I can tell something
is going on behind the scenes.
jpnChrName: このオラシオンにも、詳しくは知らないが どうやら何かがあるみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
このオラシオンにも、詳しくは知らないが
どうやら何かがあるみたいだね。

engChrName: (What the...? Oh, crap, does he know...?)
engSearchText: (What the...? Oh, crap, does he know...?)
jpnChrName: （こいつ、もしかして……）
jpnSearchText: （こいつ、もしかして……）

engChrName: Still, I'm only a traveler, and my instincts are telling me to steer clear of whatever's going on.
engSearchText:
Still, I'm only a traveler, and my instincts are telling
me to steer clear of whatever's going on.
jpnChrName: まあ、僕は所詮旅人だし 与り知らぬ事だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、僕は所詮旅人だし
与り知らぬ事だけどね。

engChrName: I have a sixth sense for danger—honed from journeying through the most treacherous of places— and it's telling me to stay put.
engSearchText:
I have a sixth sense for danger—honed from
journeying through the most treacherous of places—
and it's telling me to stay put.
jpnChrName: はは、どんな危険地帯でも旅する秘訣は 余計な事に首を突っ込まない、だからね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、どんな危険地帯でも旅する秘訣は
余計な事に首を突っ込まない、だからね。

engChrName: (Phew. Bullet dodged.)
engSearchText: (Phew. Bullet dodged.)
jpnChrName: （ふう、ヒヤヒヤしました……）
jpnSearchText: （ふう、ヒヤヒヤしました……）

engChrName: (He seems to have a good head on his shoulders, so I don't think we have anything to worry about.)
engSearchText:
(He seems to have a good head on his shoulders, so I
don't think we have anything to worry about.)
jpnChrName: （まあこの人は弁えてそうだし   大丈夫なんじゃない？）
jpnSearchText:
（まあこの人は弁えてそうだし
大丈夫なんじゃない？）

engChrName: I've traveled to lands with violent gang wars and territories with strict local taboos.
engSearchText:
I've traveled to lands with violent gang wars and
territories with strict local taboos.
jpnChrName: ギャングの抗争がある土地に行った事もあるし、 何やら土着のタブーがある地にも行った。
jpnSearchText:
ギャングの抗争がある土地に行った事もあるし、
何やら土着のタブーがある地にも行った。

engChrName: Trust me when I say it's usually best to leave the darkest paths untrod, as it were.
engSearchText:
Trust me when I say it's usually best to leave the
darkest paths untrod, as it were.
jpnChrName: まあ、程度にもよるけど、少なくとも闇夜の間は 好奇心をセーブしておくのが一番さ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、程度にもよるけど、少なくとも闇夜の間は
好奇心をセーブしておくのが一番さ。

engChrName: Tomorrow morning, I'll speak with the locals. That's how I usually judge the danger.
engSearchText:
Tomorrow morning, I'll speak with the locals.
That's how I usually judge the danger.
jpnChrName: 朝になってから、町の人がどの程度その事を 噂しているかで、後から危険度も測れたりする。
jpnSearchText:
朝になってから、町の人がどの程度その事を
噂しているかで、後から危険度も測れたりする。

engChrName: I do enjoy a light brush with peril from time to time, don't mistake me. The trick is knowing where to draw the line.
engSearchText:
I do enjoy a light brush with peril from time to time,
don't mistake me. The trick is knowing where to draw
the line.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こういう生存術を一度身につけてしまえば、 適度なスリルも何気に楽しめるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こういう生存術を一度身につけてしまえば、
適度なスリルも何気に楽しめるんだよな。

engChrName: Tell me, have we met before in another town? You all look rather familiar.
engSearchText:
Tell me, have we met before in another town? You all
look rather familiar.
jpnChrName: おや、君達は以前も他の街で会ったご一行か。 何かと縁があるものだな。
jpnSearchText:
おや、君達は以前も他の街で会ったご一行か。
何かと縁があるものだな。

engChrName: I intended to take a trip to the free cities, but now my plans have gone awry.
engSearchText:
I intended to take a trip to the free cities, but now my
plans have gone awry.
jpnChrName: 今回は、自由都市圏方面に急遽遠征するつもり だったのだが、予定が狂ってしまってね。
jpnSearchText:
今回は、自由都市圏方面に急遽遠征するつもり
だったのだが、予定が狂ってしまってね。

engChrName: Customs is delayed due to that tragedy, so I'll be sticking around here for the time being.
engSearchText:
Customs is delayed due to that tragedy, so I'll be
sticking around here for the time being.
jpnChrName: まあ、例の痛ましい事件もあって出入国にも 手間取りそうだし、少々ここに滞在する事になった。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、例の痛ましい事件もあって出入国にも
手間取りそうだし、少々ここに滞在する事になった。
