engChrName: I'm reasonably familiar with Oración, regardless, so I'm sure it will be a worthwhile stay.
engSearchText:
I'm reasonably familiar with Oración, regardless, so
I'm sure it will be a worthwhile stay.
jpnChrName: オラシオンにも馴染みはいるしな、 まあ、無意味な滞在になる事は無いだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンにも馴染みはいるしな、
まあ、無意味な滞在になる事は無いだろうさ。

engChrName: Hello there. You're staying at the same lodgings as me, yes?
engSearchText:
Hello there. You're staying at the same lodgings as
me, yes?
jpnChrName: おや、君達もどうやら同じ宿の宿泊客か。 いやはや、大変な事態になってしまったね……
jpnSearchText:
おや、君達もどうやら同じ宿の宿泊客か。
いやはや、大変な事態になってしまったね……

engChrName: I happen to be a secondhand repair dealer. I travel all around the continent in search of rare goods.
engSearchText:
I happen to be a secondhand repair dealer. I travel all
around the continent in search of rare goods.
jpnChrName: ところで、俺は大陸各地を旅しながら珍品や ジャンクを収集している中古修理屋なのだが……
jpnSearchText:
ところで、俺は大陸各地を旅しながら珍品や
ジャンクを収集している中古修理屋なのだが……

engChrName: If you see anything that tickles your fancy, I'm sure we can strike a deal.
engSearchText:
If you see anything that tickles your fancy, I'm sure
we can strike a deal.
jpnChrName: 手持ちの品で良ければ何か譲ろうか、 欲しいものがあれば言ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
手持ちの品で良ければ何か譲ろうか、
欲しいものがあれば言ってくれ。

engChrName: November 20th, 11:28AM
engSearchText: November 20th, 11:28AM

engChrName: We finally made it to Oración. It's easy to tell that it's a city with a storied history just by looking at these buildings.
engSearchText:
We finally made it to Oración. It's easy to tell that it's
a city with a storied history just by looking at
these buildings.
jpnChrName: “旧王都”オラシオン…… さすが歴史を感じさせる街並みだね。
jpnSearchText:
“旧王都”オラシオン……
さすが歴史を感じさせる街並みだね。

engChrName: I believe I heard the oldest cathedral in all of Calvard can be found in the eastern part of the city.
engSearchText:
I believe I heard the oldest cathedral in all of Calvard
can be found in the eastern part of the city.
jpnChrName: 東にはカルバード最大の “総大聖堂”もあるんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
東にはカルバード最大の
“総大聖堂”もあるんだっけ？

engChrName: You heard right. I've filmed there a few times myself. That place is always swarming with tourists.
engSearchText:
You heard right. I've filmed there a few times myself.
That place is always swarming with tourists.
jpnChrName: ええ、観光名所としても有名ね。 何度か撮影で来た事があるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、観光名所としても有名ね。
何度か撮影で来た事があるわ。

engChrName: Oh! Isn't there, like, a super huge castle here, too?
engSearchText: Oh! Isn't there, like, a super huge castle here, too?
jpnChrName: あ、たしか“お城”も あるんですよね……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、たしか“お城”も
あるんですよね……！

engChrName: There is a palace, yes. Though it was left in ruins during the revolution.
engSearchText:
There is a palace, yes. Though it was left in ruins
during the revolution.
jpnChrName: 百年前の革命時に打ち壊された カルバード王国の中心……
jpnSearchText:
百年前の革命時に打ち壊された
カルバード王国の中心……

engChrName: It's called Vashtar Palace, and it was once the center of the old Calvard Kingdom.
engSearchText:
It's called Vashtar Palace, and it was once the center
of the old Calvard Kingdom.
jpnChrName: 《ヴァシュタール宮跡》ですね。
jpnSearchText: 《ヴァシュタール宮跡》ですね。

engChrName: Bet that's a decently popular tourist spot, too. Wait, what's that?
engSearchText:
Bet that's a decently popular tourist spot, too.
Wait, what's that?
jpnChrName: 割と観光客も多そうだな…… っと、ありゃなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
割と観光客も多そうだな……
っと、ありゃなんだ？

engChrName: That thing's called an orbal tram. It'll take you anywhere in Oración.
engSearchText:
That thing's called an orbal tram. It'll take you
anywhere in Oración.
jpnChrName: 導力トラムだな。
jpnSearchText: 導力トラムだな。

engChrName: They're good for scenic drives, but they ain't exactly built for speed. I'd only hop on one when you've got time to kill.
engSearchText:
They're good for scenic drives, but they ain't exactly
built for speed. I'd only hop on one when you've got
time to kill.
jpnChrName: そこそこ便利だが速度は遅いから 観光以外じゃ使う必要はねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そこそこ便利だが速度は遅いから
観光以外じゃ使う必要はねぇだろう。

engChrName: Darn. There goes that plan...
engSearchText: Darn. There goes that plan...
jpnChrName: そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうなんですか……

engChrName: Heehee. We can ride one the next time we visit.
engSearchText: Heehee. We can ride one the next time we visit.
jpnChrName: ふふ、またの機会と致しましょう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、またの機会と致しましょう。

engChrName: (I've come here a few times for work before, but I never thought I'd return under these circumstances.)
engSearchText:
(I've come here a few times for work before, but I
never thought I'd return under these circumstances.)
jpnChrName: （……何度か仕事では来たが……   こんな形で改めて訪れるとはな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……何度か仕事では来たが……
こんな形で改めて訪れるとはな。）

engChrName: I've taken the liberty to reserve two rooms for us at a nearby hotel.
engSearchText:
I've taken the liberty to reserve two rooms for us at a
nearby hotel.
jpnChrName: 既に近くの宿を取っている。 そちらで荷解きをするといい。
jpnSearchText:
既に近くの宿を取っている。
そちらで荷解きをするといい。

engChrName: Awesome. You're a lifesaver, Master. It's not always easy to book rooms on such short notice.
engSearchText:
Awesome. You're a lifesaver, Master. It's not always
easy to book rooms on such short notice.
jpnChrName: ええ──助かりましたよ師父（せんせい）。 こう急だと手配も難しかったんでね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──助かりましたよ師父（せんせい）。
こう急だと手配も難しかったんでね。

engChrName: So the mafia's new base is somewhere in this city...
engSearchText: So the mafia's new base is somewhere in this city...
jpnChrName: ここが、マフィアたちが 新たな本拠地にした……
jpnSearchText:
ここが、マフィアたちが
新たな本拠地にした……

engChrName: We'll dig those cowards out of whatever hole they're hiding in.
engSearchText:
We'll dig those cowards out of whatever hole they're
hiding in.
jpnChrName: ……まずは支部に向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText: ……まずは支部に向かうとするか。

engChrName: Let's drop by the local branch first, though. We should get our ducks in a row and secure manpower before making a move.
engSearchText:
Let's drop by the local branch first, though.
We should get our ducks in a row and secure
manpower before making a move.
jpnChrName: それから“潜伏場所”の特定と 突入作戦の人員を確保しねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
それから“潜伏場所”の特定と
突入作戦の人員を確保しねぇとな。

engChrName: Good thinking. Better to act with caution than with reckless abandon.
engSearchText:
Good thinking. Better to act with caution than with
reckless abandon.
jpnChrName: ええ、冷静に動きましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、冷静に動きましょう。

engChrName: While we're there, we should take the time to speak with the survivor. We may learn a thing or two from them.
engSearchText:
While we're there, we should take the time to speak
with the survivor. We may learn a thing or two
from them.
jpnChrName: ……生き残ったメンバーからも 状況を確認しないと。
jpnSearchText:
……生き残ったメンバーからも
状況を確認しないと。

engChrName: Hopefully so.
engSearchText: Hopefully so.
jpnChrName: ……そだね。
jpnSearchText: ……そだね。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Your folks are here, aren't they, Elaine? Are you planning to pay them a visit?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Your folks are here, aren't they, Elaine?
Are you planning to pay them a visit?
jpnChrName: そういえばエレインさん、 “里帰り”の方は……？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばエレインさん、
“里帰り”の方は……？

engChrName: No. I'm only interested in handling the task at hand.
engSearchText: No. I'm only interested in handling the task at hand.
jpnChrName: ……必要ないわ。 今は責務を全うするだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
……必要ないわ。
今は責務を全うするだけよ。

engChrName: And I believe our temporary collaborator shares my sentiment.
engSearchText:
And I believe our temporary collaborator shares
my sentiment.
jpnChrName: そちらの“臨時協力員”さんと同じくね。
jpnSearchText: そちらの“臨時協力員”さんと同じくね。

engChrName: Indeed. I will assist you all to the best of my ability.
engSearchText: Indeed. I will assist you all to the best of my ability.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうね── 微力を尽くさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうね──
微力を尽くさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Damn. The air around this city is toxic as hell.
engSearchText: Damn. The air around this city is toxic as hell.
jpnChrName: ……クク、ヤベぇ雰囲気が ビリビリ伝わってくるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……クク、ヤベぇ雰囲気が
ビリビリ伝わってくるぜ。

engChrName: You aren't wrong. There are powerful foes all around us. I can feel it.
engSearchText:
You aren't wrong. There are powerful foes all
around us. I can feel it.
jpnChrName: ええ……幾つもの “息吹”が渦巻いています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……幾つもの
“息吹”が渦巻いています。

engChrName: R-Really? But the town seemed so peaceful to me...
engSearchText: R-Really? But the town seemed so peaceful to me...
jpnChrName: わ、私には 分かりませんでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
わ、私には
分かりませんでしたが……

engChrName: There were a lot of tourists around as well.
engSearchText: There were a lot of tourists around as well.
jpnChrName: うん……観光客も多そうだし 平和そのものって感じだったね。
jpnSearchText:
うん……観光客も多そうだし
平和そのものって感じだったね。

engChrName: And that in and of itself is concerning, given what happened to Creil.
engSearchText:
And that in and of itself is concerning, given what
happened to Creil.
jpnChrName: クレイユがあんな事になったのに それはそれでどうかとも思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユがあんな事になったのに
それはそれでどうかとも思うけど……

engChrName: From what I heard, the state of emergency lifted after one day here.
engSearchText:
From what I heard, the state of emergency lifted after
one day here.
jpnChrName: ……こっちは非常事態宣言も １日で解除されたそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
……こっちは非常事態宣言も
１日で解除されたそうだからな。

engChrName: Anyway, we should call up the CID—
engSearchText: Anyway, we should call up the CID—
jpnChrName: とにかく、まずはＣＩＤに──
jpnSearchText: とにかく、まずはＣＩＤに──

engChrName: I see you have arrived safely in the city. You were nearly on time as well. I'm impressed.
engSearchText:
I see you have arrived safely in the city. You were
nearly on time as well. I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: ほぼ予定通りの到着か。
jpnSearchText: ほぼ予定通りの到着か。

engChrName: How do you...? Did you set up hidden cameras in here?
engSearchText:
How do you...? Did you set up hidden cameras
in here?
jpnChrName: チッ…… 見てたように言いやがって。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
見てたように言いやがって。

engChrName: Bah. Never mind. What's the sitch, René?
engSearchText: Bah. Never mind. What's the sitch, René?
jpnChrName: で、そちらが掴んだ現地状況は？
jpnSearchText: で、そちらが掴んだ現地状況は？

engChrName: We're still ascertaining the names and numbers of the enemy, but I have learned which organizations are there at present.
engSearchText:
We're still ascertaining the names and numbers of the
enemy, but I have learned which organizations are
there at present.
jpnChrName: 詳細な顔触れと人数は不明だが、 オラシオン入りした勢力は判明した。
jpnSearchText:
詳細な顔触れと人数は不明だが、
オラシオン入りした勢力は判明した。

engChrName: Why don't you share with the rest of the class, then? We're all ears.
engSearchText:
Why don't you share with the rest of the class, then?
We're all ears.
jpnChrName: 聞かせろ── つーかデータも寄越せ。
jpnSearchText:
聞かせろ──
つーかデータも寄越せ。

engChrName: First, the Bracer Guild's Edith branch turned up shortly after you, and they were joined by some capable bracers from elsewhere.
engSearchText:
First, the Bracer Guild's Edith branch turned up
shortly after you, and they were joined by some
capable bracers from elsewhere.
jpnChrName: まずは《遊撃士協会》の首都支部。 各地の支部からもやり手が来たようだ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは《遊撃士協会》の首都支部。
各地の支部からもやり手が来たようだ。

engChrName: Then we confirmed the arrival of Heiyue's White Orchid Dragon and Yin, and they likely have a large number of xiongshou accompanying them.
engSearchText:
Then we confirmed the arrival of Heiyue's White
Orchid Dragon and Yin, and they likely have a large
number of xiongshou accompanying them.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》は《白蘭竜》に《銀》、 例の“凶手”たちも来ていそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》は《白蘭竜》に《銀》、
例の“凶手”たちも来ていそうだな。

engChrName: A few jaeger corps have joined the fray as well—the Warriors of Kruga and Eisenschild included.
engSearchText:
A few jaeger corps have joined the fray as well—the
Warriors of Kruga and Eisenschild included.
jpnChrName: 猟兵団は大小様々──主立ったものとして、 《クルガ戦士団》に《アイゼンシルト》。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵団は大小様々──主立ったものとして、
《クルガ戦士団》に《アイゼンシルト》。

engChrName: The church sent two members of the Gralsritter, as well as elite members of Iscariot.
engSearchText:
The church sent two members of the Gralsritter, as
well as elite members of Iscariot.
jpnChrName: 教会からは《星杯騎士》２名に、 隠密僧兵部隊《イスカリオ》の精鋭たち。
jpnSearchText:
教会からは《星杯騎士》２名に、
隠密僧兵部隊《イスカリオ》の精鋭たち。

engChrName: Ikaruga and Marduk were also dispatched to Oración by their clients.
engSearchText:
Ikaruga and Marduk were also dispatched to Oración
by their clients.
jpnChrName: そして“とある筋”からの依頼として 《斑鳩》にマルドゥック社が確認されている。
jpnSearchText:
そして“とある筋”からの依頼として
《斑鳩》にマルドゥック社が確認されている。

engChrName: ...Oh, and your clients are there, too. They are likely lurking in the shadows as we speak.
engSearchText:
...Oh, and your clients are there, too. They are likely
lurking in the shadows as we speak.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、お前たちに依頼したという、 《身喰らう蛇》の使徒に執行者達もだな。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、お前たちに依頼したという、
《身喰らう蛇》の使徒に執行者達もだな。

engChrName: That's all I have. I shall leave the rest in your capable hands. I must turn my attention to the mountain of tasks that await me.
engSearchText:
That's all I have. I shall leave the rest in your
capable hands. I must turn my attention to the
mountain of tasks that await me.
jpnChrName: ──こちらも忙しい。 あとはそちらで判断するがいい。
jpnSearchText:
──こちらも忙しい。
あとはそちらで判断するがいい。

engChrName: Ugh. Just hearing him fire off those big names one by one was enough to make me nauseous.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Just hearing him fire off those big names one by
one was enough to make me nauseous.
jpnChrName: チッ…… 聞いてるだけで胸焼けしてくるな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
聞いてるだけで胸焼けしてくるな。

engChrName: And those were just the highlights. There's still the Nidhoggr corps and the Scorpions of Zahat, an established corps from the Central East.
engSearchText:
And those were just the highlights. There's still the
Nidhoggr corps and the Scorpions of Zahat, an
established corps from the Central East.
jpnChrName: ──あとは猟兵団《ニーズヘッグ》に 中東系の中堅っつう《ザハトの蠍（さそり）》。
jpnSearchText:
──あとは猟兵団《ニーズヘッグ》に
中東系の中堅っつう《ザハトの蠍（さそり）》。

engChrName: The Dolor Family's here, too. They're the third largest mafia in all of Calvard.
engSearchText:
The Dolor Family's here, too. They're the third
largest mafia in all of Calvard.
jpnChrName: 共和国第三の武闘派マフィア、 《ドゥール・ファミリー》──
jpnSearchText:
共和国第三の武闘派マフィア、
《ドゥール・ファミリー》──

engChrName: Then there's the Stillwater Fleet and Zecht Arms. One of 'em is a group of sea jaegers, and the other's a new weapons manufacturer.
engSearchText:
Then there's the Stillwater Fleet and Zecht Arms.
One of 'em is a group of sea jaegers, and the other's a
new weapons manufacturer.
jpnChrName: 《静海（せいかい）船団》《ゼクトアームズ》…… 海の猟兵どもに、新興武器メーカーか。
jpnSearchText:
《静海（せいかい）船団》《ゼクトアームズ》……
海の猟兵どもに、新興武器メーカーか。

engChrName: What criminal organization ISN'T in Oración at this point?
engSearchText:
What criminal organization ISN'T in Oración at
this point?
jpnChrName: いやいや、多過ぎでしょ……
jpnSearchText: いやいや、多過ぎでしょ……

engChrName: You got me there. Can't say I've heard of the last few names, though.
engSearchText:
You got me there. Can't say I've heard of the last few
names, though.
jpnChrName: 百鬼夜行並みのカオスだな。 後半はあんま聞き覚えはねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
百鬼夜行並みのカオスだな。
後半はあんま聞き覚えはねぇが。

engChrName: But we're all too familiar with Ikaruga. I'll bet anything that white-haired girl is leading the charge.
engSearchText:
But we're all too familiar with Ikaruga. I'll bet
anything that white-haired girl is leading the charge.
jpnChrName: 《斑鳩》は龍來で会った…… あのとんでもない娘も来てそうね。
jpnSearchText:
《斑鳩》は龍來で会った……
あのとんでもない娘も来てそうね。

engChrName: I'm all but certain that Marduk sent the elite unit led by Mr. Al-Fayed.
engSearchText:
I'm all but certain that Marduk sent the elite unit led
by Mr. Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: ──ＭＫ社はまず間違いなく カシム警備主任の精鋭部隊かと。
jpnSearchText:
──ＭＫ社はまず間違いなく
カシム警備主任の精鋭部隊かと。

engChrName: I sensed him earlier, so I'd say you're right on the money. And I know for a fact that my people and Aida's corps are here, too.
engSearchText:
I sensed him earlier, so I'd say you're right on
the money. And I know for a fact that my people and
Aida's corps are here, too.
jpnChrName: はい……息吹を感じました。 それに戦士団（お父さんたち）にアイーダさんの所も。
jpnSearchText:
はい……息吹を感じました。
それに戦士団（お父さんたち）にアイーダさんの所も。

engChrName: And the Republican Army is making their move in secret.
engSearchText:
And the Republican Army is making their move
in secret.
jpnChrName: 加えて密かに共和国軍も 動いているんですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
加えて密かに共和国軍も
動いているんですよね……？

engChrName: Just what is Almata plotting?
engSearchText: Just what is Almata plotting?
jpnChrName: この状況でアルマータは何を……
jpnSearchText: この状況でアルマータは何を……

engChrName: Didn't you say that they leaked their current location themselves?
engSearchText:
Didn't you say that they leaked their current
location themselves?
jpnChrName: ……確か新たな拠点だと判明したのは ヤツらからのリークに近かったとか？
jpnSearchText:
……確か新たな拠点だと判明したのは
ヤツらからのリークに近かったとか？

engChrName: I did. They invited us all to this place, knowing full well that they were painting a target on their backs in the process.
engSearchText:
I did. They invited us all to this place, knowing full
well that they were painting a target on their backs
in the process.
jpnChrName: うむ──その上で彼らは “全員”をこの都市に招き入れた。
jpnSearchText:
うむ──その上で彼らは
“全員”をこの都市に招き入れた。

engChrName: They must be lying in wait as we speak. I imagine we will hear from them soon enough.
engSearchText:
They must be lying in wait as we speak. I imagine we
will hear from them soon enough.
jpnChrName: 龍來に現れた甲冑の者が残したという、 《謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）》──
jpnSearchText:
龍來に現れた甲冑の者が残したという、
《謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）》──

engChrName: And then this 'carnival' of theirs will truly begin.
engSearchText: And then this 'carnival' of theirs will truly begin.
jpnChrName: 恐らくその催しを開かんがために。
jpnSearchText: 恐らくその催しを開かんがために。

engChrName: Oh, right. The guy in the armor asked me to take part in a carnival. Is that what this whole thing is about?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. The guy in the armor asked me to take part
in a carnival. Is that what this whole thing is about?
jpnChrName: ……言ってたわね……
jpnSearchText: ……言ってたわね……

engChrName: Yeah. I'd bet money on it.
engSearchText: Yeah. I'd bet money on it.
jpnChrName: チッ、だとしたら──
jpnSearchText: チッ、だとしたら──

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Wh-Why's it going off now?
engSearchText: Wh-Why's it going off now?
jpnChrName: こ、このタイミングで……！？
jpnSearchText: こ、このタイミングで……！？

engChrName: That can only mean—
engSearchText: That can only mean—
jpnChrName: ふむ、それが──
jpnSearchText: ふむ、それが──

engChrName: Everyone's Xiphas are ringing all at once?!
engSearchText: Everyone's Xiphas are ringing all at once?!
jpnChrName: みんなのザイファに……！？
jpnSearchText: みんなのザイファに……！？

engChrName: No caller ID... I'm gonna answer it.
engSearchText: No caller ID... I'm gonna answer it.
jpnChrName: 非通知か──とりあえず出るぞ。
jpnSearchText: 非通知か──とりあえず出るぞ。

engChrName: Greetings, my friends. I thank you all for taking time out of your very busy schedules to come here today.
engSearchText:
Greetings, my friends. I thank you all for taking time
out of your very busy schedules to come here today.
jpnChrName: ご機嫌よう── この地に集まった有象無象ども。
jpnSearchText:
ご機嫌よう──
この地に集まった有象無象ども。

engChrName: My name is Gerard Dantès. I am the head of Almata—as well as the man you seek to destroy.
engSearchText:
My name is Gerard Dantès. I am the head of
Almata—as well as the man you seek to destroy.
jpnChrName: 俺はジェラール・ダンテス。 お前たちの標的、アルマータの首領だ。
jpnSearchText:
俺はジェラール・ダンテス。
お前たちの標的、アルマータの首領だ。

engChrName: Not beating around the bush, is he?
engSearchText: Not beating around the bush, is he?
jpnChrName: 早速お出ましかよ──！
jpnSearchText: 早速お出ましかよ──！

engChrName: I am thrilled to announce that every one of our invitees are in attendance.
engSearchText:
I am thrilled to announce that every one of our
invitees are in attendance.
jpnChrName: まずは招待に応じたお前たちを歓迎する。 遠路はるばる、ご苦労だった。
jpnSearchText:
まずは招待に応じたお前たちを歓迎する。
遠路はるばる、ご苦労だった。

engChrName: No doubt you all were brought here under different circumstances, but your end goals are the same:
engSearchText:
No doubt you all were brought here under different
circumstances, but your end goals are the same:
jpnChrName: それぞれ思惑はあるだろうが、 最終的な目的はどこも同じ──
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ思惑はあるだろうが、
最終的な目的はどこも同じ──

engChrName: To lead us off in chains—or lead us to an early grave.
engSearchText: To lead us off in chains—or lead us to an early grave.
jpnChrName: 俺たちの殲滅、もしくは拘束だろう。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちの殲滅、もしくは拘束だろう。

engChrName: We thought about simply settling this with an all-out war, but the collateral damage would no doubt be immense.
engSearchText:
We thought about simply settling this with an all-out
war, but the collateral damage would no doubt
be immense.
jpnChrName: 正面から受けてやってもいいが、その場合は 古都を舞台とした全面抗争──いや戦争になる。
jpnSearchText:
正面から受けてやってもいいが、その場合は
古都を舞台とした全面抗争──いや戦争になる。

engChrName: And we would never involve innocent civilians in our bloodshed! At least, not without an explicit purpose.
engSearchText:
And we would never involve innocent civilians in
our bloodshed! At least, not without an
explicit purpose.
jpnChrName: だが罪もない市民をただ巻き込むことは こちらも望んではいない。
jpnSearchText:
だが罪もない市民をただ巻き込むことは
こちらも望んではいない。

engChrName: So we went back to the drawing board...and we found a far more elegant solution.
engSearchText:
So we went back to the drawing board...and we found
a far more elegant solution.
jpnChrName: ──そこで、 とある特別な趣向を用意させてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
──そこで、
とある特別な趣向を用意させてもらった。

engChrName: We decided to host a game—one that would make clever use of the sprawling labyrinth of underground ruins just below this city.
engSearchText:
We decided to host a game—one that would make
clever use of the sprawling labyrinth of underground
ruins just below this city.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの地下にある広大な遺構を利用した、 とっておきの“ゲーム”だ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの地下にある広大な遺構を利用した、
とっておきの“ゲーム”だ。

engChrName: The concept is quite simple. We will have you all engage in a fierce competition—where you will proceed to slaughter one another like rabid animals.
engSearchText:
The concept is quite simple. We will have you all
engage in a fierce competition—where you will
proceed to slaughter one another like rabid animals.
jpnChrName: やる事はいたってシンプル── お前らには、これから潰し合ってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
やる事はいたってシンプル──
お前らには、これから潰し合ってもらう。

engChrName: Ah, and there's the noon bell. The game's first round will begin exactly two hours from now.
engSearchText:
Ah, and there's the noon bell. The game's first round
will begin exactly two hours from now.
jpnChrName: ちょうど正午だな── ゲームの“第一フェーズ”は１４時に開始となる。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど正午だな──
ゲームの“第一フェーズ”は１４時に開始となる。

engChrName: Each team has been assigned an entrance to the labyrinth. We will send each of you a map with their locations momentarily.
engSearchText:
Each team has been assigned an entrance to
the labyrinth. We will send each of you a map with
their locations momentarily.
jpnChrName: これから送るマップを頼りにそれぞれ 地下遺構への入口（エントリー）を確保するがいい。
jpnSearchText:
これから送るマップを頼りにそれぞれ
地下遺構への入口（エントリー）を確保するがいい。

engChrName: Once you arrive, you will need to search for a keycard that we hid near your respective entrances.
engSearchText:
Once you arrive, you will need to search for a keycard
that we hid near your respective entrances.
jpnChrName: 参加に必要な“アクセスキー”が その奥で手に入れられるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
参加に必要な“アクセスキー”が
その奥で手に入れられるはずだ。

engChrName: That about covers our overview. I look forward to seeing who I will fight at the end of these thrilling three days.
engSearchText:
That about covers our overview. I look forward to
seeing who I will fight at the end of these thrilling
three days.
jpnChrName: 最終的に誰がここまで辿り着くか── ３日間、存分に愉しませてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
最終的に誰がここまで辿り着くか──
３日間、存分に愉しませてもらうぞ。

engChrName: These must be the rules of the game and the map to the underground.
engSearchText:
These must be the rules of the game and the map to
the underground.
jpnChrName: ……“ルール”と 地下遺構の入口のマップか。
jpnSearchText:
……“ルール”と
地下遺構の入口のマップか。

engChrName: Let's have a look at them right away.
engSearchText: Let's have a look at them right away.
jpnChrName: すぐに確認いたしましょう。
jpnSearchText: すぐに確認いたしましょう。

engChrName: 1: The game begins at noon today and ends at 11:59PM on November 22nd. At exactly midnight, Almata will leave the area and detonate the bomb.
engSearchText:
1: The game begins at noon today and ends at
11:59PM on November 22nd. At exactly midnight,
Almata will leave the area and detonate the bomb.
jpnChrName: ①ゲーム期間は１１月２０日正午   ～１１月２２日２３時５９分まで。   ０時時点にアルマータは離脱し、反応兵器も起爆する。
jpnSearchText:
①ゲーム期間は１１月２０日正午
～１１月２２日２３時５９分まで。
０時時点にアルマータは離脱し、反応兵器も起爆する。

engChrName: 2: None of the participating players may enter or leave Oración—nor can they call on reinforcements from the outside.
engSearchText:
2: None of the participating players may enter or
leave Oración—nor can they call on reinforcements
from the outside.
jpnChrName: ②１１月２０日正午以降のオラシオン市内からの脱出、   および外からのゲームへの介入・増援の禁止。   ただし無知な市民・観光客の出入りには関知しない。
jpnSearchText:
②１１月２０日正午以降のオラシオン市内からの脱出、
および外からのゲームへの介入・増援の禁止。
ただし無知な市民・観光客の出入りには関知しない。

engChrName: 3: Any attempt to leak information on the game to the press or to the people of Oración will result in immediate detonation.
engSearchText:
3: Any attempt to leak information on the game to
the press or to the people of Oración will result in
immediate detonation.
jpnChrName: ③マスコミ・市民への情報伝達禁止。   ゲームの存在が漏れた時点で反応兵器が起爆する。
jpnSearchText:
③マスコミ・市民への情報伝達禁止。
ゲームの存在が漏れた時点で反応兵器が起爆する。

engChrName: 4: Do not attack Vashtar Palace from the outside or attempt to infiltrate it by any means other than through the established game area.
engSearchText:
4: Do not attack Vashtar Palace from the outside or
attempt to infiltrate it by any means other than
through the established game area.
jpnChrName: ④王宮跡への直接進入・介入・火力支援等による攻撃の禁止。   地下の“領域（フィールド）”を経由してのみ進入可とする。
jpnSearchText:
④王宮跡への直接進入・介入・火力支援等による攻撃の禁止。
地下の“領域（フィールド）”を経由してのみ進入可とする。

engChrName: 5: At the end of each round, a new underground area will be unlocked with a boss assigned to each. The last remaining team can enter the palace.
engSearchText:
5: At the end of each round, a new underground area
will be unlocked with a boss assigned to each.
The last remaining team can enter the palace.
jpnChrName: ⑤地下の“領域”は各フェーズごとに段階的に解放され、   それぞれの“担当者”が管理する。   最終日まで残った一勢力のみが王宮跡に進入できる。
jpnSearchText:
⑤地下の“領域”は各フェーズごとに段階的に解放され、
それぞれの“担当者”が管理する。
最終日まで残った一勢力のみが王宮跡に進入できる。

engChrName: Th-This can't be happening...
engSearchText: Th-This can't be happening...
jpnChrName: ……こ、これって……
jpnSearchText: ……こ、これって……

engChrName: Unfortunately, it is happening. We really are being forced to participate in a battle royale.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it is happening. We really are being
forced to participate in a battle royale.
jpnChrName: オラシオンを実質、都市封鎖した上での、 正真正銘のデスゲーム……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンを実質、都市封鎖した上での、
正真正銘のデスゲーム……

engChrName: With the Genesis watching over us, we will have to comply and abide by these rules as well.
engSearchText:
With the Genesis watching over us, we will have to
comply and abide by these rules as well.
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》による監視という以上、 これらのルールは絶対順守なのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》による監視という以上、
これらのルールは絶対順守なのでしょう。

engChrName: Right. If it catches us breaking any one of them, the whole city will be...destroyed.
engSearchText:
Right. If it catches us breaking any one of them, the
whole city will be...destroyed.
jpnChrName: 万が一破ったら、都市全体が……
jpnSearchText: 万が一破ったら、都市全体が……

engChrName: Our options are limited with the entirety of Oración's populace being held hostage.
engSearchText:
Our options are limited with the entirety of Oración's
populace being held hostage.
jpnChrName: ……オラシオン市民２８万人を まんまと質に取ったというわけか。
jpnSearchText:
……オラシオン市民２８万人を
まんまと質に取ったというわけか。

engChrName: Hey, wait a second. If the bomb detonates early, they'll get caught up in the blast, too, won't they?!
engSearchText:
Hey, wait a second. If the bomb detonates early,
they'll get caught up in the blast, too, won't they?!
jpnChrName: オイオイ──ヤツらだって 巻き込まれるはずだろうが！？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ──ヤツらだって
巻き込まれるはずだろうが！？

engChrName: No, these guys can teleport to safety whenever they want. Though even if they couldn't, I doubt they'd do this any differently.
engSearchText:
No, these guys can teleport to safety whenever
they want. Though even if they couldn't, I doubt
they'd do this any differently.
jpnChrName: 奴らには“転位”がある── ……いや、例え無かったとしてもか。
jpnSearchText:
奴らには“転位”がある──
……いや、例え無かったとしてもか。

engChrName: These guys are utterly insane.
engSearchText: These guys are utterly insane.
jpnChrName: それほどまでに狂っている…… そういう事かもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
それほどまでに狂っている……
そういう事かもしれないわね。

engChrName: So this is how they planned to exploit the fruits of Professor Callaghan's labor. How utterly abhorrent.
engSearchText:
So this is how they planned to exploit the fruits of
Professor Callaghan's labor. How utterly abhorrent.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン先生の成果と悔恨を こんな最悪のゲームなんかに……
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン先生の成果と悔恨を
こんな最悪のゲームなんかに……

engChrName: I can't say I'm happy about how they're abusing the Geneses, either.
engSearchText:
I can't say I'm happy about how they're abusing the
Geneses, either.
jpnChrName: はい、ゲネシスも………
jpnSearchText: はい、ゲネシスも………

engChrName: There are less than two hours until this first round begins. We have little time to waste.
engSearchText:
There are less than two hours until this first
round begins. We have little time to waste.
jpnChrName: “第一フェーズ”とやらの開始まで ２時間足らず──あまり余裕は無かろう。
jpnSearchText:
“第一フェーズ”とやらの開始まで
２時間足らず──あまり余裕は無かろう。

engChrName: What should our next move be, Van?
engSearchText: What should our next move be, Van?
jpnChrName: どうする、ヴァンよ？
jpnSearchText: どうする、ヴァンよ？

engChrName: I say we get out in the field right away.
engSearchText: I say we get out in the field right away.
jpnChrName: ええ…… すぐにでも動く必要がありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
すぐにでも動く必要がありそうだ。

engChrName: We can't afford to just sit on our hands. Not with what's at stake here.
engSearchText:
We can't afford to just sit on our hands. Not with
what's at stake here.
jpnChrName: ──悪趣味すぎる趣向だが、 様子見でも乗るしかなくなったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
──悪趣味すぎる趣向だが、
様子見でも乗るしかなくなったらしい。

engChrName: Eventually, we'll need to make our way over to the entrance and grab our keycard.
engSearchText:
Eventually, we'll need to make our way over to the
entrance and grab our keycard.
jpnChrName: マップによれば、地下への入口自体、 宿のすぐ近くにあるみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
マップによれば、地下への入口自体、
宿のすぐ近くにあるみたいだ。

engChrName: But first, I think we should walk around the South District. It'll help us get our bearings.
engSearchText:
But first, I think we should walk around the
South District. It'll help us get our bearings.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーの入手、それと最低限 南街区の状況くらいは確認しておくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキーの入手、それと最低限
南街区の状況くらいは確認しておくぞ。

engChrName: And while we're in the area, we can visit the guild branch there, too.
engSearchText:
And while we're in the area, we can visit the guild
branch there, too.
jpnChrName: ……ギルド支部もあるようですし、 一応、訪ねたほうがよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……ギルド支部もあるようですし、
一応、訪ねたほうがよさそうですね。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan!
engSearchText: Sounds like a plan!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）……！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）……！

engChrName: (Hmm... If these are all the rules, I might have an idea.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... If these are all the rules, I might have
an idea.)
jpnChrName: （この“ルール”なら……   ──ちょいと考えてみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（この“ルール”なら……
──ちょいと考えてみるか。）

engChrName: First, I will need a summary of everything that's happening in the surrounding area.
engSearchText:
First, I will need a summary of everything that's
happening in the surrounding area.
jpnChrName: まずは周辺状況をまとめてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText: まずは周辺状況をまとめてちょうだい。

engChrName: We'll also need to touch base with the local police. The CID has ordered them to work with us.
engSearchText:
We'll also need to touch base with the local police.
The CID has ordered them to work with us.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤからの指示があるとは思うから、 現地警察とは連携が取れる筈だけど……
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤからの指示があるとは思うから、
現地警察とは連携が取れる筈だけど……

engChrName: Bear in mind, though, they likely haven't been informed of the game, so be careful not to leak anything about it.
engSearchText:
Bear in mind, though, they likely haven't been
informed of the game, so be careful not to leak
anything about it.
jpnChrName: 例の“ルール”は、恐らく現場には 知らせない方針でしょうから注意して。
jpnSearchText:
例の“ルール”は、恐らく現場には
知らせない方針でしょうから注意して。

engChrName: As for the underground—
engSearchText: As for the underground—
jpnChrName: 地下の方については──
jpnSearchText: 地下の方については──

engChrName: Renne!
engSearchText: Renne!
jpnChrName: レン先輩……！
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……！

engChrName: Oh, hello. I'm glad you all could join us.
engSearchText: Oh, hello. I'm glad you all could join us.
jpnChrName: ふふ、貴方たちも着いたのね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、貴方たちも着いたのね。

engChrName: H-Hi, everyone!
engSearchText: H-Hi, everyone!
jpnChrName: お、お疲れ様です、皆さん！
jpnSearchText: お、お疲れ様です、皆さん！

engChrName: So you guys are gettin' right down to business, too, eh?
engSearchText:
So you guys are gettin' right down to business,
too, eh?
jpnChrName: おお、そっちも 早速動いてるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、そっちも
早速動いてるみたいだな。

engChrName: I knew Almata wasn't gonna make things easy for us, but they've turned our expectations on our heads yet again.
engSearchText:
I knew Almata wasn't gonna make things easy for us,
but they've turned our expectations on our heads
yet again.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、予想の遙か斜め上の 状況になっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、予想の遙か斜め上の
状況になっちまったな。

engChrName: Been a while, Roaring Lion. I'm happy to see you're still alive and kicking.
engSearchText:
Been a while, Roaring Lion. I'm happy to see you're
still alive and kicking.
jpnChrName: 獅子殿についてはご無沙汰してます。 ……ご壮健のようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
獅子殿についてはご無沙汰してます。
……ご壮健のようで何よりだ。

engChrName: Heh. Same to you, friend.
engSearchText: Heh. Same to you, friend.
jpnChrName: フフ、おぬしこそな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、おぬしこそな。

engChrName: You two know each other?
engSearchText: You two know each other?
jpnChrName: あ、お知り合いなんですね？
jpnSearchText: あ、お知り合いなんですね？

engChrName: Should've expected that. He probably knew my master through his own.
engSearchText:
Should've expected that. He probably knew my
master through his own.
jpnChrName: ま、泰斗の師範と親交があったら 面識があっても当然だろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、泰斗の師範と親交があったら
面識があっても当然だろうな。

engChrName: That's about the short of it. Just to be clear, though, I thought he died three years ago, too.
engSearchText:
That's about the short of it. Just to be clear, though, I
thought he died three years ago, too.
jpnChrName: ああ──といってもお前さんと同じく ３年前に亡くなられたと思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──といってもお前さんと同じく
３年前に亡くなられたと思ってたが。

engChrName: Anyway, Renne's gonna be serving as our supervisor while we're here.
engSearchText:
Anyway, Renne's gonna be serving as our supervisor
while we're here.
jpnChrName: それはともかく……この娘（レン）には スーパーバイザーを見込んでいてな。
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく……この娘（レン）には
スーパーバイザーを見込んでいてな。

engChrName: She's also the liaison between the guild and the other factions in the city. We figured she'd be a perfect fit for the job.
engSearchText:
She's also the liaison between the guild and the other
factions in the city. We figured she'd be a perfect fit
for the job.
jpnChrName: ギルドのみならず、各勢力間の連絡と 連携を取ってもらうために呼んだんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドのみならず、各勢力間の連絡と
連携を取ってもらうために呼んだんだ。

engChrName: I feel much better with her on board. She was a big help during the war two years ago.
engSearchText:
I feel much better with her on board. She was a big
help during the war two years ago.
jpnChrName: ん、２年前の帝国の 大戦でも色々手伝ってもらったし。
jpnSearchText:
ん、２年前の帝国の
大戦でも色々手伝ってもらったし。

engChrName: I do feel a little bad, though. She has a lot on her plate...
engSearchText:
I do feel a little bad, though. She has a lot on
her plate...
jpnChrName: ……早速、思いっきり 力になってもらっちゃってるけど。
jpnSearchText:
……早速、思いっきり
力になってもらっちゃってるけど。

engChrName: I certainly have my work cut out for me. Almata's sadistic scheming isn't making matters any simpler, either.
engSearchText:
I certainly have my work cut out for me.
Almata's sadistic scheming isn't making matters any
simpler, either.
jpnChrName: ええ、まさかあんな“ルール”を 用意して待ち受けてたなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まさかあんな“ルール”を
用意して待ち受けてたなんてね。

engChrName: But I'll manage. I'm quite proficient at multitasking, so this is well within my capabilities.
engSearchText:
But I'll manage. I'm quite proficient at multitasking,
so this is well within my capabilities.
jpnChrName: こちらもいきなり全力で 手伝わざるを得なくなったじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
こちらもいきなり全力で
手伝わざるを得なくなったじゃない。

engChrName: We're lucky to have you, Renne.
engSearchText: We're lucky to have you, Renne.
jpnChrName: 先輩……でも心強いです。
jpnSearchText: 先輩……でも心強いです。

engChrName: You go get 'em, tiger.
engSearchText: You go get 'em, tiger.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちの方は遠慮なく 期待させてもらうとして──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そっちの方は遠慮なく
期待させてもらうとして──

engChrName: Wow, you've got a lot of bracers for this op, huh?
engSearchText: Wow, you've got a lot of bracers for this op, huh?
jpnChrName: ……随分大所帯で来たんだな？
jpnSearchText: ……随分大所帯で来たんだな？

engChrName: Even the Gekka tomboy's here. How's it goin', girlie?
engSearchText: Even the Gekka tomboy's here. How's it goin', girlie?
jpnChrName: へえ、月華の跳ね返りまで 来てんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、月華の跳ね返りまで
来てんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Not. In. The. Mood.
engSearchText: Not. In. The. Mood.
jpnChrName: こら悪たれ、誰が跳ね返りね！？
jpnSearchText: こら悪たれ、誰が跳ね返りね！？

engChrName: ...Sorry. We're all a little on edge right now. We just lost one of our people today.
engSearchText:
...Sorry. We're all a little on edge right now. We just
lost one of our people today.
jpnChrName: ……一人、やられちまってな。
jpnSearchText: ……一人、やられちまってな。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: Two bracers were exploring the underground labyrinth, and they ran into Almata—who were likely in the midst of preparing for the game.
engSearchText:
Two bracers were exploring the underground
labyrinth, and they ran into Almata—who were likely
in the midst of preparing for the game.
jpnChrName: 昨日、例のルールにあった地下遺構で アルマータの連中に遭遇したそうよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日、例のルールにあった地下遺構で
アルマータの連中に遭遇したそうよ。

engChrName: They managed to bring back some valuable intelligence—but at a steep cost.
engSearchText:
They managed to bring back some valuable
intelligence—but at a steep cost.
jpnChrName: 多分ゲームの仕込み中だったんでしょう。 貴重な情報を持ち帰ってくれたけど……
jpnSearchText:
多分ゲームの仕込み中だったんでしょう。
貴重な情報を持ち帰ってくれたけど……

engChrName: One of them was badly wounded...and the other passed away this morning.
engSearchText:
One of them was badly wounded...and the other
passed away this morning.
jpnChrName: ……一人は重傷で、もう一人は 今朝、息を引き取ったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
……一人は重傷で、もう一人は
今朝、息を引き取ったみたい。

engChrName: That's horrible...
engSearchText: That's horrible...
jpnChrName: そ、そんな……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな……

engChrName: I'm so sorry to hear that, you guys.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry to hear that, you guys.
jpnChrName: ……そんなことが……
jpnSearchText: ……そんなことが……

engChrName: I just finished getting ready, Zi—oh.
engSearchText: I just finished getting ready, Zi—oh.
jpnChrName: ジンさん、こちらは 準備が出来ました──って。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさん、こちらは
準備が出来ました──って。

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレインさん……！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……！

engChrName: ...Hey.
engSearchText: ...Hey.
jpnChrName: ……よう。
jpnSearchText: ……よう。

engChrName: I had heard you were in the city, but I didn't expect to run into you so soon.
engSearchText:
I had heard you were in the city, but I didn't expect to
run into you so soon.
jpnChrName: 貴方たち…… 来ているのは聞いていたけど。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たち……
来ているのは聞いていたけど。

engChrName: I take it you've been worried about me after what happened yesterday?
engSearchText:
I take it you've been worried about me after what
happened yesterday?
jpnChrName: ……どうやら昨日の件で 余計な心配をかけたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやら昨日の件で
余計な心配をかけたみたいね。

engChrName: Well, don't be. I'm fine now.
engSearchText: Well, don't be. I'm fine now.
jpnChrName: でも、もう大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText: でも、もう大丈夫よ。

engChrName: With the stakes as high as they are, I can ill afford to be reckless—nor can I be too caught up in the past.
engSearchText:
With the stakes as high as they are, I can ill afford to
be reckless—nor can I be too caught up in the past.
jpnChrName: こんなふざけたゲームが始まった以上── 最早迷っても、後悔してもいられない。
jpnSearchText:
こんなふざけたゲームが始まった以上──
最早迷っても、後悔してもいられない。

engChrName: I hear you there.
engSearchText: I hear you there.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: How about we let bygones be bygones, then?
engSearchText: How about we let bygones be bygones, then?
jpnChrName: ……こんな形でっつーのも お互いとりあえず置いておくか。
jpnSearchText:
……こんな形でっつーのも
お互いとりあえず置いておくか。

engChrName: Yes, let's.
engSearchText: Yes, let's.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうね。

engChrName: Since you are here, I'm sure you fully intend to dive headlong into the jaws of danger.
engSearchText:
Since you are here, I'm sure you fully intend to dive
headlong into the jaws of danger.
jpnChrName: ──そっちも組み込まれた以上、 何らかの形で動き始めるつもりでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
──そっちも組み込まれた以上、
何らかの形で動き始めるつもりでしょう。

engChrName: Normally, I would suggest that you not take your assistants on that journey with you...
engSearchText:
Normally, I would suggest that you not take your
assistants on that journey with you...
jpnChrName: 助手さんたちの安全を……と言いたいけど こうなった以上、一蓮托生かもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
助手さんたちの安全を……と言いたいけど
こうなった以上、一蓮托生かもしれない。

engChrName: ...but seeing as there is no safe haven here, I will only ask that you and your friends be careful.
engSearchText:
...but seeing as there is no safe haven here, I will only
ask that you and your friends be careful.
jpnChrName: せめて気をつけなさい──連中は勿論、 他の勢力にも足元をすくわれないように。
jpnSearchText:
せめて気をつけなさい──連中は勿論、
他の勢力にも足元をすくわれないように。

engChrName: Of course. And you do the same.
engSearchText: Of course. And you do the same.
jpnChrName: 分かってる── そっちこそ気をつけろ。
jpnSearchText:
分かってる──
そっちこそ気をつけろ。

engChrName: We should probably get going, you two.
engSearchText: We should probably get going, you two.
jpnChrName: ジン、エレイン、そろそろ行こう。
jpnSearchText: ジン、エレイン、そろそろ行こう。

engChrName: Sounds good. Off to the underground, then.
engSearchText: Sounds good. Off to the underground, then.
jpnChrName: ああ──俺たちも早速、 地下遺構とやらに向かう所でな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──俺たちも早速、
地下遺構とやらに向かう所でな。

engChrName: We will be counting on you all to handle everything up here.
engSearchText:
We will be counting on you all to handle everything
up here.
jpnChrName: ラハドさん、アルヴィス君たちも。 地上方面の対応は頼みました。
jpnSearchText:
ラハドさん、アルヴィス君たちも。
地上方面の対応は頼みました。

engChrName: Understood. We won't let you down.
engSearchText: Understood. We won't let you down.
jpnChrName: おう、任せとけや。
jpnSearchText: おう、任せとけや。

engChrName: Watch your backs out there!
engSearchText: Watch your backs out there!
jpnChrName: っ…… エレインさん達もお気を付けて！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
エレインさん達もお気を付けて！

engChrName: I'm gonna get to work, too!
engSearchText: I'm gonna get to work, too!
jpnChrName: 私も取材を始めますっ……！
jpnSearchText: 私も取材を始めますっ……！

engChrName: I may not be able to keep my editors in the loop about all this, but that won't stop me. If Dingo was here, he would do something about this.
engSearchText:
I may not be able to keep my editors in the loop
about all this, but that won't stop me. If Dingo was
here, he would do something about this.
jpnChrName: 編集部には絶対伝えられませんけど せめてディンゴさんの代わりに……！
jpnSearchText:
編集部には絶対伝えられませんけど
せめてディンゴさんの代わりに……！

engChrName: If you need my help with anything—or if you want to talk—you know where to find me.
engSearchText:
If you need my help with anything—or if you want to
talk—you know where to find me.
jpnChrName: 私は基本、ここに詰めてるわ。 いつでも相談に乗るから。
jpnSearchText:
私は基本、ここに詰めてるわ。
いつでも相談に乗るから。

engChrName: Thank you. We'll be sure to take you up on that if we need to.
engSearchText:
Thank you. We'll be sure to take you up on that if we
need to.
jpnChrName: ええ──宜しくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ええ──宜しくお願いします。

engChrName: Perhaps we could ask if the messages we received from Almata all contain the same information. Just in case.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we could ask if the messages we received
from Almata all contain the same information. Just
in case.
jpnChrName: では念のため、彼らからのメールに 齟齬がないかなどの確認を──
jpnSearchText:
では念のため、彼らからのメールに
齟齬がないかなどの確認を──

engChrName: This must be it.
engSearchText: This must be it.
jpnChrName: ここが……
jpnSearchText: ここが……

engChrName: Our keycard's waiting for us just on the other side of this door.
engSearchText:
Our keycard's waiting for us just on the other side of
this door.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーっつうのがある 地下への扉みてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキーっつうのがある
地下への扉みてえだな。

engChrName: Wow. This place is, like, right next to where we're staying. Convenient.
engSearchText:
Wow. This place is, like, right next to where
we're staying. Convenient.
jpnChrName: 宿のすぐ近くだし、 使いやすくていいけど……
jpnSearchText:
宿のすぐ近くだし、
使いやすくていいけど……

engChrName: We received instructions on how to open the door, yes?
engSearchText:
We received instructions on how to open the
door, yes?
jpnChrName: ……さっきのメールの中に 開け方の手順も書かれてたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
……さっきのメールの中に
開け方の手順も書かれてたっけ。

engChrName: Yeah, it came with the message we got. It's similar to how I open these kinds of doors back in Edith.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it came with the message we got. It's similar to
how I open these kinds of doors back in Edith.
jpnChrName: ああ──首都にある扉と 同じようなカラクリみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──首都にある扉と
同じようなカラクリみたいだな。

engChrName: I take it this is the mafia's work, too, then?
engSearchText: I take it this is the mafia's work, too, then?
jpnChrName: ……この仕掛けも含めて マフィアが用意したんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……この仕掛けも含めて
マフィアが用意したんでしょうか？

engChrName: Probably. Either way, we don't know what we're gonna run into in here, so be careful, you guys.
engSearchText:
Probably. Either way, we don't know what we're
gonna run into in here, so be careful, you guys.
jpnChrName: ああ、何を仕掛けてるか分からねえ。 入るなら慎重に行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何を仕掛けてるか分からねえ。
入るなら慎重に行くぞ。

engChrName: Okay, we've already taken a cursory look around this district.
engSearchText:
Okay, we've already taken a cursory look around
this district.
jpnChrName: ……とりあえず この街区だけは軽く回れましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……とりあえず
この街区だけは軽く回れましたね。

engChrName: I wish we could do the same for the others, but we don't have time.
engSearchText:
I wish we could do the same for the others, but we
don't have time.
jpnChrName: 正直、他の街区も回って 状況を確かめたかったですが……
jpnSearchText:
正直、他の街区も回って
状況を確かめたかったですが……

engChrName: Indeed. The first round will be starting very soon.
engSearchText: Indeed. The first round will be starting very soon.
jpnChrName: 今回は仕方がないかと。 時間もそろそろ迫っていますし。
jpnSearchText:
今回は仕方がないかと。
時間もそろそろ迫っていますし。

engChrName: At least we were able to exchange info at the guild. We got our keycard, too.
engSearchText:
At least we were able to exchange info at the guild.
We got our keycard, too.
jpnChrName: でも、ギルドとは情報交換して アクセスキーも手に入れました。
jpnSearchText:
でも、ギルドとは情報交換して
アクセスキーも手に入れました。

engChrName: Maybe we can take a quick breather while we wait for—
engSearchText:
Maybe we can take a quick breather while we wait
for—
jpnChrName: あとは開始時刻まで待機して──
jpnSearchText: あとは開始時刻まで待機して──

engChrName: Sorry, but we can't. There's something we gotta do before we head into the game.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but we can't. There's something we gotta do
before we head into the game.
jpnChrName: ──いや、 もう一つやるべきことがある。
jpnSearchText:
──いや、
もう一つやるべきことがある。

engChrName: Oh? And what's that?
engSearchText: Oh? And what's that?
jpnChrName: 何よ、やるべきことって？
jpnSearchText: 何よ、やるべきことって？

engChrName: Based on the size of the arena and the teams we're gonna be up against...
engSearchText:
Based on the size of the arena and the teams we're
gonna be up against...
jpnChrName: 広大な地下遺構を探索しつつの 勝ち残りを賭けたデスゲーム……
jpnSearchText:
広大な地下遺構を探索しつつの
勝ち残りを賭けたデスゲーム……

engChrName: ...our chances of winning and taking home the gold are slim to none.
engSearchText:
...our chances of winning and taking home the gold
are slim to none.
jpnChrName: 多分、俺たちだけじゃ 最後まで残るのは厳しいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、俺たちだけじゃ
最後まで残るのは厳しいだろう。

engChrName: Normally, I'd call you a pessimistic wuss for saying that...
engSearchText:
Normally, I'd call you a pessimistic wuss for
saying that...
jpnChrName: チッ、やる前から弱気なことを── ……と言いてえところだが。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、やる前から弱気なことを──
……と言いてえところだが。

engChrName: ...but you've got a point. We're up against Heiyue, top rank jaegers, and even our batshit clients.
engSearchText:
...but you've got a point. We're up against Heiyue,
top rank jaegers, and even our batshit clients.
jpnChrName: 確かに黒月に高位猟兵団、 ふざけた依頼者（結社）まで参加してるからな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに黒月に高位猟兵団、
ふざけた依頼者（結社）まで参加してるからな。

engChrName: Our group is rather small in comparison to much of our competition.
engSearchText:
Our group is rather small in comparison to much of
our competition.
jpnChrName: それと比べて私たちは一個人事務所……
jpnSearchText: それと比べて私たちは一個人事務所……

engChrName: And though a few groups are lacking in numbers, they make up for it with their tactical support.
engSearchText:
And though a few groups are lacking in numbers,
they make up for it with their tactical support.
jpnChrName: 人数はともかく、バックアップも含めてだと 最終的にはかなり厳しいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
人数はともかく、バックアップも含めてだと
最終的にはかなり厳しいでしょう。

engChrName: That's definitely true of Abi and my brother.
engSearchText: That's definitely true of Abi and my brother.
jpnChrName: ……はい、父（アブ）もお兄ちゃんも “戦（いくさ）”となれば全力で来るはずですし。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、父（アブ）もお兄ちゃんも
“戦（いくさ）”となれば全力で来るはずですし。

engChrName: But we can't just throw in the towel!
engSearchText: But we can't just throw in the towel!
jpnChrName: でも、ここで引き下がるわけには……！
jpnSearchText: でも、ここで引き下がるわけには……！

engChrName: Yeah, and we won't.
engSearchText: Yeah, and we won't.
jpnChrName: 引き下がるつもりはねぇさ。
jpnSearchText: 引き下がるつもりはねぇさ。

engChrName: We just got a hole in the manpower department, and there's only one way to fill it: recruit more people.
engSearchText:
We just got a hole in the manpower department, and
there's only one way to fill it: recruit more people.
jpnChrName: バックアップも含めて足りねえなら ──足りるようにしちまえばいい。
jpnSearchText:
バックアップも含めて足りねえなら
──足りるようにしちまえばいい。

engChrName: W-Wait, are you suggesting...?
engSearchText: W-Wait, are you suggesting...?
jpnChrName: も、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: も、もしかして……

engChrName: You wish to form an alliance with another team, I take it?
engSearchText:
You wish to form an alliance with another team, I
take it?
jpnChrName: ──どこか別の勢力と 協力を結ぼうというわけか。
jpnSearchText:
──どこか別の勢力と
協力を結ぼうというわけか。

engChrName: Exactly. And it'll be a completely equal partnership, of course.
engSearchText:
Exactly. And it'll be a completely equal partnership,
of course.
jpnChrName: ええ、その通りです。 あくまでも対等の協力関係として。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その通りです。
あくまでも対等の協力関係として。

engChrName: The other teams have all got their goals and agendas, as well as the resources to see them through.
engSearchText:
The other teams have all got their goals and agendas,
as well as the resources to see them through.
jpnChrName: 元々、この地に集まった連中には 各自の思惑とバックボーンがあるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
元々、この地に集まった連中には
各自の思惑とバックボーンがあるはずだ。

engChrName: Normally, they'd never form a partnership with anyone, but we've got the benefit of not bein' beholden to anyone. We're flexible like that.
engSearchText:
Normally, they'd never form a partnership with
anyone, but we've got the benefit of not bein'
beholden to anyone. We're flexible like that.
jpnChrName: その意味で本来、協力関係は有り得ねえ。 ──何のしがらみもねぇ、俺たち以外はな。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で本来、協力関係は有り得ねえ。
──何のしがらみもねぇ、俺たち以外はな。

engChrName: But wouldn't doing this break one of the rules?
engSearchText: But wouldn't doing this break one of the rules?
jpnChrName: な、なるほど…… でも送られてきたルールでは……
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど……
でも送られてきたルールでは……

engChrName: '2: None of the participating players may enter or leave Oración—nor can they call on reinforcements from the outside.'
engSearchText:
'2: None of the participating players may enter or
leave Oración—nor can they call on reinforcements
from the outside.'
jpnChrName: 『②オラシオン市内からの脱出、 および外からの追加介入・増援の禁止』だね。
jpnSearchText:
『②オラシオン市内からの脱出、
および外からの追加介入・増援の禁止』だね。

engChrName: Hmm... Would joining forces with another team classify as calling on reinforcements?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Would joining forces with another team
classify as calling on reinforcements?
jpnChrName: でも、確かにこの文面って……
jpnSearchText: でも、確かにこの文面って……

engChrName: I don't think so. The rule specifically prohibits calling on them 'from the outside.' It doesn't say anything about doing so from inside the city.
engSearchText:
I don't think so. The rule specifically prohibits calling
on them 'from the outside.' It doesn't say anything
about doing so from inside the city.
jpnChrName: すでに街にいる勢力同士の協力は 禁止されていない……？
jpnSearchText:
すでに街にいる勢力同士の協力は
禁止されていない……？

engChrName: Ha! Technicality saves the day!
engSearchText: Ha! Technicality saves the day!
jpnChrName: うん──行けそうね。 少なくとも文面には抵触してないわ！
jpnSearchText:
うん──行けそうね。
少なくとも文面には抵触してないわ！

engChrName: It probably violates the spirit of the rule, but eh, who cares? It's their own damn fault for not being more clear.
engSearchText:
It probably violates the spirit of the rule, but eh,
who cares? It's their own damn fault for not being
more clear.
jpnChrName: ハン……連中の裏を掻くって意味でも 共同戦線ってのは面白そうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……連中の裏を掻くって意味でも
共同戦線ってのは面白そうだぜ。

engChrName: But who are we gonna turn to? And how are we gonna find them?
engSearchText:
But who are we gonna turn to? And how are we
gonna find them?
jpnChrName: だが、そもそもどの勢力が どこにいるかすら掴めてねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
だが、そもそもどの勢力が
どこにいるかすら掴めてねぇぞ？

engChrName: The guild is one option. We know where they are located, and they would very likely agree to your proposal.
engSearchText:
The guild is one option. We know where they are
located, and they would very likely agree to
your proposal.
jpnChrName: 一番協力に応じて頂けそうな ギルドならば分かりますが……
jpnSearchText:
一番協力に応じて頂けそうな
ギルドならば分かりますが……

engChrName: True, but there might be other good candidates, too—even if they come with more risk.
engSearchText:
True, but there might be other good candidates,
too—even if they come with more risk.
jpnChrName: ああ、だがそれ以外の勢力も リスクは高いだろうがアリだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だがそれ以外の勢力も
リスクは高いだろうがアリだろう。

engChrName: We've just gotta make sure it's a team that fits with our way of doin' things.
engSearchText:
We've just gotta make sure it's a team that fits with
our way of doin' things.
jpnChrName: あくまで俺たちの“流儀”と 折り合えるってのが条件になるが。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで俺たちの“流儀”と
折り合えるってのが条件になるが。

engChrName: As for finding out where the other teams are, there's a friend of ours here in this city who might be able to lend a hand there.
engSearchText:
As for finding out where the other teams are, there's a
friend of ours here in this city who might be able to
lend a hand there.
jpnChrName: そして居場所については── “適任者”に会ったばかりだろ？
jpnSearchText:
そして居場所については──
“適任者”に会ったばかりだろ？

engChrName: Oh! Renne!
engSearchText: Oh! Renne!
jpnChrName: あ……！ レン先輩、ですね？
jpnSearchText:
あ……！
レン先輩、ですね？

engChrName: Great idea. If anyone could help us with that, it'd be her.
engSearchText:
Great idea. If anyone could help us with that, it'd
be her.
jpnChrName: 成程、あの人だったら……
jpnSearchText: 成程、あの人だったら……

engChrName: Then let's hurry on over to the guild!
engSearchText: Then let's hurry on over to the guild!
jpnChrName: だったら善は急げです！ ギルドに行ってみましょう！
jpnSearchText:
だったら善は急げです！
ギルドに行ってみましょう！

engChrName: Hello there. You look like you have something on your mind.
engSearchText:
Hello there. You look like you have something on
your mind.
jpnChrName: あら、アニエスたち。 いかにも相談事って顔だけど。
jpnSearchText:
あら、アニエスたち。
いかにも相談事って顔だけど。

engChrName: We have something we want to discuss with you.
engSearchText: We have something we want to discuss with you.
jpnChrName: ええ、実は──
jpnSearchText: ええ、実は──

engChrName: That's quite the clever little scheme you've devised.
engSearchText: That's quite the clever little scheme you've devised.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、他の勢力と協力か。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど、他の勢力と協力か。

engChrName: Leave it to Van to find and exploit the smallest of loopholes within the rules.
engSearchText:
Leave it to Van to find and exploit the smallest of
loopholes within the rules.
jpnChrName: ルールの穴を突く“裏技”…… フフ、裏解決屋さんらしいやり方ね。
jpnSearchText:
ルールの穴を突く“裏技”……
フフ、裏解決屋さんらしいやり方ね。

engChrName: So, think you can help us out?
engSearchText: So, think you can help us out?
jpnChrName: それで、どうなんだ？
jpnSearchText: それで、どうなんだ？

engChrName: Of course. Who do you think you're talking to?
engSearchText: Of course. Who do you think you're talking to?
jpnChrName: 当然、この地に集まっている 勢力についてはすでに把握済みよ。
jpnSearchText:
当然、この地に集まっている
勢力についてはすでに把握済みよ。

engChrName: I already know the names of all the teams, their bases of operations within the city, and where their respective entrances are located.
engSearchText:
I already know the names of all the teams, their bases
of operations within the city, and where their
respective entrances are located.
jpnChrName: 各勢力が拠点にしている場所や、 確保している地下遺構の入口も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
各勢力が拠点にしている場所や、
確保している地下遺構の入口も含めて。

engChrName: How?! You haven't even been here an hour!
engSearchText: How?! You haven't even been here an hour!
jpnChrName: まだ到着して１時間かそこらで そこまで掴んでるのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
まだ到着して１時間かそこらで
そこまで掴んでるのかよ！？

engChrName: Phew. I'm sure glad she's on our side.
engSearchText: Phew. I'm sure glad she's on our side.
jpnChrName: うーん、噂は聞いてたけど ほんと規格外な子みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、噂は聞いてたけど
ほんと規格外な子みたいね。

engChrName: Of course, I can't spill all the tea, but I can at least let slip the current locations of the teams.
engSearchText:
Of course, I can't spill all the tea, but I can at least let
slip the current locations of the teams.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あくまで私にできるのは 居場所を教えられるくらいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あくまで私にできるのは
居場所を教えられるくらいだけど。

engChrName: If you wish to have a successful alliance, I suggest you ally with a group that aligns with your principles.
engSearchText:
If you wish to have a successful alliance, I suggest you
ally with a group that aligns with your principles.
jpnChrName: 交渉の余地があるかはあくまで 貴方たちの“流儀”次第でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
交渉の余地があるかはあくまで
貴方たちの“流儀”次第でしょう。

engChrName: Do you have a particular team in mind?
engSearchText: Do you have a particular team in mind?
jpnChrName: 誰と交渉するかは決まっているの？
jpnSearchText: 誰と交渉するかは決まっているの？

engChrName: The way you've handled your work thus far will determine who you can form an alliance with.
engSearchText:
The way you've handled your work thus far will
determine who you can form an alliance with.
jpnChrName: 交渉の余地があるかは 貴方たちの“流儀”次第でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
交渉の余地があるかは
貴方たちの“流儀”次第でしょう。

engChrName: Do you have a particular team in mind?
engSearchText: Do you have a particular team in mind?
jpnChrName: 誰と交渉するかは決まっているの？
jpnSearchText: 誰と交渉するかは決まっているの？

engChrName: (I think the only teams that'd consider allying with us are...)
engSearchText:
(I think the only teams that'd consider allying with
us are...)
jpnChrName: （今の俺たちと   協力を結べそうな相手は……）
jpnSearchText:
（今の俺たちと
協力を結べそうな相手は……）

engChrName: Choose a team to go and meet with. Once you have chosen a team, you cannot change your decision.
engSearchText:
Choose a team to go and meet with. Once you have
chosen a team, you cannot change your decision.
jpnChrName: 協力を打診する勢力を選んでください。 ※一度選ぶと変更することはできません。
jpnSearchText:
協力を打診する勢力を選んでください。
※一度選ぶと変更することはできません。

engChrName: All right. You've still got a little time to decide, but you will want to decide soon.
engSearchText:
All right. You've still got a little time to decide, but
you will want to decide soon.
jpnChrName: そう、でも時間は あまり残されていないわ。
jpnSearchText:
そう、でも時間は
あまり残されていないわ。

engChrName: Come and see me once you've made up your mind.
engSearchText: Come and see me once you've made up your mind.
jpnChrName: 決まったら声をかけてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText: 決まったら声をかけてちょうだい。

engChrName: Your Law alignment level isn't high enough.
engSearchText: Your Law alignment level isn't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＬ・ＬＶが不足しています。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アライメントのＬ・ＬＶが不足しています。

engChrName: Your Gray alignment level isn't high enough.
engSearchText: Your Gray alignment level isn't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＧ・ＬＶが不足しています。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アライメントのＧ・ＬＶが不足しています。

engChrName: Your combined Law and Chaos alignment levels aren't high enough.
engSearchText:
Your combined Law and Chaos alignment levels
aren't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＬ・ＬＶとＣ・ＬＶの 合計値が不足しています。
jpnSearchText:
アライメントのＬ・ＬＶとＣ・ＬＶの
合計値が不足しています。

engChrName: Your Chaos alignment level isn't high enough.
engSearchText: Your Chaos alignment level isn't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＣ・ＬＶが不足しています。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アライメントのＣ・ＬＶが不足しています。

engChrName: (I don't think they fit with our style, to be honest.)
engSearchText: (I don't think they fit with our style, to be honest.)
jpnChrName: （……俺たちの流儀とは   どうにも合わなさそうだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……俺たちの流儀とは
どうにも合わなさそうだ。）

engChrName: (We should probably consider someone else.)
engSearchText: (We should probably consider someone else.)
jpnChrName: （別の連中との協力を   考えたほうがいいかもしれねぇな。）
jpnSearchText:
（別の連中との協力を
考えたほうがいいかもしれねぇな。）

engChrName: (We've already got a decent working relationship with the guild, so they might be our best bet.)
engSearchText:
(We've already got a decent working relationship
with the guild, so they might be our best bet.)
jpnChrName: （ギルドとはこれまでも何度か協力している。   戦力的にも申し分ねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルドとはこれまでも何度か協力している。
戦力的にも申し分ねぇ。）

engChrName: (They're also short on manpower, so they're likely to see this as a mutually beneficial arrangement.)
engSearchText:
(They're also short on manpower, so they're likely to
see this as a mutually beneficial arrangement.)
jpnChrName: （地上のフォローであちらも人手不足だし、   交渉できる可能性は高いだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（地上のフォローであちらも人手不足だし、
交渉できる可能性は高いだろう。）

engChrName: (I can see us butting heads on some things, though.)
engSearchText: (I can see us butting heads on some things, though.)
jpnChrName: （流儀の部分でどうしてもぶつかる可能性は   あるかもしれねぇが……）
jpnSearchText:
（流儀の部分でどうしてもぶつかる可能性は
あるかもしれねぇが……）

engChrName: (Cao and Yin are here on behalf of Heiyue.)
engSearchText: (Cao and Yin are here on behalf of Heiyue.)
jpnChrName: （《黒月》……   ツァオに銀も来てるみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（《黒月》……
ツァオに銀も来てるみたいだな。）

engChrName: (It'd be hard to win 'em over, but Heiyue's a huge syndicate with connections on both sides of the law.)
engSearchText:
(It'd be hard to win 'em over, but Heiyue's a huge
syndicate with connections on both sides of the law.)
jpnChrName: （交渉は厄介そうだが、   表と裏を使い分ける巨大シンジケート──）
jpnSearchText:
（交渉は厄介そうだが、
表と裏を使い分ける巨大シンジケート──）

engChrName: (Might be worth tryin' to score an agreement with them.)
engSearchText:
(Might be worth tryin' to score an agreement
with them.)
jpnChrName: （上手く協力をとりつければ   裏解決屋としては動きやすくなるはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（上手く協力をとりつければ
裏解決屋としては動きやすくなるはずだ。）

engChrName: (What about the jaeger corps we ran into in Longlai? I'm sure that Divine Blade's with 'em, and she's crazy strong.)
engSearchText:
(What about the jaeger corps we ran into in Longlai?
I'm sure that Divine Blade's with 'em, and she's
crazy strong.)
jpnChrName: （龍來で遭遇した東部最強の猟兵団……   多分、あの“剣聖”も来てるんだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（龍來で遭遇した東部最強の猟兵団……
多分、あの“剣聖”も来てるんだろう。）

engChrName: (Dunno what they're after here, but if they were on our side, we'd have this game in the bag.)
engSearchText:
(Dunno what they're after here, but if they were on
our side, we'd have this game in the bag.)
jpnChrName: （何を考えてるか分からねえ連中だが、   実力は言うまでもなく折り紙付き……）
jpnSearchText:
（何を考えてるか分からねえ連中だが、
実力は言うまでもなく折り紙付き……）

engChrName: (Definitely worth a shot, I think.)
engSearchText: (Definitely worth a shot, I think.)
jpnChrName: （ワンチャン交渉してみるのはアリかもな。）
jpnSearchText: （ワンチャン交渉してみるのはアリかもな。）

engChrName: (Those two society goons from yesterday are here, and so's the Direwolf.)
engSearchText:
(Those two society goons from yesterday are here,
and so's the Direwolf.)
jpnChrName: （結社──事務所に来たあの２人に   《痩せ狼》も来てるって話だったが。）
jpnSearchText:
（結社──事務所に来たあの２人に
《痩せ狼》も来てるって話だったが。）

engChrName: (Their strength is on another level—and that goes double for the Oathbreaker.)
engSearchText:
(Their strength is on another level—and that goes
double for the Oathbreaker.)
jpnChrName: （……間違いなく危険な連中だ。   特にあの《破戒》って男はケタ違いだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（……間違いなく危険な連中だ。
特にあの《破戒》って男はケタ違いだろう。）

engChrName: (Can't believe I'm even toyin' with the idea, but maybe we should ask them to join our crew. High risk, high reward.)
engSearchText:
(Can't believe I'm even toyin' with the idea, but
maybe we should ask them to join our crew.
High risk, high reward.)
jpnChrName: （かなりのリスクを覚悟する必要はあるが──   飛び込んでみる価値はあるかもしれねぇな。）
jpnSearchText:
（かなりのリスクを覚悟する必要はあるが──
飛び込んでみる価値はあるかもしれねぇな。）

engChrName: Are you sure you want to ally with the team you have chosen? After making your decision, you won't be able to return to the city for a while.
engSearchText:
Are you sure you want to ally with the team you
have chosen? After making your decision, you won't
be able to return to the city for a while.
jpnChrName: 選んだ勢力で本当によろしいですか？ ※メインストーリーが進行して 　しばらく街に戻れなくなります。
jpnSearchText:
選んだ勢力で本当によろしいですか？
※メインストーリーが進行して
　しばらく街に戻れなくなります。

engChrName: Yeah. We're gonna try our luck with...
engSearchText: Yeah. We're gonna try our luck with...
jpnChrName: ああ、俺たちが交渉するのは──
jpnSearchText: ああ、俺たちが交渉するのは──

engChrName: Yeah. We're gonna try our luck with...
engSearchText: Yeah. We're gonna try our luck with...
jpnChrName: それじゃあ教えてくれ、 俺たちが交渉するのは──
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ教えてくれ、
俺たちが交渉するのは──

engChrName: All right. You've still got a little time to decide, but you will want to decide soon.
engSearchText:
All right. You've still got a little time to decide, but
you will want to decide soon.
jpnChrName: そう、でも時間は あまり残されていないわ。
jpnSearchText:
そう、でも時間は
あまり残されていないわ。

engChrName: Come and see me once you've made up your mind.
engSearchText: Come and see me once you've made up your mind.
jpnChrName: 決まったら声をかけてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText: 決まったら声をかけてちょうだい。

engChrName: Your Law alignment level isn't high enough.
engSearchText: Your Law alignment level isn't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＬ・ＬＶが不足しています。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アライメントのＬ・ＬＶが不足しています。

engChrName: Your Gray alignment level isn't high enough.
engSearchText: Your Gray alignment level isn't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＧ・ＬＶが不足しています。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アライメントのＧ・ＬＶが不足しています。

engChrName: Your combined Law and Chaos alignment levels aren't high enough.
engSearchText:
Your combined Law and Chaos alignment levels
aren't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＬ・ＬＶとＣ・ＬＶの 合計値が不足しています。
jpnSearchText:
アライメントのＬ・ＬＶとＣ・ＬＶの
合計値が不足しています。

engChrName: Your Chaos alignment level isn't high enough.
engSearchText: Your Chaos alignment level isn't high enough.
jpnChrName: アライメントのＣ・ＬＶが不足しています。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アライメントのＣ・ＬＶが不足しています。

engChrName: Are you sure you want to ally with the team you have chosen?
engSearchText:
Are you sure you want to ally with the team you
have chosen?
jpnChrName: 選んだ勢力で本当によろしいですか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>選んだ勢力で本当によろしいですか？

engChrName: After the alliance was formed, all that was left to do was wait for the game to begin.
engSearchText:
After the alliance was formed, all that was left to do
was wait for the game to begin.
jpnChrName: ──その後、協力者たちと共に ヴァンたちが確保した入口へと移動し……
jpnSearchText:
──その後、協力者たちと共に
ヴァンたちが確保した入口へと移動し……

engChrName: Both groups passed the time by exchanging information until the appointed hour finally arrived.
engSearchText:
Both groups passed the time by exchanging
information until the appointed hour finally arrived.
jpnChrName: 双方が把握する情報を軽く共有しつつ、 ゲームの開始時刻を待つのだった。
jpnSearchText:
双方が把握する情報を軽く共有しつつ、
ゲームの開始時刻を待つのだった。

engChrName: November 21st, 1208, 5:03AM
engSearchText: November 21st, 1208, 5:03AM

engChrName: Th-That felt like...
engSearchText: Th-That felt like...
jpnChrName: い、今の感覚って……
jpnSearchText: い、今の感覚って……

engChrName: Yeah. It's the same feeling I got when that murderous maniac showed up.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's the same feeling I got when that murderous
maniac showed up.
jpnChrName: ああ、鏖殺野郎が現れた時の……
jpnSearchText: ああ、鏖殺野郎が現れた時の……

engChrName: What's up, René?
engSearchText: What's up, René?
jpnChrName: ルネか……どうした？
jpnSearchText: ルネか……どうした？

engChrName: We have a problem.
engSearchText: We have a problem.
jpnChrName: ──不味い事になった。
jpnSearchText: ──不味い事になった。

engChrName: I just received word that our Hercules β company acted against our orders.
engSearchText:
I just received word that our Hercules β company
acted against our orders.
jpnChrName: 今しがた省内である事実が判明した。
jpnSearchText: 今しがた省内である事実が判明した。

engChrName: They sent a squad to infiltrate the city from the outside.
engSearchText:
They sent a squad to infiltrate the city from
the outside.
jpnChrName: ハーキュリーズβ中隊が、先ほど独断専行で 市外からの潜入を敢行したらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ハーキュリーズβ中隊が、先ほど独断専行で
市外からの潜入を敢行したらしい。

engChrName: Now, hold on a damn second. I thought your supervisors knew what was goin' on here!
engSearchText:
Now, hold on a damn second. I thought your
supervisors knew what was goin' on here!
jpnChrName: ……待て、そっちの雇ってる連中から お前らも状況は分かってるだろうが！？
jpnSearchText:
……待て、そっちの雇ってる連中から
お前らも状況は分かってるだろうが！？

engChrName: We aren't allowed any reinforcements from the outside! And if someone breaks that rule...
engSearchText:
We aren't allowed any reinforcements from
the outside! And if someone breaks that rule...
jpnChrName: 外部からの新勢力は介入はできない、 そのルールを破っちまったら──
jpnSearchText:
外部からの新勢力は介入はできない、
そのルールを破っちまったら──

engChrName: I know. That is precisely why we attempted to keep word of the game from spreading outside our department.
engSearchText:
I know. That is precisely why we attempted to keep
word of the game from spreading outside
our department.
jpnChrName: 分かっている──当然ＣＩＤでも 分析室内だけで箝口令を敷いていた。
jpnSearchText:
分かっている──当然ＣＩＤでも
分析室内だけで箝口令を敷いていた。

engChrName: However, as I've told you once before, the CID is not as unified as I would like.
engSearchText:
However, as I've told you once before, the CID is not
as unified as I would like.
jpnChrName: だが、前にも言ったが 今のＣＩＤの体制は一枚岩じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
だが、前にも言ったが
今のＣＩＤの体制は一枚岩じゃない。

engChrName: A department close to the army grew suspicious of what was happening in Oración and sent them in of their own volition.
engSearchText:
A department close to the army grew suspicious of
what was happening in Oración and sent them in of
their own volition.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの状況を不審に抱いた 軍寄りの局が独断で送り込んだようだ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの状況を不審に抱いた
軍寄りの局が独断で送り込んだようだ。

engChrName: An idiotic move on their part—and we may all pay the price for it.
engSearchText:
An idiotic move on their part—and we may all pay
the price for it.
jpnChrName: ……愚かな真似を。 だが、あり得る話ではあるのか。
jpnSearchText:
……愚かな真似を。
だが、あり得る話ではあるのか。

engChrName: Hopefully not. They didn't know about the rules, so maybe this'll just be written off as foul play.
engSearchText:
Hopefully not. They didn't know about the rules, so
maybe this'll just be written off as foul play.
jpnChrName: ええ、それが本当ならルールの 判定外になるかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それが本当ならルールの
判定外になるかもしれませんが……

engChrName: But since we don't know for sure, you gotta get them out of here ASAP! Who knows how those maniacs are gonna react?!
engSearchText:
But since we don't know for sure, you gotta get them
out of here ASAP! Who knows how those maniacs are
gonna react?!
jpnChrName: ──とりあえず何としても止めさせろ！ 連中がどんな判断をするか分からねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえず何としても止めさせろ！
連中がどんな判断をするか分からねぇ！

engChrName: We already tried to contact them, but they've cut off their comms. You aren't the first group I've notified, but I thought you should know—
engSearchText:
We already tried to contact them, but they've cut off
their comms. You aren't the first group I've notified,
but I thought you should know—
jpnChrName: 既に通信が遮断された状況だ。 他にも伝えたが、念のためお前たちも──
jpnSearchText:
既に通信が遮断された状況だ。
他にも伝えたが、念のためお前たちも──

engChrName: Rise and shine, everyone! It's me, Melchior.
engSearchText: Rise and shine, everyone! It's me, Melchior.
jpnChrName: ──ボンジュール（おはよう）、 参加者の諸君、メルキオルだよ。
jpnSearchText:
──ボンジュール（おはよう）、
参加者の諸君、メルキオルだよ。

engChrName: I hope you all had a good night's rest. I myself couldn't sleep a wink. The anticipation for today's big event has me bouncing off the walls.
engSearchText:
I hope you all had a good night's rest. I myself
couldn't sleep a wink. The anticipation for today's big
event has me bouncing off the walls.
jpnChrName: 昨夜はちゃんと眠れたかい？ 僕は興奮してなかなか寝付けなかったよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜はちゃんと眠れたかい？
僕は興奮してなかなか寝付けなかったよ。

engChrName: But anyhow, I'm afraid this isn't a social call. I have another reason for calling so early in the morning.
engSearchText:
But anyhow, I'm afraid this isn't a social call. I have
another reason for calling so early in the morning.
jpnChrName: まあこんな朝早く連絡したのは 別に挨拶のためじゃないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあこんな朝早く連絡したのは
別に挨拶のためじゃないけどね。

engChrName: Our warning system activated a few moments ago. I believe a number of you already know what exactly transpired.
engSearchText:
Our warning system activated a few moments ago.
I believe a number of you already know what
exactly transpired.
jpnChrName: “警告”も働いたし、 既に一部の者は知ってるみたいだけど──
jpnSearchText:
“警告”も働いたし、
既に一部の者は知ってるみたいだけど──

engChrName: But for those who don't, allow me to break the bad news: a special unit connected to the government foolishly attempted to infiltrate Oración.
engSearchText:
But for those who don't, allow me to break the bad
news: a special unit connected to the government
foolishly attempted to infiltrate Oración.
jpnChrName: 先ほど、とある政府筋の特殊部隊が このオラシオンに侵入を試みた。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど、とある政府筋の特殊部隊が
このオラシオンに侵入を試みた。

engChrName: I'm afraid this is a clear violation of our rules—and you all know what that means. Say hello to Aidios for me, everyone!
engSearchText:
I'm afraid this is a clear violation of our rules—and
you all know what that means. Say hello to Aidios for
me, everyone!
jpnChrName: これは明確なルール違反だ。 ──後は、分かるよね？
jpnSearchText:
これは明確なルール違反だ。
──後は、分かるよね？

engChrName: No...
engSearchText: No...

engChrName: Th-The bomb's going to go off?!
engSearchText: Th-The bomb's going to go off?!
jpnChrName: は、反応兵器が……！
jpnSearchText: は、反応兵器が……！

engChrName: ...Fooled you! Ahahaha!
engSearchText: ...Fooled you! Ahahaha!
jpnChrName: ──アハハッ！　なんちゃって！
jpnSearchText: <C1>──アハハッ！　なんちゃって！

engChrName: Don't worry, we aren't going to blow you up just because some dimwitted bigwig decided to meddle in affairs they don't understand.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, we aren't going to blow you up just
because some dimwitted bigwig decided to meddle in
affairs they don't understand.
jpnChrName: 一応、事情を知らないどこかの “お偉方”が独断で送り込んだみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、事情を知らないどこかの
“お偉方”が独断で送り込んだみたいでね。

engChrName: That would be woefully unfair...to us—the hardworking designers who poured their hearts and souls into making this game for you. ♪
engSearchText:
That would be woefully unfair...to us—the
hardworking designers who poured their hearts and
souls into making this game for you. ♪
jpnChrName: それでいきなり“バーン！！”っていうのは さすがに可哀そうだ──色々準備した僕たちが♪
jpnSearchText:
それでいきなり“バーン！！”っていうのは
さすがに可哀そうだ──色々準備した僕たちが♪

engChrName: The observation system assigned a small penalty, but nothing more, fortunately for all. You should count yourselves lucky.
engSearchText:
The observation system assigned a small penalty, but
nothing more, fortunately for all. You should count
yourselves lucky.
jpnChrName: 幸い監視システムも“ペナルティ”の形での ジャッジを下すに止めたみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
幸い監視システムも“ペナルティ”の形での
ジャッジを下すに止めたみたいでね。

engChrName: Those poor, pathetic soldiers have all finally breathed their last, so all is well with the world.
engSearchText:
Those poor, pathetic soldiers have all finally breathed
their last, so all is well with the world.
jpnChrName: たった今、全員排除されたみたいだし、 ──今回は見逃してあげようかな？
jpnSearchText:
たった今、全員排除されたみたいだし、
──今回は見逃してあげようかな？

engChrName: Damn it.
engSearchText: Damn it.
jpnChrName: ……遅かった、みてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: ……遅かった、みてぇだな。

engChrName: What an utterly avoidable tragedy...
engSearchText: What an utterly avoidable tragedy...

engChrName: I will delay the next round's start time to noon so you can all sleep in. I'd prefer you to come into the game bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.
engSearchText:
I will delay the next round's start time to noon so you
can all sleep in. I'd prefer you to come into the game
bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.
jpnChrName: 予定が狂って早起きしちゃったのもあるし、 ゲーム開始は正午丁度に遅らせてあげるよ。
jpnSearchText:
予定が狂って早起きしちゃったのもあるし、
ゲーム開始は正午丁度に遅らせてあげるよ。

engChrName: In the meantime, I bid you good night and sweet dreams—because a nightmare of bloody death and murder awaits you in the afternoon. ❤
engSearchText:
In the meantime, I bid you good night and sweet
dreams—because a nightmare of bloody death and
murder awaits you in the afternoon. ❤
jpnChrName: ──そういうわけで本日もよろしく！ 目一杯愉しんで、殺し合って欲しいかな❤
jpnSearchText:
──そういうわけで本日もよろしく！
目一杯愉しんで、殺し合って欲しいかな❤

engChrName: November 21st, 9:50AM
engSearchText: November 21st, 9:50AM

engChrName: The second round would be starting soon if it hadn't been postponed.
engSearchText:
The second round would be starting soon if it hadn't
been postponed.
jpnChrName: ……本来なら“第２フェーズ”の 開始時刻だが、正午に変更になった。
jpnSearchText:
……本来なら“第２フェーズ”の
開始時刻だが、正午に変更になった。

engChrName: I'm gonna use this extra time to look around the north and east districts. What about you guys?
engSearchText:
I'm gonna use this extra time to look around the
north and east districts. What about you guys?
jpnChrName: 昨日は寄れなかった東や北街区も ある程度覗けそうだが──どうする？
jpnSearchText:
昨日は寄れなかった東や北街区も
ある程度覗けそうだが──どうする？

engChrName: I'd like to accompany you, if possible. I wouldn't be surprised if there were requests for us, too.
engSearchText:
I'd like to accompany you, if possible. I wouldn't be
surprised if there were requests for us, too.
jpnChrName: ……もちろんお付き合いします。 ４ｓｐｇも出ていそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
……もちろんお付き合いします。
４ｓｐｇも出ていそうですし。

engChrName: Normally I'd use the extra time to catch forty winks, but the whole thing from last night's got me all antsy...
engSearchText:
Normally I'd use the extra time to catch forty winks,
but the whole thing from last night's got me
all antsy...
jpnChrName: おかげで睡眠時間は稼げたけど 明け方にあんな報せがあるとね……
jpnSearchText:
おかげで睡眠時間は稼げたけど
明け方にあんな報せがあるとね……

engChrName: I don't blame you. Maybe getting out and about will help you shake off that nervous energy.
engSearchText:
I don't blame you. Maybe getting out and about will
help you shake off that nervous energy.
jpnChrName: はい……ですが身体を温める意味でも 色々回るのはいいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
はい……ですが身体を温める意味でも
色々回るのはいいかもしれません。

engChrName: That's a solid suggestion. I think that would do us all some good, in fact.
engSearchText:
That's a solid suggestion. I think that would do us all
some good, in fact.
jpnChrName: 元気だなぁ…… ま、確かに一理あるか。
jpnSearchText:
元気だなぁ……
ま、確かに一理あるか。

engChrName: Well, I don't know about 'all.' I hear old men require more sleep, so I say we make Van take a nap.
engSearchText:
Well, I don't know about 'all.' I hear old men require
more sleep, so I say we make Van take a nap.
jpnChrName: クク、そっちの爺さんはともかく アラサーにはキツいんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、そっちの爺さんはともかく
アラサーにはキツいんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: Why am I getting singled out here?! Master's older than me!
engSearchText:
Why am I getting singled out here?! Master's older
than me!
jpnChrName: だから２４だっつーの！
jpnSearchText: だから２４だっつーの！

engChrName: Heh. I'll have you know I'm quite spry for my age.
engSearchText: Heh. I'll have you know I'm quite spry for my age.
jpnChrName: フフ……ならば朝餉も済ませたし、 出かけるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……ならば朝餉も済ませたし、
出かけるとしようか。

engChrName: All joking aside, we should visit the main facilities in the north and east districts and check the bulletin boards for—
engSearchText:
All joking aside, we should visit the main facilities in
the north and east districts and check the bulletin
boards for—
jpnChrName: はい、では東と北の主要施設に ４ｓｐｇのある掲示板の場所を──
jpnSearchText:
はい、では東と北の主要施設に
４ｓｐｇのある掲示板の場所を──

engChrName: ...Another damn call? When'd we become so popular all of a sudden?
engSearchText:
...Another damn call? When'd we become so popular
all of a sudden?
jpnChrName: っと…… 朝からよくかかってくるな。
jpnSearchText:
っと……
朝からよくかかってくるな。

engChrName: We need to talk. Are you free right now?
engSearchText: We need to talk. Are you free right now?
jpnChrName: ──今、いい？ ちょっと話がある。
jpnSearchText:
──今、いい？
ちょっと話がある。

engChrName: Is this about that Hercules unit? 'Cause we already—
engSearchText: Is this about that Hercules unit? 'Cause we already—
jpnChrName: ハーキュリーズの話か？ それなら──
jpnSearchText:
ハーキュリーズの話か？
それなら──

engChrName: Nah, it's something else. The CID's already touched base with us about that.
engSearchText:
Nah, it's something else. The CID's already touched
base with us about that.
jpnChrName: いや、そっちじゃない。 既にＣＩＤから状況も聞いている。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そっちじゃない。
既にＣＩＤから状況も聞いている。

engChrName: Sounds like they've already recovered the bodies... Wish we could've saved them.
engSearchText:
Sounds like they've already recovered the bodies...
Wish we could've saved them.
jpnChrName: ……遺体は向こうで引き取ったそうだ。 気の毒だが仕方あるまい。
jpnSearchText:
……遺体は向こうで引き取ったそうだ。
気の毒だが仕方あるまい。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: ……それとは別口で 相談したいことがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
……それとは別口で
相談したいことがあってね。

engChrName: ...I'm sorry if this isn't the best time, but do you mind if we talk in person? It's important.
engSearchText:
...I'm sorry if this isn't the best time, but do you mind
if we talk in person? It's important.
jpnChrName: 隙を見てギルドに来てくれると助かる。
jpnSearchText: <C1>隙を見てギルドに来てくれると助かる。

engChrName: Sure thing. Don't mind chattin' with my fellow teammates.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. Don't mind chattin' with my
fellow teammates.
jpnChrName: ……分かった。 元より協力関係でもあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
……分かった。
元より協力関係でもあるしな。

engChrName: Sure thing. We ain't competin' anymore, so I'm down to have a chat.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. We ain't competin' anymore, so I'm down
to have a chat.
jpnChrName: ……分かった。 ま、そっちはゲームを降りてるしな。
jpnSearchText:
……分かった。
ま、そっちはゲームを降りてるしな。

engChrName: Thanks. We'll be waiting here at the guild.
engSearchText: Thanks. We'll be waiting here at the guild.
jpnChrName: サンクス、それじゃお願い。
jpnSearchText: <C1>サンクス、それじゃお願い。

engChrName: Any time before the start of the second round is good with us. See you soon.
engSearchText:
Any time before the start of the second round is good
with us. See you soon.
jpnChrName: いつでもいいが、 第二フェーズの開始前には頼むぞ。
jpnSearchText:
いつでもいいが、
第二フェーズの開始前には頼むぞ。

engChrName: I wonder what they wanna talk about?
engSearchText: I wonder what they wanna talk about?
jpnChrName: フィーさん達からですか？
jpnSearchText: フィーさん達からですか？

engChrName: Good question. They sounded quite serious.
engSearchText: Good question. They sounded quite serious.
jpnChrName: なんだか深刻な顔だったけど……
jpnSearchText: なんだか深刻な顔だったけど……

engChrName: I can't say I'm not curious, but it sounds like they just want to talk with Van.
engSearchText:
I can't say I'm not curious, but it sounds like they just
want to talk with Van.
