jpnChrName: どちらかというとヴァンさん個人に 用事があるみたいでしたね……
jpnSearchText:
どちらかというとヴァンさん個人に
用事があるみたいでしたね……

engChrName: Eh, I'm sure they wouldn't mind y'all listening in.
engSearchText: Eh, I'm sure they wouldn't mind y'all listening in.
jpnChrName: ……東街区と北街区を 周りがてら、顔を出してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
……東街区と北街区を
周りがてら、顔を出してみるか。

engChrName: We'll all swing by there together and see what's up.
engSearchText: We'll all swing by there together and see what's up.
jpnChrName: “第２フェーズ”への準備も 忘れねぇように進めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
“第２フェーズ”への準備も
忘れねぇように進めるぞ。

engChrName: And while we're out, I suggest we do whatever is needed to prepare for the second round.
engSearchText:
And while we're out, I suggest we do whatever is
needed to prepare for the second round.
jpnChrName: 了解いたしました── それでは出発いたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
了解いたしました──
それでは出発いたしましょう。

engChrName: Oh, there you are.
engSearchText: Oh, there you are.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちか。
jpnSearchText: お前さんたちか。

engChrName: Glad you could make it.
engSearchText: Glad you could make it.
jpnChrName: さっそく来てくれたんだね。
jpnSearchText: さっそく来てくれたんだね。

engChrName: You guys sounded pretty serious on the call. Everything all ri—
engSearchText:
You guys sounded pretty serious on the call.
Everything all ri—
jpnChrName: あんな風に連絡されたらな。 わざわざ呼び出して、一体何が──
jpnSearchText:
あんな風に連絡されたらな。
わざわざ呼び出して、一体何が──

engChrName: Do any of you know where Elaine's gone?!
engSearchText: Do any of you know where Elaine's gone?!
jpnChrName: お前たち──エレインさんが どこに行ったか知らないか！？
jpnSearchText:
お前たち──エレインさんが
どこに行ったか知らないか！？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?

engChrName: The hell do you mean?
engSearchText: The hell do you mean?
jpnChrName: ……なんだと？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだと？

engChrName: 'There is an urgent matter I must attend to.'
engSearchText: 'There is an urgent matter I must attend to.'
jpnChrName: 『──片付けなければいけない   案件が出来てしまいました。』
jpnSearchText:
『──片付けなければいけない
案件が出来てしまいました。』

engChrName: 'I will be acting alone for the time being. I apologize for not discussing this with any of you beforehand.'
engSearchText:
'I will be acting alone for the time being. I apologize
for not discussing this with any of you beforehand.'
jpnChrName: 『しばらく一人で行動します──   勝手な事をして申し訳ありません。』
jpnSearchText:
『しばらく一人で行動します──
勝手な事をして申し訳ありません。』

engChrName: 'Please continue to aid Team Arkride Solutions in my absence.'
engSearchText:
'Please continue to aid Team Arkride Solutions in
my absence.'
jpnChrName: 『解決事務所への協力もしばらく   ジンさんたちだけでお願いします。』
jpnSearchText:
『解決事務所への協力もしばらく
ジンさんたちだけでお願いします。』

engChrName: Elaine...
engSearchText: Elaine...
jpnChrName: ……エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: ……エレインさん……

engChrName: This has to be some kind of a joke...right?
engSearchText: This has to be some kind of a joke...right?
jpnChrName: えっと……マジなの？
jpnSearchText: えっと……マジなの？

engChrName: If only it was, but this handwriting's definitely hers. Probably dropped this note by here in the morning.
engSearchText:
If only it was, but this handwriting's definitely hers.
Probably dropped this note by here in the morning.
jpnChrName: 今朝方、ハーキュリーズの件が起きる前に そいつを残してギルドを出たみたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
今朝方、ハーキュリーズの件が起きる前に
そいつを残してギルドを出たみたいでな。

engChrName: I was gonna ask if you knew anything about this, but I can tell you're just as clueless as us. It's written all over your faces.
engSearchText:
I was gonna ask if you knew anything about this, but
I can tell you're just as clueless as us. It's written all
over your faces.
jpnChrName: この様子じゃ、お前さんたちも知らないか。
jpnSearchText: この様子じゃ、お前さんたちも知らないか。

engChrName: Sorry... I wish we had better news for you.
engSearchText: Sorry... I wish we had better news for you.
jpnChrName: い、いえ……今朝のあの連絡で けっこうゴタゴタしてまして……
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ……今朝のあの連絡で
けっこうゴタゴタしてまして……

engChrName: She certainly isn't acting like her normal self. There was that incident in the capital, too...
engSearchText:
She certainly isn't acting like her normal self.
There was that incident in the capital, too...
jpnChrName: そういえばあの人……首都の廃路線で 随分と荒れていたみたいだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばあの人……首都の廃路線で
随分と荒れていたみたいだったけど。

engChrName: Yeah, but I thought she rebounded from that. Guess something set her off again.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but I thought she rebounded from that.
Guess something set her off again.
jpnChrName: 昨日は平気そうだったが、何かの事情で 個人的にテンパってたってことか？
jpnSearchText:
昨日は平気そうだったが、何かの事情で
個人的にテンパってたってことか？

engChrName: Yeah, but I thought she rebounded from that. Maybe losing yesterday set her off or something.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but I thought she rebounded from that.
Maybe losing yesterday set her off or something.
jpnChrName: 昨日ゲームをリタイアした結果、 個人的にテンパっちまったってことか？
jpnSearchText:
昨日ゲームをリタイアした結果、
個人的にテンパっちまったってことか？

engChrName: H-How dare you belittle her!
engSearchText: H-How dare you belittle her!
jpnChrName: か、彼女を馬鹿にするな……！
jpnSearchText: か、彼女を馬鹿にするな……！

engChrName: Have some faith, Mr. Wei. I doubt an A-rank bracer would make this sort of choice on a mere impulse.
engSearchText:
Have some faith, Mr. Wei. I doubt an A-rank bracer
would make this sort of choice on a mere impulse.
jpnChrName: 確かに……Ａ級遊撃士ともなれば 感情的な独断専行も考えにくいかと。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……Ａ級遊撃士ともなれば
感情的な独断専行も考えにくいかと。

engChrName: Anyway, thanks for fillin' us in. We'll keep an eye out for her.
engSearchText:
Anyway, thanks for fillin' us in. We'll keep an eye out
for her.
jpnChrName: ……話は分かった。 俺たちの方でも気にかけておく。
jpnSearchText:
……話は分かった。
俺たちの方でも気にかけておく。

engChrName: Though I can't imagine us havin' much time to do that once the game starts up again.
engSearchText:
Though I can't imagine us havin' much time to do
that once the game starts up again.
jpnChrName: ゲームが始まったらそれどころじゃ 無くなるかもしれんが。
jpnSearchText:
ゲームが始まったらそれどころじゃ
無くなるかもしれんが。

engChrName: Hopefully we'll find her soon. This game's gonna be a lot rougher without her.
engSearchText:
Hopefully we'll find her soon. This game's gonna be a
lot rougher without her.
jpnChrName: ……そだね、戻ってこなかったら 戦力ダウンは避けられないけど。
jpnSearchText:
……そだね、戻ってこなかったら
戦力ダウンは避けられないけど。

engChrName: Sorry 'bout all this, you guys. I know you were counting on having her help.
engSearchText:
Sorry 'bout all this, you guys. I know you were
counting on having her help.
jpnChrName: それについては…… スマンとしか言いようがねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
それについては……
スマンとしか言いようがねぇな。

engChrName: Don't sweat it. Having any extra hands is a bonus, and you guys're carryin' a shitton of weight as is.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. Having any extra hands is a bonus,
and you guys're carryin' a shitton of weight as is.
jpnChrName: いいさ、元々裏技だし 戦力としては今でも十分だろう。
jpnSearchText:
いいさ、元々裏技だし
戦力としては今でも十分だろう。

engChrName: Any help's better than none. Thanks a lot, you guys.
engSearchText: Any help's better than none. Thanks a lot, you guys.
jpnChrName: ん、それでも助かる。
jpnSearchText: ん、それでも助かる。

engChrName: Try not to let it bug you too much. We all need you to have your head in the game.
engSearchText:
Try not to let it bug you too much. We all need you
to have your head in the game.
jpnChrName: そっちはあまり気にせずに ゲームに集中してくれてもいい。
jpnSearchText:
そっちはあまり気にせずに
ゲームに集中してくれてもいい。

engChrName: Thanks. If we learn anything, we'll get in touch.
engSearchText: Thanks. If we learn anything, we'll get in touch.
jpnChrName: ああ──とはいえ 何か分かったらこっちも連絡する。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──とはいえ
何か分かったらこっちも連絡する。

engChrName: Good luck with your work in the city, Alvis.
engSearchText: Good luck with your work in the city, Alvis.
jpnChrName: アルヴィス──お前さんも 市内の活動に支障が出ないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィス──お前さんも
市内の活動に支障が出ないようにな。

engChrName: ...Yeah. Best of luck to you as well.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. Best of luck to you as well.
jpnChrName: ……分かった、よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ……分かった、よろしく頼む。

engChrName: After the second round came to an end, they parted ways with their allies and returned to the hotel.
engSearchText:
After the second round came to an end, they parted
ways with their allies and returned to the hotel.
jpnChrName: ──第二フェーズを終えたヴァンたちは 協力者と別れて、いったん宿に戻った。
jpnSearchText:
──第二フェーズを終えたヴァンたちは
協力者と別れて、いったん宿に戻った。

engChrName: However, they would have an early start the following morning, so they decided to prepare for the next round in advance.
engSearchText:
However, they would have an early start the following
morning, so they decided to prepare for the next
round in advance.
jpnChrName: しかし、３日目の開始時刻を考えると 今日のうちには準備を終える必要があり……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、３日目の開始時刻を考えると
今日のうちには準備を終える必要があり……

engChrName: As such, they took a short rest and set off again that evening.
engSearchText:
As such, they took a short rest and set off again
that evening.
jpnChrName: 少しの休憩を挟み、行動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>少しの休憩を挟み、行動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: November 21st, 6:00PM
engSearchText: November 21st, 6:00PM

engChrName: Ugh. That wasn't nearly enough sleep. I'm just about running on empty here.
engSearchText:
Ugh. That wasn't nearly enough sleep. I'm just about
running on empty here.
jpnChrName: ったく、少しは休めたが さすがに疲れも溜まってやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、少しは休めたが
さすがに疲れも溜まってやがるな。

engChrName: I'm exhausted, too, so I understand. Just try and hold out a little longer if you can.
engSearchText:
I'm exhausted, too, so I understand. Just try and hold
out a little longer if you can.
jpnChrName: はい……ですが明日のことを考えると 今日中に準備を済ませておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
はい……ですが明日のことを考えると
今日中に準備を済ませておかないと。

engChrName: Hang in there! I believe in you, Aaron!
engSearchText: Hang in there! I believe in you, Aaron!
jpnChrName: もうひと頑張りですよ、 アーロンさん！
jpnSearchText:
もうひと頑張りですよ、
アーロンさん！

engChrName: Okay, spare me the motivational talk. I'll make it— just wish I had the energy to hit the town afterwards.
engSearchText:
Okay, spare me the motivational talk. I'll make it—
just wish I had the energy to hit the town afterwards.
jpnChrName: 分かってるっつーの。 夜遊びまでする気力がねぇだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
分かってるっつーの。
夜遊びまでする気力がねぇだけだ。

engChrName: If hitting the town is even crossing your mind, you're fine.
engSearchText:
If hitting the town is even crossing your mind,
you're fine.
jpnChrName: いや、元気すぎでしょ……
jpnSearchText: いや、元気すぎでしょ……

engChrName: It's only 6PM, so all the shops in the city should still be open.
engSearchText:
It's only 6PM, so all the shops in the city should still
be open.
jpnChrName: 午後６時──市内の店舗も まだ営業しているでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
午後６時──市内の店舗も
まだ営業しているでしょうね。

engChrName: Good deal. Let's do as much prep as we can. And maybe we can take on a request or two, if we're feelin' up for it.
engSearchText:
Good deal. Let's do as much prep as we can.
And maybe we can take on a request or two, if we're
feelin' up for it.
jpnChrName: ああ、４ｓｐｇも含めて 今のうちに片づけておくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、４ｓｐｇも含めて
今のうちに片づけておくぞ。

engChrName: Don't overdo it with 'em, though. Getting through tomorrow is our top priority.
engSearchText:
Don't overdo it with 'em, though. Getting through
tomorrow is our top priority.
jpnChrName: ただし無理して明日に響いたら 元も子もない──程々にな。
jpnSearchText:
ただし無理して明日に響いたら
元も子もない──程々にな。

engChrName: I'd rather not stay up too late if I can help it. It's bad for your skin.
engSearchText:
I'd rather not stay up too late if I can help it. It's bad
for your skin.
jpnChrName: ええ、美容のためにもそこは大事よね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、美容のためにもそこは大事よね。

engChrName: Unless there is an urgent matter that requires our attention, we should make it back to our room at a reasonable hour.
engSearchText:
Unless there is an urgent matter that requires our
attention, we should make it back to our room at a
reasonable hour.
jpnChrName: 緊急を要する案件でもない限り、 適当な時間で切り上げるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
緊急を要する案件でもない限り、
適当な時間で切り上げるとしよう。

engChrName: (If we're done here, maybe we oughta go ahead and hit the hay.)
engSearchText:
(If we're done here, maybe we oughta go ahead and
hit the hay.)
jpnChrName: （もうやることがないなら、   そろそろ今日は休むか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（もうやることがないなら、
そろそろ今日は休むか……？）

engChrName: If you choose to return to your room and rest, the main story will advance.
engSearchText:
If you choose to return to your room and rest, the
main story will advance.
jpnChrName: 部屋に戻って休むと メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
部屋に戻って休むと
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: As a result, some unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
As a result, some unfinished quests and unseen
sub-events will disappear.
jpnChrName: 一部のクエスト・サブイベントが 消滅するので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
一部のクエスト・サブイベントが
消滅するので注意して下さい。

engChrName: The group then gathered for dinner.
engSearchText: The group then gathered for dinner.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは夕食をとり……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、ヴァンたちは夕食をとり……

engChrName: After enjoying a savory meal together, they split off into their rooms to get some much-needed rest.
engSearchText:
After enjoying a savory meal together, they split off
into their rooms to get some much-needed rest.
jpnChrName: それぞれ部屋に戻って、 翌朝のゲームに備えて休むことにした。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ部屋に戻って、
翌朝のゲームに備えて休むことにした。

engChrName: November 21st, 9:04PM
engSearchText: November 21st, 9:04PM

engChrName: (Wait...)
engSearchText: (Wait...)
jpnChrName: （もしかすると……）
jpnSearchText: （もしかすると……）

engChrName: You go on in, Quatre. I just remembered there was something I needed to take care of.
engSearchText:
You go on in, Quatre. I just remembered there was
something I needed to take care of.
jpnChrName: カトル──用事を思い出した。
jpnSearchText: カトル──用事を思い出した。

engChrName: I'll be back in less than an hour, but if y'all wanna go ahead and get to bed, don't feel like you have to wait for me.
engSearchText:
I'll be back in less than an hour, but if y'all wanna go
ahead and get to bed, don't feel like you have to wait
for me.
jpnChrName: 小一時間くらいで戻ってくるから 疲れてるんだったら先に寝ていいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
小一時間くらいで戻ってくるから
疲れてるんだったら先に寝ていいぞ。

engChrName: Okay. That's fine with me.
engSearchText: Okay. That's fine with me.
jpnChrName: え、うん、そうさせて もらうかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
え、うん、そうさせて
もらうかもしれないけど……

engChrName: Wait a moment... You're trying to pull an Aaron, aren't you? Off to enjoy the nightlife, hmm?
engSearchText:
Wait a moment... You're trying to pull an Aaron,
aren't you? Off to enjoy the nightlife, hmm?
jpnChrName: ──って、ちょっと待ってよ。 アーロンさんじゃあるまいし夜遊びを……
jpnSearchText:
──って、ちょっと待ってよ。
アーロンさんじゃあるまいし夜遊びを……

engChrName: Don't lump me in with him. We are not the same.
engSearchText: Don't lump me in with him. We are not the same.
jpnChrName: それこそヤツじゃあるまいし、だろ。
jpnSearchText: それこそヤツじゃあるまいし、だろ。

engChrName: It's just guild business, promise. If anything comes up, just give me a ring.
engSearchText:
It's just guild business, promise. If anything comes up,
just give me a ring.
jpnChrName: ギルド関連の連絡を思い出してな。 何かあったら遠慮なくコールしてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルド関連の連絡を思い出してな。
何かあったら遠慮なくコールしてくれ。

engChrName: ...Ah, I see. Got it.
engSearchText: ...Ah, I see. Got it.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 色々あるみたいだし分かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
色々あるみたいだし分かったよ。

engChrName: Just try not to worry the girls too much, okay?
engSearchText: Just try not to worry the girls too much, okay?
jpnChrName: あんまりアニエスさんたちに 心配させないようにしなよね？
jpnSearchText:
あんまりアニエスさんたちに
心配させないようにしなよね？

engChrName: Will do.
engSearchText: Will do.
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ。

engChrName: (I wonder if he's...)
engSearchText: (I wonder if he's...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……もしかして。）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさん……もしかして。）

engChrName: (...No, I can't be thinking about that now. I've got my own work to do.)
engSearchText:
(...No, I can't be thinking about that now. I've got my
own work to do.)
jpnChrName: （………ううん、私の方は   今のうちに進めておかないと………）
jpnSearchText:
（………ううん、私の方は
今のうちに進めておかないと………）

engChrName: November 22nd, 12:03PM
engSearchText: November 22nd, 12:03PM

engChrName: The next round will be the last. The end is finally within sight.
engSearchText:
The next round will be the last. The end is finally
within sight.
jpnChrName: 次が最終フェーズ……いよいよだね。
jpnSearchText: 次が最終フェーズ……いよいよだね。

engChrName: I don't know about you guys, but I'm psyched to get back in there and kick some mafia butt.
engSearchText:
I don't know about you guys, but I'm psyched to get
back in there and kick some mafia butt.
jpnChrName: 正午過ぎ…… １５時まで結構時間があるわね。
jpnSearchText:
正午過ぎ……
１５時まで結構時間があるわね。

engChrName: We will be leaving for the palace in less than three hours. If you have anything else you want to do before then, now's the time.
engSearchText:
We will be leaving for the palace in less than
three hours. If you have anything else you want to do
before then, now's the time.
jpnChrName: 準備を整えるのは勿論──今のうちに 心残りは片付けておくべきであろうな。
jpnSearchText:
準備を整えるのは勿論──今のうちに
心残りは片付けておくべきであろうな。

engChrName: I'm sorry to spring this on all of you so suddenly...
engSearchText: I'm sorry to spring this on all of you so suddenly...
jpnChrName: ──皆さん。 いきなりで申し訳ないんですが……
jpnSearchText:
──皆さん。
いきなりで申し訳ないんですが……

engChrName: ...but would it be okay if I go off on my own for a bit?
engSearchText: ...but would it be okay if I go off on my own for a bit?
jpnChrName: できれば最終フェーズ開始までの間、 別行動をとってもいいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
できれば最終フェーズ開始までの間、
別行動をとってもいいでしょうか？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: How come?
engSearchText: How come?
jpnChrName: そ、それって？
jpnSearchText: そ、それって？

engChrName: There's something I want to try—and now is my only chance to do so.
engSearchText:
There's something I want to try—and now is my only
chance to do so.
jpnChrName: ……その、実は今の内に 試しておきたいことがあるんです。
jpnSearchText:
……その、実は今の内に
試しておきたいことがあるんです。

engChrName: I believe it would be best to get it done while you and everyone else are handling preparations. I'll be back before the final ro—
engSearchText:
I believe it would be best to get it done while you and
everyone else are handling preparations. I'll be back
before the final ro—
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちが準備を進めるのと 並行してやることに意義がありまして。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちが準備を進めるのと
並行してやることに意義がありまして。

engChrName: Okie doke. Dunno what you're up to, but knock yourself out.
engSearchText:
Okie doke. Dunno what you're up to, but knock
yourself out.
jpnChrName: ──分かった。 何をするつもりか知らんがやってみろ。
jpnSearchText:
──分かった。
何をするつもりか知らんがやってみろ。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ！？

engChrName: She didn't even finish explaining!
engSearchText: She didn't even finish explaining!
jpnChrName: 即決かよ！？
jpnSearchText: 即決かよ！？

engChrName: She doesn't have to—because I trust her. She's been learning a lot since she started workin' for me...
engSearchText:
She doesn't have to—because I trust her. She's been
learning a lot since she started workin' for me...
jpnChrName: 時間もねえし、何だかんだバイトを始めて 得られたものもあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
時間もねえし、何だかんだバイトを始めて
得られたものもあるだろう。

engChrName: ...and just by looking at her, I can tell she's itchin' to put that knowledge into practice somehow.
engSearchText:
...and just by looking at her, I can tell she's itchin' to
put that knowledge into practice somehow.
jpnChrName: ──それを活かして自分なりに やってみたい事があるってところか？
jpnSearchText:
──それを活かして自分なりに
やってみたい事があるってところか？

engChrName: That's right. I do have a plan, but I have no idea if it'll work out. I at least want to give it a shot, though.
engSearchText:
That's right. I do have a plan, but I have no idea if it'll
work out. I at least want to give it a shot, though.
jpnChrName: はい── 自己満足かもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
はい──
自己満足かもしれませんが。

engChrName: Well, you know what they say: nothing ventured, nothing gained.
engSearchText:
Well, you know what they say: nothing ventured,
nothing gained.
jpnChrName: だったら問題ない。 お前なりの流儀を試してみろ。
jpnSearchText:
だったら問題ない。
お前なりの流儀を試してみろ。

engChrName: Guessin' everyone's cool with Agnès doing her own thing?
engSearchText:
Guessin' everyone's cool with Agnès doing her
own thing?
jpnChrName: ──みんなも構わねぇな？
jpnSearchText: ──みんなも構わねぇな？

engChrName: Of course. You go, girl!
engSearchText: Of course. You go, girl!
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいんじゃない？ 心残りを片付けるって意味でも。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいんじゃない？
心残りを片付けるって意味でも。

engChrName: If you require anything of us, we are but a call away.
engSearchText: If you require anything of us, we are but a call away.
jpnChrName: こちらの事はご心配なく── 何かあれば連絡していただければ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの事はご心配なく──
何かあれば連絡していただければ。

engChrName: I think it'd be a good idea if one of us joined you.
engSearchText: I think it'd be a good idea if one of us joined you.
jpnChrName: ──だったら、誰か一人くらいは お手伝いに連れていってください……！
jpnSearchText:
──だったら、誰か一人くらいは
お手伝いに連れていってください……！

engChrName: I agree. I don't know what you're planning exactly, but we're more than happy to lend a hand.
engSearchText:
I agree. I don't know what you're planning exactly,
but we're more than happy to lend a hand.
jpnChrName: うん、どういう内容にせよ、 さすがに一人じゃ大変だと思うよ？
jpnSearchText:
うん、どういう内容にせよ、
さすがに一人じゃ大変だと思うよ？

engChrName: Eh. I guess I wouldn't mind a change of pace. If you need my help, just say the word.
engSearchText:
Eh. I guess I wouldn't mind a change of pace. If
you need my help, just say the word.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ダリーが気晴らしがてらなら 付き合ってやってもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ダリーが気晴らしがてらなら
付き合ってやってもいいぜ？

engChrName: You all really mean that?
engSearchText: You all really mean that?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、 カトル君にアーロンさんも……
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん、
カトル君にアーロンさんも……

engChrName: Thank you. I'd be delighted to have your assistance.
engSearchText: Thank you. I'd be delighted to have your assistance.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとうございます。 お言葉に甘えさせていただきますね。
jpnSearchText:
……ありがとうございます。
お言葉に甘えさせていただきますね。

engChrName: Let's all do our best, everyone.
engSearchText: Let's all do our best, everyone.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも── 準備は宜しくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも──
準備は宜しくお願いします……！

engChrName: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: Heh. I'm curious to learn what sort of scheme she's hatching.
engSearchText:
Heh. I'm curious to learn what sort of scheme
she's hatching.
jpnChrName: フフ…… 何をするつもりか分からぬが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
何をするつもりか分からぬが。

engChrName: Well, whatever it is, we'll just have to leave 'em to it.
engSearchText: Well, whatever it is, we'll just have to leave 'em to it.
jpnChrName: ま、いったん任せるとしますよ。
jpnSearchText: ま、いったん任せるとしますよ。

engChrName: Indeed. We have our own part to play in this.
engSearchText: Indeed. We have our own part to play in this.
jpnChrName: では、こちらも改めて行動開始ですね。
jpnSearchText: では、こちらも改めて行動開始ですね。

engChrName: And while they're away, I suggest we complete some requests. The guild and the CID sent a few our way.
engSearchText:
And while they're away, I suggest we complete
some requests. The guild and the CID sent a few
our way.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤとギルド方面から手配魔獣関連の 依頼がいくつか出ているようですし。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤとギルド方面から手配魔獣関連の
依頼がいくつか出ているようですし。

engChrName: When the heck did they do that? Well, not like I'm complaining. I could use a good warmup before the real show begins.
engSearchText:
When the heck did they do that? Well, not like
I'm complaining. I could use a good warmup before
the real show begins.
jpnChrName: っていつの間に。 ……でも肩慣らしにはいいかもね。
jpnSearchText:
っていつの間に。
……でも肩慣らしにはいいかもね。

engChrName: Yeah, we should consider taking it on. Be nice to tie up all the loose ends if we've got the time.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we should consider taking it on. Be nice to tie
up all the loose ends if we've got the time.
jpnChrName: ああ、この状況だし心残りは 一つでも片付けた方がいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この状況だし心残りは
一つでも片付けた方がいいだろう。

engChrName: All righty, then. We're on the clock now, so let's get to work!
engSearchText:
All righty, then. We're on the clock now, so let's get
to work!
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ最終日の解決業務を始めるぞ！
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ最終日の解決業務を始めるぞ！

engChrName: Understood! I'll give 110% to make up for the others' absences.
engSearchText:
Understood! I'll give 110% to make up for the
others' absences.
jpnChrName: はいっ、アニエスさんの分も！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、アニエスさんの分も！

engChrName: We need to be ready for anything!
engSearchText: We need to be ready for anything!
jpnChrName: 万全の準備を整えないとね……！
jpnSearchText: 万全の準備を整えないとね……！

engChrName: Let's hurry and get everything done in the city because the Almata pain train is about to leave the station!
engSearchText:
Let's hurry and get everything done in the city
because the Almata pain train is about to leave
the station!
jpnChrName: ハッ、悔いなくやり切るとすっか！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、悔いなくやり切るとすっか！

engChrName: November 22nd, 2:35PM
engSearchText: November 22nd, 2:35PM

engChrName: It's almost time for the final round to begin, but they're still nowhere to be seen.
engSearchText:
It's almost time for the final round to begin, but
they're still nowhere to be seen.
jpnChrName: ……最終フェーズが近づいてきたわね。 あの子たちはまだかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……最終フェーズが近づいてきたわね。
あの子たちはまだかしら？

engChrName: Sounds like Agnès is done with whatever she was workin' on, so I'm sure they'll be here before long.
engSearchText:
Sounds like Agnès is done with whatever she was
workin' on, so I'm sure they'll be here before long.
jpnChrName: ああ、用事は終わったらしいし、 そろそろ戻ってくるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、用事は終わったらしいし、
そろそろ戻ってくるだろ。

engChrName: Our collaborators are ready to go, so as long as they arrive in time, there is no need to worry.
engSearchText:
Our collaborators are ready to go, so as long as they
arrive in time, there is no need to worry.
jpnChrName: 協力者たちの準備も整ったようだ。 まだ十分、開始には間に合うだろう。
jpnSearchText:
協力者たちの準備も整ったようだ。
まだ十分、開始には間に合うだろう。

engChrName: I'm still really curious about what she's planning, though.
engSearchText:
I'm still really curious about what she's
planning, though.
jpnChrName: でも結局、アニエスさんが やろうとしてた事というのは……
jpnSearchText:
でも結局、アニエスさんが
やろうとしてた事というのは……

engChrName: I'm still very curious about what she's planning, though.
engSearchText:
I'm still very curious about what she's
planning, though.
jpnChrName: でも結局、アニエスさんが やろうとしてた事っていうのは……
jpnSearchText:
でも結局、アニエスさんが
やろうとしてた事っていうのは……

engChrName: Seems like it involved a heck of a lot of prep work around the city.
engSearchText:
Seems like it involved a heck of a lot of prep work
around the city.
jpnChrName: ハッ……街でなんか色々と 仕込んでやがったみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……街でなんか色々と
仕込んでやがったみてぇだが。

engChrName: It seemed like it involved a good deal of prep work around the city.
engSearchText:
It seemed like it involved a good deal of prep work
around the city.
jpnChrName: うーん、どうやら街で色々と 動いてるみたいだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、どうやら街で色々と
動いてるみたいだったけど。

engChrName: L-Look!
engSearchText: L-Look!
jpnChrName: あ、あれは……！
jpnSearchText: あ、あれは……！

engChrName: No way...
engSearchText: No way...
jpnChrName: おいおい……
jpnSearchText: おいおい……

engChrName: Isn't that the airship we saw in Tharbad?
engSearchText: Isn't that the airship we saw in Tharbad?
jpnChrName: サ、サルバッドに来てた……！？
jpnSearchText: サ、サルバッドに来てた……！？

engChrName: That belongs to the princely family of Elsaim. I think it might be carrying all of the city's children on board.
engSearchText:
That belongs to the princely family of Elsaim. I think
it might be carrying all of the city's children on board.
jpnChrName: エルザイム公王家専用飛行船…… 乗っているのは街の子供たちですね。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイム公王家専用飛行船……
乗っているのは街の子供たちですね。

engChrName: Good. That means the orphanage kids are safe.
engSearchText: Good. That means the orphanage kids are safe.
jpnChrName: ああ…… 孤児院のあいつらも……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
孤児院のあいつらも……

engChrName: I'm so glad everything went according to plan.
engSearchText: I'm so glad everything went according to plan.
jpnChrName: ふふ、上手くいって良かったです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、上手くいって良かったです。

engChrName: Agnès!
engSearchText: Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスさんたち……！
jpnSearchText: アニエスさんたち……！

engChrName: W-Wait, does that mean...?
engSearchText: W-Wait, does that mean...?
jpnChrName: も、もしかして……！？
jpnSearchText: も、もしかして……！？

engChrName: THAT was what you were up to?
engSearchText: THAT was what you were up to?
jpnChrName: あれを仕込んだのはお前らか……！？
jpnSearchText: あれを仕込んだのはお前らか……！？

engChrName: That's right. Officially, it's a sightseeing flight—to foster relations with the Central East and to commemorate the ending of the film festival.
engSearchText:
That's right. Officially, it's a sightseeing flight—to
foster relations with the Central East and to
commemorate the ending of the film festival.
jpnChrName: はい、映画祭の事後キャンペーンと 中東親善を兼ねた遊覧飛行イベント──
jpnSearchText:
はい、映画祭の事後キャンペーンと
中東親善を兼ねた遊覧飛行イベント──

engChrName: We spread awareness of it through the orbal network and with word of mouth—and said that all children of the city were invited.
engSearchText:
We spread awareness of it through the orbal network
and with word of mouth—and said that all children
of the city were invited.
jpnChrName: 子供たちをサプライズ招待する情報を 口コミと導力ネットで流したんです。
jpnSearchText:
子供たちをサプライズ招待する情報を
口コミと導力ネットで流したんです。

engChrName: We put the connections Dingo left behind to good use!
engSearchText:
We put the connections Dingo left behind to
good use!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんが残してくれた ツテも最大限活用しましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんが残してくれた
ツテも最大限活用しましたっ！

engChrName: Last night, we reached out to the crown prince and asked if we could use the principality transport vessel.
engSearchText:
Last night, we reached out to the crown prince and
asked if we could use the principality transport vessel.
jpnChrName: 昨夜の時点で公太子殿下に打診、停泊中の 公国の輸送船を見込んでたんですけど……！
jpnSearchText:
昨夜の時点で公太子殿下に打診、停泊中の
公国の輸送船を見込んでたんですけど……！

engChrName: I fully expected him to inquire about why we needed it, but no. He just rushed on over in that airship without a second thought.
engSearchText:
I fully expected him to inquire about why we needed
it, but no. He just rushed on over in that airship
without a second thought.
jpnChrName: 何も聞かずに“ならばいっそ”って わざわざ中東から駆け付けてくれてね。
jpnSearchText:
何も聞かずに“ならばいっそ”って
わざわざ中東から駆け付けてくれてね。

engChrName: He is quite the character. I wouldn't be surprised if he was taking inspiration from a certain musician I know.
engSearchText:
He is quite the character. I wouldn't be surprised if he
was taking inspiration from a certain musician
I know.
jpnChrName: なかなかやるわね、あの公太子さん。 演奏家さんを見習ってるだけはあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
なかなかやるわね、あの公太子さん。
演奏家さんを見習ってるだけはあるわ。

engChrName: They're gonna fly around outside the city for the next couple of hours. Then they'll return to Oración.
engSearchText:
They're gonna fly around outside the city for the next
couple of hours. Then they'll return to Oración.
jpnChrName: 二時間ほど周辺を遊覧してから オラシオンに戻ってくるそうです。
jpnSearchText:
二時間ほど周辺を遊覧してから
オラシオンに戻ってくるそうです。

engChrName: That's one less thing we have to worry about as we head into the final battle.
engSearchText:
That's one less thing we have to worry about as we
head into the final battle.
jpnChrName: ──これでちょっとは心置きなく、 最後の戦いに挑めるのではないかと！
jpnSearchText:
──これでちょっとは心置きなく、
最後の戦いに挑めるのではないかと！

engChrName: They're gonna spend a couple of hours flying outside the city. Then they'll come on back to Oración.
engSearchText:
They're gonna spend a couple of hours flying outside
the city. Then they'll come on back to Oración.
jpnChrName: 二時間ほど周辺を遊覧してから オラシオンに戻ってくるそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
二時間ほど周辺を遊覧してから
オラシオンに戻ってくるそうだぜ。

engChrName: That's one less thing to worry about while we head off to the final showdown.
engSearchText:
That's one less thing to worry about while we head
off to the final showdown.
jpnChrName: ──これでちったあ心置きなく、 最後の戦いに挑めるんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
──これでちったあ心置きなく、
最後の戦いに挑めるんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: They'll spend two hours flying outside of the city, after which they will return to Oración.
engSearchText:
They'll spend two hours flying outside of the city,
after which they will return to Oración.
jpnChrName: 二時間ほど周辺を遊覧してから オラシオンに戻ってくるそうだよ。
jpnSearchText:
二時間ほど周辺を遊覧してから
オラシオンに戻ってくるそうだよ。

engChrName: That'll take one concern off our minds as we head into the final battle.
engSearchText:
That'll take one concern off our minds as we head
into the final battle.
jpnChrName: ──これでまあ心置きなく、 最後の戦いに挑めるんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
──これでまあ心置きなく、
最後の戦いに挑めるんじゃないかな？

engChrName: I'm genuinely speechless.
engSearchText: I'm genuinely speechless.
jpnChrName: ……呆れたわね……
jpnSearchText: ……呆れたわね……

engChrName: Heh. An impressive feat, to be sure.
engSearchText: Heh. An impressive feat, to be sure.
jpnChrName: フフ、まさかそこまでのことを このタイミングで成し遂げるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、まさかそこまでのことを
このタイミングで成し遂げるとはな。

engChrName: Indeed. Even if the worst-case scenario should happen, the children will be out of harm's reach.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Even if the worst-case scenario should
happen, the children will be out of harm's reach.
jpnChrName: ええ、これで万が一の場合でも 子供たちだけは安全な場所で守れる……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、これで万が一の場合でも
子供たちだけは安全な場所で守れる……

engChrName: This was a brilliant scheme. You should be proud of yourself, Agnès.
engSearchText:
This was a brilliant scheme. You should be proud of
yourself, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ルールの枠組みを見極めた見事な一手かと。
jpnSearchText: ルールの枠組みを見極めた見事な一手かと。

engChrName: Not at all. Admittedly, this was just a self-satisfied gesture that might well have no meaning at all.
engSearchText:
Not at all. Admittedly, this was just a self-satisfied
gesture that might well have no meaning at all.
jpnChrName: いえ…… ただの自己満足ですし、我が儘です。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……
ただの自己満足ですし、我が儘です。

engChrName: But I just happened to remember what Dingo once said to Van.
engSearchText:
But I just happened to remember what Dingo once
said to Van.
jpnChrName: でも、ヴァンさんがディンゴさんから 伝えられたという言葉が頭をよぎって──
jpnSearchText:
でも、ヴァンさんがディンゴさんから
伝えられたという言葉が頭をよぎって──

engChrName: Think about what you can do, and what you want to do.
engSearchText:
Think about what you can do, and what you want
to do.
jpnChrName: 今、自分に出来ることは何なのか、 それと自分がやりたい事は何なのか。
jpnSearchText:
今、自分に出来ることは何なのか、
それと自分がやりたい事は何なのか。

engChrName: You'll find a clue on how to move forward in the gap between the two.
engSearchText:
You'll find a clue on how to move forward in the gap
between the two.
jpnChrName: そこの“ギャップ”にこそ、 前に進むためのヒントがあるってな。
jpnSearchText:
そこの“ギャップ”にこそ、
前に進むためのヒントがあるってな。

engChrName: Very well. Make the most of your connections while you're away. The CID is at your beck and call.
engSearchText:
Very well. Make the most of your connections while
you're away. The CID is at your beck and call.
jpnChrName: ──ＣＩＤや各方面との ツテはせいぜい活用することだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ＣＩＤや各方面との
ツテはせいぜい活用することだ。

engChrName: There are many truths that lie dormant in the gap between ideals and reality. You would do well to seek them out.
engSearchText:
There are many truths that lie dormant in the gap
between ideals and reality. You would do well to seek
them out.
jpnChrName: 理想と現実の狭間の中、 自分が何を掴めるかを測る意味でも。
jpnSearchText:
理想と現実の狭間の中、
自分が何を掴めるかを測る意味でも。

engChrName: I also recalled the words of my dad, and it just... spurred me to action, I suppose.
engSearchText:
I also recalled the words of my dad, and it just...
spurred me to action, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ──それと合わせて 父の言葉も思い出してしまって。
jpnSearchText:
──それと合わせて
父の言葉も思い出してしまって。

engChrName: After I thought up the idea, I spoke to Marielle and Renne, and we all decided to go ahead with it.
engSearchText:
After I thought up the idea, I spoke to Marielle
and Renne, and we all decided to go ahead with it.
jpnChrName: 先輩やマリエルさんとも相談して 独断でやらせてもらいました。
jpnSearchText:
先輩やマリエルさんとも相談して
独断でやらせてもらいました。

engChrName: By the way, I heard about what happened with Elaine through the guild.
engSearchText:
By the way, I heard about what happened with Elaine
through the guild.
jpnChrName: ……すみません、エレインさんの件は 先ほどギルド方面から聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
……すみません、エレインさんの件は
先ほどギルド方面から聞きました。

engChrName: I'm so sorry I couldn't be there at such an important time.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry I couldn't be there at such an
important time.
jpnChrName: そんな大変な時に力になれず、 余計なことをしたかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
そんな大変な時に力になれず、
余計なことをしたかもしれませんが……

engChrName: Why the hell are you sayin' sorry? You just earned us a huge win.
engSearchText:
Why the hell are you sayin' sorry? You just earned us
a huge win.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 余計な事どころか、大金星じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
余計な事どころか、大金星じゃねえか。

engChrName: You even factored in the crown prince's debt to us and turned him into a chess piece for your master plan.
engSearchText:
You even factored in the crown prince's debt to us
and turned him into a chess piece for your
master plan.
jpnChrName: しかもバーゼルの件での公国への貸しと 公太子の察しも計算しやがるとは……
jpnSearchText:
しかもバーゼルの件での公国への貸しと
公太子の察しも計算しやがるとは……

engChrName: You've gotten pretty damn sneaky. We better watch out, or we're all gonna be your puppets before long.
engSearchText:
You've gotten pretty damn sneaky. We better watch
out, or we're all gonna be your puppets before long.
jpnChrName: 良い感じで“ズル”くなったもんだな？
jpnSearchText: 良い感じで“ズル”くなったもんだな？

engChrName: I...don't think that will be happening anytime soon.
engSearchText: I...don't think that will be happening anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ううっ、否定できませんけど……
jpnSearchText: ううっ、否定できませんけど……

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: It's almost like you're utterly incapable of offering a genuine compliment.
engSearchText:
It's almost like you're utterly incapable of offering
a genuine compliment.
jpnChrName: ふう、そこは素直に 誉めてあげればいいのにさ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、そこは素直に
誉めてあげればいいのにさ。

engChrName: (Tch. I'm gonna have to start pulling my weight more.)
engSearchText:
(Tch. I'm gonna have to start pulling my
weight more.)
jpnChrName: （チッ……負けてられねぇな。）
jpnSearchText: （チッ……負けてられねぇな。）

engChrName: Sounds like our allies are on their way.
engSearchText: Sounds like our allies are on their way.
jpnChrName: “協力者”もすぐ来るそうだ。
jpnSearchText: “協力者”もすぐ来るそうだ。

engChrName: Let's go, guys. It's time to finish this.
engSearchText: Let's go, guys. It's time to finish this.
jpnChrName: ──行くぞ、今度こそ 全てにケリをつけるために。
jpnSearchText:
──行くぞ、今度こそ
全てにケリをつけるために。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Let's do this!
engSearchText: Let's do this!
jpnChrName: いよいよだな……！
jpnSearchText: いよいよだな……！

engChrName: May Aidios be with you all!
engSearchText: May Aidios be with you all!
jpnChrName: 皆さん── どうか女神のご加護を！
jpnSearchText:
皆さん──
どうか女神のご加護を！

engChrName: Do whatever must be done to ensure that Agnès' precautions will be for naught.
engSearchText:
Do whatever must be done to ensure that Agnès'
precautions will be for naught.
jpnChrName: アニエスが掛けた“保険”、 何としても無駄に終わらせなさい！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスが掛けた“保険”、
何としても無駄に終わらせなさい！

engChrName: I don't see any 4SPGs on the board.
engSearchText: I don't see any 4SPGs on the board.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇはありませんね。
jpnSearchText: ４ｓｐｇはありませんね。

engChrName: That's weird. I thought the society was spreading the word that I'm in town.
engSearchText:
That's weird. I thought the society was spreading the
word that I'm in town.
jpnChrName: 一応結社の連中が噂を流す筈だが……
jpnSearchText: 一応結社の連中が噂を流す筈だが……

engChrName: Maybe they'll start rollin' in soon.
engSearchText: Maybe they'll start rollin' in soon.
jpnChrName: 何せ急な話だ、依頼が来始めるのは もう少し時間が経ってからだろう。
jpnSearchText:
何せ急な話だ、依頼が来始めるのは
もう少し時間が経ってからだろう。

engChrName: Not like we can deal with them today, anyway.
engSearchText: Not like we can deal with them today, anyway.
jpnChrName: どの道今日は対応する余裕もねえしな。
jpnSearchText: どの道今日は対応する余裕もねえしな。

engChrName: The game will begin soon, and we aren't sure how much time we will have in the evening.
engSearchText:
The game will begin soon, and we aren't sure how
much time we will have in the evening.
jpnChrName: １４時に“ゲーム”が始まれば どうなるか分かりませんし。
jpnSearchText:
１４時に“ゲーム”が始まれば
どうなるか分かりませんし。

engChrName: Got a point there. Guess we'll just have to check back tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Got a point there. Guess we'll just have to check
back tomorrow.
jpnChrName: だな、本格的な裏解決業務は 明日以降になるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
だな、本格的な裏解決業務は
明日以降になるだろう。

engChrName: Let's just worry about makin' it through the first round for the time being.
engSearchText:
Let's just worry about makin' it through the first
round for the time being.
jpnChrName: 無事に今日を乗り越えることを 考えた方がよさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
無事に今日を乗り越えることを
考えた方がよさそうだな。

engChrName: Right. We need to prepare for the game.
engSearchText: Right. We need to prepare for the game.
jpnChrName: はい、今はゲームの準備を進めないと。
jpnSearchText: はい、今はゲームの準備を進めないと。

engChrName: The main story will advance once you enter the guild.
engSearchText: The main story will advance once you enter the guild.
jpnChrName: この先に進むとストーリーが進行するので 注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
この先に進むとストーリーが進行するので
注意してください。

engChrName: Hey there.
engSearchText: Hey there.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちか。
jpnSearchText: お前さんたちか。

engChrName: Took you long enough.
engSearchText: Took you long enough.
jpnChrName: 来てくれたんだね。
jpnSearchText: 来てくれたんだね。

engChrName: 'Sup, you guys.
engSearchText: 'Sup, you guys.
jpnChrName: ハッ、また会ったな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、また会ったな。

engChrName: Oh, you guys are here, too?
engSearchText: Oh, you guys are here, too?
jpnChrName: 《不動》と《妖精》もいるのか。
jpnSearchText: 《不動》と《妖精》もいるのか。

engChrName: Yeah. Alvis called and asked us to come back here.
engSearchText: Yeah. Alvis called and asked us to come back here.
jpnChrName: わたしたちも連絡を受けて 帰って来たばかりだけど。
jpnSearchText:
わたしたちも連絡を受けて
帰って来たばかりだけど。

engChrName: So, what's the sitch?
engSearchText: So, what's the sitch?
jpnChrName: それで、状況は？
jpnSearchText: それで、状況は？

engChrName: Is something going on with Ms. Auclair? I hear she has gone to see her family.
engSearchText:
Is something going on with Ms. Auclair? I hear she
has gone to see her family.
jpnChrName: 確かエレイン様は、ご実家に 戻られたはずなのでは？
jpnSearchText:
確かエレイン様は、ご実家に
戻られたはずなのでは？

engChrName: Yeah, that's what she told us initially, but umm... Actually, let me start from the beginning.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's what she told us initially, but umm...
Actually, let me start from the beginning.
jpnChrName: そのはずなんだが…… とにかく順を追って説明する。
jpnSearchText:
そのはずなんだが……
とにかく順を追って説明する。

engChrName: Let me start from the beginning.
engSearchText: Let me start from the beginning.
jpnChrName: ……順を追って説明する。
jpnSearchText: ……順を追って説明する。

engChrName: After the third round ended, Elaine returned to the guild.
engSearchText:
After the third round ended, Elaine returned to
the guild.
jpnChrName: 下層の“ゲーム”の後で、 エレインさんは一旦ギルドに戻ったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
下層の“ゲーム”の後で、
エレインさんは一旦ギルドに戻ったんだ。

engChrName: I just thought she was coming here to clear her head...
engSearchText: I just thought she was coming here to clear her head...
jpnChrName: あの時はどこか吹っ切れたような 感じだったから、油断していた。
jpnSearchText:
あの時はどこか吹っ切れたような
感じだったから、油断していた。

engChrName: After a bit, she said she was gonna go see her folks back home.
engSearchText:
After a bit, she said she was gonna go see her folks
back home.
jpnChrName: それでしばらくした後、 実家に戻ると言ってまた出て行ってな。
jpnSearchText:
それでしばらくした後、
実家に戻ると言ってまた出て行ってな。

engChrName: She looked exhausted, so I told her to enjoy some time off and get plenty of rest.
engSearchText:
She looked exhausted, so I told her to enjoy some
time off and get plenty of rest.
jpnChrName: かなり疲れていたようだから、俺も帰って 休んだ方がいいと送り出していたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
かなり疲れていたようだから、俺も帰って
休んだ方がいいと送り出していたんだが……

engChrName: At the time, I just thought she was worn out from all those battles, but now I realize there was more to it than that.
engSearchText:
At the time, I just thought she was worn out from all
those battles, but now I realize there was more to it
than that.
jpnChrName: 今思えばあの時エレインの顔色が悪かったのは 戦いで消耗したからだけじゃなかったんだね。
jpnSearchText:
今思えばあの時エレインの顔色が悪かったのは
戦いで消耗したからだけじゃなかったんだね。

engChrName: Wait, back up. What's wrong with her wanting to go back to see her family?
engSearchText:
Wait, back up. What's wrong with her wanting to go
back to see her family?
jpnChrName: 実家に帰っただけなら 別に問題はないと思うけど……？
jpnSearchText:
実家に帰っただけなら
別に問題はないと思うけど……？

engChrName: We'll get to that in a second.
engSearchText: We'll get to that in a second.
jpnChrName: 問題はその後だ。
jpnSearchText: 問題はその後だ。

engChrName: A while later, a courier named Hermès dropped off a letter from Elaine.
engSearchText:
A while later, a courier named Hermès dropped off a
letter from Elaine.
jpnChrName: しばらく経ってから、エルメスっていう 運び屋がエレインさんからの手紙を届けてきた。
jpnSearchText:
しばらく経ってから、エルメスっていう
運び屋がエレインさんからの手紙を届けてきた。

engChrName: I didn't know Hermès was up here.
engSearchText: I didn't know Hermès was up here.
jpnChrName: エルメスさん、ここに来たんですか。
jpnSearchText: エルメスさん、ここに来たんですか。

engChrName: The bike lady's up here?
engSearchText: The bike lady's up here?
jpnChrName: あのバイク女、ここに来たのかよ。
jpnSearchText: あのバイク女、ここに来たのかよ。

engChrName: Why a letter of all things...?
engSearchText: Why a letter of all things...?
jpnChrName: しかし、わざわざ手紙とは……
jpnSearchText: しかし、わざわざ手紙とは……

engChrName: Inside the letter was that sheet of paper.
engSearchText: Inside the letter was that sheet of paper.
jpnChrName: 中身は……これだ。
jpnSearchText: 中身は……これだ。

engChrName: That's the bracer emblem, yes?
engSearchText: That's the bracer emblem, yes?
jpnChrName: これは……遊撃士のエンブレムか？
jpnSearchText: これは……遊撃士のエンブレムか？

engChrName: That's the bracer emblem, right?
engSearchText: That's the bracer emblem, right?
jpnChrName: こいつは……遊撃士のエンブレムだな？
jpnSearchText: こいつは……遊撃士のエンブレムだな？

engChrName: Yeah. A bracer's always supposed to carry this on their person.
engSearchText:
Yeah. A bracer's always supposed to carry this on
their person.
jpnChrName: ああ、遊撃士として活動する際は 肌身離さず持っているべきなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、遊撃士として活動する際は
肌身離さず持っているべきなんだが……

engChrName: Wait, so if she turned that in, then that means... No way.
engSearchText:
Wait, so if she turned that in, then that means...
No way.
jpnChrName: おい、まさか隣にある手紙の内容ってのは……
jpnSearchText: おい、まさか隣にある手紙の内容ってのは……

engChrName: Yep. That's her letter of resignation.
engSearchText: Yep. That's her letter of resignation.
jpnChrName: 辞表よ、エレインの。
jpnSearchText: 辞表よ、エレインの。

engChrName: She quit the bracers?! But why?
engSearchText: She quit the bracers?! But why?
jpnChrName: 《剣の乙女》が遊撃士を……！？
jpnSearchText: 《剣の乙女》が遊撃士を……！？

engChrName: No idea. She didn't go into that in the letter.
engSearchText: No idea. She didn't go into that in the letter.
jpnChrName: 簡単にまとめると、そうなる。 しかも理由も説明されていない。
jpnSearchText:
簡単にまとめると、そうなる。
しかも理由も説明されていない。

engChrName: What a mess.
engSearchText: What a mess.
jpnChrName: こりゃただ事じゃなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: こりゃただ事じゃなさそうだな。

engChrName: That just seems unbelievable to me.
engSearchText: That just seems unbelievable to me.
jpnChrName: それは……ただ事じゃないな。
jpnSearchText: それは……ただ事じゃないな。

engChrName: The timing concerns me most.
engSearchText: The timing concerns me most.
jpnChrName: それに、このタイミングで というのも気になります。
jpnSearchText:
それに、このタイミングで
というのも気になります。

engChrName: You don't think she went to face Almata alone, do you?
engSearchText:
You don't think she went to face Almata alone,
do you?
jpnChrName: まさか、一人でアルマータの所に……！
jpnSearchText: まさか、一人でアルマータの所に……！

engChrName: Not a chance. That'd be a violation of the rules.
engSearchText: Not a chance. That'd be a violation of the rules.
jpnChrName: いや、そんなことしたら即ルール違反で 街ごと女神行きだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そんなことしたら即ルール違反で
街ごと女神行きだ。

engChrName: She would never do something that'd put the rest of us in danger.
engSearchText:
She would never do something that'd put the rest of
us in danger.
jpnChrName: あいつがそんなバカな真似を するはずがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつがそんなバカな真似を
するはずがねぇ。

engChrName: Don't think she'd spare that kind of concern for herself, though...
engSearchText:
Don't think she'd spare that kind of concern for
herself, though...
jpnChrName: 無謀な真似はしそうだがな……
jpnSearchText: 無謀な真似はしそうだがな……

engChrName: So what in the world happened, then?
engSearchText: So what in the world happened, then?
jpnChrName: だとしたら、彼女は一体 なんでこんなことを……
jpnSearchText:
だとしたら、彼女は一体
なんでこんなことを……

engChrName: Or maybe the better question is what on earth is she doing?
engSearchText:
Or maybe the better question is what on earth is
she doing?
jpnChrName: というより、一体何を しようとしているのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
というより、一体何を
しようとしているのかしら……

engChrName: I can answer that one.
engSearchText: I can answer that one.
jpnChrName: それについては、一応 手掛かりが残っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
それについては、一応
手掛かりが残っているわ。

engChrName: You know what Elaine's up to?
engSearchText: You know what Elaine's up to?
jpnChrName: レン、何か知ってるの？
jpnSearchText: レン、何か知ってるの？

engChrName: As a matter of fact, I do. Sorry about the hold up, by the way. I was tied up helping someone else.
engSearchText:
As a matter of fact, I do. Sorry about the hold up, by
the way. I was tied up helping someone else.
jpnChrName: ええ、さっきまで他のお手伝いで手が 離せなかったけど、状況は理解しているつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、さっきまで他のお手伝いで手が
離せなかったけど、状況は理解しているつもりよ。

engChrName: Elaine came by the guild earlier today.
engSearchText: Elaine came by the guild earlier today.
jpnChrName: 剣のお姉さんのことなんだけど……
jpnSearchText: 剣のお姉さんのことなんだけど……

engChrName: She asked me to do a small favor for her.
engSearchText: She asked me to do a small favor for her.
jpnChrName: 実は彼女がギルドに戻っていた際に、 少し頼み事をされてね。
jpnSearchText:
実は彼女がギルドに戻っていた際に、
少し頼み事をされてね。

engChrName: What? I didn't hear about this. What'd she ask?
engSearchText: What? I didn't hear about this. What'd she ask?
jpnChrName: 頼み事か……俺は聞いちゃいないが、 一体何を頼まれたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
頼み事か……俺は聞いちゃいないが、
一体何を頼まれたんだ？

engChrName: She gave me a flash drive and asked me to verify the authenticity of the data stored on it.
engSearchText:
She gave me a flash drive and asked me to verify the
authenticity of the data stored on it.
jpnChrName: いくつかのデータを渡され、 それが本物か検証できないかってね。
jpnSearchText:
いくつかのデータを渡され、
それが本物か検証できないかってね。

engChrName: Elaine came back here just to ask you to verify some data?
engSearchText:
Elaine came back here just to ask you to verify
some data?
jpnChrName: データの裏取り……！？
jpnSearchText: データの裏取り……！？

engChrName: Ms. Auclair returned to the guild just to ask you to verify some data?
engSearchText:
Ms. Auclair returned to the guild just to ask you to
verify some data?
jpnChrName: データの裏取り……ですか。
jpnSearchText: データの裏取り……ですか。

engChrName: Yes, and she left as soon as she got her answer.
engSearchText: Yes, and she left as soon as she got her answer.
jpnChrName: ええ、そして何とか調べて、 全部本物だと伝えたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そして何とか調べて、
全部本物だと伝えたわ。

engChrName: The data was genuine. That much is certain.
engSearchText: The data was genuine. That much is certain.
jpnChrName: 彼女が出て行ったのはその後よ。
jpnSearchText: 彼女が出て行ったのはその後よ。

engChrName: So what kinda data was it?
engSearchText: So what kinda data was it?
jpnChrName: ……内容は？
jpnSearchText: ……内容は？

engChrName: That I don't know. Not for certain, at least.
engSearchText: That I don't know. Not for certain, at least.
jpnChrName: 渡されたものはどれも断片的で 全体像は分からないけれど……
jpnSearchText:
渡されたものはどれも断片的で
全体像は分からないけれど……

engChrName: It was all incomplete, but I could tell it entailed multiple mira transactions—and large ones, at that.
engSearchText:
It was all incomplete, but I could tell it entailed
multiple mira transactions—and large ones, at that.
jpnChrName: その背後で大きなミラが流れていた ことは確かね。
jpnSearchText:
その背後で大きなミラが流れていた
ことは確かね。

engChrName: This is pure conjecture, but I believe the data outlines the financial operations of a criminal organization's primary sponsor.
engSearchText:
This is pure conjecture, but I believe the data outlines
the financial operations of a criminal organization's
primary sponsor.
jpnChrName: 推測するにあれは、ある団体に莫大な 資金提供を行った取引の記録。
jpnSearchText:
推測するにあれは、ある団体に莫大な
資金提供を行った取引の記録。

engChrName: And that criminal organization is almost certainly—
engSearchText: And that criminal organization is almost certainly—
jpnChrName: その相手は恐らく──
jpnSearchText: その相手は恐らく──

engChrName: Almata, right?
engSearchText: Almata, right?
jpnChrName: アルマータ、だな。
jpnSearchText: アルマータ、だな。

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.
jpnChrName: ほぼ間違いないでしょうね。
jpnSearchText: ほぼ間違いないでしょうね。

engChrName: So Elaine's going after Almata's pocketbook.
engSearchText: So Elaine's going after Almata's pocketbook.
jpnChrName: するとエレインはアルマータに資金提供を していたスポンサーを追っていたわけか。
jpnSearchText:
するとエレインはアルマータに資金提供を
していたスポンサーを追っていたわけか。

engChrName: Well, I suppose that's one way to bring them down.
engSearchText: Well, I suppose that's one way to bring them down.
jpnChrName: 確かに放っては置けぬ相手だが……
jpnSearchText: 確かに放っては置けぬ相手だが……

engChrName: But why would she need to leave the bracers to do that?
engSearchText:
But why would she need to leave the bracers to
do that?
jpnChrName: なんで遊撃士を辞めてまで 一人でそんなことを……
jpnSearchText:
なんで遊撃士を辞めてまで
一人でそんなことを……

engChrName: Shit. I've got a bad feeling about this one.
engSearchText: Shit. I've got a bad feeling about this one.
jpnChrName: ……クソ、嫌な予感しかしねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ……クソ、嫌な予感しかしねぇ。

engChrName: I gotta find her fast!
engSearchText: I gotta find her fast!
jpnChrName: とにかくあいつを追うぞ。 何か取り返しのつかないことになる前に……
jpnSearchText:
とにかくあいつを追うぞ。
何か取り返しのつかないことになる前に……

engChrName: Any idea where she might've gone?
engSearchText: Any idea where she might've gone?
jpnChrName: 当然俺たちもそのつもりだが、 問題はどこへ行けばいいかだな……
jpnSearchText:
当然俺たちもそのつもりだが、
問題はどこへ行けばいいかだな……

engChrName: She's probably headed to—or has already arrived at— the site of Almata's largest investor.
engSearchText:
She's probably headed to—or has already arrived at—
the site of Almata's largest investor.
jpnChrName: アルマータを支援しているのは 個人というよりは団体……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータを支援しているのは
個人というよりは団体……

engChrName: I'm fairly certain the investor in question is a company—but I don't know which one it is.
engSearchText:
I'm fairly certain the investor in question is a
company—but I don't know which one it is.
jpnChrName: しかも複数存在していると 考えた方が自然でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
しかも複数存在していると
考えた方が自然でしょう。

engChrName: Though I can imagine her target is the person who's at the top rung of their corporate ladder.
engSearchText:
Though I can imagine her target is the person who's
at the top rung of their corporate ladder.
jpnChrName: それらを取り纏め、 主導している人物がいるはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
それらを取り纏め、
主導している人物がいるはずよ。

engChrName: If you can find that person, you will likely find Elaine.
engSearchText: If you can find that person, you will likely find Elaine.
jpnChrName: 剣のお姉さんはまさにその人物を 追っていると思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
剣のお姉さんはまさにその人物を
追っていると思うわ。

engChrName: Naturally, they have to be someone who resides in Oración.
engSearchText:
Naturally, they have to be someone who resides
in Oración.
jpnChrName: そしておそらくは このオラシオンの中にいる人物……
jpnSearchText:
そしておそらくは
このオラシオンの中にいる人物……

engChrName: Okay, that means we've got 280,000 suspects. Any way we can bring that number down?
engSearchText:
Okay, that means we've got 280,000 suspects.
Any way we can bring that number down?
jpnChrName: それでも範囲が広すぎるのよね。
jpnSearchText: それでも範囲が広すぎるのよね。

engChrName: If they're directing multiple sponsors, they must be someone who's wealthy and in a position of power.
engSearchText:
If they're directing multiple sponsors, they must be
someone who's wealthy and in a position of power.
jpnChrName: スポンサーたちを主導するくらいの人なら、 それなりの財力と権力を持っているはず。
jpnSearchText:
スポンサーたちを主導するくらいの人なら、
それなりの財力と権力を持っているはず。

engChrName: So we're probably looking for a celebrity or a bigwig.
engSearchText: So we're probably looking for a celebrity or a bigwig.
jpnChrName: 地元の名士か何かの組織のトップ……
jpnSearchText: 地元の名士か何かの組織のトップ……

engChrName: That narrows it down.
engSearchText: That narrows it down.
jpnChrName: ハ、少しは見えてきたじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハ、少しは見えてきたじゃねえか。

engChrName: So we're likely looking for a celebrity or a company executive.
engSearchText:
So we're likely looking for a celebrity or a
company executive.
jpnChrName: 地元の名士か何かの組織のトップ……
jpnSearchText: 地元の名士か何かの組織のトップ……

engChrName: That narrows it down a fair bit.
engSearchText: That narrows it down a fair bit.
jpnChrName: ある程度絞れてきたかもね。
jpnSearchText: ある程度絞れてきたかもね。

engChrName: I've got a couple of ideas as to who it could be.
engSearchText: I've got a couple of ideas as to who it could be.
jpnChrName: それなら候補はあるぞ。
jpnSearchText: それなら候補はあるぞ。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: アルヴィス？
jpnSearchText: アルヴィス？

engChrName: I've been doing an investigation of my own over these last few days.
engSearchText:
I've been doing an investigation of my own over these
last few days.
jpnChrName: エレインさんのこととは無関係に、 俺もこの数日で色々と調べていた。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんのこととは無関係に、
俺もこの数日で色々と調べていた。

engChrName: I figured I'd make myself useful while I was up here on the surface.
engSearchText:
I figured I'd make myself useful while I was up here
on the surface.
jpnChrName: 伊達に地上で活動してはいないからな。
jpnSearchText: 伊達に地上で活動してはいないからな。

engChrName: Well, don't keep us in suspense. Who do you think it is?
engSearchText:
Well, don't keep us in suspense. Who do you think
it is?
jpnChrName: その候補とは？
jpnSearchText: その候補とは？

engChrName: The way I see it, there's two possible suspects. The first is the owner of the opera house. Her name is Adeline Monange.
engSearchText:
The way I see it, there's two possible suspects.
The first is the owner of the opera house. Her name
is Adeline Monange.
jpnChrName: 一人はオペラハウスのオーナー、 アドリーヌ・モナンジュ。
jpnSearchText:
一人はオペラハウスのオーナー、
アドリーヌ・モナンジュ。

engChrName: She's independently wealthy and has deep ties to Oración's upper crust.
engSearchText:
She's independently wealthy and has deep ties to
Oración's upper crust.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの伝統文化を守ろうとして、 新興の映画産業を敵視しているとの噂だ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの伝統文化を守ろうとして、
新興の映画産業を敵視しているとの噂だ。

engChrName: Word is she's got one heck of a bone to pick with people in the film industry.
engSearchText:
Word is she's got one heck of a bone to pick with
people in the film industry.
jpnChrName: 資産家である上に、オラシオンの 上流階級との繋がりが強い。
jpnSearchText:
資産家である上に、オラシオンの
上流階級との繋がりが強い。

engChrName: Considering Almata went after two film festivals, I think it's entirely possible that she's backing them.
engSearchText:
Considering Almata went after two film festivals, I
think it's entirely possible that she's backing them.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が２回もアルマータに狙われたことを 考えると、彼女が支援している可能性は十分にある。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が２回もアルマータに狙われたことを
考えると、彼女が支援している可能性は十分にある。

engChrName: The other one is Fernand Audran, Oración's mayor.
engSearchText: The other one is Fernand Audran, Oración's mayor.
jpnChrName: もう一人はオラシオン市長の フィルナン・オードラン。
jpnSearchText:
もう一人はオラシオン市長の
フィルナン・オードラン。

engChrName: Mayor Audran is the head of the conservative faction here, and he's hard on immigrants. He also interacts with descendants of the old nobility.
engSearchText:
Mayor Audran is the head of the conservative faction
here, and he's hard on immigrants. He also interacts
with descendants of the old nobility.
jpnChrName: 保守派の筆頭で、移民へのあたりが強い。 未だに旧王国貴族たちと交流があると聞いている。
jpnSearchText:
保守派の筆頭で、移民へのあたりが強い。
未だに旧王国貴族たちと交流があると聞いている。

engChrName: He could be using Almata as a tool to strike at immigrants. The idea is unnerving, I know, but it's not out of the question.
engSearchText:
He could be using Almata as a tool to strike
at immigrants. The idea is unnerving, I know, but it's
not out of the question.
jpnChrName: 考えたくないが、移民を攻撃するために アルマータを利用しているかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
考えたくないが、移民を攻撃するために
アルマータを利用しているかもしれない。

engChrName: Both sound like they could be the sponsor head.
engSearchText: Both sound like they could be the sponsor head.
jpnChrName: どちらも条件を満たしていそうですね……
jpnSearchText: どちらも条件を満たしていそうですね……

engChrName: Both sound like viable suspects.
engSearchText: Both sound like viable suspects.
jpnChrName: どっちも条件を満たしていそうだな……
jpnSearchText: どっちも条件を満たしていそうだな……

engChrName: Hey, Van. Who do you think's most suspicious? You're a local, technically, so I'm curious about your opinion.
engSearchText:
Hey, Van. Who do you think's most suspicious?
You're a local, technically, so I'm curious about
your opinion.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはエレインと同じ地元なんだね、 誰が一番怪しいと思う？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはエレインと同じ地元なんだね、
誰が一番怪しいと思う？

engChrName: I wouldn't put much stock in it. I was just a kid when I was livin' here.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't put much stock in it. I was just a kid when
I was livin' here.
jpnChrName: 地元つっても、ガキの頃だけだ。 そうだな……
jpnSearchText:
地元つっても、ガキの頃だけだ。
そうだな……

engChrName: I'll give my take, though. Based on Alvis' findings—as well as the situation over the last few years—the most suspicious one is...
engSearchText:
I'll give my take, though. Based on Alvis'
findings—as well as the situation over
the last few years—the most suspicious one is...
jpnChrName: アルヴィスの話にここ数年の状況を 合わせて考えると、一番怪しいのは──
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスの話にここ数年の状況を
合わせて考えると、一番怪しいのは──

engChrName: You've got a good eye, Alvis, but the conditions we outlined could match a couple of other people, too.
engSearchText:
You've got a good eye, Alvis, but the conditions we
outlined could match a couple of other people, too.
jpnChrName: 着眼点は悪くねえが、その条件なら他にも 当てはまりそうな候補はいるな。
jpnSearchText:
着眼点は悪くねえが、その条件なら他にも
当てはまりそうな候補はいるな。

engChrName: Oh, you're right.
engSearchText: Oh, you're right.
jpnChrName: あ、そう言えば……
jpnSearchText: あ、そう言えば……

engChrName: And there's one person in particular...
engSearchText: And there's one person in particular...
jpnChrName: それに…………
jpnSearchText: それに…………

engChrName: Anyway, I can only think of one person who's leading Almata's sponsors.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I can only think of one person who's leading
Almata's sponsors.
jpnChrName: とにかく、それらも合わせて考えると、 アルマータのスポンサーたちを主導する人物……
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、それらも合わせて考えると、
アルマータのスポンサーたちを主導する人物……

engChrName: I can only think of one person who's leading Almata's sponsors.
engSearchText:
I can only think of one person who's leading
Almata's sponsors.
jpnChrName: それも合わせて考えると、アルマータの スポンサーたちを主導する人物……
jpnSearchText:
それも合わせて考えると、アルマータの
スポンサーたちを主導する人物……

engChrName: And that person is...
engSearchText: And that person is...
jpnChrName: 一番怪しいのは──
jpnSearchText: 一番怪しいのは──

engChrName: Yeah, you're probably right. They have to be the one.
engSearchText: Yeah, you're probably right. They have to be the one.
jpnChrName: 言われてみれば、確かに一段と 怪しく感じる所があるな……
jpnSearchText:
言われてみれば、確かに一段と
怪しく感じる所があるな……

engChrName: Let's go find 'em right now, then. We might not have much time.
engSearchText:
Let's go find 'em right now, then. We might not have
much time.
jpnChrName: 結論が出たのなら早く行動に移そう。 あんまり時間がないかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
結論が出たのなら早く行動に移そう。
あんまり時間がないかもしれん。

engChrName: Right.
engSearchText: Right.
jpnChrName: そうだね。
jpnSearchText: そうだね。

engChrName: (Did I pick the right person...? Agh, I can't waste time thinking about this. We gotta move!)
engSearchText:
(Did I pick the right person...? Agh, I can't waste
time thinking about this. We gotta move!)
jpnChrName: （本当にこれでいいのか……   いや、迷ってる時間はねぇ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（本当にこれでいいのか……
いや、迷ってる時間はねぇ……！）

engChrName: All right. Let's go!
engSearchText: All right. Let's go!
jpnChrName: ああ、早く行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、早く行くぞ！

engChrName: W-Wait a moment. Did you just say...?!
engSearchText: W-Wait a moment. Did you just say...?!
jpnChrName: ……ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ。 その名前って……！
jpnSearchText:
……ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ。
その名前って……！

engChrName: Ah. That would explain a lot, actually.
engSearchText: Ah. That would explain a lot, actually.
jpnChrName: なるほど……それなら、 彼女の行動にも説明がつくわね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……それなら、
彼女の行動にも説明がつくわね。

engChrName: Oh, no. That's horrible...
engSearchText: Oh, no. That's horrible...
jpnChrName: ですが、それはあまりにも……
jpnSearchText: ですが、それはあまりにも……

engChrName: I sympathize with her.
engSearchText: I sympathize with her.
jpnChrName: だが……おそらく間違いないのだろう。
jpnSearchText: だが……おそらく間違いないのだろう。

engChrName: Well, now that we have our answer, I say we get moving.
engSearchText:
Well, now that we have our answer, I say we
get moving.
jpnChrName: そうと決まれば 早く行動した方がよさそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
そうと決まれば
早く行動した方がよさそうだね。

engChrName: Yeah. Just in case, though, we should send people to the other suspects.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Just in case, though, we should send people to
the other suspects.
jpnChrName: ああ、一応念のため、他の候補にも 人手を割いた方がいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、一応念のため、他の候補にも
人手を割いた方がいいだろう。

engChrName: Can you handle that for us, Alvis?
engSearchText: Can you handle that for us, Alvis?
jpnChrName: アルヴィス、そっちは頼めるか？
jpnSearchText: アルヴィス、そっちは頼めるか？

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はい！
jpnSearchText: はい！

engChrName: I'll go help him with that. Good luck with the main target.
engSearchText:
I'll go help him with that. Good luck with the
main target.
jpnChrName: 私もそっちをサポートするわ。 本命の方は任せたわよ。
jpnSearchText:
私もそっちをサポートするわ。
本命の方は任せたわよ。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ──行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: ああ──行くぞ！

engChrName: (Wait for me, Elaine. I'm coming!)
engSearchText: (Wait for me, Elaine. I'm coming!)
jpnChrName: （待ってろよ、エレイン……！）
jpnSearchText: （待ってろよ、エレイン……！）

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Isn't Nelly the name of the waitress at our inn?
engSearchText: Isn't Nelly the name of the waitress at our inn?
jpnChrName: それにしても、 依頼人のネリーさんというのは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
依頼人のネリーさんというのは……

engChrName: Yes, that's right.
engSearchText: Yes, that's right.
jpnChrName: 確か僕たちが泊ってる宿の ウェイトレスだね。
jpnSearchText:
確か僕たちが泊ってる宿の
ウェイトレスだね。

engChrName: Wonder what's goin' on with her.
engSearchText: Wonder what's goin' on with her.
jpnChrName: ふむ、ちょいと気になるが……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、ちょいと気になるが……

engChrName: How may I help you all?
engSearchText: How may I help you all?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃいませ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah, you're the group that came here yesterday. You want me to whip up a meal for you?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, you're the group that came here yesterday.
You want me to whip up a meal for you?
jpnChrName: あ、昨日から宿泊されていた皆さん。 お食事ですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、昨日から宿泊されていた皆さん。
お食事ですか？

engChrName: That's okay. Thank you, though. We're actually here about your request.
engSearchText:
That's okay. Thank you, though. We're actually here
about your request.
jpnChrName: いえその…… 貴女が４ｓｐｇの依頼をしたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
いえその……
貴女が４ｓｐｇの依頼をしたんですか？

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!

engChrName: You're Nelly, right? We saw your 4SPG on the bulletin board.
engSearchText:
You're Nelly, right? We saw your 4SPG on the
bulletin board.
jpnChrName: 出したんだろ？　掲示板に。
jpnSearchText: 出したんだろ？　掲示板に。

engChrName: Wait, you're the famous spriggan? Wow!
engSearchText: Wait, you're the famous spriggan? Wow!
jpnChrName: ということは、皆さんが 噂の裏解決屋だったんですか……！
jpnSearchText:
ということは、皆さんが
噂の裏解決屋だったんですか……！

engChrName: We left the inn to check the bulletin board, and now we're right back where we started. That's funny.
engSearchText:
We left the inn to check the bulletin board, and now
we're right back where we started. That's funny.
jpnChrName: まさかこんな近くに依頼人がいるとはな。
jpnSearchText: まさかこんな近くに依頼人がいるとはな。

engChrName: So, umm... Can I go ahead and talk about the threat letter I received?
engSearchText:
So, umm... Can I go ahead and talk about the threat
letter I received?
jpnChrName: その……では“脅迫状”に関して…… 話を聞いてもらえますか？
jpnSearchText:
その……では“脅迫状”に関して……
話を聞いてもらえますか？

engChrName: Oh, you're back. So can I tell you about the threat letter now?
engSearchText:
Oh, you're back. So can I tell you about the threat
letter now?
jpnChrName: その……“脅迫状”に関して…… 話を聞いてもらえますか？
jpnSearchText:
その……“脅迫状”に関して……
話を聞いてもらえますか？

engChrName: Actually, we gotta do somethin' real quick.
engSearchText: Actually, we gotta do somethin' real quick.
jpnChrName: 結構厄介な問題かもしれないから、 時間が掛かりそうだな……
jpnSearchText:
結構厄介な問題かもしれないから、
時間が掛かりそうだな……

engChrName: Mind if we check back with you later?
engSearchText: Mind if we check back with you later?
jpnChrName: 悪いが、少し考えさせてくれ。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、少し考えさせてくれ。

engChrName: Oh, of course. Take your time. I'll be right here when you're ready to listen.
engSearchText:
Oh, of course. Take your time. I'll be right here when
you're ready to listen.
jpnChrName: はい、皆さんの都合がいいように。 私はここで待っています。
jpnSearchText:
はい、皆さんの都合がいいように。
私はここで待っています。

engChrName: Sure. What's it say?
engSearchText: Sure. What's it say?
jpnChrName: ああ、さっそく聞かせて貰おうか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、さっそく聞かせて貰おうか。

engChrName: Perhaps we should discuss this in our room. I have a feeling this could take a while.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we should discuss this in our room. I have a
feeling this could take a while.
jpnChrName: 込み入った話になりそうですし、 いったん我々の部屋に向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
込み入った話になりそうですし、
いったん我々の部屋に向かいましょうか。

engChrName: All right. Have you got the letter on hand?
engSearchText: All right. Have you got the letter on hand?
jpnChrName: 脅迫状、か。 まずは見せてもらっていいか？
jpnSearchText:
脅迫状、か。
まずは見せてもらっていいか？

engChrName: Yes. Right here.
engSearchText: Yes. Right here.
jpnChrName: はい、こちらです。
jpnSearchText: はい、こちらです。

engChrName: 'Filthy, parasitic immigrants like you have no place in our magnificent opera house!'
engSearchText:
'Filthy, parasitic immigrants like you have no place in
our magnificent opera house!'
jpnChrName: 薄汚い移民が伝統あるオペラハウスの 舞台に立つなどあり得ない！
jpnSearchText:
薄汚い移民が伝統あるオペラハウスの
舞台に立つなどあり得ない！

engChrName: 'Abandon your dream to take the stage—or the wrath of Aidios will descend upon you!'
engSearchText:
'Abandon your dream to take the stage—or the wrath
of Aidios will descend upon you!'
jpnChrName: 分を弁えぬ者には、 女神に代わって“天罰”を下してくれる！
jpnSearchText:
分を弁えぬ者には、
女神に代わって“天罰”を下してくれる！

engChrName: How could anyone write something so horrible...?
engSearchText: How could anyone write something so horrible...?
jpnChrName: これは、ひどいですね……
jpnSearchText: これは、ひどいですね……

engChrName: Invoking our Goddess' name in this way is nothing short of impiety.
engSearchText:
Invoking our Goddess' name in this way is nothing
short of impiety.
jpnChrName: 女神の名をこのような形で借りるなど、 不敬虔にもほどがあろう。
jpnSearchText:
女神の名をこのような形で借りるなど、
不敬虔にもほどがあろう。

engChrName: The person who wrote this is obviously anti-immigrant.
engSearchText:
The person who wrote this is
obviously anti-immigrant.
jpnChrName: 犯人は……明らかに反移民主義者だね。
jpnSearchText: 犯人は……明らかに反移民主義者だね。

engChrName: This is one of the most pathetic things I've ever read.
engSearchText: This is one of the most pathetic things I've ever read.
jpnChrName: ハッ、くだらねえヤツがいるもんだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、くだらねえヤツがいるもんだ。

engChrName: Guessin' you don't see a lot of this stuff, given that Heiyue's got such a stranglehold over Langport.
engSearchText:
Guessin' you don't see a lot of this stuff, given that
Heiyue's got such a stranglehold over Langport.
jpnChrName: ラングポートでは黒月が幅を利かせている分、 移民に対する反感が表に出ることは余りない。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートでは黒月が幅を利かせている分、
移民に対する反感が表に出ることは余りない。

engChrName: Oración's a different story, though. Anti-immigrant animosity's more likely to seep through here.
engSearchText:
Oración's a different story, though.
Anti-immigrant animosity's more likely to seep
through here.
jpnChrName: だがオラシオンは違う……
jpnSearchText: だがオラシオンは違う……

engChrName: Some people in this city are determined to carry the antiquated beliefs of the old nobility to the grave.
engSearchText:
Some people in this city are determined to carry the
antiquated beliefs of the old nobility to the grave.
jpnChrName: 旧王都だけあって、未だに王国時代の 貴族思想を引き継いでるヤツが多いからな。
jpnSearchText:
旧王都だけあって、未だに王国時代の
貴族思想を引き継いでるヤツが多いからな。

engChrName: It's almost like their life's calling is to harass people like Nelly.
engSearchText:
It's almost like their life's calling is to harass people
like Nelly.
jpnChrName: それだけ移民に対する風当たりも強いってわけだ。
jpnSearchText: それだけ移民に対する風当たりも強いってわけだ。

engChrName: You aren't wrong there. Most of the people here are kind, but there's a handful of rotten apples, to be sure.
engSearchText:
You aren't wrong there. Most of the people here are
kind, but there's a handful of rotten apples, to be sure.
jpnChrName: はい、もちろん周りには 優しい人も一杯いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、もちろん周りには
優しい人も一杯いますけど……

engChrName: This isn't the first time I've faced discrimination in this city. I can count the number of times this kind of thing has happened on two hands.
engSearchText:
This isn't the first time I've faced discrimination in
this city. I can count the number of times this kind of
thing has happened on two hands.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、移民に対する差別は 私自身これまで何度も経験しました……
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら、移民に対する差別は
私自身これまで何度も経験しました……

engChrName: Then why are you still living here?
engSearchText: Then why are you still living here?
jpnChrName: それでもこの街で暮らしているのは なぜですか？
jpnSearchText:
それでもこの街で暮らしているのは
なぜですか？

engChrName: Because I love Oración. It's every artist's dream to live here. We all call it the city of art and tradition.
engSearchText:
Because I love Oración. It's every artist's dream to
live here. We all call it the city of art and tradition.
jpnChrName: オラシオンは“芸術の都”と称されるほど 伝統芸術が盛んな都市ですから。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンは“芸術の都”と称されるほど
伝統芸術が盛んな都市ですから。

engChrName: I've wanted to be here ever since I was a little girl.
engSearchText: I've wanted to be here ever since I was a little girl.
jpnChrName: ずっと以前から憧れがあって……
jpnSearchText: ずっと以前から憧れがあって……

engChrName: I worked day and night for so long to get to where I am, and now I've finally earned the right to attend the music academy here.
engSearchText:
I worked day and night for so long to get to where I
am, and now I've finally earned the right to attend the
music academy here.
jpnChrName: 努力してようやく、ここの音楽学校に 通えるようになったんです。
jpnSearchText:
努力してようやく、ここの音楽学校に
通えるようになったんです。

engChrName: I can't just throw it all away now.
engSearchText: I can't just throw it all away now.
jpnChrName: なので途中で辞めることなんてできません。
jpnSearchText: なので途中で辞めることなんてできません。

engChrName: Mmm. I can understand that feeling.
engSearchText: Mmm. I can understand that feeling.
jpnChrName: そうだったのね……
jpnSearchText: そうだったのね……

engChrName: Okay, so the music academy and the opera house connection tracks.
engSearchText:
Okay, so the music academy and the opera house
connection tracks.
jpnChrName: 音楽学校…… それでオペラハウスに繋がるわけか。
jpnSearchText:
音楽学校……
それでオペラハウスに繋がるわけか。

engChrName: Is there something that sparked all this? Like an event of some kind?
engSearchText:
Is there something that sparked all this? Like an event
of some kind?
jpnChrName: 近々、何かイベントでもあるのか？
jpnSearchText: 近々、何かイベントでもあるのか？

engChrName: Yes, actually. We're borrowing the opera house for a concert recital.
engSearchText:
Yes, actually. We're borrowing the opera house for a
concert recital.
jpnChrName: はい、オペラハウスを借りて、 学校主催の声楽の発表会がありまして。
jpnSearchText:
はい、オペラハウスを借りて、
学校主催の声楽の発表会がありまして。

engChrName: It's still a little ways away, but I'm totally stoked for it. And that's in part because I got the lead role.
engSearchText:
It's still a little ways away, but I'm totally stoked for it.
And that's in part because I got the lead role.
jpnChrName: まだ少し先のことですが…… その主演に私が選ばれているんです。
jpnSearchText:
まだ少し先のことですが……
その主演に私が選ばれているんです。

engChrName: Wow! Congratulations!
engSearchText: Wow! Congratulations!
jpnChrName: 主演……すごいじゃないですか。
jpnSearchText: 主演……すごいじゃないですか。

engChrName: So the threat letter is calling on you to give up the leading role.
engSearchText:
So the threat letter is calling on you to give up the
leading role.
jpnChrName: なら脅迫状の内容は、その声楽会の 主演を降りろって意味かな……？
jpnSearchText:
なら脅迫状の内容は、その声楽会の
主演を降りろって意味かな……？

engChrName: They'll probably resort to violence if you don't comply.
engSearchText:
They'll probably resort to violence if you
don't comply.
jpnChrName: しかも従わない場合は実力行使に出ると……
jpnSearchText: しかも従わない場合は実力行使に出ると……

engChrName: That's what I feared...
engSearchText: That's what I feared...
jpnChrName: やはり、そう取れますよね……
jpnSearchText: やはり、そう取れますよね……

engChrName: The opera house has been around for over a hundred years.
engSearchText:
The opera house has been around for over a
hundred years.
jpnChrName: ……百年以上の歴史を誇るオペラハウスは オラシオン伝統芸術の象徴のようなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……百年以上の歴史を誇るオペラハウスは
オラシオン伝統芸術の象徴のようなもんだ。

engChrName: And in all that time, I don't think there's ever been an immigrant who's been at the center of the stage.
engSearchText:
And in all that time, I don't think there's ever been an
immigrant who's been at the center of the stage.
jpnChrName: そんな場所に移民を立たせて、 しかも主演ってなると──
jpnSearchText:
そんな場所に移民を立たせて、
しかも主演ってなると──

engChrName: I could definitely see that ruffling more than a few feathers in the anti-immigrant crowd.
engSearchText:
I could definitely see that ruffling more than a few
feathers in the anti-immigrant crowd.
jpnChrName: 反移民主義者が騒ぎ立てるのも無理はねえな。
jpnSearchText: 反移民主義者が騒ぎ立てるのも無理はねえな。

engChrName: I'm sure they'll stoop to some serious lows to get you out of the spotlight.
engSearchText:
I'm sure they'll stoop to some serious lows to get you
out of the spotlight.
jpnChrName: 強引な手段に出る可能性も十分にあり得るだろう。
jpnSearchText: 強引な手段に出る可能性も十分にあり得るだろう。

engChrName: That's terrible.
engSearchText: That's terrible.
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: If you don't mind me asking, why didn't you take this to the police or the guild?
engSearchText:
If you don't mind me asking, why didn't you take this
to the police or the guild?
jpnChrName: その……僕たちよりギルドや警察に 相談した方がいいんじゃないですか？
jpnSearchText:
その……僕たちよりギルドや警察に
相談した方がいいんじゃないですか？

engChrName: I wanted to be discreet about all this. If word gets out, the entire recital could be canceled.
engSearchText:
I wanted to be discreet about all this. If word gets out,
the entire recital could be canceled.
jpnChrName: そんな大ごとになったら声楽会そのものが 開催を取り消されるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
そんな大ごとになったら声楽会そのものが
開催を取り消されるかもしれません。

engChrName: It's been a labor of love from everyone involved, and my classmates have been giving it their all during practice.
engSearchText:
It's been a labor of love from everyone involved, and
my classmates have been giving it their all
during practice.
jpnChrName: 学校の仲間たちはみんな必死に 練習してこの日を待っていたんです……
jpnSearchText:
学校の仲間たちはみんな必死に
練習してこの日を待っていたんです……

engChrName: I don't want their efforts to go to waste.
engSearchText: I don't want their efforts to go to waste.
jpnChrName: 私一人のせいでみんなの努力を 無駄にしたくありません……！
jpnSearchText:
私一人のせいでみんなの努力を
無駄にしたくありません……！

engChrName: This is just like the film festival—from the threat letter to the calling upon of a dubious spriggan to save the day.
engSearchText:
This is just like the film festival—from the threat
letter to the calling upon of a dubious spriggan to save
the day.
jpnChrName: なんだか映画祭の時を思い出すわね。 あの時も怪しい裏解決屋に依頼するしかなくて……
jpnSearchText:
なんだか映画祭の時を思い出すわね。
あの時も怪しい裏解決屋に依頼するしかなくて……

engChrName: I should just give up the lead role, shouldn't I?
engSearchText: I should just give up the lead role, shouldn't I?
jpnChrName: とは言うものの…… 私が降板するしかありませんよね……
jpnSearchText:
とは言うものの……
私が降板するしかありませんよね……

engChrName: What?! Heck no!
engSearchText: What?! Heck no!
jpnChrName: ──なんでそうなるのよ！？
jpnSearchText: ──なんでそうなるのよ！？

engChrName: You worked your butt off and studied like crazy to get this far. That role is rightfully yours, so don't give it up!
engSearchText:
You worked your butt off and studied like crazy to get
this far. That role is rightfully yours, so don't give
it up!
jpnChrName: 嫌な思いをしてまで、ここで勉強して せっかく掴んだチャンスじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
嫌な思いをしてまで、ここで勉強して
せっかく掴んだチャンスじゃない！

engChrName: But I... I don't think I have any other choice.
engSearchText: But I... I don't think I have any other choice.
jpnChrName: だってそうするしか……自分一人が 我慢すればいいこと……ですから………
jpnSearchText:
だってそうするしか……自分一人が
我慢すればいいこと……ですから………

engChrName: You don't wanna fight this? Then why'd you send out a request?
engSearchText:
You don't wanna fight this? Then why'd you send out
a request?
jpnChrName: だったらなんで わざわざ俺たちに依頼を出したんだ？
jpnSearchText:
だったらなんで
わざわざ俺たちに依頼を出したんだ？

engChrName: I guess I just wanted to hear an expert's opinion before I came to a decision.
engSearchText:
I guess I just wanted to hear an expert's opinion
before I came to a decision.
jpnChrName: それは……脅迫状について 見解を聞きたかったからで……
jpnSearchText:
それは……脅迫状について
見解を聞きたかったからで……

engChrName: Now that I know I'm in real danger, I'd rather just let this one go.
engSearchText:
Now that I know I'm in real danger, I'd rather just let
this one go.
jpnChrName: 本当に危険があると分かった以上、 もうそうするしか……
jpnSearchText:
本当に危険があると分かった以上、
もうそうするしか……

engChrName: Well, you're the client. If you wanna call it here, then we'll be on our way.
engSearchText:
Well, you're the client. If you wanna call it here, then
we'll be on our way.
jpnChrName: 依頼人がそう言うなら 俺たちにはどうすることも出来ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼人がそう言うなら
俺たちにはどうすることも出来ねぇ。

engChrName: But are you sure this is how you want things to end?
engSearchText: But are you sure this is how you want things to end?
jpnChrName: ──だが、本当にそれでいいのか？
jpnSearchText: ──だが、本当にそれでいいのか？

engChrName: If you let this guy go, they'll be back for more. As long as you have the will to take to the skies, they'll do everything they can to chain you down.
engSearchText:
If you let this guy go, they'll be back for more.
As long as you have the will to take to the skies,
they'll do everything they can to chain you down.
jpnChrName: ここで犯人の要求を飲んだら、 次も、またその次があるかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ここで犯人の要求を飲んだら、
次も、またその次があるかもしれねえ。

engChrName: Things'll only escalate from here if you don't take a stand.
engSearchText:
Things'll only escalate from here if you don't take
a stand.
jpnChrName: そうなりゃどんどん エスカレートしていくのは明白だ。
jpnSearchText:
そうなりゃどんどん
エスカレートしていくのは明白だ。

engChrName: I bet they won't stop until you've packed your bags and left.
engSearchText:
I bet they won't stop until you've packed your bags
and left.
jpnChrName: いつかお前さんがここにいられなくなるまでな。
jpnSearchText: いつかお前さんがここにいられなくなるまでな。

engChrName: You still haven't given me the details of your request.
engSearchText: You still haven't given me the details of your request.
jpnChrName: 俺はまだ詳細な依頼内容を聞いてねえ。
jpnSearchText: 俺はまだ詳細な依頼内容を聞いてねえ。

engChrName: Tell me what you really want. I'm all ears.
engSearchText: Tell me what you really want. I'm all ears.
jpnChrName: さ、言ってみろ。 お前さんが本当はどうしたいのか。
jpnSearchText:
さ、言ってみろ。
お前さんが本当はどうしたいのか。

jpnChrName: 私は……
jpnSearchText: 私は……

engChrName: I want to be a part of the recital! I don't want to give up here!
engSearchText:
I want to be a part of the recital! I don't want to give
up here!
jpnChrName: 胸を張って声楽会に出たいです！
jpnSearchText: 胸を張って声楽会に出たいです！

engChrName: Got it. Then you can leave everything to us—'cause Arkride Solutions is on the case.
engSearchText:
Got it. Then you can leave everything to us—'cause
Arkride Solutions is on the case.
jpnChrName: 了解だ──その４ｓｐｇ、 《アークライド解決事務所》が引き受けた。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ──その４ｓｐｇ、
《アークライド解決事務所》が引き受けた。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: ですが……
jpnSearchText: ですが……

engChrName: No buts. We're gonna help you out, and that's final. Whoever's behind this will think twice about hurting you once we're through with them.
engSearchText:
No buts. We're gonna help you out, and that's final.
Whoever's behind this will think twice about
hurting you once we're through with them.
jpnChrName: ごちゃごちゃうるせぇな、 要は犯人を炙り出せばいいだけだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ごちゃごちゃうるせぇな、
要は犯人を炙り出せばいいだけだろ？
