engChrName: I suppose I can't change your minds, then...
engSearchText: I suppose I can't change your minds, then...
jpnChrName: 本当に……そこまでお世話になって いいんですか？
jpnSearchText:
本当に……そこまでお世話になって
いいんですか？

engChrName: That's right. Once we're committed to helping someone, we always see it through.
engSearchText:
That's right. Once we're committed to helping
someone, we always see it through.
jpnChrName: そのための裏解決屋ですから。
jpnSearchText: そのための裏解決屋ですから。

engChrName: Don't you worry, young lady. We'll catch this foul criminal.
engSearchText:
Don't you worry, young lady. We'll catch this
foul criminal.
jpnChrName: そうと決まれば犯人の考察といこう。
jpnSearchText: そうと決まれば犯人の考察といこう。

engChrName: I suggest we start by gathering a list of suspects. Is there anyone you can think of who could have sent that letter to you?
engSearchText:
I suggest we start by gathering a list of suspects.
Is there anyone you can think of who could have sent
that letter to you?
jpnChrName: ネリー様は何か心当たりはありませんか？
jpnSearchText: ネリー様は何か心当たりはありませんか？

engChrName: Umm... No, not off the top of my head.
engSearchText: Umm... No, not off the top of my head.
jpnChrName: 心当たりと言われても……
jpnSearchText: 心当たりと言われても……

engChrName: I know doubtin' people you know ain't any fun, but we need someplace to start.
engSearchText:
I know doubtin' people you know ain't any fun, but
we need someplace to start.
jpnChrName: 人を疑うことが辛いのは分かるが、 そうでもしねえと進まねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
人を疑うことが辛いのは分かるが、
そうでもしねえと進まねぇからな。

engChrName: Can you think of anyone who might want to snipe the leading role if you gave it up?
engSearchText:
Can you think of anyone who might want to snipe
the leading role if you gave it up?
jpnChrName: 周りにそれっぽいヤツはいねえのか？ アンタが降板になったら得をするような。
jpnSearchText:
周りにそれっぽいヤツはいねえのか？
アンタが降板になったら得をするような。

engChrName: I...suppose one person comes to mind.
engSearchText: I...suppose one person comes to mind.
jpnChrName: そう言われると…… 一人、思い当たる相手はいます。
jpnSearchText:
そう言われると……
一人、思い当たる相手はいます。

engChrName: Her name's Amalie.
engSearchText: Her name's Amalie.
jpnChrName: 名前はアマーリエさんといって……
jpnSearchText: 名前はアマーリエさんといって……

engChrName: She's another student at the academy—and she's hyper competitive.
engSearchText:
She's another student at the academy—and she's
hyper competitive.
jpnChrName: 音楽学校の同級生で、 私にとってはライバルのような子です。
jpnSearchText:
音楽学校の同級生で、
私にとってはライバルのような子です。

engChrName: We were both the top picks for the lead spot.
engSearchText: We were both the top picks for the lead spot.
jpnChrName: 今回の発表会の主演も、私たち二人が 最終候補だったと聞いています。
jpnSearchText:
今回の発表会の主演も、私たち二人が
最終候補だったと聞いています。

engChrName: So if you were to step down, she would assume the leading role.
engSearchText:
So if you were to step down, she would assume the
leading role.
jpnChrName: つまり貴女が降板になったら 自動的に彼女が主演になるわけですね。
jpnSearchText:
つまり貴女が降板になったら
自動的に彼女が主演になるわけですね。

engChrName: That certainly qualifies as a motive.
engSearchText: That certainly qualifies as a motive.
jpnChrName: 動機は十分か……
jpnSearchText: 動機は十分か……

engChrName: What kind of person is she? Do you know what she thinks about immigrants?
engSearchText:
What kind of person is she? Do you know what she
thinks about immigrants?
jpnChrName: どういった人なんですか？ 移民に対する態度とか。
jpnSearchText:
どういった人なんですか？
移民に対する態度とか。

engChrName: I know she's a descendant of the old Oración nobility, and, umm... Well, I don't think she likes me very much.
engSearchText:
I know she's a descendant of the old Oración nobility,
and, umm... Well, I don't think she likes me
very much.
jpnChrName: 彼女は確かオラシオンの旧貴族家出身で、 私には、その……いつもきつい態度で……
jpnSearchText:
彼女は確かオラシオンの旧貴族家出身で、
私には、その……いつもきつい態度で……

engChrName: I've never heard her say anything discriminatory about immigrants, but I can't exactly read her mind.
engSearchText:
I've never heard her say anything discriminatory about
immigrants, but I can't exactly read her mind.
jpnChrName: 公の場で直接人種差別的な発言をしたわけでは ありませんが、心の中でどう思ってるかまでは……
jpnSearchText:
公の場で直接人種差別的な発言をしたわけでは
ありませんが、心の中でどう思ってるかまでは……

engChrName: She definitely sounds suspicious to me.
engSearchText: She definitely sounds suspicious to me.
jpnChrName: ……疑う要素が揃っているわね。
jpnSearchText: ……疑う要素が揃っているわね。

engChrName: Yeah, I agree. We'll start by talking with her.
engSearchText: Yeah, I agree. We'll start by talking with her.
jpnChrName: んじゃ、まずはそのアマーリエから 話を聞いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
んじゃ、まずはそのアマーリエから
話を聞いてみるか。

engChrName: Oh, but I don't know for sure that it's Amalie.
engSearchText: Oh, but I don't know for sure that it's Amalie.
jpnChrName: ですが、彼女だと決まったわけでは……
jpnSearchText: ですが、彼女だと決まったわけでは……

engChrName: I know. We're not gonna lay any accusations. We just wanna chat with her.
engSearchText:
I know. We're not gonna lay any accusations. We just
wanna chat with her.
jpnChrName: 分かってるさ、あくまで話を聞くだけだ。
jpnSearchText: 分かってるさ、あくまで話を聞くだけだ。

engChrName: Any idea where she'd be around this time?
engSearchText: Any idea where she'd be around this time?
jpnChrName: この時間で彼女がいそうな場所は分かるか？
jpnSearchText: この時間で彼女がいそうな場所は分かるか？

engChrName: I think she's at the boutique in the department store over by the East District. She wanted to pick out a dress to wear to the recital.
engSearchText:
I think she's at the boutique in the department store
over by the East District. She wanted to pick out a
dress to wear to the recital.
jpnChrName: 確か発表会に着るドレスを選ぶために 今日は百貨店のブティックに行くと……
jpnSearchText:
確か発表会に着るドレスを選ぶために
今日は百貨店のブティックに行くと……

engChrName: I overheard her saying that in our last rehearsal.
engSearchText: I overheard her saying that in our last rehearsal.
jpnChrName: 前のリハーサルの時に偶然聞きました。
jpnSearchText: 前のリハーサルの時に偶然聞きました。

engChrName: So we need to go to the Quincy Department Store.
engSearchText: So we need to go to the Quincy Department Store.
jpnChrName: 東街区の《クインシー百貨店》か。
jpnSearchText: 東街区の《クインシー百貨店》か。

engChrName: Let's depart, then.
engSearchText: Let's depart, then.
jpnChrName: 早速行きましょう。
jpnSearchText: 早速行きましょう。

engChrName: Quest Threatening Letter started!
engSearchText: Quest Threatening Letter started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【脅迫状についての相談】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>脅迫状についての相談<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: So, did you talk with Amalie?
engSearchText: So, did you talk with Amalie?
jpnChrName: 皆さん、何か進展がありましたか？
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、何か進展がありましたか？

engChrName: Yeah, we did. Let's move this conversation back to our room.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we did. Let's move this conversation back to
our room.
jpnChrName: まあな、ここじゃ何だから 部屋で話をさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、ここじゃ何だから
部屋で話をさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Van relayed what they heard from Amalie.
engSearchText: Van relayed what they heard from Amalie.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはアマーリエから聞いた話を ネリーに伝えた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはアマーリエから聞いた話を
ネリーに伝えた。

engChrName: Amalie really said all that?
engSearchText: Amalie really said all that?
jpnChrName: アマーリエさんがそんなことを……
jpnSearchText: アマーリエさんがそんなことを……

engChrName: Sure did. It's doubtful that she penned that letter.
engSearchText: Sure did. It's doubtful that she penned that letter.
jpnChrName: ああ、これで彼女が犯人である可能性は ほぼ消えたと言えるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これで彼女が犯人である可能性は
ほぼ消えたと言えるだろうな。

engChrName: Heehee. You look relieved.
engSearchText: Heehee. You look relieved.
jpnChrName: ふふ、良かったですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、良かったですね。

engChrName: I am. I totally had the wrong idea about her this whole time.
engSearchText:
I am. I totally had the wrong idea about her this
whole time.
jpnChrName: はい……私、ずっとアマーリエさんのことを 誤解していたんですね……
jpnSearchText:
はい……私、ずっとアマーリエさんのことを
誤解していたんですね……

engChrName: So she really thinks of me as a rival...
engSearchText: So she really thinks of me as a rival...
jpnChrName: ちゃんと私のことをライバルだと思って……
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと私のことをライバルだと思って……

engChrName: Glad we got that sorted out, but that means the number of suspects has dropped down to zero.
engSearchText:
Glad we got that sorted out, but that means the
number of suspects has dropped down to zero.
jpnChrName: 悪いが友情を噛み締めるのはまた後にしてくれ。 まだ問題は解決していないからな。
jpnSearchText:
悪いが友情を噛み締めるのはまた後にしてくれ。
まだ問題は解決していないからな。

engChrName: If Amalie didn't write it, then who in the world did?
engSearchText: If Amalie didn't write it, then who in the world did?
jpnChrName: そうでした……！　犯人がアマーリエさん じゃないとしたら、一体誰なんでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
そうでした……！　犯人がアマーリエさん
じゃないとしたら、一体誰なんでしょう……

engChrName: We're back to square one, it seems.
engSearchText: We're back to square one, it seems.
jpnChrName: 振り出しに戻ったようですね……
jpnSearchText: 振り出しに戻ったようですね……

engChrName: Actually, we might be one step closer to the truth. I'm thinkin' our perp was setting her up to take the blame.
engSearchText:
Actually, we might be one step closer to the truth.
I'm thinkin' our perp was setting her up to take
the blame.
jpnChrName: いや、確かに彼女は犯人じゃないが…… そう思われたのは偶然じゃないかもな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、確かに彼女は犯人じゃないが……
そう思われたのは偶然じゃないかもな。

engChrName: Wait, what?!
engSearchText: Wait, what?!
jpnChrName: それって……！？
jpnSearchText: それって……！？

engChrName: You think they were trying to frame her?
engSearchText: You think they were trying to frame her?
jpnChrName: 犯人に仕立てられたとでも言いてえのか？
jpnSearchText: 犯人に仕立てられたとでも言いてえのか？

engChrName: H-Huh? What do you mean?
engSearchText: H-Huh? What do you mean?
jpnChrName: えっ、ええ？　どういうことですか？
jpnSearchText: えっ、ええ？　どういうことですか？

engChrName: Look at it from this perspective: Amalie has the most to gain if you dropped out.
engSearchText:
Look at it from this perspective: Amalie has the most
to gain if you dropped out.
jpnChrName: 今回お前さんが降板になったら 一番得をするのは彼女（アマーリエ）だからな。
jpnSearchText:
今回お前さんが降板になったら
一番得をするのは彼女（アマーリエ）だからな。

engChrName: She's the type to be easily misunderstood, and like you said before, she's a descendant of the old Oración nobility.
engSearchText:
She's the type to be easily misunderstood, and like
you said before, she's a descendant of the old
Oración nobility.
jpnChrName: 加えてあの誤解されやすい性格に 旧オラシオン貴族という出身。
jpnSearchText:
加えてあの誤解されやすい性格に
旧オラシオン貴族という出身。

engChrName: Anyone would think she's suspicious with a capital S.
engSearchText: Anyone would think she's suspicious with a capital S.
jpnChrName: むしろ疑う方が自然な流れってもんだ。
jpnSearchText: むしろ疑う方が自然な流れってもんだ。

engChrName: It's a plausible theory, especially if our perpetrator holds anti-immigrant views.
engSearchText:
It's a plausible theory, especially if our perpetrator
holds anti-immigrant views.
jpnChrName: 犯人が反移民主義者だと仮定すれば、 その動機もまた明瞭なもの。
jpnSearchText:
犯人が反移民主義者だと仮定すれば、
その動機もまた明瞭なもの。

engChrName: After all, she herself is an ally of immigrants. She's an ideal target for them.
engSearchText:
After all, she herself is an ally of immigrants. She's an
ideal target for them.
jpnChrName: 移民だけでなく、移民に好意的な人間も また攻撃の対象となり得るだろう。
jpnSearchText:
移民だけでなく、移民に好意的な人間も
また攻撃の対象となり得るだろう。

engChrName: I...can see that.
engSearchText: I...can see that.
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: And if you start pointing fingers and playing the blame game, then that's all the better for them.
engSearchText:
And if you start pointing fingers and playing the
blame game, then that's all the better for them.
jpnChrName: 上手く行けば内輪もめも狙えるし、 確かに無駄がねぇ手だ。
jpnSearchText:
上手く行けば内輪もめも狙えるし、
確かに無駄がねぇ手だ。

engChrName: They must think they're sooo clever. Can't wait to bust their heads.
engSearchText:
They must think they're sooo clever. Can't wait to
bust their heads.
jpnChrName: 反吐が出そうなくらいにな。
jpnSearchText: 反吐が出そうなくらいにな。

engChrName: Do we have any idea who they are?
engSearchText: Do we have any idea who they are?
jpnChrName: 犯人の狙いがそれだとして、 何か目星があるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
犯人の狙いがそれだとして、
何か目星があるかしら？

engChrName: I've got a hunch. We should look into whoever's behind that survey. That thing stinks to high heaven.
engSearchText:
I've got a hunch. We should look into whoever's
behind that survey. That thing stinks to high heaven.
jpnChrName: 一応な。 どうもあの“アンケート”が胡散臭ぇ。
jpnSearchText:
一応な。
どうもあの“アンケート”が胡散臭ぇ。

engChrName: You think so? I thought Amalie said the person giving the surveys was pro-immigrant.
engSearchText:
You think so? I thought Amalie said the person
giving the surveys was pro-immigrant.
jpnChrName: ですが、移民に好意的な アンケートではなかったでしたっけ？
jpnSearchText:
ですが、移民に好意的な
アンケートではなかったでしたっけ？

engChrName: Yeah, I doubt that.
engSearchText: Yeah, I doubt that.
jpnChrName: そこがまた匂う所でな。
jpnSearchText: そこがまた匂う所でな。

engChrName: While it's true that the number of people with pro-immigrant beliefs are on the rise...
engSearchText:
While it's true that the number of people with
pro-immigrant beliefs are on the rise...
jpnChrName: あのアマーリエって子のように 移民に好意的な人間は増えちゃいるが――
jpnSearchText:
あのアマーリエって子のように
移民に好意的な人間は増えちゃいるが――

engChrName: ...in Oración, those voices are drowned out by the choir of anti-immigrant sentiment.
engSearchText:
...in Oración, those voices are drowned out by the
choir of anti-immigrant sentiment.
jpnChrName: それでもこのオラシオンは 反移民主義者たちの本拠地みたいなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでもこのオラシオンは
反移民主義者たちの本拠地みたいなもんだ。

engChrName: So if the results of that survey got posted, what do you think it'd look like?
engSearchText:
So if the results of that survey got posted, what do
you think it'd look like?
jpnChrName: こんな所であんなアンケートなんざしたら どうなると思う？
jpnSearchText:
こんな所であんなアンケートなんざしたら
どうなると思う？

engChrName: Well, it'd probably skew in favor of the people who hold those anti-immigrant beliefs.
engSearchText:
Well, it'd probably skew in favor of the people who
hold those anti-immigrant beliefs.
jpnChrName: 反移民主義者に狙われる……でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: 反移民主義者に狙われる……でしょうか。

engChrName: Bingo. If you were conducting the survey in good faith, doin' it here would fly in the face of common sense.
engSearchText:
Bingo. If you were conducting the survey in good
faith, doin' it here would fly in the face of
common sense.
jpnChrName: ああ、だからおいそれと そんなことが出来ねえはずなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だからおいそれと
そんなことが出来ねえはずなんだ。

engChrName: And that's exactly why I think that whole thing is bogus.
engSearchText:
And that's exactly why I think that whole thing
is bogus.
jpnChrName: 一つの例外を除いてな。
jpnSearchText: 一つの例外を除いてな。

engChrName: Do you think the person doing the survey could be connected to the anti-immigrant movement?
engSearchText:
Do you think the person doing the survey could be
connected to the anti-immigrant movement?
jpnChrName: アンケートを取った人間が本当は 実は反移民主義者と通じている……！？
jpnSearchText:
アンケートを取った人間が本当は
実は反移民主義者と通じている……！？

engChrName: That's exactly what I think. Might be connected to a hate group or a racist asshole in a position of power.
engSearchText:
That's exactly what I think. Might be connected to a
hate group or a racist asshole in a position of power.
jpnChrName: まあな、それもある程度の “力”がある人間、もしくは勢力だろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、それもある程度の
“力”がある人間、もしくは勢力だろう。

engChrName: So their goal this whole time was to root out people who support immigrants.
engSearchText:
So their goal this whole time was to root out people
who support immigrants.
jpnChrName: つまりアンケートの本当の狙いは 親移民派を炙り出すため、ってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
つまりアンケートの本当の狙いは
親移民派を炙り出すため、ってわけか。

engChrName: How dare they do something so vile! We can't let them get away with this!
engSearchText:
How dare they do something so vile! We can't let
them get away with this!
jpnChrName: 本当に手段が汚いわね。 人の好意を利用するだなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
本当に手段が汚いわね。
人の好意を利用するだなんて……！

engChrName: And we won't. We'll make sure they get what's coming to them—and we don't have to be picky about how we go about it.
engSearchText:
And we won't. We'll make sure they get what's
coming to them—and we don't have to be picky
about how we go about it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ならこっちも手段を選ばないまでだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ならこっちも手段を選ばないまでだ。

engChrName: Personally, though, I wanna do something that'll really rile 'em up, and I know just how to do that.
engSearchText:
Personally, though, I wanna do something that'll
really rile 'em up, and I know just how to do that.
jpnChrName: せいぜい相手が嫌がるようなことを やり返してやるとしようぜ――作戦がある。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい相手が嫌がるようなことを
やり返してやるとしようぜ――作戦がある。

engChrName: Does this mean I'm safe?
engSearchText: Does this mean I'm safe?
jpnChrName: これで、声楽会は 無事に開催されるのですね？
jpnSearchText:
これで、声楽会は
無事に開催されるのですね？

engChrName: Yep. You can go into your concert worry-free.
engSearchText: Yep. You can go into your concert worry-free.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの後ちゃんと吐いてたからな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、あの後ちゃんと吐いてたからな。

engChrName: We foiled the perpetrator's plans before they went into motion. He hadn't even secured the manpower he needed to force you out.
engSearchText:
We foiled the perpetrator's plans before they went
into motion. He hadn't even secured the manpower
he needed to force you out.
jpnChrName: ちなみに事を起こすための協力者も まだ用意は出来ていなかったようです。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに事を起こすための協力者も
まだ用意は出来ていなかったようです。

engChrName: What a relief.
engSearchText: What a relief.
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: Thank you so much, everyone.
engSearchText: Thank you so much, everyone.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: It was our pleasure. We wish you both the best of luck with your recital.
engSearchText:
It was our pleasure. We wish you both the best of
luck with your recital.
jpnChrName: ふふ。 声楽会、頑張ってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ。
声楽会、頑張ってくださいね。

engChrName: I'm sure you'll blow everyone's socks off!
engSearchText: I'm sure you'll blow everyone's socks off!
jpnChrName: お二人を応援しています！
jpnSearchText: お二人を応援しています！

engChrName: I would also like to extend my gratitude. Had you not stepped in, this insidious plot might never have been unraveled.
engSearchText:
I would also like to extend my gratitude. Had you not
stepped in, this insidious plot might never have
been unraveled.
jpnChrName: それにしても、まさか裏で あんなことになっていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、まさか裏で
あんなことになっていたなんて……

engChrName: Although, I might've been of some assistance earlier on had a certain someone kept me in the loop.
engSearchText:
Although, I might've been of some assistance earlier
on had a certain someone kept me in the loop.
jpnChrName: もっと早くわたくしに 相談してくれればよかったのに。
jpnSearchText:
もっと早くわたくしに
相談してくれればよかったのに。

engChrName: Sorry...
engSearchText: Sorry...
jpnChrName: アマーリエさん……
jpnSearchText: アマーリエさん……

engChrName: You gotta put a little more faith in your gal pals.
engSearchText: You gotta put a little more faith in your gal pals.
jpnChrName: そうだぜ、“友達”にはもっと 頼ったほうがいいぞ？
jpnSearchText:
そうだぜ、“友達”にはもっと
頼ったほうがいいぞ？

engChrName: I-I am most certainly NOT a 'gal pal'!
engSearchText: I-I am most certainly NOT a 'gal pal'!
jpnChrName: べ、別に友達とかではありませんわ！
jpnSearchText: べ、別に友達とかではありませんわ！

engChrName: I simply didn't want a worthy adversary to walk out on me—and especially not before I had the chance to even the score.
engSearchText:
I simply didn't want a worthy adversary to walk out
on me—and especially not before I had the chance to
even the score.
jpnChrName: わたくしはただライバルとして 勝ち逃げされるわけには──
jpnSearchText:
わたくしはただライバルとして
勝ち逃げされるわけには──

engChrName: Thanks, Amalie. You're such a good friend.
engSearchText: Thanks, Amalie. You're such a good friend.
jpnChrName: アマーリエさん、 改めて仲良くしてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
アマーリエさん、
改めて仲良くしてくださいね！

engChrName: I-I told you, I'm not... Argh...
engSearchText: I-I told you, I'm not... Argh...
jpnChrName: ですからそういうのじゃなくって……
jpnSearchText: ですからそういうのじゃなくって……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I still need to get an outfit for the recital.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. I still need to get an outfit for the recital.
jpnChrName: そう言えば私もまだ舞台の衣装を 決めていませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば私もまだ舞台の衣装を
決めていませんでした。

engChrName: Wanna go to the boutique with me?
engSearchText: Wanna go to the boutique with me?
jpnChrName: 一緒にブティックを回りませんか？
jpnSearchText: 一緒にブティックを回りませんか？

engChrName: W-Well... I suppose I wouldn't mind accompanying you.
engSearchText:
W-Well... I suppose I wouldn't mind
accompanying you.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ……そのくらいなら 別に構いませんけど………
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ……そのくらいなら
別に構いませんけど………

engChrName: *sigh* Kids, am I right?
engSearchText: *sigh* Kids, am I right?
jpnChrName: 青春っつうか、若いっていいねぇ～。
jpnSearchText: 青春っつうか、若いっていいねぇ～。

engChrName: You do realize that's a phrase only elderly people use, yes?
engSearchText:
You do realize that's a phrase only elderly people
use, yes?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、それ、かなりオヤジくさいから。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、それ、かなりオヤジくさいから。

engChrName: Can it.
engSearchText: Can it.
jpnChrName: うるせぇ！
jpnSearchText: うるせぇ！

engChrName: Quest Threatening Letter completed!
engSearchText: Quest Threatening Letter completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【脅迫状についての相談】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>脅迫状についての相談<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Pardon us, sir. Are you employed by the opera house?
engSearchText: Pardon us, sir. Are you employed by the opera house?
jpnChrName: すみません、オペラハウスの 職員の方でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
すみません、オペラハウスの
職員の方でしょうか？

engChrName: I am. Can I help you?
engSearchText: I am. Can I help you?
jpnChrName: はい、何かお手伝いが必要ですか？
jpnSearchText: はい、何かお手伝いが必要ですか？

engChrName: We had a question for you, if you don't mind.
engSearchText: We had a question for you, if you don't mind.
jpnChrName: いえ、その…… 少しお尋ねしたいことがありまして。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、その……
少しお尋ねしたいことがありまして。

engChrName: Do you know when the opera house was renovated?
engSearchText: Do you know when the opera house was renovated?
jpnChrName: このオペラハウスが建立されたのは 中世のことだと思うのですが……
jpnSearchText:
このオペラハウスが建立されたのは
中世のことだと思うのですが……

engChrName: We know it happened sometime in the Middle Ages, but we don't know when exactly.
engSearchText:
We know it happened sometime in the Middle Ages,
but we don't know when exactly.
jpnChrName: その後、改修されてから 何年経ったのかご存じだったりしますか？
jpnSearchText:
その後、改修されてから
何年経ったのかご存じだったりしますか？

engChrName: Oh, that's an easy one.
engSearchText: Oh, that's an easy one.
jpnChrName: それくらいのことでしたら。
jpnSearchText: それくらいのことでしたら。

engChrName: It was renovated sixteen years after the Calvardian Revolution.
engSearchText:
It was renovated sixteen years after the
Calvardian Revolution.
jpnChrName: このオペラハウスが改修されたのは、 《カルバード革命》から十数年後……
jpnSearchText:
このオペラハウスが改修されたのは、
《カルバード革命》から十数年後……

engChrName: So that would be 1116.
engSearchText: So that would be 1116.
jpnChrName: 今年でかれこれ９２年になりますね。
jpnSearchText: 今年でかれこれ９２年になりますね。

engChrName: Whoa, that's like...a long time ago!
engSearchText: Whoa, that's like...a long time ago!
jpnChrName: ９２年……すごいです！
jpnSearchText: ９２年……すごいです！

engChrName: Ninety-two years to be exact. I'm sure we will host a big event eight years from now.
engSearchText:
Ninety-two years to be exact. I'm sure we will host a
big event eight years from now.
jpnChrName: 後８年もすれば百年になりますから、 その際は大きな記念イベントもあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
後８年もすれば百年になりますから、
その際は大きな記念イベントもあるでしょう。

engChrName: That is, assuming the opera house lives to see that day. Ahaha...
engSearchText:
That is, assuming the opera house lives to see
that day. Ahaha...
jpnChrName: その時にまだこのオペラハウスが 残っていればの話ですが、あはは……
jpnSearchText:
その時にまだこのオペラハウスが
残っていればの話ですが、あはは……

engChrName: The burgeoning film industry is taking the world by storm...
engSearchText:
The burgeoning film industry is taking the world
by storm...
jpnChrName: 近年は映画産業がますます 盛り上がっていますしね。
jpnSearchText:
近年は映画産業がますます
盛り上がっていますしね。

engChrName: ...and all the while, opera will be left gasping for air in its wake.
engSearchText:
...and all the while, opera will be left gasping for air in
its wake.
jpnChrName: オペラを観る人はどんどん 少なくなっていくでしょうから……
jpnSearchText:
オペラを観る人はどんどん
少なくなっていくでしょうから……

engChrName: Do you really think that will happen?
engSearchText: Do you really think that will happen?
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: Well, I for one don't.
engSearchText: Well, I for one don't.
jpnChrName: そんなことはないわよ。
jpnSearchText: そんなことはないわよ。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: え？
jpnSearchText: え？

engChrName: It's true that movies are getting more popular by the day—especially with our generation.
engSearchText:
It's true that movies are getting more popular by the
day—especially with our generation.
jpnChrName: 確かに映画の勢いはすごいし、 若者に受け入れられやすい側面もあるけど――
jpnSearchText:
確かに映画の勢いはすごいし、
若者に受け入れられやすい側面もあるけど――

engChrName: Both, however, are totally distinct forms of art.
engSearchText: Both, however, are totally distinct forms of art.
jpnChrName: どちらも芸術の一形態でしかないわ。
jpnSearchText: どちらも芸術の一形態でしかないわ。

engChrName: Opera's able to capture the magic of live performances—and it's been refined over decades of iteration and practice.
engSearchText:
Opera's able to capture the magic of live
performances—and it's been refined over decades of
iteration and practice.
jpnChrName: オペラには映画にないような生の迫力や 蓄積され、洗練された様式美があるから――
jpnSearchText:
オペラには映画にないような生の迫力や
蓄積され、洗練された様式美があるから――

engChrName: The film industry still has a lot of catching up to do if it ever hopes to be on par with it.
engSearchText:
The film industry still has a lot of catching up to do if
it ever hopes to be on par with it.
jpnChrName: 新しい芸術である映画が 簡単に追いつけるものではないはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
新しい芸術である映画が
簡単に追いつけるものではないはずよ。

engChrName: You're absolutely right! I shouldn't let my anxieties get the best of me.
engSearchText:
You're absolutely right! I shouldn't let my anxieties
get the best of me.
jpnChrName: おっしゃる通りです！ 失礼しました、私としたことが……
jpnSearchText:
おっしゃる通りです！
失礼しました、私としたことが……

engChrName: To think that my faith in opera wavered for even a moment. It's thanks to you that I can lay all my doubts to rest.
engSearchText:
To think that my faith in opera wavered for even
a moment. It's thanks to you that I can lay all my
doubts to rest.
jpnChrName: 誰よりも職員である私がオペラを信じなくては！ 本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
誰よりも職員である私がオペラを信じなくては！
本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: Think nothing of it, sir. And thank you for answering our question.
engSearchText:
Think nothing of it, sir. And thank you for answering
our question.
jpnChrName: いえ、こちらこそ。 教えていただいて有難うございました。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、こちらこそ。
教えていただいて有難うございました。

engChrName: Okay, so ninety-two years is the answer.
engSearchText: Okay, so ninety-two years is the answer.
jpnChrName: ９２年っと……
jpnSearchText: ９２年っと……

engChrName: But wow, Judith. Who'd've thought you could be so nice?
engSearchText:
But wow, Judith. Who'd've thought you could be
so nice?
jpnChrName: しかし、お前さんも たまにはいいこと言うじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、お前さんも
たまにはいいこと言うじゃねぇか。

engChrName: And why exactly is that a surprise?!
engSearchText: And why exactly is that a surprise?!
jpnChrName: たまには余計よ！ それに……一応本心だしね。
jpnSearchText:
たまには余計よ！
それに……一応本心だしね。

engChrName: I'm a fan of opera, myself. I spent a lot of time studying it to strengthen my own acting ability.
engSearchText:
I'm a fan of opera, myself. I spent a lot of time
studying it to strengthen my own acting ability.
jpnChrName: 演技を磨くために、オペラも演劇も 一時期はかなり研究したんだから。
jpnSearchText:
演技を磨くために、オペラも演劇も
一時期はかなり研究したんだから。

engChrName: I have a stage actress friend to thank for inspiring me to do that.
engSearchText:
I have a stage actress friend to thank for inspiring me
to do that.
jpnChrName: とある舞台女優の演技は 今でも私のお手本でもあるし……
jpnSearchText:
とある舞台女優の演技は
今でも私のお手本でもあるし……

engChrName: Yet even after all that hard work, I didn't have much to show for it. Turns out, opera's tough.
engSearchText:
Yet even after all that hard work, I didn't have much
to show for it. Turns out, opera's tough.
jpnChrName: けれどその奥深さは簡単に 真似できるものではなかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
けれどその奥深さは簡単に
真似できるものではなかったわ。

engChrName: I had to grit my teeth when I came to that realization.
engSearchText: I had to grit my teeth when I came to that realization.
jpnChrName: 悔しいけどね。
jpnSearchText: 悔しいけどね。

engChrName: Judith...
engSearchText: Judith...
jpnChrName: ジュディスさん……
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさん……

engChrName: Once our work here is done, we should come see an opera performance all together.
engSearchText:
Once our work here is done, we should come see an
opera performance all together.
jpnChrName: 今回のことが終わったら、いつか みんなで一緒にオペラを観に行きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今回のことが終わったら、いつか
みんなで一緒にオペラを観に行きましょうか。

engChrName: Yeah, I'd like that.
engSearchText: Yeah, I'd like that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それもいいわね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それもいいわね。

engChrName: Aha! Here's the red tram.
engSearchText: Aha! Here's the red tram.
jpnChrName: 見つけました、赤いトラムです！
jpnSearchText: 見つけました、赤いトラムです！

engChrName: The color really makes it stick out.
engSearchText: The color really makes it stick out.
jpnChrName: ハッ、赤は目立ってていいよな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、赤は目立ってていいよな。

engChrName: Let's get the number!
engSearchText: Let's get the number!
jpnChrName: ちゃんと番号を覚えとけよ！
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと番号を覚えとけよ！

engChrName: That matches the number FIO recorded.
engSearchText: That matches the number FIO recorded.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯが認識・記録した番号とも一致する。 間違いないね。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯが認識・記録した番号とも一致する。
間違いないね。

engChrName: Phew. Finding that thing was a real hassle.
engSearchText: Phew. Finding that thing was a real hassle.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……見つけるのが大変だったわね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……見つけるのが大変だったわね。

engChrName: Surprised that it was, given that it's the only tram in Oración with a red top. Sticks out like a sore thumb.
engSearchText:
Surprised that it was, given that it's the only tram in
Oración with a red top. Sticks out like a sore thumb.
jpnChrName: オラシオンで運行してるトラムの中で 赤い車両はあの一両だけだからな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンで運行してるトラムの中で
赤い車両はあの一両だけだからな。

engChrName: I wonder why it's the only one with that color.
engSearchText: I wonder why it's the only one with that color.
jpnChrName: どうしてそうなっているのでしょう？
jpnSearchText: どうしてそうなっているのでしょう？

engChrName: There's a story behind that, actually. Decades ago, the painters who were workin' on that tram got mixed up about which color to use.
engSearchText:
There's a story behind that, actually. Decades ago, the
painters who were workin' on that tram got mixed up
about which color to use.
jpnChrName: 何十年前の話だが、最初は手違いで 塗る予定のペンキを取り違えたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
何十年前の話だが、最初は手違いで
塗る予定のペンキを取り違えたらしい。

engChrName: It was scheduled to get a repaint job a few days later, but while it was in operation, a string of miracles was bein' spun.
engSearchText:
It was scheduled to get a repaint job a few days later,
but while it was in operation, a string of miracles was
bein' spun.
jpnChrName: 数日後に塗り直すはずだったが、 その間に生き別れた家族を運んだり──
jpnSearchText:
数日後に塗り直すはずだったが、
その間に生き別れた家族を運んだり──

engChrName: On that very tram, separated families reunited, and quarreling lovers kissed and made up. People were meetin' famous celebrities on it, too.
engSearchText:
On that very tram, separated families reunited, and
quarreling lovers kissed and made up. People were
meetin' famous celebrities on it, too.
jpnChrName: ケンカした恋人が偶然車内で会って仲直りしたり、 有名人を何人も乗せたりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
ケンカした恋人が偶然車内で会って仲直りしたり、
有名人を何人も乗せたりしてな。

engChrName: Soon enough, all the citizens were callin' it the Lucky Red Tram.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, all the citizens were callin' it the Lucky
Red Tram.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか“幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム” と呼ばれるようになっちまった。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか“幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム”
と呼ばれるようになっちまった。

engChrName: That's a cute nickname.
engSearchText: That's a cute nickname.
jpnChrName: 幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム……！
jpnSearchText: 幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム……！

engChrName: Yeah, and it really caught on. It was so popular, the tram company decided to leave the paint job as is.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and it really caught on. It was so popular, the
tram company decided to leave the paint job as is.
jpnChrName: 運営会社はそれを受けて赤いヤツを そのまま残したってわけさ。
jpnSearchText:
運営会社はそれを受けて赤いヤツを
そのまま残したってわけさ。

engChrName: Since then, they've always made sure to have one red-roofed tram in operation.
engSearchText:
Since then, they've always made sure to have one
red-roofed tram in operation.
jpnChrName: それが定着して、オラシオンのトラムには 一両だけ赤く塗るのが伝統になってる。
jpnSearchText:
それが定着して、オラシオンのトラムには
一両だけ赤く塗るのが伝統になってる。

engChrName: What a lovely story.
engSearchText: What a lovely story.
jpnChrName: ロマンチックな話ですね。
jpnSearchText: ロマンチックな話ですね。

engChrName: It was marketing gold that fell right in the tram company's laps. Helped them get a shitton of butts in seats.
engSearchText:
It was marketing gold that fell right in the tram
company's laps. Helped them get a shitton of butts
in seats.
jpnChrName: 運営会社にとってはいい宣伝材料だからな。 どっちかっつうとミラの話だ。
jpnSearchText:
運営会社にとってはいい宣伝材料だからな。
どっちかっつうとミラの話だ。

engChrName: Aaand it's ruined now.
engSearchText: Aaand it's ruined now.
jpnChrName: 情緒がないわね、まったく……
jpnSearchText: 情緒がないわね、まったく……

engChrName: Hey there. We're Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Hey there. We're Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》 っつうモンなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》
っつうモンなんだが。

engChrName: Got a quick question for you.
engSearchText: Got a quick question for you.
jpnChrName: 依頼を受けてちょいと調べてる事があってな。
jpnSearchText: 依頼を受けてちょいと調べてる事があってな。

engChrName: We're lookin' for a man in a suit and a female police officer. Did you see anyone like that recently?
engSearchText:
We're lookin' for a man in a suit and a female
police officer. Did you see anyone like that recently?
jpnChrName: 数分前に、ここにスーツの男と 婦警が来なかったか？
jpnSearchText:
数分前に、ここにスーツの男と
婦警が来なかったか？

engChrName: Hmm? Ah, yes, I did. They were here about ten minutes ago.
engSearchText:
Hmm? Ah, yes, I did. They were here about ten
minutes ago.
jpnChrName: ？　ええ……確かに１０分ほど前に いらっしゃいましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
？　ええ……確かに１０分ほど前に
いらっしゃいましたよ。

engChrName: The officer appeared to be tailing the man. The tension in the air was quite palpable.
engSearchText:
The officer appeared to be tailing the man.
The tension in the air was quite palpable.
jpnChrName: 婦警の方が男性の行方を追っているようでして、 少々物々しい雰囲気でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
婦警の方が男性の行方を追っているようでして、
少々物々しい雰囲気でしたが……

engChrName: Did the gentleman happen to mention where he was headed next, by any chance?
engSearchText:
Did the gentleman happen to mention where he was
headed next, by any chance?
jpnChrName: 男性が店を出る際に、 次の行先を言ってはいませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
男性が店を出る際に、
次の行先を言ってはいませんでしたか？

engChrName: Funny you say that. The officer asked me the same thing.
engSearchText:
Funny you say that. The officer asked me the
same thing.
jpnChrName: 婦警の方にも、まさしく 同じように尋ねられましたが……
jpnSearchText:
婦警の方にも、まさしく
同じように尋ねられましたが……

engChrName: After the man finished his shopping, he left without a word.
engSearchText:
After the man finished his shopping, he left without
a word.
jpnChrName: 男性の方は買い物を終えた後、 特に何も仰らずに店を出られましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
男性の方は買い物を終えた後、
特に何も仰らずに店を出られましたよ。

engChrName: What? For real?!
engSearchText: What? For real?!
jpnChrName: えっ、そうなんですか……！？
jpnSearchText: えっ、そうなんですか……！？

engChrName: It may be that he's decided to finally put an end to this affair.
engSearchText:
It may be that he's decided to finally put an end to
this affair.
jpnChrName: ここに来て、決着を付けようと しているのかもしれぬな。
jpnSearchText:
ここに来て、決着を付けようと
しているのかもしれぬな。

engChrName: Yeah. We gotta hurry.
engSearchText: Yeah. We gotta hurry.
jpnChrName: ええ、こいつは急いだ方がよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、こいつは急いだ方がよさそうですね。

engChrName: Huh? What are you all talking about?
engSearchText: Huh? What are you all talking about?
jpnChrName: け、決着といいますと……？
jpnSearchText: け、決着といいますと……？

engChrName: Oh, it's nothing you need to worry about. Thanks for the help!
engSearchText:
Oh, it's nothing you need to worry about. Thanks for
the help!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、気にしないでちょうだい。 教えてくれてありがとね！
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫、気にしないでちょうだい。
教えてくれてありがとね！

engChrName: So he isn't drawing this out any further.
engSearchText: So he isn't drawing this out any further.
jpnChrName: 男性が決着を付けようとしている、 という事でしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
男性が決着を付けようとしている、
という事でしたけど……

engChrName: It sounds like this will all come to a head soon.
engSearchText: It sounds like this will all come to a head soon.
jpnChrName: 今度は婦警の方を誘導した末に 対峙しようとしているという事でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今度は婦警の方を誘導した末に
対峙しようとしているという事でしょうか。

engChrName: Yeah. He's done playing games.
engSearchText: Yeah. He's done playing games.
jpnChrName: ああ、行き先を言わねえって事は 大方の誘導が済んだっつう事だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、行き先を言わねえって事は
大方の誘導が済んだっつう事だ。

engChrName: I'm afraid she's gonna be drawn in like a moth to a flame.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid she's gonna be drawn in like a moth to
a flame.
jpnChrName: その上で、行き先が言えねえ場所──
jpnSearchText: その上で、行き先が言えねえ場所──

engChrName: He's probably bringin' her to a place that's out of sight.
engSearchText:
He's probably bringin' her to a place that's out
of sight.
jpnChrName: どこか人気のない場所に 例の婦警を誘い込もうとしてるのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
どこか人気のない場所に
例の婦警を誘い込もうとしてるのかもな。

engChrName: Wouldn't that be difficult, though?
engSearchText: Wouldn't that be difficult, though?
jpnChrName: 人気のない場所ね……今のオラシオンじゃ そんな場所少ないと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
人気のない場所ね……今のオラシオンじゃ
そんな場所少ないと思うけど。

engChrName: The whole city's crawlin' with goons and buffoons. Even the back streets oughta be crowded right about now.
engSearchText:
The whole city's crawlin' with goons and buffoons.
Even the back streets oughta be crowded right
about now.
jpnChrName: 街中がどこかの組織の勢力下だもんな。 裏路地こそ賑わっちまってるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
街中がどこかの組織の勢力下だもんな。
裏路地こそ賑わっちまってるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: This is a toughie. Where do you think he'd try to lure her?
engSearchText:
This is a toughie. Where do you think he'd try to
lure her?
jpnChrName: うーん、となれば一体どこに 誘い込もうとしてるんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、となれば一体どこに
誘い込もうとしてるんでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm... Let's say that, for instance, our guy's a player in the game.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Let's say that, for instance, our guy's a player
in the game.
jpnChrName: その男がゲームの参加者なら 逆に絞られてくるはずだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
その男がゲームの参加者なら
逆に絞られてくるはずだぞ。

engChrName: He could take 'em someplace out of the public eye— and away from all the major players—without breakin' the rules.
engSearchText:
He could take 'em someplace out of the public eye—
and away from all the major players—without
breakin' the rules.
jpnChrName: 人目につかず、各勢力の拠点からは離れ、 “ルール”にも抵触しない場所──
jpnSearchText:
人目につかず、各勢力の拠点からは離れ、
“ルール”にも抵触しない場所──

engChrName: I can think of one place that'd fit all the criteria.
engSearchText: I can think of one place that'd fit all the criteria.
jpnChrName: となれば、考えられるのはあそこだろう。
jpnSearchText: となれば、考えられるのはあそこだろう。

engChrName: (Has to be the labyrinth entrance near the guild, right?)
engSearchText:
(Has to be the labyrinth entrance near the
guild, right?)
jpnChrName: （ギルド近くの地下遺跡の入口か……？）
jpnSearchText: （ギルド近くの地下遺跡の入口か……？）

engChrName: (Nah, there's no way. He wouldn't go near the guild with a ten-arge poll.)
engSearchText:
(Nah, there's no way. He wouldn't go near the guild
with a ten-arge poll.)
jpnChrName: （いや、あそこはギルドの勢力下だ。   面倒を避けるならあっちには行かねえだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、あそこはギルドの勢力下だ。
面倒を避けるならあっちには行かねえだろう。）

engChrName: (Must be Oración Station, right?)
engSearchText: (Must be Oración Station, right?)
jpnChrName: （オラシオン駅の方か……？）
jpnSearchText: （オラシオン駅の方か……？）

engChrName: (No, wait, that area's too populated.)
engSearchText: (No, wait, that area's too populated.)
jpnChrName: （いや、あっちは人が多すぎるか。）
jpnSearchText: （いや、あっちは人が多すぎるか。）

engChrName: (He wants the police officer to follow him—not lose him in the crowd.)
engSearchText:
(He wants the police officer to follow him—not lose
him in the crowd.)
jpnChrName: （婦警を誘い込みてえなら、   人ごみに紛れるような真似はしねえはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（婦警を誘い込みてえなら、
人ごみに紛れるような真似はしねえはずだ。）

engChrName: (Has to be the labyrinth entrance near the tavern, right?)
engSearchText:
(Has to be the labyrinth entrance near the
tavern, right?)
jpnChrName: （宿酒場近くの地下遺跡の入口か……？）
jpnSearchText: （宿酒場近くの地下遺跡の入口か……？）

engChrName: (Wait, no, that's our turf. Doubt he'd wanna go near us.)
engSearchText:
(Wait, no, that's our turf. Doubt he'd wanna go
near us.)
jpnChrName: （いや、あそこは俺達の拠点がある。）
jpnSearchText: （いや、あそこは俺達の拠点がある。）

engChrName: (Although, I guess it's possible that he'd underestimate us, but there's an easier place to lure her.)
engSearchText:
(Although, I guess it's possible that he'd
underestimate us, but there's an easier place to
lure her.)
jpnChrName: （舐められてる可能性もゼロじゃねえが、   誘い込むにはもっと相応しい場所があるはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（舐められてる可能性もゼロじゃねえが、
誘い込むにはもっと相応しい場所があるはずだ。）

engChrName: The parking lot near the city entrance. That's gotta be where he's headed.
engSearchText:
The parking lot near the city entrance. That's gotta
be where he's headed.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの入口の駐車場── ヤツの次の行き先はそこだろう。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの入口の駐車場──
ヤツの次の行き先はそこだろう。

engChrName: Oh! I hadn't even considered that!
engSearchText: Oh! I hadn't even considered that!
jpnChrName: 駐車場ですか……！ それは盲点でした……！
jpnSearchText:
駐車場ですか……！
それは盲点でした……！

engChrName: Are you certain, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText: Are you certain, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: 街の外に出てはいけないという “ルール”から考えても──
jpnSearchText:
街の外に出てはいけないという
“ルール”から考えても──

engChrName: If he is a player as you suspect, I sincerely doubt he'd want to go near the entrance, given that one rule.
engSearchText:
If he is a player as you suspect, I sincerely doubt he'd
want to go near the entrance, given that one rule.
jpnChrName: ルールを知るゲーム参加者こそが 近寄りにくい場所かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ルールを知るゲーム参加者こそが
近寄りにくい場所かもしれませんね。

engChrName: I know, but it's the best idea we've got. Some of the players ain't right in the head anyway.
engSearchText:
I know, but it's the best idea we've got. Some of the
players ain't right in the head anyway.
jpnChrName: ああ、結局男がどこの組織のヤツかまでは 会ってみねえと分からねえがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、結局男がどこの組織のヤツかまでは
会ってみねえと分からねえがな。

engChrName: Also, for all we know, he could be connected to Almata, like the officer believes.
engSearchText:
Also, for all we know, he could be connected to
Almata, like the officer believes.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも、婦警は男を《Ａ》関係者だと 思い込んでる可能性が高いみてえだ。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも、婦警は男を《Ａ》関係者だと
思い込んでる可能性が高いみてえだ。

engChrName: Anyhow, there's no time to dawdle. If they start a fight, she might need some backup.
engSearchText:
Anyhow, there's no time to dawdle. If they start a
fight, she might need some backup.
jpnChrName: 婦警が揉め事を起こさないとも限らねえし、 急いで向かった方がいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
婦警が揉め事を起こさないとも限らねえし、
急いで向かった方がいいかもな。

engChrName: Then let's hurry!
engSearchText: Then let's hurry!
jpnChrName: ええ、賭けてみる価値はありそうね。 それじゃ急いで向かってみましょう！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、賭けてみる価値はありそうね。
それじゃ急いで向かってみましょう！

engChrName: (The police officer and the man in the suit should be here.)
engSearchText:
(The police officer and the man in the suit should
be here.)
jpnChrName: （ここから先の駐車場に   婦警と例のスーツの男がいるはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここから先の駐車場に
婦警と例のスーツの男がいるはずだ。）

engChrName: (We need to be prepared for a fight. Should we head in now?)
engSearchText:
(We need to be prepared for a fight. Should we head
in now?)
jpnChrName: （万が一に備えて準備しといた方が   よさそうだが……このまま突入しちまうか？）
jpnSearchText:
（万が一に備えて準備しといた方が
よさそうだが……このまま突入しちまうか？）

engChrName: Okay, we're goin' in. Get out your weapons, guys!
engSearchText: Okay, we're goin' in. Get out your weapons, guys!
jpnChrName: それじゃ突入するぞ。 念の為戦えるように準備しておけ！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ突入するぞ。
念の為戦えるように準備しておけ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい──！
jpnSearchText: はい──！

engChrName: A few minutes prior—near the fountain in the South District...
engSearchText:
A few minutes prior—near the fountain in the
South District...
jpnChrName: ヴァン達の突入から時は遡り、 数分前の南街区の噴水前にて────
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達の突入から時は遡り、
数分前の南街区の噴水前にて────

engChrName: First an exchange shop, then the department store. He's making it look like he's just doing some shopping, but he can't fool me.
engSearchText:
First an exchange shop, then the department store.
He's making it look like he's just doing some
shopping, but he can't fool me.
jpnChrName: 交換屋に百貨店に…… のんきに買い物をしてるかと思ったら。
jpnSearchText:
交換屋に百貨店に……
のんきに買い物をしてるかと思ったら。

engChrName: Where is he going now?
engSearchText: Where is he going now?
jpnChrName: 今度はどこへ向かうつもりなの？
jpnSearchText: 今度はどこへ向かうつもりなの？

engChrName: The highway, maybe? No, he must have a car in the parking lot.
engSearchText:
The highway, maybe? No, he must have a car in the
parking lot.
jpnChrName: まさか街道に出るつもり？ いえ、駐車場に車を停めてあるのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
まさか街道に出るつもり？
いえ、駐車場に車を停めてあるのかしら。

engChrName: He's clearly not one of A's leaders, but I can still get some information out of him.
engSearchText:
He's clearly not one of A's leaders, but I can still get
some information out of him.
jpnChrName: ……アイツは彼を殺した《Ａ》の幹部じゃない。 だけど、情報を聞き出す事が出来れば……
jpnSearchText:
……アイツは彼を殺した《Ａ》の幹部じゃない。
だけど、情報を聞き出す事が出来れば……

engChrName: Just wait a little longer, Ewan. I WILL get revenge for you!
engSearchText:
Just wait a little longer, Ewan. I WILL get revenge
for you!
jpnChrName: 待っていて、ユアン。 貴方の仇は私が必ず……！
jpnSearchText:
待っていて、ユアン。
貴方の仇は私が必ず……！

engChrName: Disguised yourself as an officer lady, eh? Surprised you went to all that trouble.
engSearchText:
Disguised yourself as an officer lady, eh?
Surprised you went to all that trouble.
jpnChrName: ハッ、婦警の変装をしてくるとは 手の込んでいる事だ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、婦警の変装をしてくるとは
手の込んでいる事だ。

engChrName: Drop the gun and put your hands where I can see 'em. Unless you want a bullet in your brain.
engSearchText:
Drop the gun and put your hands where I can
see 'em. Unless you want a bullet in your brain.
jpnChrName: 銃を置いて両手を挙げろ。 さもなければ撃つぞ。
jpnSearchText:
銃を置いて両手を挙げろ。
さもなければ撃つぞ。

engChrName: That's my line.
engSearchText: That's my line.
jpnChrName: ──それはこちらの台詞よ！
jpnSearchText: ──それはこちらの台詞よ！

engChrName: You got a death wish, woman?
engSearchText: You got a death wish, woman?
jpnChrName: ハッ、命知らずな事だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、命知らずな事だ。

engChrName: Does Almata only hire the crazies?
engSearchText: Does Almata only hire the crazies?
jpnChrName: お前達《アルマータ》の魂胆は分かっているぞ？
jpnSearchText: お前達《アルマータ》の魂胆は分かっているぞ？

engChrName: Well, lunatic or not, your plan's as predictable as they come. You're tryin' to pick us off one by one since we ain't protected by the rules no more.
engSearchText:
Well, lunatic or not, your plan's as predictable as
they come. You're tryin' to pick us off one by one
since we ain't protected by the rules no more.
jpnChrName: ルールから外れた事を良い事に、 我々を襲撃しにくるだろうと思っていた。
jpnSearchText:
ルールから外れた事を良い事に、
我々を襲撃しにくるだろうと思っていた。

engChrName: Pity you didn't bring any backup. Bad move, sweetcheeks.
engSearchText:
Pity you didn't bring any backup. Bad
move, sweetcheeks.
jpnChrName: 単身で無防備に尾行してくるとは 舐められたものだがな。
jpnSearchText:
単身で無防備に尾行してくるとは
舐められたものだがな。

engChrName: So this was a trap.
engSearchText: So this was a trap.
jpnChrName: ……ッ、なるほどね…………
jpnSearchText: ……ッ、なるほどね…………

engChrName: I have no clue why you thought I was in disguise or what you mean by 'rules,' but one thing's crystal clear:
engSearchText:
I have no clue why you thought I was in disguise or
what you mean by 'rules,' but one thing's crystal clear:
jpnChrName: 変装？　ルール？ やっぱり《アルマータ》は言葉が通じないようね。
jpnSearchText:
変装？　ルール？
やっぱり《アルマータ》は言葉が通じないようね。

engChrName: You're members of the Almata mafia.
engSearchText: You're members of the Almata mafia.
jpnChrName: 後をつけながら確信したわ。 確かに貴方の仕草はマフィア特有のものだった。
jpnSearchText:
後をつけながら確信したわ。
確かに貴方の仕草はマフィア特有のものだった。

engChrName: I know your executives are hiding here in Oración!
engSearchText: I know your executives are hiding here in Oración!
jpnChrName: そして《アルマータ》が古都に 潜伏している事も掴んでいるわ！
jpnSearchText:
そして《アルマータ》が古都に
潜伏している事も掴んでいるわ！

engChrName: I have no business with grunts like you. I want to speak with the man in the armor and the girl who controls the doll.
engSearchText:
I have no business with grunts like you. I want to
speak with the man in the armor and the girl who
controls the doll.
jpnChrName: でも、私が用があるのは構成員の貴方じゃない。 ──鎧の男と、人形を操る包帯の女よ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、私が用があるのは構成員の貴方じゃない。
──鎧の男と、人形を操る包帯の女よ。

engChrName: If you want to live to see tomorrow, you will bring me to them at once!
engSearchText:
If you want to live to see tomorrow, you will bring me
to them at once!
jpnChrName: 命が惜しければ、今すぐ私を 二人の元まで案内しなさいッ！
jpnSearchText:
命が惜しければ、今すぐ私を
二人の元まで案内しなさいッ！

engChrName: Seems we got a little misunderstanding here.
engSearchText: Seems we got a little misunderstanding here.
jpnChrName: クク──なんだ、そういう事か。
jpnSearchText: クク──なんだ、そういう事か。

engChrName: And here I was, getting all stressed thinkin' that Almata was coming after the losers.
engSearchText:
And here I was, getting all stressed thinkin' that
Almata was coming after the losers.
jpnChrName: 《アルマータ》が脱落者をどう扱うか 慎重に様子を窺っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
《アルマータ》が脱落者をどう扱うか
慎重に様子を窺っていたが……

engChrName: You caused me so much grief for no damn reason.
engSearchText: You caused me so much grief for no damn reason.
jpnChrName: お前に関しては、 ただの杞憂に過ぎなかったという訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
お前に関しては、
ただの杞憂に過ぎなかったという訳だな。

engChrName: What...?
engSearchText: What...?
jpnChrName: それは…………
jpnSearchText: それは…………

engChrName: *sigh* I can't be bothered to explain all this. I'd rather just off ya and go about my evening in peace.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't be bothered to explain all this. I'd rather
just off ya and go about my evening in peace.
jpnChrName: だが誤解を解いてやるのも面倒だ。
jpnSearchText: だが誤解を解いてやるのも面倒だ。

engChrName: Tell Aidios the Dolor Family sends their regards.
engSearchText: Tell Aidios the Dolor Family sends their regards.
jpnChrName: あの世で《ドゥール・ファミリー》に 楯突いた事を後悔するんだな──！
jpnSearchText:
あの世で《ドゥール・ファミリー》に
楯突いた事を後悔するんだな──！

engChrName: The hell...?!
engSearchText: The hell...?!
jpnChrName: くっ、何者だッ！？
jpnSearchText: くっ、何者だッ！？

engChrName: Phew. Barely made it.
engSearchText: Phew. Barely made it.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、間に合いましたね……！
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、間に合いましたね……！

engChrName: Sorry to drop in on ya.
engSearchText: Sorry to drop in on ya.
jpnChrName: よう、邪魔して悪いな。
jpnSearchText: よう、邪魔して悪いな。

engChrName: Except we're totally not sorry.
engSearchText: Except we're totally not sorry.
jpnChrName: ハッ、思ってたよりも状況が こんがらがってるみてえじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、思ってたよりも状況が
こんがらがってるみてえじゃねえか。

engChrName: We're not here to pick a fight, so why don't we all just walk away and pretend this never happened.
engSearchText:
We're not here to pick a fight, so why don't we all
just walk away and pretend this never happened.
jpnChrName: 先に言っておくが俺達に戦意は無い。 手を引いてもらえると手間が省けるんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
先に言っておくが俺達に戦意は無い。
手を引いてもらえると手間が省けるんだがな。

engChrName: That's not gonna fly, pal. We're gonna send ya straight to Gehenna!
engSearchText:
That's not gonna fly, pal. We're gonna send ya
straight to Gehenna!
jpnChrName: たわけた事を！ 行くぞお前ら、敵を排除しろ！
jpnSearchText:
たわけた事を！
行くぞお前ら、敵を排除しろ！

engChrName: Officer Crema! Please get behind us!
engSearchText: Officer Crema! Please get behind us!
jpnChrName: クレマ巡査は私達の後ろへ！
jpnSearchText: クレマ巡査は私達の後ろへ！

engChrName: H-How do you know my name?! Are you—
engSearchText: H-How do you know my name?! Are you—
jpnChrName: ど、どうして私の事を！？ まさか貴方達は────
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうして私の事を！？
まさか貴方達は────

engChrName: Save the chitchat for later. We've gotta deal with these idiots first!
engSearchText:
Save the chitchat for later. We've gotta deal with
these idiots first!
jpnChrName: チッ、説明は後だ。 まずはこいつらを片付けるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、説明は後だ。
まずはこいつらを片付けるぞ！

engChrName: Commencing suppression of enemy forces!
engSearchText: Commencing suppression of enemy forces!
jpnChrName: 敵勢力の掃討を開始します──！
jpnSearchText: 敵勢力の掃討を開始します──！

engChrName: Damn... You guys're good. What's your aim here?!
engSearchText: Damn... You guys're good. What's your aim here?!
jpnChrName: チッ……ここまで腕が立つとは…… お前達は一体何が狙いだ！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……ここまで腕が立つとは……
お前達は一体何が狙いだ！？

engChrName: Nothing. Like I said, we weren't here to pick a fight with you.
engSearchText:
Nothing. Like I said, we weren't here to pick a fight
with you.
jpnChrName: さっきも言ったが、アンタらには用はねえ。 ちょいと婦警に用事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
さっきも言ったが、アンタらには用はねえ。
ちょいと婦警に用事があってな。

engChrName: We were just helping out our runaway client.
engSearchText: We were just helping out our runaway client.
jpnChrName: オイ、依頼を出しておいてばっくれるとは いい度胸してるじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
オイ、依頼を出しておいてばっくれるとは
いい度胸してるじゃねーか？

engChrName: So you really are the famous Arkride Solutions, then?
engSearchText: So you really are the famous Arkride Solutions, then?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ…… やっぱり貴方達は《裏解決屋》なのね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ……
やっぱり貴方達は《裏解決屋》なのね。

engChrName: That's correct. Officer Katarina requested that we follow you.
engSearchText:
That's correct. Officer Katarina requested that we
follow you.
jpnChrName: はい、カタリナ巡査に依頼をされて ここまで追いかけて来てしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
はい、カタリナ巡査に依頼をされて
ここまで追いかけて来てしまいました。

engChrName: Ugh. Didn't think we'd get into any fights with players in the city.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Didn't think we'd get into any fights with
players in the city.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》…… 確かお前たちも参加者だったな。
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋》……
確かお前たちも参加者だったな。

engChrName: That's your own damn fault. Anyway, we'll be leavin' with her.
engSearchText:
That's your own damn fault. Anyway, we'll be leavin'
with her.
jpnChrName: ああ、この婦警の事は こっちで預からせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この婦警の事は
こっちで預からせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Now, wait just a moment. I'm not finished with them!
engSearchText:
Now, wait just a moment. I'm not finished
with them!
jpnChrName: ちょっと待って、勝手に話を進めないで。 コイツは間違いなくマフィアなのよ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと待って、勝手に話を進めないで。
コイツは間違いなくマフィアなのよ！

engChrName: These guys are clearly mafia scum—and the only mafia gang that'd be in this city is Almata!
engSearchText:
These guys are clearly mafia scum—and the only
mafia gang that'd be in this city is Almata!
jpnChrName: そしてこの街にのさばってる組織と言えば 《アルマータ》に決まってる──
jpnSearchText:
そしてこの街にのさばってる組織と言えば
《アルマータ》に決まってる──

engChrName: I won't let them escape—not until I get revenge for Ewan!
engSearchText:
I won't let them escape—not until I get revenge
for Ewan!
jpnChrName: ユアンの仇を討つためにも、 ここでこいつらを逃す訳には行かないわ！
jpnSearchText:
ユアンの仇を討つためにも、
ここでこいつらを逃す訳には行かないわ！

engChrName: Hate to tell you this, lady, but I don't think you understand what's goin' on here.
engSearchText:
Hate to tell you this, lady, but I don't think you
understand what's goin' on here.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、今のオラシオンは アンタが知ってるよりも特殊な状況でな。
jpnSearchText:
悪いが、今のオラシオンは
アンタが知ってるよりも特殊な状況でな。

engChrName: Almost every cockroach from Calvard's criminal underbelly is crawlin' around here.
engSearchText:
Almost every cockroach from Calvard's criminal
underbelly is crawlin' around here.
jpnChrName: 共和国全土から裏社会の人間が集まってんだよ。
jpnSearchText: 共和国全土から裏社会の人間が集まってんだよ。

engChrName: We even got mafias from the western regions of the Republic, for example.
engSearchText:
We even got mafias from the western regions of the
Republic, for example.
jpnChrName: 例えば、共和国西部を縄張りにしてる マフィアだったりもな。
jpnSearchText:
例えば、共和国西部を縄張りにしてる
マフィアだったりもな。

engChrName: Just calm down and think about it for a sec. You had to have realized somethin' was up, right?
engSearchText:
Just calm down and think about it for a sec. You had
to have realized somethin' was up, right?
jpnChrName: 冷静になって考えてみろ。 アンタも薄々は気付いてるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
冷静になって考えてみろ。
アンタも薄々は気付いてるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: W-Well...
engSearchText: W-Well...
jpnChrName: そ、それは…………
jpnSearchText: そ、それは…………

engChrName: Now that you mention it, I did find it strange that HQ told us to leave them to their devices.
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, I did find it strange that
HQ told us to leave them to their devices.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……本部から連絡があった “不干渉”っていうのはそういう事なのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……本部から連絡があった
“不干渉”っていうのはそういう事なのね。

engChrName: I'm guessing something sinister is unfolding behind the scenes—and for whatever reason, we can't interfere.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing something sinister is unfolding behind
the scenes—and for whatever reason, we
can't interfere.
jpnChrName: 今この街で、警察ですら介入できないような 裏社会の大きな動きがあるという事……
jpnSearchText:
今この街で、警察ですら介入できないような
裏社会の大きな動きがあるという事……

engChrName: That's more or less the situation, yes.
engSearchText: That's more or less the situation, yes.
jpnChrName: 簡潔に言えば、そんな感じかな。
jpnSearchText: 簡潔に言えば、そんな感じかな。

engChrName: Oh, there you are, Officer Crema! We've been looking all over for you!
engSearchText:
Oh, there you are, Officer Crema! We've been
looking all over for you!
jpnChrName: ふう……探しましたよ、 クレマ巡査に裏解決屋の皆さん……！
jpnSearchText:
ふう……探しましたよ、
クレマ巡査に裏解決屋の皆さん……！

engChrName: Well, look what we have here. If it isn't the Dolor Family.
engSearchText:
Well, look what we have here. If it isn't the
Dolor Family.
jpnChrName: この状況は…… 急いで駆け付けて正解だったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
この状況は……
急いで駆け付けて正解だったみたいだな。

engChrName: Oh, hey. Didn't expect to see you guys here.
engSearchText: Oh, hey. Didn't expect to see you guys here.
jpnChrName: お前らは首都の遊撃士の……！
jpnSearchText: お前らは首都の遊撃士の……！

engChrName: Same to you. I'd like to ask what's going on, but first, we need to arrest these guys.
engSearchText:
Same to you. I'd like to ask what's going on, but first,
we need to arrest these guys.
jpnChrName: お話したい事はありますが、 まずは《ドゥール・ファミリー》を拘束しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
お話したい事はありますが、
まずは《ドゥール・ファミリー》を拘束しましょう。

engChrName: You won't be causing trouble here any longer.
engSearchText: You won't be causing trouble here any longer.
jpnChrName: これ以上好き勝手されちゃ困るんでな。
jpnSearchText: これ以上好き勝手されちゃ困るんでな。

engChrName: We'll be placing you under arrest for the time being.
engSearchText: We'll be placing you under arrest for the time being.
jpnChrName: お前達はギルドの施設で 一時的に拘束させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前達はギルドの施設で
一時的に拘束させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: You can enjoy some quality time with the other detainees we picked up here.
engSearchText:
You can enjoy some quality time with the other
detainees we picked up here.
jpnChrName: 向こうで、ギルドが地下遺跡で 出くわした連中と仲良くしておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
向こうで、ギルドが地下遺跡で
出くわした連中と仲良くしておいてくれ。

engChrName: You won't be causing trouble here any longer.
engSearchText: You won't be causing trouble here any longer.
jpnChrName: これ以上好き勝手されちゃ困るんでな。
jpnSearchText: これ以上好き勝手されちゃ困るんでな。

engChrName: We'll be placing you under arrest for the time being.
engSearchText: We'll be placing you under arrest for the time being.
jpnChrName: お前達はギルドの施設で 一時的に拘束させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前達はギルドの施設で
一時的に拘束させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Damn you, bracer scum!
engSearchText: Damn you, bracer scum!
jpnChrName: チッ……遊撃士風情が……！
jpnSearchText: チッ……遊撃士風情が……！

engChrName: Everyone helped secure the Dolor Family.
engSearchText: Everyone helped secure the Dolor Family.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァン達は遊撃士の２人に協力し、 《ドゥール・ファミリー》を拘束したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァン達は遊撃士の２人に協力し、
《ドゥール・ファミリー》を拘束したのだった。

engChrName: Okay. Thanks for taking those guys off our hands.
engSearchText: Okay. Thanks for taking those guys off our hands.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、とりあえずこれで一安心かしら。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、とりあえずこれで一安心かしら。

engChrName: And thank you for making it so easy to round them up.
engSearchText:
And thank you for making it so easy to round
them up.
jpnChrName: アンタ達のおかげで俺達２人がかりでも 拘束できた、協力に感謝するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達のおかげで俺達２人がかりでも
拘束できた、協力に感謝するぜ。

engChrName: All righty. We got a client to report to, so we'll be on our way.
engSearchText:
All righty. We got a client to report to, so we'll be on
our way.
jpnChrName: さて、それじゃマフィア共の事は任せて 俺達は依頼主に報告に行くか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、それじゃマフィア共の事は任せて
俺達は依頼主に報告に行くか。

engChrName: One moment, spriggan.
engSearchText: One moment, spriggan.
jpnChrName: 待ちなさい。
jpnSearchText: 待ちなさい。

engChrName: You know where Almata's hiding, don't you?
engSearchText: You know where Almata's hiding, don't you?
jpnChrName: やっぱり知ってるんでしょう、裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText: やっぱり知ってるんでしょう、裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: Won't you tell me?
engSearchText: Won't you tell me?
jpnChrName: 《アルマータ》の居場所について 教えてくれないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
《アルマータ》の居場所について
教えてくれないかしら？

engChrName: I can't, sorry. That's what I was plannin' on telling you before you ran off.
engSearchText:
I can't, sorry. That's what I was plannin' on telling
you before you ran off.
jpnChrName: ……悪いが、それは教えられねえな。 そう伝える為にアンタを探してたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……悪いが、それは教えられねえな。
そう伝える為にアンタを探してたんだ。

engChrName: But...why? WHY?! Was the amount offered too low? I'll pay double if that's what it takes!
engSearchText:
But...why? WHY?! Was the amount offered too low?
I'll pay double if that's what it takes!
jpnChrName: 何で……どうしてよ……！？ ミラなら今の倍を出しても構わないわ！
jpnSearchText:
何で……どうしてよ……！？
ミラなら今の倍を出しても構わないわ！

engChrName: Calm yourself, officer. Almata isn't an enemy you can face on your own.
engSearchText:
Calm yourself, officer. Almata isn't an enemy you can
face on your own.
jpnChrName: 冷静になるがいい、婦警殿よ。 相手はおぬし一人で敵う相手ではない。
jpnSearchText:
冷静になるがいい、婦警殿よ。
相手はおぬし一人で敵う相手ではない。

engChrName: If you throw yourself into the fires of revenge, you will only get burned by its flames.
engSearchText:
If you throw yourself into the fires of revenge, you
will only get burned by its flames.
jpnChrName: 会った所で、復讐すらままならず、 悪戯に命を落とすだけとなろう。
jpnSearchText:
会った所で、復讐すらままならず、
悪戯に命を落とすだけとなろう。

engChrName: Don't throw away your life. Your loved ones— including those who have gone to Aidios—would not want you to lose your way.
engSearchText:
Don't throw away your life. Your loved ones—
including those who have gone to Aidios—would not
want you to lose your way.
jpnChrName: 女神の下へ行った者の為にも 道を誤ってはならぬ。
jpnSearchText:
女神の下へ行った者の為にも
道を誤ってはならぬ。

engChrName: You... You think I don't know that already?! Of course I do!
engSearchText:
You... You think I don't know that already?!
Of course I do!
jpnChrName: そんな事……分かってるわよ……っ！ でも、納得できるわけないじゃないっ！
jpnSearchText:
そんな事……分かってるわよ……っ！
でも、納得できるわけないじゃないっ！

engChrName: But that doesn't matter! The man I loved was taken from me...so do you expect me to sit around and do nothing?!
engSearchText:
But that doesn't matter! The man I loved was taken
from me...so do you expect me to sit around and
do nothing?!
jpnChrName: 愛する人を奪われたっていうのに じっとしてろっていうの！？
jpnSearchText:
愛する人を奪われたっていうのに
じっとしてろっていうの！？

engChrName: Officer Crema...
engSearchText: Officer Crema...
jpnChrName: クレマ巡査……
jpnSearchText: クレマ巡査……

engChrName: Please calm down, Crema.
engSearchText: Please calm down, Crema.
jpnChrName: 落ち着いて下さい、クレマさん。
jpnSearchText: 落ち着いて下さい、クレマさん。

engChrName: While we did come here in part to apprehend the Dolor Family...
engSearchText:
While we did come here in part to apprehend the
Dolor Family...
jpnChrName: 《ドゥール・ファミリー》の件もありましたが……
jpnSearchText: 《ドゥール・ファミリー》の件もありましたが……

engChrName: ...we also had something to tell you.
engSearchText: ...we also had something to tell you.
jpnChrName: 僕達がここに来たのは、貴女に伝えなくては ならない事があるからなんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕達がここに来たのは、貴女に伝えなくては
ならない事があるからなんですよ。

engChrName: And that is...?
engSearchText: And that is...?
jpnChrName: 私に伝えたい事……？
jpnSearchText: 私に伝えたい事……？

engChrName: Kirchheim asked us to tell you...
engSearchText: Kirchheim asked us to tell you...
jpnChrName: キルヒハイムから、 急ぎ伝えるようにと言われたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
キルヒハイムから、
急ぎ伝えるようにと言われたんだ。

engChrName: ...Ewan's final words.
engSearchText: ...Ewan's final words.
jpnChrName: ユアンが彼女であるアンタに遺した遺言をな……
jpnSearchText: ユアンが彼女であるアンタに遺した遺言をな……

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: ユ、ユアンの……！？
jpnSearchText: ユ、ユアンの……！？

engChrName: So Kirchheim finally woke up.
engSearchText: So Kirchheim finally woke up.
jpnChrName: それにキルヒハイムさん…… 無事に目を醒ましたのね。
jpnSearchText:
それにキルヒハイムさん……
無事に目を醒ましたのね。

engChrName: Was he in coma or something?
engSearchText: Was he in coma or something?
jpnChrName: 事情はよく分からないけど……
jpnSearchText: 事情はよく分からないけど……

engChrName: Do you mind if I ask what happened?
engSearchText: Do you mind if I ask what happened?
jpnChrName: 遊撃士協会の方でも 色々と辛い事があったみたいね……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士協会の方でも
色々と辛い事があったみたいね……

engChrName: A few days ago, he and Ewan were exploring the labyrinth.
engSearchText:
A few days ago, he and Ewan were exploring
the labyrinth.
jpnChrName: ああ……数日前の事だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……数日前の事だ。

engChrName: They noticed something was out of the ordinary and ran into Almata, who was busy doing preparations for...uhh...you know what.
engSearchText:
They noticed something was out of the ordinary and
ran into Almata, who was busy doing preparations
for...uhh...you know what.
jpnChrName: 例のモン（ゲーム）の仕込みをしていた《Ａ》と、 異変を察知した遊撃士二名が衝突……
jpnSearchText:
例のモン（ゲーム）の仕込みをしていた《Ａ》と、
異変を察知した遊撃士二名が衝突……

engChrName: As a result, Almata attacked them and Kirchheim was rendered unconscious and in critical condition.
engSearchText:
As a result, Almata attacked them and Kirchheim was
rendered unconscious and in critical condition.
jpnChrName: そこでキルヒハイムは 意識不明の重体になっちまって……
jpnSearchText:
そこでキルヒハイムは
意識不明の重体になっちまって……

engChrName: Though he would not be alive right now if not for Ewan—who gave his life to protect him.
engSearchText:
Though he would not be alive right now if not for
Ewan—who gave his life to protect him.
jpnChrName: 彼を庇ったユアンは──殉職したそうだ。
jpnSearchText: 彼を庇ったユアンは──殉職したそうだ。

engChrName: Ah. Now I understand why Officer Crema was so hellbent on revenge.
engSearchText:
Ah. Now I understand why Officer Crema was so
hellbent on revenge.
jpnChrName: そういう事だったのね…… 彼女の気持ち、分かる気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
そういう事だったのね……
彼女の気持ち、分かる気がするわ。

engChrName: Please tell me. What did Ewan say?
engSearchText: Please tell me. What did Ewan say?
jpnChrName: 聞かせてちょうだい。 ユアンは、なんて言っていたの……？
jpnSearchText:
聞かせてちょうだい。
ユアンは、なんて言っていたの……？

engChrName: He said he was so glad he met you...
engSearchText: He said he was so glad he met you...
jpnChrName: ──貴女と出会えて幸せだった、と。 言っていたそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
──貴女と出会えて幸せだった、と。
言っていたそうですよ。

engChrName: ...and that he was satisfied with the life that he led— as a bracer and a protector of this city.
engSearchText:
...and that he was satisfied with the life that he led—
as a bracer and a protector of this city.
jpnChrName: そして、憧れていた遊撃士として 全力を尽くした日々に後悔はないと。
jpnSearchText:
そして、憧れていた遊撃士として
全力を尽くした日々に後悔はないと。

engChrName: Kirchheim also had this to say.
engSearchText: Kirchheim also had this to say.
jpnChrName: キルヒハイムが言ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText: キルヒハイムが言ってたぜ。

engChrName: He fought till his last breath. For this city—and for his injured friend.
engSearchText:
He fought till his last breath. For this city—and for
his injured friend.
jpnChrName: 街の為に……そして怪我をした自分の為に、 最後も一歩も引かずに戦ってたってよ。
jpnSearchText:
街の為に……そして怪我をした自分の為に、
最後も一歩も引かずに戦ってたってよ。

engChrName: He has my respect. Ewan was one of the finest bracers I have ever known.
engSearchText:
He has my respect. Ewan was one of the finest
bracers I have ever known.
jpnChrName: 尊敬するぜ……ユアンは誰よりも立派な遊撃士だ。
jpnSearchText: 尊敬するぜ……ユアンは誰よりも立派な遊撃士だ。

engChrName: That's not fair.
engSearchText: That's not fair.
jpnChrName: ……ズルいわよ。
jpnSearchText: ……ズルいわよ。

engChrName: Putting on airs, acting like some cool hero... Saying he was satisfied...
engSearchText:
Putting on airs, acting like some cool hero...
Saying he was satisfied...
jpnChrName: そんな風に格好つけちゃって…… 満足したような事を言って……！
jpnSearchText:
そんな風に格好つけちゃって……
満足したような事を言って……！

engChrName: We had a date to the movies planned... We were going to get married!
engSearchText:
We had a date to the movies planned... We were
going to get married!
jpnChrName: 来週の映画の約束だって…… 結婚の話だってまだじゃない……っ！
jpnSearchText:
来週の映画の約束だって……
結婚の話だってまだじゃない……っ！

engChrName: So why...? Why did you leave me behind?!
engSearchText: So why...? Why did you leave me behind?!
jpnChrName: それなのにっ……どうして……！ どうして私を置いて行くのよぉ……！
jpnSearchText:
それなのにっ……どうして……！
どうして私を置いて行くのよぉ……！

engChrName: *sob* Aaaaaah!
engSearchText: *sob* Aaaaaah!
jpnChrName: あぁぁぁぁっ…………！
jpnSearchText: あぁぁぁぁっ…………！

engChrName: (There's no way those of us left behind can ever accept it.)
engSearchText:
(There's no way those of us left behind can ever
accept it.)
jpnChrName: （残された僕達からしたら、   納得できるはずがありませんよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（残された僕達からしたら、
納得できるはずがありませんよね……）

engChrName: As Officer Crema's cries echoed through the streets, Van's group paid respects to the fallen bracer.
engSearchText:
As Officer Crema's cries echoed through the streets,
Van's group paid respects to the fallen bracer.
jpnChrName: クレマ巡査の慟哭が響き渡る中── ヴァン達は静かに亡き遊撃士を偲んだのだった。
jpnSearchText:
クレマ巡査の慟哭が響き渡る中──
ヴァン達は静かに亡き遊撃士を偲んだのだった。

engChrName: That... That was quite a shameful display, wasn't it?
engSearchText: That... That was quite a shameful display, wasn't it?
jpnChrName: ……みっともない所を見せて悪かったわね。
jpnSearchText: ……みっともない所を見せて悪かったわね。

engChrName: I think I just needed to let it all out. I'm okay now.
engSearchText: I think I just needed to let it all out. I'm okay now.
jpnChrName: もう大丈夫だから……心配しないで。
jpnSearchText: もう大丈夫だから……心配しないで。

engChrName: All right. But remember, we're always here if you need a shoulder to cry on.
engSearchText:
All right. But remember, we're always here if you
need a shoulder to cry on.
jpnChrName: ……分かりました。 でも無理はしないで下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました。
でも無理はしないで下さいね。

engChrName: Yeah, no need to hold it all in. It's always okay to cry when you need to.
engSearchText:
Yeah, no need to hold it all in. It's always okay to cry
when you need to.
jpnChrName: そうよ、泣きたい時に 泣いておいた方がいいんだから。
jpnSearchText:
そうよ、泣きたい時に
泣いておいた方がいいんだから。

engChrName: Heehee. I think I'll be fine, but I appreciate the offer.
engSearchText: Heehee. I think I'll be fine, but I appreciate the offer.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとう。 でもこれ以上皆さんに迷惑はかけられないわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ありがとう。
でもこれ以上皆さんに迷惑はかけられないわ。

engChrName: And thank you both for passing on that message.
engSearchText: And thank you both for passing on that message.
jpnChrName: ……２人とも、 伝言を伝えてくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
……２人とも、
伝言を伝えてくれてありがとう。

engChrName: Of course. I just wish we could've done more.
engSearchText: Of course. I just wish we could've done more.
jpnChrName: いえ……大した事はしていませんから。
jpnSearchText: いえ……大した事はしていませんから。

engChrName: You should thank Kirchheim as well.
engSearchText: You should thank Kirchheim as well.
jpnChrName: 礼ならキルヒハイムに言ってやってくれ。
jpnSearchText: 礼ならキルヒハイムに言ってやってくれ。

engChrName: Now, then. I think it's high time we send those goons up the river.
engSearchText:
Now, then. I think it's high time we send those goons
up the river.
jpnChrName: さてと……それじゃここいらで マフィア共を連れて行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……それじゃここいらで
マフィア共を連れて行くとするか。

engChrName: Y'all have a safe trip.
engSearchText: Y'all have a safe trip.
jpnChrName: おう、よろしく頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: おう、よろしく頼んだぜ。

engChrName: In the meantime, I'm gonna go report to our client.
engSearchText: In the meantime, I'm gonna go report to our client.
jpnChrName: それじゃ改めて……俺達も依頼人の所に 報告に行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ改めて……俺達も依頼人の所に
報告に行くとするか。

engChrName: Van got in touch with Officer Katarina.
engSearchText: Van got in touch with Officer Katarina.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達はカタリナ巡査に連絡を取り……
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァン達はカタリナ巡査に連絡を取り……

engChrName: After a brief discussion, they agreed to meet in front of the police station that Officer Crema was assigned to.
engSearchText:
After a brief discussion, they agreed to meet in front
of the police station that Officer Crema was
assigned to.
jpnChrName: クレマ巡査の勤務担当となっていた 駐在所前で合流する事となった。
jpnSearchText:
クレマ巡査の勤務担当となっていた
駐在所前で合流する事となった。
